jahan tak usake rahane ka saval hai vah munbaee mahanagar ke door ya pas ke kisi upanagar men steshan se kafi door kisi jhopadapatti men rah sakata hai aur entap hil bandra sarakari vasahat sahar pi end ti kaloni men klas for kvartars men se kisi flait men sablaiting karake ek kamara bhi lekar rah sakata hai aur yah bhi ho sakata hai ki kahin khane kee suvidha ke sath peing gest ban kar rah raha ho yah bhi ho sakata hai ki vah kisi hed klark numa apane kisi bos ke dedh kamare ke makan men rat ko bistar bichhane bhar kee jagah men rah raha ho hone ko to yah bhi ho sakata hai ki vah kisi laj men chhah ya aath bistaron vale ek bade se kamare men rah raha ho jahan rahane ke sathsath khane kee bhi suvidha ho beshak vahan ka khana itana ghatiya ho ki aaye din usaka pet kharab ho jata ho lekin fir bhi vahin jama huaa ho aur chah kar bhi use chhodane kee himmat n juta pata ho itana tay hai ki vah kahin bhi rah raha ho kiraye ka kamara le kar rahane kee usakee haisiyat nahin hai hoti to kathanayika se kab kee usakee shadi ho chukee hoti aur vah is samay yahan baitha usaka intazar n kar raha hota
kathanayika ko ab tak aa jana chahiye usane socha aur rah chalate ek aadami kee ghadi par nigah dali use yahan baithe hue paintalis minat hone ko aaye the

kathanayika se usakee mulakat yahin isi jagah par huee thi lagabhag dhaee sal pahale katha nayika kee zindagi bhi kamobesh kathanayak jaisi hi hai usaka bhi koee bhi nam naukari digri jati dharm ho sakata hai alabatta vah rahati apane ghar men hai aur is tarah se kuchh mayanon men kathanayak se behatar sthiti men hai bakee baten kathanayak se milati julati hain shayad isi vazah se donon ke bich batachit shuroo huee hogi donon men doek fark aur hain kathanayak is shahar men paradesi hai yahan usaka koee nahin hai kathanayika sthaniy hai usaka apana ghar bar hai bakee sare dukh ek jaise sanjhe aur lagabhag barabar bhi kathanayika sadharan kathi kee ausatsi dikhane vali ladakee hai beshak usakee aankhen khoob gahari aur khas tarah kee chamak liye hue hain usaka bakee cheharamohara sadharan hai rang bhi thoda daba huaa hai jisakee vajah vah kaee bar hinata bhi mahasoos karati hai

ek minat thaharen yahan is bat kee zaroorat mahasoos ho rahi hai ki kahani men behatar sanvad sthapit karane kee drishti se katha nayak aur katha nayika ka namakaran kar diya jaye taki un donon kee kahani padhate hue ham yah mahasoos karate rahen ki ve bhi hamari tarah had mans ke jite jagate insan hain aur unakee bhi beshak mamooli hi ho apani khud ka zindagi hai aur unakee bhi ek pahachan hai choonki yahan kahi ja rahi kahani bharat desh usakee aazadi kee pachasavin varshaganth aur us dauran kee katha nayak tatha katha nayika ke prem kee kahani hai at in donon ke nam bharat aur bharati rakh diye jayen to aap shayad etaraz n karen sanyog se katha nayika bharati upanam se kavitaen bhi likhati hai

hamare katha nayak aur katha nayika jinhen ham aage poori kahani men bharat aur bharati ke nam se janenge halat ke mare do adane se insan hain behad sharif aur zamane bhar ke satae hue unakee poori zindagi ko sirf tin lafajon men bayan kiya ja sakata hai  sangharsh sangharsh aur sangharsh safalata ek bhi nahin vaise mauka milata to ve bhi zindagi kee sari sidhiyan aapako ek sath chadh kar dikha dete bas unhen apani zindagi sanvarane ke mauke hi nahin mile har tarah se yogy hone ke bavazood apani taraf se har sanbhav koshish kar lene ke bavazood vaise unakee is halat ke lie unhen to kattaee doshi nahin thaharaya ja sakata yah bat bhi hai ki ve halat ka shikar hone vale akele pahale ya aakhiri bhi nahin hain daraasal isake pichhe ek lambi kahani hai aur use bayan karane ke lie hamen apani is prem kahani ko thodi der ke lie yahin rok kar halat kee us kahani kee tah men jana hoga han itana zaroor hai ki jab ham katha nayak aur katha nayika ke bahane un sari sthitiyon kee padatal kar rahe honge to ve donon bhi lagatar is kahani men hamare aas pas bane rahenge balki jahan bhi mauka mila hamen aage kee apani kahani khud hi sunayenge

to desh kee aazadi kee yah pachasavin varshaganth thi vaise to katha nayak aur katha nayika ke lie aazadi ke is sal aur pichhale unachas salon men koee antar nahin tha yah sal bhi pichhale sare salon kee tarah vaise hi shuroo ho kar yoon hi guzar jane vala tha fir bhi yah sal pichhale salon se is roop men alag tha ki sarakari taur par aur sarakari kharche par poore desh men sal bhar tak utsav ka mahaul rahane vala tha is mad ke lie sarakar ne karodon rupaye pahale hi ek taraf rakh diye the jinhen sal bhar chalane vale sarakari samarohon utsavon natakon aur nautankiyon men khule hathon kharch kiya jana tha in aayojanon ke lie bahut oonche daraje kee bisiyon samitiyan bana di gayi thin aur unake salah mashavire se ye sare bhavy aayojan kiye jane the jahan tak katha nayak aur nayika ka in sab aayojanon se judane ka saval tha ve in sari chizon ke prati poori tarah udasin the vaise bhi sarakar ne unhen in sabamen shamil hone ke lie nahin kaha tha kahata bhi kaun kisi ne n to unhen in sabake lie aamantrit kiya tha aur n hi kisi bhi stej par unhen vishvas men hi liya gaya tha ve chah kar bhi in sabamen shamil nahin ho sakate the

katha nayika ke intazar men baithe katha nayak bharat kee sochane kee gambhir mudra dekh kar kalpana karana mushkil nahin lagata ki vah is samay kis udhedabun se guzar raha hoga ho sakata hai vah is samay door kisi ganv men ya chhote shahar men apani bimar man ritayard bap berozagar chhote bhaee shadi ke intazar men baithi bahan ke bare men soch raha ho aur is mahine bhi unhen ab tak mani aardar n bhej pane ke bare men pareshan ho raha ho ya use aaj apani is naukari se bhi javab mil gaya ho aur vah ek bar fir berozagar hone ja raha ho ho sakata hai kal usakee premika ka janmadin ho aur vah usake lie koee chhotamota tohafa lene ke bare men soch raha ho is bat kee bhi sambhavana hai ki aaj shanivar ho aur usakee jeb men ek bhi paisa n ho use har halat men aaj apane thiye ka kiraya chukana ho nahin to   ya usane nayika ko aaj badhiya khana khilane ka vada kar rakha ho ya usakee naukari men koee lafada ya rahane kee jagah ya ya ya

bahut kuchh ho sakata hai jisake bare men katha nayak soch raha ho aakhir ham use janate hi kahan hain ki itane dave ke sath bata den ki vah is vakt kya soch raha hai usake vyaktitv ke jivan ke usake sangharshon ke bare men bahut sare aise pahaloo ho sakate hain jinake bare men ham kuchh bhi to nahin janate ho sakata hai ki abhi tak hamane jo bhi anuman lagaye hain ve sare hi galat hon ham usake bare men jo kuchh soch rahe hain aisa kuchh ho hi nahin vah us kism ka aadami ho n ho vah to bas yoon hi yahan mausam aur sham kee ranginiyan dekhakar kuchh vakt bitane kee niyat se mairin draiv kee munder par aa kar baith gaya ho

nahin ham galat nahin hain katha nayak ko le kar hamane jitani bhi baten sochi hain ve sari kee sari sahi hain kuchh baten agar aaj sahi hain to kuchh sachchaiyan aane vale ya bite hue kal kee bhi ho sakati hain

daraasal jaisaki mainne bataya desh kee aazadi ka yah pachasavan sal pichhale unachas salon se koee khas fark nahin rakhata tha sab kuchh vaisa hi tha balki kaee mayanon men badatar bhi agar is bich janasankhya badhi thi to berozagari usake anupat men kaee guna badhi thi halanki aazadi ke is pachasaven baras men bhi pichhale baras aur usase bhi pichhale kaee barason kee tarah desh ke sabhi vishvavidyalayon mahavidyalayon takanikee aur prabandh sansthanon ne lakhon kee sankhya men har tarah se yogy aur kuchh kar guzarane ke utsah se labarez post grejuets aur grejuets taiyar karake sadaken par utar diye the unakee jagah turant hi aur unase adhik hi tadad men naye log unakee jagah lene ke lie in sansthanon aadi men pahunch gaye the bhitar sabake samane layak jagah nahin thi fir bhi log the ki kisi bhi tarah ek bar dakhila pa lene ke lie aakulvyakul the kaee log to isake lie apani haisiyat se kaee guna jyada paise kharch karake bhi bhitar jagah pane ke lie hod  si laga rahe the isase koee fark nahin padata tha ki unakee ruchi kis vishay men thi aur pravesh kis vishay men mil raha tha unhen to bas ek adad digri se matalab tha kaise bhi kisi bhi vishay kee mile ve janate the ki unhen jo naukari agar kabhi mili to sirf digri ke aadhar par milegi usamen darj vishay ke aadhar par nahin unakee visheshagyata ke aadhar par to kattaee nahin

udhar bahar sadakon par abhi bhi pichhale kaee barason ke bakaya post grejuets aur grejuets har tarah se yogy zarooratamand aur ichchhuk hone ke bavajood apane layak koee kam nahin talash paye the aur har vakt apane hath men maili pad chukee digriyon aavedan patron kee kopiyon aur akhabaron kee kataranon kar bandal uthaye daftaron faiktariyon sevayojan karyalayon ke get ke aasapas aur chaurahon nukkadon par dekhe ja sakate the ve har kahin maujood the ve sab jagahon par arase se the

berozagaron kee is bhid men in naye logon ke aa jane se har kahin bhid betahasha badh gayi thi aur lagabhag har kahin ekdoosare ko dhakiyane keesi naubat aa gayi thi in sab logon ka dhairy halanki ab tak to chuk jana chahiye tha aur manovigyan ke niyamon ke hisab se maramari sir futtauval aur isi tarah kee doosari arajak sthitiyon kee shurooaat ho jani chahiye thi fir bhi n jane kyon aam taur par yah sthiti nahin aa payi thi ye log behad aasthavan the pratiksha aur aashvasanon ke sahare yahan tak kee kathin aur asambhav yatra poori karake aa pahunche the unhen abhi bhi ummid thi ki koee jaduee chirag unakee zindagi ka andhera door karane ke lie bas aata hi hoga unhen is tarah apane layak kam kee talash karate hue ab tak to sadiyan bitane ko aayin thin balki pichhali pidhi men se bhi adhikatar log bina koee dhang ka kam paye apani zindagi kee aadhi sadi poori kar chuke the n to unaka intazar khatm huaa tha aur n hi koee jaduee chirag hi unakee andheri zindagi men raushani ka ekadh katara hi la paya tha ye sare ke sare log jo berozagar the aur kam karana chahate the arase se khali pet aur lagabhag sunn dimag liye ab tak past hone ko aaye the lekin jaisa ki mainne bataya unakee aankhon men chamak abhi bhi bakee thi aur ve sab ekatak sadaq ke us muhane kee taraf dekh rahe the jahan se kabhikabhi rozagar ke kuchhek mauke muhaiya karane valon ke aane kee bariksi ummid rahati thi amooman ve log kabhi is taraf aate dekhe to nahin gaye the sirf sune gaye the aur agar kabhi ve aaye bhi the to aage aage khade dochar logon ko apane pichhe aane ka ishara karake bahut teji se laut gaye the unake aane aur laut jane ke bich ka antaral itana kam hota tha ki pichhe khade logon ko hava bhi nahin lag pati thi aur ve laut chuke hote the

hamara katha nayak bharat hamesha aisi kataron men maujood tha kabhi sabase aage to kabhi beintahan bhid men sabase pichhe vah kahin bhi raha ho hamesha chhala gaya tha usake hisse men kabhi bhi koee bhi dhang kee naukari nahin aayi thi har bar usi kee bari aane par sab kuchh khatm ho jata tha

use aaj bhi yad karake hansi aati hai usakee pahali naukari nagar palika men thi tab vah barahavin poori kar chuka tha usakee umr attharah kee thi yah dasek sal pahale kee bat hai empalayament eksachenj se badi mushkil se sau rupaye de kar nam nikalavaya tha usane yah to vahin ja kar pata chala tha ki ye naukari galigali ghoom kar machchhar marane kee dava chhidakane kee hai saikil apani honi chahiye sir pit liya tha usane is naukari ke lie mana karane ka matalab hota agale tin mahine tak eksachenj se dobara kisi naukari ke lie nam nahin aayega aur svikar karane ka matalab agale chh mahine tak nam nahin aayega fir bhi usane naukari yahi soch kar le li thi ki kuchh to paise milenge hi saikil ka intazam use karana pada tha jis padosi ke bachchon ko vah tyooshan padhata tha unase mili thi saikil use ek aur bachche ko muft padhane kee shart par lekin yah naukari sirf tin din chal payi thi vaise chalane vale isase badatar naukariyan bhi chala hi rahe the balki katha nayak ne bhi aagepichhe kaee vahiyat naukariyan kee hi thin lekin machchhar marane vali us naukari se vah ek pal ke lie bhi khud ko jod nahin paya tha bahut beman se dodhaee din kat kar usase alag ho gaya tha

aisa nahin tha ki berozagari ke lambelambe daur se guzarate hue katha nayak ya usake sath ke doosare sare berozagar log kabhi nirash nahin hote the ya inhen gussa nahin aata tha daraasal inakee nirasha aur inaka gussa sirf inhin kee jan leta tha charam hatasha kee halat men kuchhek log khudakushi kar lete the ya ghar valon ke sath samoohik roop se zahar kha lete the lekin ab tak koee aisi varadat sunane men nahin aayi thi ki naukari mangane valon ne koee bhi kam n milane par mil malikon bainkon ya sarakari daftaron vagairah ka gherav kiya ho hinsa ka rasta apanaya ho ya kahin oonchi aavaj men bat hi kee ho aisi ek bhi ghatana sunane men nahin aayi thi shayad berozagaron kee hi jamat aisi thi jo ki sangathit nahin thi unaka koee gut nahin tha aur unaka koee rahanuma bhi nahin tha han kabhikabhar kuchh svarthi tatv zaroor in logon ko apane matalab ke lie apane pichhe aane vali bhid men shamil kar lete the aur apana kam sadhate hi inhen vapis sadakon par thel dete the

katha nayak apane charon taraf gahari hatasha aur nirasha se dekhata tha vah janata tha ki akele ke balaboote par poore desh men barason se faili bhayankar avyavastha berozagari aur had daraje kee udasinata se kabhi bhi nahin lad payega koee bhi nahin lad sakata tha yahan kisi ko bhi to kisi kee paravah nahin thi kahin koee sunavaee nahin thi halat itani kharab thi ki rozagar daftaron ke rajistaron men aur nam likhane kee jagah hi nahin bachi thi fir bhi har berozagar naukari kee halakeesi ummid men rozagar daftaron ke aage lagi kataron men din bhar khada rahata fir bhi ghanton ek pair par bhookhe pyase khade rahane ke bad bhi nam likhavane ke lie usaka nambar nahin aa pata tha deri kee shikayat karane par yahi bataya jata ki staf kee kami hai der to lagegi hi

yahi halat sab jagah thi chhote se chhota kam karane ke lie bhi use ghanton lainon men lagana padata ek lain ka kam khatm karake doosare kam ke lie doosari lain men naye sire se apani bari lagani padati inhin lainon ke chakkar men kaee bar sirf aadhe ghante ke kam ke lie pandrahpandrah din tak lag jate sabhi jagah staf kee kami ka rona roya jata

sach to yah tha ki ek taraf staf kee behad kami thi aur doori taraf kam karane layak amooman har tisara aadami bekar tha ya apani yogyata aur haisiyat se kam ka kam aunepaune damon par karane ke lie mazaboor tha yah bhi ho raha tha ki ek lamba arasa bit jane ke bad is tarah ka bekar yuvak sachamuch hi bekar ho chuka hota tha tab usamen n to kam karane ka madda bachata tha aur n ichchha shakti hi ek tarah se use taiyar karane men samaj kee dher sari poonji to bekar jati hi thi usakee khud kee barason kee mehanat poonji lagan aur eemanadar koshish bhi bekar chali jati thi kahin  kahi to ekek kam se tintin aadami chipake hue the rozagar ho n ho pet sabake pas lagabhag ek jaisa hi tha jo aadhaadhoora hi sahi anaj mangata tha isi khali pet ko kisi bhi halat men bharane kee mazaboori kaee logon ko aaparadhik jagat kee taraf mod deti thi jahan jane ke to kaee aasan raste the lekin vapasi ka koee bhi rasta nahin hota tha

katha nayak ke pas kuchh bhi to nahin tha ki de dila kar hi kahin khud ko fit karava leta n to usake pas koee sifarish hoti thi aur n hi khilane pilane ke lie paise hi vaise bhi vah roz hi to dekhata tha ki jo log kisi n kisi tarah kee jugat bhida kar kuchh dedila kar ya oonchi sifarish vagairah lagava kar in thodisi naukariyon se chipak bhi gaye the ve bhi itane virodhabhas kee zindagi ji rahe the ki aashchary hota tha ki ab tak ye log pagal kyon nahin ho gaye batani ka gold maidalist baink ke kauntar par baitha din bhar not ginata tha aur fijiks ka farst klas farst kahin sade hue sarakari daftar men ghun lagi kursi par baitha aalatoofalatoo kee chitthiyon ko darj kar raha tha angreji sahity ke emae pas yuvak hotal men grahakon ke dinar ke aardar lete milate aur hindi ka piech di kisi doordaraj kee chungi par baitha jahil trak draivaron se mathapachchi kar raha hota bayo kaimisti kee pratham shreni kee emaesasi pas ladakee telifon aoparetar kee tuchchi si naukari karane par mazaboor thi aur paliestar taiknalaji men piech di yuvak kisi chay kampani men marketing mainejar hota kahin kahin aisa bhi hota ki ghoda daktari kee digri le lene ke bad bhi jab kisi yuvak ko door pas kahin bhi chhotisi naukari nahin milati thi to vah motar parts kee ya kitabon kee selsamaini vali ghumantoo naukari sirf is lie svikar kar leta tha ki berozagar rahane se to achchha hai kuchh bech hi lo ghar valon ke samane har samay thobada latakaye rahane se to yahi behatar tha usane khud bhi to grejuet hone ke bad aise aise kam kiye the jinhen koee aathavin pas bhi aaram se kar sakata tha balki kar bhi raha tha

yah is vakt ka sabase bada sach tha ki kaee dakakhanon ke bahar dasiyon kee sankhya men bekar grejuets baithe hue ekek dodo rupaye le kar anapadh mazadooron ke ghar par bheje jane vale maniaardaron ke farm bhar kar rozi roti kama rahe the nishchit hi sadak par mazadoori karane vale ye mazadoor in grejueton kee tulana men behatar sthiti men the jo apane rahanekhane ke alava ghar bhejane layak paise kama rahe the aur paroksh roop se hi sahi mahanagaron ke in padhe likhe logon ke rozagar ke nimitt bane hue the khair

vichitr sanyog tha ki katha nayak ko hamesha falatoo anutpadak aur apane star se kam ke kam karane pade the ab tak kee pachchis tis naukariyon men se ek bhi to usake layak nahin thi katha nayak hamesha yahi soch kar apane ko tasalli de leta ki vah akela nahin hai usake sath ke lakhon kee tadad men berojagar log ek sath kaee sazishon ke shikar hain sarakar kee chinta to itani bhar thi ki usake aankadon men kisi tarah yah darj ho jaye ki desh kee adhikatar aabadi unake prayason kee vazah se aaj sakshar hai shikshit prashikshit hai aur har tarah se yogy hai vah akshar banch sakati hai sabako naukari dene kee n to usakee naitik jimmevari hai n usakee aukat hi hai aur n hi usane kabhi aisa vayada hi kiya tha agar kahin kamon kee gunjaish thi bhi to sarakar kee oonchi gaddedar kursiyon par baithe logon ke pas itani dooradarshita hi nahin thi ki tay kar sakate kis kam ke lie kaunsa aadami thik rahega sabase badi vidambana to yahi thi ki tay karane kee takat rakhane vale kaee afasar aur lidar khud hi galat jagahon aur galat kursiyon par galat tarike se baithe hue the unase kisi bhi tarah kee koee bhi ummid karana unake sath jyadati hi hoti sabase adhik takalif kee bat to yahi thi ki jin logon ke bharose yah desh chal raha tha ve hi log pichhale barason men sabase jyada nakara bhrasht laparavah aur avasaravadi sidv hue the

karod kee janasankhya ke muhane par khade desh ke lie yah bahut hi sharm kee bat thi ki poore desh men aadarsh kahe ja sakane layak ek bhi neta nahin tha aazadi kee pachasavin varshaganth mana rahe vishv kee sabase vaibhavashali paramparaon aur manyataon aur samriddh lok tantr vale poore desh men is samay ek bhi aisa vyakti nahin tha jis par desh kee janata man se bharosa kar sake aur jisake hote hue apane aap ko surakshit aur nishchit mahasoos kar sake maje kee bat yah thi ki poore desh men n keval rajaniti men balki kisi bhi kshetr men is tarah ka ek bhi vyakti nahin tha ye desh baunon ka desh ban chuka tha

durbhagy se jin hathon men desh ka netritv saunpa gaya tha unamen aadhe se jyada luchche aavara katil hatyare shatir aparadhi bis bis hatyaon ke sidv doshi dakait aur girahakat bhare pade the rajaniti ke kshetr men kul mila kar yah aalam tha ki aap ek neta aur hatyare men fark nahin dikha sakate the fark tha bhi nahin donon ek hi kam kar rahe the aur kamobesh donon ka tarika bhi ek hi tha aaye din akhabar netaon dvara karodon rupaye kee rishvat lene hatyaen balatkar karane aur doosare itar aparadhon men lipt paye jane kee khabaron se bhare rahate the aksar pata chalata ki falan neta ya mukhy mantree ke ghar se karodon rupaye kee nakadi payi gayi hai ya falan pradhan mantree par karodon rupaye sootakes men aparadhiyon se lene ke aarop lagaye gaye hain aksar pradhan mantree par doosare deshon ke hathiyar bechane vale karobariyon se rishvat lene ke aarop lagate rahate aur ve in aaropon se n vichalit hote aur n hi inaka khandan hi karate ve poori besharami se adalaton se agrim jamanat bhi le aate the besharami ka yah aalam hota tha ki ve dobara chunav ladane ke lie ek bar fir janata ke pratinidhi ban kar hath jode vot mangane ke lie chal padate the un par aaparadhik mukadame chalate rahate ve jel bhi ho aate aur is bich satta apane parivar valon ko saunp jate mano satta n ho lala kee dukan ho ki koee bhi sauda suluf bech lega

desh kee aazadi kee pachasavin salagirah ke varsh men ab rajaniti hi aisa vyavasay bacha tha jisamen bharapoor paisa tha satta sukh tha aur asim suvidhaen thin yah isi desh men ho raha tha ki desh kee behatarin suraksha mashinari aparadh kee duniya se rajaniti men aaye logon aur unake kunabon kee hajari baja rahi thi

rajaniti ek khujaili randi ka nam ho gaya tha is randi ke pas sukh to tha lekin rog aur khaj bhi the log the ki fir bhi is randi ke pas jane ke lie kuchh bhi lie karane ke taiyar the pahale chori chhupe aur ab sareaam

is randi ke pas jane valon ka din duniya se naitik anaitik koee sanbandh nahin rah jata tha desh unake lie ek khula aur hara bhara charagah tha aur unaka kam sirf hari ghas charana tha aur kuchh bhi nahin

rajaniti nam kee is randi ke pas beintaha paisa tha itana ki aap kalpana bhi nahin kar sakate the vahan jane vale khiladi abhi bhi raje maharajaon kee tarah aisho aaram se rahate aur sarakari mashinari ka jam kar durupayog karate the

mashinari ke is durupayog ka hi parinam tha ki is rajanitik kunabaparasti kee chhatr chhaya men lagabhag kathanayak kee hi pidhi ka ek aisa varg bhi angadaiyan le raha tha jisake pas koee disha nahin thi koee lakshy nahin tha jisake pas koee jimmevari bhi nahin thi aur samajik bodh to door door tak nahin tha fast laif ka himayati yah yuva varg jis raftar se badi badi gadiyan chalata tha usi raftar se apane sare kam poore hote dekhana chahata tha yah yuva varg behad jaldi men tha aur use zara sa bhi intazar karana gavara nahin tha vah apane pas aadhunik aagney hathiyar pain ya laitar kee tarah rakhata tha aur unaka istemal bhi vaisa hi karata tha vah aadhi rat ko klab men sharab parosane men ek pal kee bhi der hone par ya bar bala dvara paig ke sath chunban dene se inakar karane par usakee kanapati par goli mar kar do sau aadamiyon kee maujoodagi men sareaam usakee hatya kar sakata tha apani manapasand aaisakrim n milane par vetar kee hatya kar sakata tha sharab ka nasha badhane ke lie apani hi premika ko mar kar use makkhan ke sath tandoor men bhoon sakata tha aur saiks sanbandhi apani vikritiyon ko poora karane ke lie bhari tikat kharid kar purushon ka nanga nach bhi dekhane ja sakata tha use kisi ka kisi ka bhi dar nahin tha kyonki use pata tha ki is desh ka kanoon usakee mutthi men hai aur koee usaka bal bhi banka nahin kar sakata usakee uchchhrinkhalata ka yah aalam tha ki vah kahana n manane vali kisi chhatra ka usake hostal men ja kar samoohik roop se balatkar kar sakata tha aur shikayat kee dhamakee diye jane par use sabak sikhane ke lie dobara use sadak se uthava kar usake sath fir se usake sath samoohik balatkar kar sakata tha

is varg kee takat itani jyada badh gayi thi ki yah apane samane kisi ko bhi kuchh nahin samajhata tha aur sari duniya ko apane thenge par rakhata tha vah der rat tak sadakon par tej gadiyan chalata aiyyashi ke nit naye charagah talashata bhaunde roop men saiks ka pradarshan karata karata aur nashe men dhut ho kar ghar lautate samay kisi ko bhi apani gadi ke niche kuchal sakata tha use is hadase par koee afasos n hota use pata tha ki jab gavahiyan di jayengi to vahan usakee biemadi gadi ka nahin kisi anadi sharabi dvara chalaye ja rahe trak ka jikr hoga

yah vahi varg tha jo din bhar kale dhandhe men anap shanap paisa kamata aur rat ko apani aukat batane ke lie kharch kar dalata usake samane har bar ek hi lakshy hota vah doosaron se aage hai kamane men bhi aur kharch karane men bhi isake lie use nit naye tarikon kee talash rahati

kaee bar katha nayak sochata tha ki kash usake pas bhi koee behatar digri hi hoti aur bahar jane layak thode bahut paise hi hote vah bhi inake sahare achchhi digri haisiyat aur zindagi men kuchh kar guzarane kee tamanna rakhane vale tamam injiniyar doktar aur doosare kshetron ke profeshanalon kee tarah kisi bhi keemat par bahar ke mulkon kee taraf nikal jata beshak vahan doyam daraje ke jivan tha fir bhi kam se kam itana to mil jata ki vah khud ka aur apane pichhe parivar ka khyal to rakh pata vah kitane hi aise logon ko janata tha jo yahan se badi badi digriyan le kar gaye the aur bahar ke mulakon men bairagiri kar rahe the ve kinhin sharton par bhi vahan jana chahate

ek vikasashil aur garib desh kee poonji par taiyar hone vale ye har tarah se shreshth dimag vikasit deshon ke vikas aur pragati ke vahak ban rahe the hamari sarakar ko is pratibha palayan kee kattaee chinta nahin thi desh kee isi berukhi kee vazah se hi to ve apani sar zamin chhod kar gaye the bahar kinhin bhi sharton par ho rozagar aur paisa to tha har sal bahar jane vale dimagon kee sankhya badhati jati unhen rokane ke lie n to koee niyam the aur n hi koee pralobhan hi

jahan tak niji sansthanon badebade audyogik gharanon aur vishalakay deshi videshi udyamon men naukariyon ka saval tha to vahan ke layak padhaee to katha nayak ke pas thi lekin kismat nahin thi use koee mamooli naukari dene ko taiyar nahin tha itani aala naukari kaun deta vah dekhata tha ki vahan hamesha kuchhek aala daraje kee naukariyan huaa karati thin aur aksar layak aadamiyon ko mil bhi jati thin lekin aam taur par in udyog valon kee nigah takanikee aur prabandh sansthanon men har sal taiyar hone vali behatarin krim par hi rahati thi in sansthanon men fainal varsh ke shuroo hote hi audyogik samoohon ke pratinidhi vahan chakkar katana shuroo kar dete aur vahan taiyar ho rahe behatarin dimagon ko bahut oonchi ummid se kahin adhik aur yogyata ke anupat men do  tin guna oonchi boliyan laga kar ek tarah se kharid lete the aur apane yahan kee top mashinari men fit kar dete the ek bar in yuva oorjavan aur shatir dimagon ko kharid lene ke bad ye udyog dhandhe vale inase barah pandrah ghante kas kar kam lete aur un par kharch kee jane vali ekek paee vasool kar lete yah bat digar hoti ki is tarah se kainpas selekshan se laye gaye ye shatir dimag kisi ek jagah sal chh mahine tikana bhi apani tauhin samajhate aur apani chhati par apane bazar bhav ka billa lagaye ek aur oonchi chhalang lagane ke lie doosari kanpaniyon se bhav taul karane lagate halat yah ho jati ki ek kanpani men pachas hajar rupaye masik kar bangala klab maimbaraship jaisi suvidhaon ko bhogane vala teees varsh ka sayana dimag pachapan hazar vali kanpani men jane kee firak men rahata aur pachapan vala kisi sath hazar vali kanpani men sauda pata raha hota oopar ke star par yah aavagaman itana tej aakasmik aur anivarysa lagane lagata ki pata hi nahin chalata tha ki kal tak jo aadami kisi kold drink kanpani men siniyar marketing mainejar ke roop men naya prodakt lanch karane ke lie apani tim se aur adhik dedikeshan samarpan aur daishing eproch kee mang kar raha tha achanak agali subah kisi joota kanpani men kaise ja pahuncha

lekin ye sari baten bahut oopar ke star par chalatin thin sirf us star par jahan behatarin dimag aur behatarin pad lagabhag barabar sankhya men the ek khas kism ke logon ke lie donon hi simit ginechune lagabhag har kushal aur tez dimag ke lie ek pad to tha hi kaee bar ek se jyada bhi hote dochar hajar rupaye kam ya jyada par katha nayak kee pahunch se bahut door usake jaison ke samane to hamesha sankat tha kyonki unake pas sirf samany digriyan thin vishvavidyalayin digriyan sahity kee kala kee aur samaj shastreey vishayon kee kaee bar vigyan kee vishisht shakhaon kee bhi ye digriyan unhen kisi bhi vishisht takanikee prabandh ya eksakyootiv ya kaee bar sadharan daraje ke padon tak bhi nahin pahunchatin thin unake lie to sirf ausat naukariyan ya fir adhyapan hi bachata tha vah bhi simit sankhya men pahale aaiees men in digridhariyon ka nambar lag jaya karata tha lekin kuchh arase se is lain men bhi profeshanal logon ne dhava bolana shuroo kar diya tha

bazar kee kahani aur bhi ajib thi bazar men mang sirf vishishtata speshalaijeshan kee thi chahe vah kisi bhi kshetr men ho in kshetron men thoda kam ank vale aadami ko bhi kisi n kisi naukari kee ummid rahati hi thi lekin samany vishay ke piech di bhi bazar men koee khas keemat nahin rakhate the aisi digriyon vale log bhi samany aur kam padhe likhe tatha berozagaron vali bhid ka hi hissa ban kar rah jate the unhen bhi klarkee se lekar aaiees tak ke lie lagatar aavedan karate rahana padata tha balki kam padhelikhe berozagaron ke sath ek suvidha rahati thi ki ve zaroorat padane par khud ko kisi bhi chhote mote kam men bhi fit kar lete the ye kam padhelikhe log vakt zaroorat bazar men kele seb aur pyaj bhi bech sakate the riksha chala sakate the balki chala bhi rahe hi the ve koee bhi chhotamota kam kar lete the kuchh bhi nahin hota tha to apana sab kuchh bechbach kar midil eest kee taraf mazadoori karane hi nikal jate the lekin ab to halat yah ho gayi thi ki kisi bhi chhote se chhote kam par kisi varg vishesh ka ekadhikar nahin raha tha oonchi oonchi digri vale bhi chaparasi bas kandaktar aur hamalagiri kee tuchchi naukari ke lie apani asali digriyon ko chhupa kar samane aane lage the kaha ja sakata tha ki desh ne padhaee ke mamale men ab itani tarakkee kar li thi ki ab yahan rikshe vale khomachevale pan bidi vale aur yahan tak ki bindisurkhi bechane vale bhi emae bie pas hone lage the ve bhi aakhir kahan tak bhookhe rahate berozagari to unhen ek kap chay aur eplaee karane ke lie dak kharch tak ke lie rula dalati thi bhookhe rah kar ghutate rahane se to yahi behatar tha ki jo bhi jaise bhi mil raha hai le lo ise chhoden to hathiyane ke lie das log lain men khade milenge zinda rahane ke lie koee bhi shart badi nahin thi

katha nayak kee doosari naukari bhi bahut thode din chal payi thi kam tha ek vakeel kee dak sanbhalana aur usake lie maisenjar ka kam karana vaise is naukari men koee khas takalif nahin thi paise bhi thik the aur vakeel sahab ka vyavahar bhi achchha tha lekin jo takalif thi usase kisi bhi tarah se par nahin paya ja sakata tha usake kalej ka samay tyooshan ka samay aur vakeel sahab ke yahan hajari bajane ka samay ek hi the vakeel sahab poora din mangate to kolej kee padhaee aur aanejane ke lie bhi use utane hi samay kee zaroorat hoti use har halat men rozana do chizen chhodani hi padatin tyooshan ka samay to fir bhi badala ja sakata tha lekin bakee donon samay usake bas men nahin the yahan bhi naukari hi chhooti thi vakeel ne bhi yahi salah di thi ki pahale padhaee poori kar lo tabhi koee dhang kee naukari talasho mere yahan kam karate rahane se agar tumhari padhaee ka harza hota hai to main yah dosh apane sir nahin lena chahoonga vaise kabhi bhi fis vagairah ke lie rupaye paise kee zaroorat ho to
yah bat digar hai ki ye naukari ke chhootane ke bad bhi padhaee nahin chal payi thi aur vah poori tarah se bekar ho gaya tha

use yahan aane kee tarikh aaj bhi yad hai apane shahar ne to use mushkil se rula rula kar ek digri hi di thi isake bich ek lamba silasila tyooshanon praivet naukariyon aur berozagari ke dauron ka raha tha kabhi naukari ke lie padhaee to kabhi padhaee ke lie naukari kabhi donon ek sath to kabhi donon hi nahin tarah tarah kee dukanon men selsamain ship kee lotari ke tikat tak beche sadakon par khade ho kar brejari se le kar bal pain tak beche sirf is ummid se har tarah ke kam men khud ko khapaye rakha ki achchhe din bas aate hi honge usane kisi bhi kam ko chhota nahin samajha tha halanki is vazah se use kaee bar bahut sharmindagi bhi uthani padati

tab vah bi e men padh raha tha chhutti ke din aur sham ke vakt chhota mota kam karake apana kharch nikalata tha us din ravivar tha jis dukan se bechane ke hojari ka saman lata tha usane us din alagalag saiz kee brezari ke kaee dibbe pakada diye aur aankh marate hue bola le ja beta maze kar ek se ek badhiya grahak ko yah nayab tohafa saste damon par bech nayan sukh vahan se lena aur dabal kamishan main doonga usane lakh kaha tha vah yah aaitam is tarah sareaam aavazen laga kar nahin bech sakata lekin dukanadar ne ek nahin suni thi aur usane us din pahali aur aakhiri bar sadak par khade ho kar yah aaitam bechi thi aur usi din yah gadabad ho gayi thi

ve charon ek sath thin aur ekadam usake thiye ke samane aa khadi huee thin vah aur usakee tin saheliyan usake samane aa khade hone se pahale n to unhonne use dekha tha aur n hi vah unhen aata dekh paya tha ladakiyon men se kisi ko bhi ummid nahin thi ki usase is tarah is halat men ye sab bechate hue samana ho jayega

sir usi ka pahale jhuka tha aur vah unhen sakate kee halat men apane thiye par chhod kar bajoo kee gali men sarak gaya tha ve bhi vahan nahin rukee thin aur ek tarah se vahan se lapakate hue aage nikal gayin thin sadak par is tarah se saman bechane ka yah usaka aakhiri din tha

unase aur khas taur par usase vah kaee din tak aankhen nahin mila paya tha apane aap par gussa bhi aaya tha ki sali yah bhi koee zindagi hai har vakt koee n koee ladaee ladate hi raho is tuchchi zindagi se to behatar tha anapadh hi hote kam se kam is tarah se apane parayon ke samane nazaren to n jhukani padatin halanki kaee din bad jab unamen samany roop se batachit shuroo huee thi to un donon ne hi itana khyal zaroor rakha tha ki is bat ka bilkul bhi zikr nahin kiya tha lekin vah soch sakata tha ki use aur usakee saheliyon ko kitana kharab laga hoga ki unaka klas failo dost jo padhaee men kam se kam unase to achchha hi tha aur ve aksar usase nots vagairah manga karati thin sadak par is tarah se

sunita ne bad men bahut bad men usase kaha bhi tha ki us din vah ghar ja kar bahut der tak roti rahi thi isalie nahin ki ve achanak usake samane us vakt pad gayi thin jab vah futapath par is tarah kee koee chiz bech raha tha usase pahale bhi vah use kuchh n kuchh bechate hue dekh hi chukee thi aur is bat ke lie usakee tarif hi karati thi ki vah kisi bhi kam ko chhota nahin samajhata tha aur sab kam karane ke bavazood apani padhaee ke prati bhi utana hi siriyas tha use rona to is bat par aaya tha ki use padhaee poori karane ke lie kaise kaise din dekhane pad rahe the

vah sunita kee sthiti ko achchhi tarah samajhata tha apane prati usakee bhavanaon se vah vakif tha unaka kaee barason ka parichay tha un donon ne lagabhag poora bachapan ek sath hi bitaya tha vah kuchh kahe bina bhi sab kuchh samajhati thi aur hamesha ek maichyor dost kee tarah usaka sath deti thi ek tarah se usakee chhooti huee padhaee fir se shuroo karane ke pichhe sunita kee hi zid thi varana to vah ek sal barahavin men fel ho jane ke bad padhaee ko poori tarah se alavida kah chuka tha sunita usase ek sal jooniyar thi aur usake fel ho jane se donon barahavin men aa gaye the us sal bhi vah lagatar sunita ke konchane samajhane aur har tarah se usaka manobal banaye rakhane ke karan hi achchhe nambaron se pas ho paya tha bie ke lie bhi usake lie farm sunita hi layi thi aur apani poori anichchha ke bavajood sirf sunita ka man rakhane ke lie bie kar raha tha beshak bie karane ke chakkar men usaka aarthik graf bigad gaya tha aur usake hath se ek dhang kee naukari bhi jati rahi thi vah yah bhi janata tha ki vah bie to kya emae bhi kar le dhang kee naukari usase sau tarah ke papad bilavayegi lekin isake bavajood vah sunita ka kaha nahin tal paya tha vah usake lie itana kuchh karati thi usakee sari takalifon ko vah beshak kam n kar sake vah itana to karati hi thi ki jaise bhi ho vah usaka manobal banaye rakhati thi padhaee ke lie bhi aur behatar zindagi ke khvab ko lagatar nigah men rakhane ke lie bhi

use yah bhi pata tha ki vah jo bhi jahan bhi koee dhandha kar raha hota tha ya jis sadak par vah saman bech raha hota ya jis dukan par vah koee tuchchi selsameni kar raha hota to vah us sadak se bhi guzarana talati thi taki use yani katha nayak bharat ko bevazah usakee nazaron ke samane chhota n hona pade yah bat vah samajhata tha aur ve donon kabhi bhi is bat ko apane aapasi sanbandhon ke bich men nahin late the khasakar mojon vale kisse ke bad se to sunita usakee khuddari ka poora samman karati thi vah us ghatana ke bad se is bat ka poora khyal rakhati thi ki usakee kisi bhi bat se vyavahar se katha nayak ko takalif n pahunche

un dinon usakee aarthik sthiti bahut kharab chal rahi thi isake bavajood usakee poori koshish rahati ki usake kapade saf suthare rahen kisi ko bhi hava tak n lage ki vah kitane kathin daur se guzar raha hai kaee zaroori chizen tal rahi thin vah chah kar bhi apane lie dhang ke rumal aur moje nahin kharid pa raha tha jo do ek jode the usake pas ya to unaka ilastik dhila ho gaya tha ya ve panjon kee taraf bilakul fat gaye the sunita se yahin ek bevakoofi ho gayi thi halanki usakee khud kee apani koee kamaee nahin thi fir bhi vah apani taraf se usake lie do jodi moje aur rumal le aayi thi vaise to isamen aisa kuchh bhi nahin tha ki bat ka batangad banata ve donon pahale bhi ek doosare ko chhoti moti chizen dete hi rahe the lekin in chijon ko dekhakar vah buri tarah hart ho gaya tha ekadam chup ho gaya tha is ghatana ke bad se usane kaee din tak sunita se bat nahin kee thi usake hisab se yah usake aham par chot thi use becharagi kee had tak sharminda karane vali bat shayad yah usi ghatana ka prabhav raha ho ki usane us din ke bad se aaj tak mojon vale joote hi nahin pahane hain vah ya to saindil pahanata hai ya fir bina tasmen vale joote jinamen mojon kee zaroorat hi nahin rahati

sunita se behad aatmiy sanbandhon ke bavazood vah in sanbandhon ka hashr janata tha aur huaa bhi vahi tha use achchhi sekend klas ke bavazood padhaee ko ek bar fir viram dena pada tha aur sunita sirf pas bhar hone ke bavajood emae karane ke lie apani badi bahan ke pas doosare shahar chali gayi thi un donon ke bich sare vayade aur us anakahe sanbandhon ke barik reshe apani jagah par the aur zindagi kee sachchaee apani jagah par sunita kee shadi vahin se usakee bahan ne apane kisi rishtedar se tay kar di thi ladaka doktar tha sadak ke kinare feri laga kar saman bech kar padhaee karane vala katha nayak nishchit roop se us doktar ka vikalp nahin ho sakata tha filmin kisson men yah bat chal jati thi lekin zindagi kee sachchaee donon hi janate the ab emae pas sunita ke sapane ek bie pas aur do sal se lagabhag berojagar katha nayak kaise bhi to poore nahin kar sakata tha ek aadh sapana bhi nahin yahan bhi usane ise apani ek bahut badi har man liya tha vah ladata bhi to kisase aur kis aadhar par ladane layak aatmavishvas berozagaron ke hisse men nahin aata yah bat vah janata tha usane sunita kee shadi ke bare men ek lafj tak nahin kaha tha ek bar fir chuppi ke gahare koone men utar gaya tha

halanki shadi ka nyauta use bhi mila tha balki sunita ke hath se likha akela kard usi ko bheja gaya tha yah bat sunita bhi janati thi aur chahati bhi thi ki vah n hi aaye to behatar janata vah bhi tha isilie to usakee shadi men jane ke bajaye usane vah shahar hi hamesha ke lie chhod diya tha vah bambaee aa gaya tha

banbaee  jahan dher sare log sapane le kar aate the aur dhire dhire sapanon kee baten poori tarah se bhool kar ek mamooli si gumanam si zindagi guzarane lagate the thik katha nayak kee tarah vah bhi khali hath yahan chala aaya tha shayad yahin kismat kuchh palata khaye

jin bhasin sahab ke bachchon ko vah tyooshan padhata tha ve jab sthanantarit ho kar banbaee aaye to unhin ne koncha tha chale aao yahan yahan koee bhookha nahin marata ek bar kismat aajamane men koee harj nahin main apane aofis men hi tumhare lie koee badhiya job dekhoonga tab tak tum hamare sath hi rahana

sachamuch use bhasin sahab kee meharabani se futapath par nahin sona pada tha n bhookhe rahana pada tha aur n hi khana khane ke evaj men hotalon men bairagiri karani padi thi kar leta to behatar tha bhasin sahab ne use chhat aur roti zaroor di thi lekin usakee haisiyat tyootar se girate girate ghareloo naukar aur bebi sitar kee ho gayi thi aisi zindagi se to behatar tha futapath par hi so leta vah soya bhi lekin bad men jahan tak naukari ka saval tha to mistar bhasin kabhi bhi nahin chahate the ki use naukari mile ve to yahi soch kar use laye the ki vah roti aur chhat ke evaj men unake bachchon ko padhata bhi rahega ve donon jab naukari karane jayenge to din bhar muft men bachchon ka khyal bhi rakhega

panch sal pahale jab katha nayak yahan aaya tha tab se aaj tak usane jitane bhi anubhav batore hain jitane sangharsh kiye hain un par chahe to ek poori kitab likh sakata hai chahe to bina ruke ghanton bat kar sakata hai lekin takalif yahi hai ki yah sona itana tap chuka hai isane itani garami tap aur mar jheli hain ki ab vah bat hi nahin karata ab ekadam chup hi rahata hai vah kaee kaee din tak ek shabd bole bina bhi rah sakata hai kaee bar to poora poora din yahan tak ki shanivar kee sham se lekar somavar aofis pahunchane tak ek shabd bole bagair sara vakt kat deta hai kahe bhi to kya kahe bhi to kisase hamare kitane bachche hain yah batate samay ham garbhapaton kee sankhya nahin ginate yahan to katha nayak ke pas safalataon ke nam par misakairij aur aborshan vale mamale hi hain safalata ek bhi nahin han is shahar men bhi usakee ek premika hai yahi ikalauta prem hai jo pichhale dhaee tin sal se kisi tarah ghisat raha hai dost ek bhi nahin

is shahar men katha nayak kee pahali pagar nau sau rupaye thi jabaki loj men rahanekhane ke hi sadhe sat sau dene padate the us laj se nikalane aur aaj do hazar sau kee pagar tak pahunchane men use panch sal lag gaye hain is bich mairin draiv kee is munder se arab sagar kee itani laharen nahin takarayi hongi jitane dhakke usane khaye hain loj se jhopadi chal daftar ke chaparasi kee bolkani bistar bhar jagah ke lie kabhi vasaee to kabhi chemboor kabhi bhayakhala to kabhi ulhasanagar banbaee ka koee bhi upanagar nahin bacha hoga kabhi bilakul sadak par aa jane kee halat ekadh rat park men bhi naukariyan bhi isi tarah badalin begari kee mar bhi khayi aur paise bhi ganvaye kaee bar poori pagar hi jebakataron ka nishana ban gayi kitani hi raten usane dal ubal kar bred ke sath khayi hai dal ka pani pi kar raten guzari hain pav aur garam mithe pani ka kambineshan banaya hai bhala aise dinon kee bhi ginati rakhi ja sakati hai kya bas har bar pagar ka sabase bada hissa use kamare ke lie rakhana padata hai bhookhe pet hi sahi sone ke lie to jagah chahiye hi
usake pas is bat kee koee ginati nahin hai ki usane kitani bar khudakashi karane kee sochi aur kitani bar vapis jane kee donon kam hi vah nahin kar paya

aajakal use kat kata kar kul do hazar rupaye milate hain jis jagah vah rahata hai vahan use rahane khane ke hi pandrah sau rupaye dene padate hain bakee panch sau rupaye usakee zindagi kee bakee sari zarooraton ke lie hain inamen kabhikabhar ghar bheja ja sakane vala maniaardar bhi shamil hota hai usakee sari khushiyan takalifen bimari kapada latta tren ka sizan tikat chay toothapest brash kanghee tel kitab pain tauliya akhabar joota moja vah pahanata nahin rumal pres sabun sigaret pan jo vah eford hi nahin kar sakata dadhi heyar kating sinema manoranjan upahar ghar jane aane ke lie kiraya jo vah panch sal men sirf ek bar hi juta paya hai aur vah sab kuchh jo ek shahari aadami ko subah uthane se le kar rat ko sone tak jutana hota hai use in panch sau men hi jutane hote hain ye panch sau rupaye usake vartaman ke lie hain usake bhavishy ke lie hain jisamen sirf salana tarakkee pachas rupaye hoti hai aur yahi masik rashi usake bhavishy ke lie hai isi men usakee bhavi grihasthi makan parivar bal bachche unaka bhavishy aur usake khud ke sare sapane isi rashi ke sahare poore kiye jayenge kabhikabhar bimari kee vazah se usakee pagar se koee katauti hoti hai ya ovar taim kee vajah se ya bonas kee vazah se koee atirikt rashi milati hai to vah samajh hi nahin pata isaka kya kare aur kaise kare

yahan pair thik se jama lene ke bad shuroo shuroo men vah kuchh tyooshanen padha liya karata tha hath kharch layak paise mil jate the lekin ab sab kuchh chhod chhad diya hai vahan bhi vahi khichakhich falan din nahin aaye the falan din aaye the lekin bachche kee tabiyat thik nahin thi so padhaya nahin tha falan dinfalan din ab vah kuchh bhi nahin karata chhutti hote hi yahin aa baithata hai aur tabhi jata hai jab khana khane aur sone ka vakt ho jata hai vah ab har taraf se laparavah ho gaya hai n kuchh sochata hai n sochana chahata hi hai pichhale do tin salon se usakee sari shamen aam taur par yahin gujari hongi chupachap akele door kshitij men jahajon ko niche laharon ko ya fir sadak par chal rahe logon ko chupachap dekhate hue sirf shanivar ko hi vah kuchhek vaky bolata hai jab katha nayika aati hai us ek ghante men vah katha nayika se jitane shabd bolata hai utane vah poore hafte men bhi nahin bolata

katha nayika jaisa ki mainne bataya hindi men emae hai aur kavitaen likhati hai usakee ab tak kee poori zindagi lagabhag usi tarah kee rahi hai jaisi zindagi katha nayak ne guzari hai kadam kadam par sangharsh kabhi padhaee ke lie kabhi chhat ke lie to kabhi do vakt kee roti ke lie hi vah bhi agar ginane baithe ki kul mila kar use kitani bar apani padhaee sthagit karani padi hai to usakee koee ginati nahin hai naukariyon kee ginati bhi vah ab tak bhool chukee hai lekin ek bat usake sath hamesha rahi ek ek kadam aage badhati badhati vah yahan tak aa pahunchi hai vaise usake samane bhi kaee bar zindagi ke shart kat aaye the vah chahati to unaka fayada utha kar kahan se kahan pahunch sakati thi lekin dikkat yahi thi ki ye sare shartakat usakee deh se ho kar guzarate the

is desh men kam karane ke lie ghar se nikali jyadatar ladakiyon kee yahi pida thi desh ka aur desh kee ladakiyon ka zikr aaya hai to yah dekh lene men koee harz nahin hai ki kul mila kar aam taur par bakee ladakiyan kis tarah ke halat se guzar rahi thin

vaise to is desh men ek taraf padhi likhi doosari taraf anapadh ghareloo ya naukaripesha kunvari ya shadishuda kisi bhi tarah kee ladakiyon kee samajik aur aarthik halat kabhi bhi achchhi sammanajanak aur sukoonabhari nahin rahi thi lekin har vakt paison kee tangi rozana kee zarooraton ke aur sath hi un zarooraton ko poori karane vali chizon ke dam betahasha badh jane ke aur kisi bhi tarah se unhen poora n kar pane kee kachot ne idhar unake jivan ko aur bhi doobhar aur takalifadeh bana diya tha padhi likhi lekin mazaboori se ya svechchha se ghar ke bhitar baithi aurat ko to ghar kee chaharadivari ke bhitar hi shoshit karane vale kaee hath the lekin jo aurat mazaboori ke chalate do char atirikt paise kamane kee niyat se ghar se bahar nikalati thi usaka gala tipane ke lie charon taraf kaee jodi hath ug aate the emae emaesasi aur bied ya emaed vagairah kar lene ke bad bhi usake nasib men gali mauhallon men har chauthe ghar men khule pablik skoolon men panchsat sau rupalli kee naukari hi bachati thi jahan use sausau bachchon kee klas ke sat aath piriyad rozana lene hote ye panch sat sau bhi use apani taraf se kuchh dhila kiye bagair nahin milate the is aarthik aur manasik shoshan ke alava naukari kee anishchitata evan daihik shoshan kee aashanka kee addashy talavar har samay unake sir par latakati rahati kisi bhi any behatar vikalp ke abhav men vah vahin aur yoon hi khatati rahati thi apani zindagi ka behatarin vakt yoon hi barabad ho jane deti thi khushi kuntha sapane sab apani jagah hote the aur yah chhoti si naukari apani jagah hoti thi jo beshak ek dhang kee sadi bhi nahin dila sakati thi fir bhi kuchh to deti hi thi kaee jagah to halat itani kharab thi ki kuchh javan auraten sirf isalie do char sau rupaye kee naukari karane ke lie din bhar ke lie ghar se bahar rahati thin taki akele ghar par baithe boodhe sasur ya jeth ya javan devaron kee muft kee khitamadagari n karani pade aur unakee ijzat bhi bachi rah sake

yah hamare vakt kee ek bahut kadavi sachchaee thi ki sadak ke kinare dihadi par mazadoori karane vale mazadoor ke lie to sarakar ne sath sattar rupaye mazadoori tay kar rakhi thi steshan par hamali karane vale ke lie bhi fi fera das bis rupaye ka intazam tha lekin ek em e aur emaesasi pas kisi maidam shyama ke lie ya din bhar kisi praivet aafis men khatane vali konvent se padh kar aayi mis mairi ke lie sarakar ne kisi nyoonatam vetan kee bhi zaroorat nahin samajhee thi jo bhi chahe unaka shoshan kar sakata tha log dhadalle se kar hi rahe the poore desh ka yahi aalam tha

inakee tulana men mahanagar munbaee kee ladakiyon kee halat fir bhi behatar thi usakee vazahen bhi alag thin ve sthaniy thin halanki unakee takalifen bahar se aane vali ladakiyon se alag nahin thin fir bhi donon men ek fark to tha ve yahin kee isi mitti kee bani huee thin yahin kee paidaish ve choonki kahin bahar se nahin aayi thin atah is shahar ke mijaz ko achchhi tarah se janati thin sangharsh choonki is shahar men rahane kee pahali aur aakhiri shart thi isalie vah is yahan kee zamin ko isakedh tapaman ko yahan ke yatharth ko zindagi ke sabhi rangon roopon aur jayakon ko khoob pahachanati thi vah bilakul pados men basi filmi duniya kee chakachaundh ko aisho aaram ko vahan kee beshumar daulat kee asaliyat se vakif to thi in sari chizon ke lie use svabhavik roop se sapane bhi aate the lekin in asambhav se lagane vale sapanon ko poora karane ke lie ve aam taur par koee badi bevakoofi nahin karati thin bambaee kee ladakiyon kee zindagi kee bahut kadavi sachchaee thi ki vah apani haisiyat ke anusar hi aise sapane dekhati thin jinhen vah thode bahut sangharshan ke sath kuchh intajar ke sath kisi bhi bade samajhaute ke bina poore kar sakati thin

yah ek tarif karane layak bat thi ki aam taur par munbaee kee har doosari tisari madhyavargi ladakee ka sapana thodi si aarthik aazadi ek thik thak sa naukarishuda pati aur khud ka beshak chhota sa hi sahi ek adad alag ghar huaa karata tha jo sachamuch achchhi kismat vali hoti thin ve tinon sapane n sahi inamen se do ek to aage pichhe poore kar hi leti thin inakee zindagi ka matalab chhotichhoti khushiyan sangharsh kabhi n khatm hone vali takalifon ka antahin silasila hota tha jinake sath madhyavarg kee sabhi ladakiyon ko aage pichhe kam jyada joojhana hi hota tha lekin ek bat hamesha unake paksh men raha karati thi ki ve kabhi himmat nahin harati thin hamesha lagi hi rahatin behatar thoda aur behatar kee chah unhen kabhi thakati hi nahin thi ekek tinaka chunchun kar ghonsala sajane jaisa sangharsh ek sapane ke poore hote hi doosara sapana poora karane ke lie ya us sapane se thoda oopar ke star ka sapana dekhane ka silasila shuroo ho jata is tarah se apane sansar ko aur behatar banane ka silasila chalata hi rahata tha isi vajah se kaee bar sapane tootane ya poore n ho pane par bhi unaka mohabhang nahin hota tha aur n hi ve kabhi nirash hi hoti thin ve zindagi ke sath sath in sab baton kee aadi ho jati thin

lekin takalif un ladakiyon kee hoti thi jo kahin bhi kabhi bhi bahut oonche star ke sapane dekhana shuroo kar deti thin sapane dekhana aur unake poora n hone par nirash hona koee galat bat nahin thi balki sapane n dekhana hi asvabhavik mana jata pareshani kee bat to yah thi ki unake apane chhote bade shaharon ya kasbon men jab unake ye sapane poore nahin ho sakate the aur ve bina soche samajhe munbaee mahanagar kee taraf chal padati thin ya kaee bar fusala kar le aayi jati thin jahan unake vichar se raton  rat n keval sare hasin sapane poore kiye ja sakate the balki duniya bhar kee shanoshaukat bhi jutaee ja sakati thi ve sapane men dekhi gayi ek anajani duniya kee talash men munbaee aa to jati thin lekin aate hi rah bhatak jati thin takalif yah bhi thi ki desh ke har bade chhote shahar men aise sapane dekhane vali kamazor bhavuk aur kaee bar bevakoof ladakiyon kee tadad hamesha badhati hi rahati kabhi kabhar alag alag chhote bade shaharon se bhag kar ya bhaga kar layi gayi kuchhek ladakiyon ko bahut sangharsh karane ke bad filmon men ekstra ka ekadh rol mil jaya karata tha bakee ninanave fisadi ladakiyan hamesha ke lie gumanami ke andheron men kho jati thin raste bhatakate bhatakate ve alag alag raston se bazar men bikane ke lie pahunch jati thin vahan sirf chhat roti aur hamesha ke lie gumanam badanam zindagi hoti thi aur kuchh bhi nahin kuchh bhi to nahin

lekin idhar hal ke barason men halat kuchh badale the galat vakt par galat faisale lene ke lie badanam lekin doosaron ke lie udar hamare desh ne jab se apana aakash duniya bhar ke aadamakhor jadon se kate bilakul anajan deshon se aaye apasanskriti ke giddhon ke lie khol diya tha aur ye badibadi aankhon vale daravane giddh amooman har ghar kee chhat par lage entina ke zariye har ghar ke draing room men pahunch gaye the tab se alag alag shaharon se balivud khinche chale aane vale ladake ladakiyon ko rozana pachason kee tadad men banane vale tivi siriyalon men chhote mote kam milane lage the isake bavazood rozana jitane log yahan rol pane kee talash men pahunchate the unake do fisadi ko bhi kaimare ke aage ya pichhe kam nahin mil pata tha natiza yahi hota tha ki itane sare log jab arasa bit jane par bhi apani kismat kee potali ko khulata bhi nahin dekh pate the to apane aap ko kisi bhi aise kam men jhonk dete the jisamen beshak gumanami ho lekin thik thak paise milate rahen ladakiyon ke mamale men yah bat jyada lagoo hoti thi

jab is tarah se yahan pahunchane vali hazaron ladakiyan apani haisiyat bhar sangharsh karane ke bavazood kuchh hasil nahin kar pati thin to unhen munbaee ke amooman har upanagar men bisiyon kee sankhya men khul gaye ledij biyar bar sharan dete the yahan ve ga leti thin nach sakati thin aur agar inamen se unhen kuchh bhi nahin aata tha to grahakon ko apani muskan ke sath biyar to pila hi sakati thin

daraasal ye lediz biyar bar nam ke adde upabhoktavadi sanskriti ke naye charagah the ek tarah se purushon ke paravarshan saiks ko le kar manasik vikritiyon ko bhunane ke naye thikane the aazad hindustan men yah pahali bar dekha suna ja raha tha ki is tarah se saiks sanbandhi kunthaon ko n keval sarvajanik taur par samajik manyata dilayi ja rahi thi balki use is tarah galiyon chaurahon par sareaam bhunaya ja raha tha bloo filmon ko chhup chhupa kar dekhanedikhane ka zamana ja chuka tha ab to pratyaksh pradarshan ka zamana tha in tathakathit tanman kee thakan utarane tanav dhila karane ke navin addon  ledij biyar baron men sare sham gatividhiyan shuroo ho jatin kaee jagahon par to subah gyarah bajate hi bhari riyayat ka lalach de kar grahakon ko patane ka silasila shuroo ho jata

jalati bujhati aankhon men chubhati raushaniyan tej stiriyofonik sangit dhunaa shor sharaba aisi jagahon ko ek alag hi rang dete the in tang majhaule aakar ke biyar baron ke mukhy hal ke bichon bich kanch ke farsh ka ek ubhara huaa ek tapoo bana diya jata tha jisake niche rangin battiyan jalati bujhati rahati thin inhin tapuon par inake irdgird rat bhar khulla khel muradabadi chalata rahata

yahan ausatan har mej ke lie sarv karane vali ek ladakee hoti aur kanch ke tapoo par kaiset ya aarakestra ke sangit par nachane vali tin char ladakiyan hotin sara ka sara mahaul tikhepan se buri tarah grast hota tikhi gandh tikha mekaap tikha bhadakaoo sangit aur mejon se uthane vale shohadepan vale tikhe fikare

sarv karane vali ladakiyon ko shayad sakht hidayat thi ki maryada men rahate hue jitani adhik ho sake hotal kee bikri badhavao aur is tarah jitani jyada ho sake apane lie tip kamao isaka natija yah hota aapakee mej par sarv karane vali ladakee lagatar aapake sir par khadi rahati vahin mandarati rahati aapane apane gilas men se ghoont bhara bhi nahin hota ki vah aati botal men se aur biyar udel jati usakee har sanbhav ichchha aur koshish rahati aur vah barbar isharon se havbhav se aur shabdon se bhi jatalati ki use aapake akelepan se hamadardi hai vah aapako kanpani dena chahati hai aap use bas ishara bhar kar den vah aapakee mej par aa baithegi baten karegi piyegi pilayegi aapako sath degi aap usaka hath thamenge to vah bhi aapaka hath daba kar aapake prati apani bhavanaen darshayegi aap aagrah karenge to aapako  aap kahenge to aapake sath khana bhi khayegi is tarah vah aapaka mood aur aapakee jeb halakee karegi jo kuchh usane aapako diya sabakee keemat tagadi tip ke roop men vasool karegi seth kee jo bikri usane badhayi hai usakee kamishan use seth se alag se milegi in biyar baron men amooman sari chijon ke dam dotin guna vasool kiye jate

in bar balaon ke viparit nrity balaon ka silasila thoda alag hota tha unhen apane dans flor par rahate hue hi alagalag mejon par baithe hue vikrit manasikata vale grahakon se apane hisse ke lie tagadi bakhshish nikalavani hoti thi balki unhen rakha hi isalie jata tha ki unake tathakathit nrityon aur koolhe matakane kee adaon par rijhane ke lie grahak aayen apani sudhabudh kho kar piyen pilayen aur noton kee itani barish kar den ki hotal ka seth nachane vali gane vali sarv karane vali aur daroo banane vali kanpani sab ke sab bhitar tak bhig jayen

aam taur par in biyar baron ke malik dharmik kism ke log the jo pahale in jagahon par idali vada becha karate the kuchhek to samose jalebi bechane vale halavaee bhi rahe the jab unhonne dekha ki logon kee pet kee bhookh shant karane kee tulana men unake bimar dimagon kee bhookh shant karane aur yauvan kee bhookh badhane men jyada kamaee hai to ve is dhandhe men utar gaye the aur khoob paisa pit rahe the ye nachane gane vali ladakiyan bhi rat bhar men panch sat sau pit hi leti thin shuroo shuroo men to yahan filmon se thukarayi gayi ladakiyan hi aati thin lekin jab sthaniy ladakiyon ne dekha ki yahan to turant kamaee khoob khana pina aur gahe bagahe mauj maja bhi hai to jhopadapattiyon men rahane vali garib mazaboor aur thodi tez ladakiyan bhi yahan aane lagi thin gahara mekaap shokh adayen odhi huee muskurahat aur in sabake oopar jalati bujhati battiyon vala mahaul bakee sari kamiyan poori kar deta tha

nachane gane vali ladakiyan apani mahafil kee shurooaat kisi bhajananuma filmi git se karati thin aur bhajan ke khatm hote hi vahin kahin kone men rakhi shiv kee moorti ke aage agarabatti jala kar pranam karati thin isake bad hi ve vidhivat koolhe matakana shuroo karati thin

yahan amooman un ladakiyon ghareloo auraton aur kamakaji mahilaon ka janaboojh kar zikr nahin kiya ja raha jo svechchha se mazaboori men kisi aarthik sharirik athava parivarik dabav ke chalate duniya ke sabase purane gyat dhandhe men lipt thin unakee zindagi ke bare men log pahale se hi jaroorat se jyada janate hain isaka karan saf hai paramparagat veshyavritti ab gaye jamane kee bat ho chukee thi beshak abhi bhi aapako rah chalate ya us tarah ke bazaron men grahakon kee talash men khadi saji dhaji aisi paturiyon ke darshan ho sakate the jo is chahe anachahe is dhandhe men dhakel di gayi thin aur vahan se nikalane ka ab unake pas koee rasta nahin bacha tha lekin desh kee aazadi ka pachasavan varsh aate aate duniya ke sabase purane dhandhe ke samikaran badal chuke the ab is dhandhe ko bhi samajik manyata de di gayi thi aur ise vyavasayik jagat ka ek anivary ghatak man liya gaya tha ab is dhandhe ko safedaposhi ka jama pahana kar naye taur tarikon ke sath sar anjam diya jane laga tha mal vahi tha aur roop badal diya gaya tha usaka ab vah sosaiti garl parsanal sekretari aur parsanal eksakyootiv ke roop men karporet jagat kee shobha badha rahi thi

pichhale dashak tak ek latifa aksar sunaya jata tha ki ek kampani ne apane sabhi bade afasaron ko sapatnik videsh yatra ka nyauta diya tha sab afasar jab yatra ke bad vapis aaye to kampani ne sabhi afasaron kee patniyon ko ek patr bhej kar poochhana chaha tha ki unakee videsh yatra kaisi rahi to sabhi afasaron kee patniyon ne kampani se ek sath poochha tha ki kaisi videsh yatra ve to kisi videsh yatra par nahin gayi hain

ab aazadi kee pachasavin varshaganth aate aate yah latifa hakeekat men badal chuka tha ab bazar men aisi pachason kampaniyan aa gayi thin ki jo badi badi kampaniyon ke aur bhi bade adhikariyon kee desh videsh ke yatra karyakram kee vyavastha karane ke sath sath sundar sathi bhi muhaiyya karati thin ye sathi daure ke dauran n keval adhikariyon ke kagaj sanbhalati thin sath hi sath har tarah se unaka khyal rakhane ke lie prastut thin bas shulk ada kiye jane kee zaroorat thi

veshyavritti ke lie ye aur is tarah ke kaee aur kaee barik aur saufistiketed tarike vikasit kar liye gaye the aur inhen kamobesh aadhunik bazar tantr men safal prayog men laya ja raha tha ab ye kam soshal klabon men soshal gaidarings ke nam par telifon ke zariye fraindaship sarkal kee partiyon ke jariye kiya ja raha tha aur kisi ko kanon kan khabar nahin hoti thi bas har jagah manamani fis ada karane kee zaroorat thi
khair bakee baten apani jagah par thin aur desh apani gati se chal raha tha
ladakiyon kee jo halat thi so thi aam taur par ladake chahe ve jyada padhelikhen hon ya guzare layak sab ke sab ek hi nav par savar the sabakee gardan berojagari kee dudhari talavar ke niche thi

daraasal in pagal kar dene vali aur amanaviy zindagi jine par mazaboor karane vali sthitiyon ke pichhe kaee karan ek sath sakriy the mukkamal taur par yah nahin kaha ja sakata tha ki bazar men paisa kam hone ke karan chizon kee mang kam ho rahi thi aur kam khapat hone ke karan faiktariyon karakhanon men utpadan kam ho raha tha is karan se vahan kam log bharati kiye ja rahe the yah bhi nahin kaha ja sakata tha ki desh men kampyootar kranti aa jane se kam karane layak hathon kee zaroorat hi nahin rahi thi

aam taur par ye ve utpad hote the jinhen kharidane kee haisiyat upabhokta men nahin hoti thi jinakee use zaroorat hi nahin hoti thi aur jinhen kharid kar vah sirf unhin logon par raub jama sakata thajinhen vah vyaktigat taur par pasand nahin karata tha

yahi sara khel tha jo upabhokta ke sath din bhar bisiyon kampaniyon ke ejent dalal utpadak aur importar khelate rahate the sabaka makasad ek hi rahata  jaise bhi ho upabhokta kee jeb se paise nikalo usakee jeb men nahin hain to use apani sharton par udhar do usake man men in aalatoo falatoo chijon ke lie lalak paida karake apane utpad ke lie mang paida karo fir manamani keemat par usakee saplaee karo yahi bazar ka moolamantr tha jo in kampaniyon ke taja bharati sels eksakyootivs ke kan men utar diya jata tha

in fraish grejuets ladake ladakiyon ko bharati karate hi unhen har tarah ke grahak banane patane aur fansa kar lane kee vidhivat trening di jati thi fir unhen ek achchhi si kadaqadar kamiz aur rangin taee pahana kar aur ek bade se baig men duniya bhar kee falatoo chizen bhar kar bajar men utar diya jata tha  jao sham tak poore baig ko khali kar lao jitana mal bechoge utani hi kamishan paoge rozana baig khali kar ke laoge to tarakkee paoge

isi kamishan ke lalach men rozana saikadon hazaron yuvak yuvatiyan kadaq kamiz aur gale men fans rahi taee pahane bada sa baig dhote hue bainkon daftaron bazaron aur koloniyon men kisi bhi vakt bhatakate hue dekhe ja sakate the inake baig men sheving krim kichan ka aadhunik saman juraben chakoo sait laitar fraing pain tarch kuchh bhi ho sakata tha ve aapako folding chhata pasand n aane par mini miksar ke lie fansa sakate sakate the aur usake lie bhi n fansane par apane baig se bachchon ke lie koee imported khilauna nikal kar gher sakate the ye chijen ve aapako chhapi huee keemat se aadhi keemat par dene ke lie ek tarah se gidagidate dekhe ja sakate the yah bat alag hoti ki chhapi huee keemat se aadhi keemat par bhi vah chiz mahangi lagati

isake bavazood taee aur baig vale ye sels eksakyootiv marketing dairaiktar ya mainejamaint treni jaise bhari bharakam padanam vale ye ghumantoo selsamain daraasal bahut nirih se lagate the inhen din bhar bolane dar dar bhatakane dher sara saman dhone aur ek ek grahak ko apane shabdajal men fansane kee hi kamishan milati thi isake lie unhen din bhar jis tarah aur jitani bar gidagidana padata tha unhen taras ke layak hi banata tha ek bat aur bhi thi in logon ko dekhakar bachapan men dekhe feri valon kee bhi yad aati thi jo bandhe bandhaye gali mauhallon men barahon mahine ek hi tarah kee chizen bechane ke lie lagabhag usi vakt ke aasapas aaya karate the aur lambi si pyari si tan laga kar poore mauhalle ko apane aane kee khabar diya karate the ve feri vale sabhi mauhallon men bahanape ka sa rishta jodate hue saman becha karate the ek tarah se ve gali mauhallon kee dinacharya ka ek hissa ban jaya karate the ve kaee bar kisi kee mang par khas aaitam dhoondh kar bhi la diya karate the isake alava ve bahanon bhabhiyon aur nanadon ke kaee mamalon men razadar bhi huaa karate the

unaka aana achchha lagata tha lekin in aadhunik feri valon ko dekhate hi khijh paida hoti thi ek to ye log bak bak bahut karate the daravaja khulate hi sighe bhitar ghus jate the aur doosare apani chizen jabaradasti thopana chahate halanki un par khijate samay ham achchhi tarah janate hote the ki ye to sirf bhade ke sipahi hain jinake zariye ye ladaee aur koee lad raha hai lekin ladaee ke niyam to yahi sikhate hain ki dushman ko maro nahin to vah aapako mar dalega isi vazah se ye selsamain har jagah dutkare bhi jate the

inhin aadhunik feri valon kee ek aur zamat bhi thi jo kuchh bechati to nahin thi lekin konsaipt aur sarvis saiktar ka pratinidhitv karati thi ye log grahak ko patane kee har chand koshish karate apani sarvis ke lakhon fayade ginate the jaise ve aapako fansane ke lie ghar se hi kasam kha kar nikalate the yahi unaka pesha tha videshi bainkon ke kredit kard kisi klab ya holide risort kee mahangi aur aajivan sadasyata kisi shoping klab kee sadasyata ya isi tarah kee kisi bhavy eenami yojana vagairah ke lie rozana saikadon kee sankhya men ye marketing eksakyootiv grahakon kee talash men idhar udhar daftaron dukanon koloniyon men chakkar lagate dekhe ja sakate the inhen naukari par rakhane vali kampani inake lie jo bijines target tay kar deti ve dekhanesunane men bahut aakarshak lagate lekin hasil karane bahut mushkil hote the ye kampaniyan grahak patane ke lie har tarah ke naitikanaitik hathakande apanatin kahin se bhi grahakon ke pate fon nambar hasil kar letin aur fir unhen fon karake batatin ki aapako hamane samman eenam ke lie chuna hai logon ko eenam lene ke lie kisi achchhe hotal men bulavaya jata mej buk karavayi jati vahin ja kar pata chalata ki ve akele nahin hain jinhen is tarah bulavaya gaya hai kaee aur bhi hain jinhen is tarah gher kar laya gaya hai vahin yah rahasy bhi khulata ki yah sara natak unhen kisi mahangi falatoo aur bakavas skeem kee sadasyata ke lie gherane ke lie kiya ja raha hai turant sadasyata lene par bhari chhoot ka chugga dala jata ek poora dal hota jo har tarike se aap par itana dabav dalata ki aap mazaboor ho kar han kar baithen videshi halanki is tarah kee ghumantoo selsamainaship ne desh ke lakhon berojagaron ko vhait kolar naukari de rakhi thi aur ve shan se kah sakate the ki ve achchhe bhale kam dhandhe se lage hue hain unake pas vijiting kard hai bhari bharakam padanam hai lekin asaliyat ve hi janate the ki unhen kitane mushkil lakshy de diye jate the poora n kar pane kee halat men turant bahar ka rasta dikha diya jata din bhar ediyan ragadane ke evaj men unhen pachas sath rupaye bhi mushkil se milate jabaki din bhar men ve kampani ko hajaron rupaye kama kar de chuke hote the isake alava ye kampaniyan udhar mal la kar nakad bechatin sirf inhin ghumantoo logon kee hi naukari ya pagar ka thikana nahin hota tha isake alava in kampaniyen ka koee bharosa bhi nahin hota tha ki kab band ho jayen ya dhandha hi badal len

desh men achanak ek mahamari kee tarah fail gaye bhoomandalikaran ke daity aur upabhoktavad ke danav ne ek aur sarvis saiktar ko janm diya tha is kshetr men bhi khoob kamaee thi beshak kharch bhi the aur berojagaron ke lie bharapoor rojagar kee gunjaish bhi thi lekin yahan bhi rojagar pane valon ka aur sarvis pane valon ka bharapoor shoshan ho raha tha dekhate hi dekhate desh ke har gali mauhalle men sthaniy deshi aur videshi antarrashtriy kooriyar sevaon ka jal sa bichh gaya tha inamen sthaniy log bhi the aur maltineshanal kampaniyan bhi thin jo ek chhote se kavar ko ek shahar se doosare shahar men chaubis ghante men pahunchane ka dava karake sau rupaye tak jhatak leti thin jitana bada lifafa utani hi jyada fis in ejensiyon men bhi vok in intaravyoo ke zariye fresh grejuets bharti kiye jate aur unhen achchhi yoonifarm pahana kar aur gale men pejar lataka kar bajar men dakiyagiri ke lie utar diya jata ye bechare taee dhari yuva log din bhar ek bade se plastik baig men dher sari chittiyan lie ek imarat se doosari imarat men dakiyagiri karate dekhe ja sakate the inhonne ek kam poora kiya nahin hota tha ki pejar par doosara sandesh aa tapakata ki aate hue falan kampani se bhi dak bhi lete aao inamen se jo marketing said men hote ve bhi bechare din bhi apane asambhav aur mushkil tagret poore karane ke chakkar men mare mare firate
