lekin isi ke samantar lagabhag sabhi mahanagaron shaharon aur kaee bar kasbon ke bazar bhi har vakt grahakon kee bhid se pate rahate kisi bhi samay bazar se guzarate vakt bhid kee vazah se kandhe chhilate dukanadaron ke pas sabhi grahakon ke layak saman to hota lekin dikhane bechane kee hi fursat nahin hoti thi jitani badi aur mahangi dukan hoti vahan utani hi jyada bhid hoti log the ki chizon par toote padate halanki kuchh arasa pahale tak itani mahangaee kee kalpana bhi nahin kee ja sakati thi chizen mahangi thin aur khoob mahangi thin lekin yah dekh kar bhi hairani hoti thi ki in damon par bhi un chizon ko kharidane vale apani bari ka intazar karane ke lie lambi lainon men lage rahate pata nahin logon ke pas itana paisa kahan se aa jata tha ki din bhar shaping karane ke bad bhi khatam nahin hota tha

madhyavarg ne achanak hi oopar kee taraf oonchi chhalang laga li thi aur usake kharid pane kee takat raton rat badh gayi thi use kharch karate dekh kar ab utani hairani nahin hoti thi jitani kaee bar yah dekh kar hoti thi ki ab garib aadami bhi usake nakshe kadam par chalane laga tha kisi baink men kam karane vala svipar jab pachas hazar kee dupahiya gadi le kar use sajane ke lie panch hazar aur kharch karata tha ya kisi sarakari daftar men mamooli steno jab bis hazar ka nekales aur sat hazar kee sadi pahanakar daftar aati thi to hairani to hoti hi thi kaee bar mamooli haisiyat vale kisi karmachari ko apane bachchon kee shadi men lakhon kharch karate dekh saval uthane svabhavik hi the

vakt tha ki bahut tezi se badal raha tha sains ab aam aadami kee cheri ho gayi thi sirf use apane ghar ke daravaje ke aage bandh sakane kee haisiyat honi chahiye thi aadami aur aalasi ho chala tha ab usake pas har kam ke lie svachalit mashinen thin ya rimot kantrol vali behatarin mashinen thin bartan saf karane kapade dhone roti belane kee mashinen to ab bite vakt kee baten thin yah yug to apane sath har asanbhav kam ke lie aadhunik upakaran le kar aaya tha ab aap kahin bhi aadami ko ek sath hagate aur mobail fon par baten karate ya fon par baten karate aur hagate dekh sakate the selular fon ya pejar ab chalate firate aadami ke pas pain ya laitar kee tarah aam ho chale the

beshak yah vakt kuchh khas logon ke lie behatarin shanadar aur aon d top aof d varld jaisa mahasoos karane jaisa tha lekin aam aadami ke lie yah abhi bhi bahut mushkil taim tha bahut hi mushkil vakt usane isase pahale ek sath itani mushkilen kabhi bhi nahin dekhin thi

ajib bat thi ki is poore paridrishy men bachche kahin nahin the aur n hi kahin unaka svabhavik bachapan hi tha agar kahin bachche the bhi to sirf vigyapanon men the aaim krim khate hue bachche chokalet khate hue bachche maigi noodals aur bargar khate hue bachche saf suthare kisi khas kampani ke mahange sabun se nahate saf gadabade bachche ye sare bachche upabhokta sanskriti ke naye vahak the jo badi badi kampaniyon ke utpadan bechane kee muhim par lagaye gaye the ve naye yug ke bikri pratinidhi the ve svabhavik bachanap jite galabahiyan dale bhari basta uthaye skool jate bachche nahin the in bachchon men shararaten nahin thin inake bachapan men kahin bhi mitti nahin thi kyonki inake kapadon men jara si mitti lagate hi inakee modal mataen inhen kisi kampani ke sabun se dho dalati thin aur ye fir se pahale kee tarah ujale aur saf suthare ho jate the

ham apane desh kee aajadi kee pachasavin varshaganth mana rahe the aur hamare pas ye hi bachche the jinhen ham dikha sakate the asali bachche kahin aur the aur unakee taraf kisi kee bhi nigah nahin gayi thi halanki ve sab jagah the karakhanon men dhabon hotalon men sadakon chaurahon par bhattiyon ke pas aur skoolon ke bahar bas ve inhin kee nigah men nahin the
katha nayak aur katha nayika bhi isi vakt ka hissa the aur apane apane hisse ke achchhe bure din dekh rahe the

katha nayika pahale nariman panit ke ek praivet daftar men kam karati thi usase pahale aur usase bhi pahale usake khate men bisiyon chhoti badi naukariyan darz thin is naukari men use kul nau sau rupaye pagar milati thi anishchitata aur daihik shoshan ka hamesha dar tab vah bhi sham ke vakt yahin isi munder par baitha karati thi akeli aur apane aap men khoyi huee kaee din tak donon ne ek doosare ko apane aas pas baithe dekha tha fir achanak hi bat shuroo huee aur baten aage badhane lagin ve ab aksar milate the ek doosare ke sukh dukh dekhatesunate aur sheyar karate the dhire dhire donon ek doosare ke nazadik aaye aur ek doosare kee takalifon ke bhagidar bane zindagi jaisi bhi ho ek sath guzarane ka aham faisala liya gaya halanki ekdoosare ka sath unhen kisi tarah aage badhate rahane ka bahut bada sahara deta tha aur katha nayak ko apani zindagi arthapoorn lagane lagi thi fir bhi vah aksar bechain ho uthata katha nayika ko lekar vah jitane bhi sapane bunata sabamen usakee ek hi chinta hoti ki aakhir vah usase shadi kare to kaise aur use le jaye kahan

tabhi ek aur chhota sa hadasa ho gaya tha aur un donon kee niyamit mulakaton par ek tarah se bain lag gaya tha beshak ise hadasa nahin kaha ja sakata tha kyonki yah katha nayika ke lie behatari ka sandesh le kar aaya tha kathanayika ko virar men hi apane ghar ke pas pahali aur doosari kaksha ke bachchon ko padhane kee naukari mil gayi thi chaudah sau rupaye kee in chaudah sau rupaye ka chaik skool mainejamaint tabhi deta tha jab vah tin sau rupaye nakad kaishiyar ko thama deti thi halanki is tarah se usakee pagar sirf gyarah sau rupaye padati thi jisake evaj men use sath bachchon ke sat piriyad lagatar lene padate the lekin tab bhi vah nariman panit vali naukari se is roop men behatar sthiti men thi ki use ab aane jane men char panch ghante aur do tin sau rupaye kharch nahin karane padate the beshak vah ab katha nayak se rozana nahin mil pati thi lekin ab usake pas khud ke lie apani man aur bahan ke lie thoda atirikt vakt mil jata tha ye baten itani mahatvapoorn nahin thin usake lie jitani yah bat thi ki ab usake pahale kee tulana men tin sau rupaye ke karib jyada mil jate the ye tin sau rupaye nishchit hi katha nayak se ho sakane vali mulakaton kee tulana men jyada zaroori the

katha nayika kee man thodi bahut silaee karati thi aur chhoti bahan dasavin kee chhatra hone ke bavajood pados ke ghar men ek chhote bachche ke lie bebi siting karati thi aur evaj men tin sau rupaye pati thi ghar ka kharch katha nayika ke vetan se hi chalata tha kisi tarah gadi khinchi ja rahi thi

halanki katha nayika ne bhi aur adhyapikaon kee dekhadekhi kuchh atirikt paise kamane ka zariya dhoondh liya tha lekin ye sab bhi oont men munh men jire kee tarah lagata pahali doosari ke bachchon ko sirf isalie fel kar dena ki ve jabaradasti aapase tyooshan padhen bachche ke janm din par sirf tafi dekh kar nak bhaun sikodana aur jatalana ki hamen aur bachchon kee tarah sirf tafi par n bahala kar kuchh gift bhi lao khud ke janmadin par kaksha ke sare bachchon ko khali lifafe pakada dena ki is men apane manbap se das bis rupaye rakhava lao ye sare hathakande katha nayika ko bahut ochhe lagate aakhir vah kavitaen likhati thi aur kuchh to sochati samajhati hi thi halanki is sab ke lie use kuchh bhi n karana padata aur sari chizen apane aap hoti jatin fir bhi usaka man n manata

aur aise hi kathin vakt men hamara katha nayak aur katha nayika saptah men ek bar mil kar aadha ghanta baten karana ya masala dosa khana ya bhelapoori kha lena bhi sirf isalie eford nahin kar pate the ki milane ke lie unamen se kisi ek ko tren kee tikat ke lie hi attharah rupaye kharch karane padate the jo donon ko hi bhari padate the fon kee suvidha donon ke pas hi nahin thi lekin yah vahi kathin samay tha jab log maikal jaiksan ke sho ke lie isi shahar men pandrah hazar ka tikat ya kriket maich ka panch hazar ka tikat pane ke lie ghanton lain men khade rahate the logon ko is kathin vakt men bhi tinchar hazar ke joote satrah hazar rupaye kee dres ya pandrah hazar ka rangin dhoop ka chashma mahanga nahin lagata tha is kathin vakt men bhi log barah pandrah sau rupaye ka khana kha hi rahe the auraten pandrah sau rupaye kee brejari pahan hi rahi thin aur log bachchon ko hazaron rupaye ke khilaune dilava hi rahe the

thik isi kathin vakt men hamara katha nayak apani bhookh ko kaee kaee ghante sirf isalie talata rahata tha ki ghar ja kar khana to vaise hi khana hi hai katha nayika bahut zaroorat hone par bhi doosari se tisari sadi sirf isalie eford nahin kar par pati thi ki har bar kuchh naye kharche pichhali bar kee tarah is bar bhi tal rahe hote the use saheliyon ke sath golagappe khana ya ek achchhi jodi nakali moti vali mala kharidana bhi aiyyashi lagata tha chizen in donon ke lie sachamuch bahut mahangi thin

inhin sari vazahon takalifon aur mazabooriyon ke chalate katha nayak aur katha nayika pichhale do dhaee baras se ek doosare ko chahane ke bavazood shadi ke lie tay nahin kar pa rahe hain katha nayak ke pas jagah hi nahin hai use hansi aati hai  usake pas nayika ko choomane gale lagane ya mutthi bhar pyar karane ke lie bhi jagah nahin hai sab kuchh sarvajanik jagahon par sabake samane

katha nayika ka liya gaya pahala chumban use abhi bhi yad hai use us chumban ke lie kee gayi poori eksarasaij aaj bhi romanchit kar deti hai ek bar usane yoon hi katha nayika se kah diya tha ki vah use aaj usake ghar tak chhodane jayega katha nayika ekadam chaunk gayi thi vah soch bhi nahin sakati thi ki kathanayak sirf use chhodane jane ke lie charchaget se virar kee aane jane kee  kimi kee char ghante kee yatra karega munbaee jaise mahanagar men is bat kee kalpana bhi nahin kee ja sakati thi fir bhi vah zid karake usake sath gaya tha halanki tren men donon jab pahali bar ek sath sat kar baithe the to nayika behad romanchit ho gayi thi katha nayika ne use apane ghar tak aane kee ijazat nahin di thi aur use virar steshan par hi ek kap chay pila kar agali tren se ravana kar diya tha
virar se vapis aate samay katha nayak ne dekha tha ki vasaee steshan aane tak usake dibbe men koee bhi savari nahin thi kam se kam jis sit par vah baitha tha us hisse men to bilkul bhi nahin

agali bar jab dobara katha nayak ne usake samane fir se yahi prastav rakha tha to vah thodi na nukur ke bad man gayi thi virar pahunch kar hi katha nayak ne usase kaha tha ki vah ek bar fir usake sath vasaee tak vapis chale ek khas bat karani hai use nayika ko tabhi usane sattar kee raftar se chal rahi lagabhag khali lokal men sham ke sadhe aath baje pahali bar chooma tha nayika behad romanchit ho gayi thi vah kalpana bhi nahin kar sakati thi ki yah ghunna sa chuppa sa aadami itani mardanagi ka kam bhi kar sakata hai isase pahale ki nayak use dobara choom pata vasaee steshan aa gaya tha aur vah tezi se utar gayi thi gadi chalane tak khidakee kee salakhen pakad kar khadi rahi thi aur jate jate use  buddhoo kahin ke kee shanadar digri de gayi thi

sachamuch vah buddhoo hi to tha ki apani premika ka chumban lene ke lie usane itani badi mashakkat kee thi lagabhag char ghante kee falatoo aur bina tikat yatra kee thi aur loj men der se pahunchane ke karan dinar mis kiya tha
log the ki kahin bhi kabhi bhi apane partanaron ke n keval chumban le lete the balki isase bhi kaee kadam aage badh kar ashlilata kee simaen langhane lagate the
katha nayak ka bhi dil karata ki use katha nayika ke sath bitane ko thoda sa hi ekant mile lekin is kambakht mahanagari men ekant hai kahan

ek bar use yah ekant mila bhi tha lekin vah nahin janata tha ki is ekant kee use itani badi keemat chukani padegi use aofis ke hi kisi sathi ne bataya tha ki ek sindhi mahila peing gest rakhati hai rahane aur ghar ke khane kee bahut kam damon par bahut achchhi vyavastha vah vahan turant pata karane gaya tha sachamuch achchha ghar bar tha karib saintis baras kee mahila thi vah bahut hi milanasar lagi thi vah mahila use pahali hi mulakat men man moh lene vali usakee ek hi ladakee thi  chaudahpandrah baras kee pati aksar bahar toor par rahata tha ghar par koee mard rahe  yahi soch kar vah peing gest rakhati thi

sari chizen manamafik thin use alag kamara diya ja raha tha jahan vah kabhi kabhar katha nayika ko lane kee soch sakata tha agar sab kuchh thik thak chalata to vah vahin rahate hue shadi karane kee bhi soch sakata tha lekin yah sara sochana sirf sochana hi rah gaya tha

vahan usaka yah pahala hi din tha vah apana sara saman le kar aa gaya tha apana kamara jamaya tha usane munbaee men itane barason men yah pahali bar hota ki vah ek poore kamare men akela sota us bhadr mahila ne bahut hi suruchipoorn dhang se khana bana kar use khilaya tha vah nihal ho gaya tha
usakee zindagi kee bahut badi samasya hal ho gayi thi dhang ke khane aur rahane ke lie vah kab se taras raha tha

vah der tak jagata raha tha aur katha nayika ko lekar madhur rangin sapane bunata raha tha lekin in sapanon men dastak kisi aur ne di thi pahale to vah samajh hi nahin paya tha ki yah daravaja khatakhatane kee halakee si aavaz kahan se aa rahi hai kafi der bad hi vah samajh paya tha ki usi ka band daravaja khatakhataya ja raha tha usane uth kar jab daravaja khola tha to samane makan malakin khadi thi lagabhag paradarshi gaun men usane ekadam bhitar aa kar daravaja band kar diya tha

katha nayak ekadam bhaunchak sa khada dekhata rah gaya tha usakee taraf kamatur nazaron se dekhate hue boli thi vah  kambakht nind hi nahin aa rahi thi tumhari batti jalati dekhi to socha   are tum khade kyon ho aao baitho na aur usane katha nayak ko khinch kar apane pas bitha liya tha katha nayak ko kato to khoon nahin vah yah kya dekh raha tha yaun ka itana khula aamantrann achanak usake samane sab kuchh saf ho gaya tha yah itane kam damon men sari suvidhaen itana achchha vyavahar aur itana badhiya bhojan badale men yah sab kuchh chhi

us rat vah bahut mushkil se khud ko us kamatur aurat ke changul se bacha paya tha vaise vah bach bhi kahan paya tha us aurat ne use bar bar apane se lipatane kee koshishen kee thin yahan tak ki vah usake samane poori tarah nangi ho gayi thi lekin jab katha nayak kisi bhi tarah is roop men apane jivan men saiks kee shurooaat ke lie razi nahin huaa tha to usane use dher sare paison ka bhi lalach diya tha  tum jo chaho le lo bas meri yah ichchha poori kar diya karo roz nahin to hafte men doek bar sahi vah fir bhi nahin mana tha to usane aakhiri danv chala tha  vah man jaye varana vah us par apani ladakee ko chhedane kar ilzam lagayegi aur isi vakt khade khade daravaje se bahar nikalava degi ek bar usane socha bhi ki kya harz hai jab sab kuchh usake samane itane shanadar dhang se parosa ja raha hai to vah bhi kyon n aanand le lekin vah aisi nimfomainik auraton ke bare men janata tha ek bar silasila shuroo ho jane par isaka kahin ant nahin hota apani saiks poorti ke samane ve n din dekhati hain n rat yahi soch soch kar vah use apane se pare thelata raha yahi kahata raha aaj vah bahut thaka huaa hai kal vah zaroor usakee ichchha poori karega lekin vah bilkul bhi nahin mani thi vah bar bar use apane oopar gira rahi thi usane jabaradasti katha nayak ke kapade utar diye the vah tab bhi nahin mana to usane katha nayak ko gali di thi  namard kahin ka mainne to socha tha dekhane men achchhe khase ho

aur is tarah se katha nayak ko jivan ka pahala saiks anubhav is jabaradasti ke ikatarafa khel men apani mardanagi siddh karane ke chakkar men mila tha pahali hi rat men do bar use apani mardanagi dikhani padi thi

katha nayak samajh gaya tha ki vah yahan raha to use roz rat hi yah rasalila rachani padegi usakee sehat ka jo falooda banega so banega vah is ghinaune rishte kee vazah se kisi ko munh hi nahin dikha payega

agale din hi usane vahan se apana boriya bistar uthaya tha aur us prasang ko apani yadon se hamesha ke lie nikal fenka tha usane aaj tak kisi se bhi is ghatana ka zikr nahin kiya tha halanki use vahan poore mahine ke khane rahane ke paise edavans de diye the lekin us ek rat ko itane bhishan roop men guzarane ke bad usakee himmat hi nahin huee thi ki apane bakee paise vapis mangane jaye usake bad kisi ghar men dobara sheyaring karake rahane kee usakee himmat hi nahin huee thi

is samay usaka sabase bada sankat hi yahi hai ki  chhote se chhote aur door se door kiraye ke makan ke lie bhi vah tis chalis hazar dipajit kahan se laye jhopadapatti vale bhi pandrah hazar dipajit mangate hain aur hazar rupaye kiraye se kam bat nahin karate vo bhi door daraj ke ilakon men jahan rahane par bas ka kiraya alag se jud jayega vah jahan kam karata hai vahan se to vah hazar rupaye edavans kee bhi ummid nahin kar sakata vahan to vah aaj kam chhode to das aadami hazar rupaye men kam karane ke lie lain lagaye khade milenge bachat ke paise n usake pas kal the n aaj hain kal kisane dekha

katha nayika kee bhi kamobesh yahi halat hai ghar chalaye ya jode man bahan ko dekhe ya apani shadi ke lie sapane dekhe jab tak bahan kamane layak nahin ho jati tab tak intazar karane ke alava koee upay nahin panch sal ya aur jyada tab vah tis kee hogi aur katha nayak taintis ka donon jab bhi milate hain har bar sir jod kar baithate hain aur bisiyon bar guna bhag karate hain
katha nayika to pahane kapadon men bhi aa jaye par aaye kahan is kahan ka javab hi nahin hai donon ke pas

kya aapako nahin lagata in do pyar karane valon ka bhi zindagi kee chhoti chhoti khushiyon par hak banata hai unhen bhi apane chhote chhote sapanon ko poora karane kee chah ho sakati hai vaise bhi ve eyyashi vali khoobasoorat aur aisho aaram kee zindagi ke khvab kahan dekh rahe hain ek chhota sa ghar hi to chahate hain jahan unakee apani khud kee duniya ho aur

aap chahen to inake chhote se ghar ke behatar naukari ke aur behatar zindagi ke sapane ko poora karane men unakee madad kar sakate hain aapakee nazar men in donon men se kisi ke bhi layak koee behatar naukari ho ya kahin bina dipojit ka kam kiraye vala koee ghar ho to unhen zaroor batayen ve door pas kahin bhi jane ke lie taiyar hain in donon ka bayodata aapake pas hai hi sahi

inaka pata usakee kya zaroorat jab bhi aapake pas is tarah kee naukari ya ghar ho aap is bhid men jis bhi tisare aadami ke kandhe par hath rakhenge vah hamara katha nayak hi hoga aap use dekhate hi pahachan lenge

satyamev jayate  prachin bharatiy sahity men mundakopanishad se liya gaya yah sootr vaky aaj bhi manav jagat kee sima nirdharit karata hai  saty kee vijay ho  ka viparit hoga asaty kee parajay ho  saty asaty sabhyata ke aarambh se hi dharm evan darshan ke kendr bindu bane huye hain ramayan men bhagavan ram kee ravan par vijay ko asaty par saty kee vijay bataya gaya aur pratik svaroop ham aaj bhi ise dashahara parv ke roop men manate hain tatha ravan ka putala jalakar saty kee vijay ka shankhanad karate hain mahabharat men bhi ek krishn ke netritv aur panch pandavon kee sau kauravon aur attharah akshauhini sena par vijay ko saty kee asaty par vijay bataya gaya kalantar men ved aur puran ke virodhi buddh v jain ne bhi saty ko panchashil v panchamahavrat ka pramukh ang mana

saty  ek behad satvik par jatil shabd hai dhaee aksharon se nirmit yah shabd utana hi saral hai jitana ki  pyar  shabd par is marg par chalana utana hi kathin hai jitana ki sachche pyar ke marg par chalana rashtrapita mahatma gandhi jinhen saty ka sabase bada vyavaharavadi upasak mana jata hai ne saty ko eeshvar ka paryayavachi kaha unake shabdon men saty hi eeshvar hai evan eeshvar hi saty hai yah vaky gyan karm evan bhakti yog kee triveni hai saty kee anubhooti agar gyan yog hai to ise vastavik jivan men utarana karmayog evan antatah saty roopi sagar men doobakar isaka rasasvadan lena hi bhakti yog hai shayad yahi karan hai ki lagabhag sabhi dharm saty ko kendr bindu banakar hi apane naitik aur samajik niyamon ko pesh karate hain

is arth men rachana ke karm se aalochana ka karm bhinn nahin kaha jayega isi arth men aalochana bhi srijanatmak karm hai thik rachana kee tarah yah tabhi sanbhav hai jab aalochak ko jivan ke vikas kee sthitiyon kee bhagidari nibhane ka tajurba ho kaha ja sakata hai ki rachana aur aalochana donon saman roop se jivan kee vastavikata ko khojane ke lie prayatnashil hain khoj kee is prakriya men vividhata hona svabhavik hai kyonki jivan kee vastavikata jatil aur dvandapoorn hai sapat aur ekangi nahin isalie donon ka marg bhin nbhin n hote hue bhi lakshy saman hai

mana ki rachana jivan kee jatilataaun ka udghatan hai to aalochana ka kary yah khoj karana hai ki rachana men vyakt jivan vastavik bhi hai ya nahin pathak bhi yah kary karata hai isalie vivekavan pathak ya sahriday bhi ek aalochak kaha gaya hai yah bhi ho sakata hai ki rachanakar pathak ka sahara lekar aalochana kee paravah n karen kyonki rachanakar aalochana kee satta ko apani anuvarti bhi banana chahata hai main is bahas ko filahal aage nahin badhana chahata bat antaravalamban kee hai main yah manata hoon ki aalochak ke lie bhi jivan ka gahara aur vyapak sarokar vastavik aalochana karm kee or prerit karata hai aalochak ke lie bhi jivan ke prati utani pakshadharata aavashyak hai jitani ki ek rachanakar ke lie tatasth rahakar eemanadar aalochana karm sanbhav nahin

keval sahityik ya akadamin manadandon ka palan karake aalochana apane kartavy se mukt nahin ho sakati yadi rachana jivan ka hras karane vale moolyon kee vakalat karati hai to aalochana kee patari usake sath nahin baithegi aise men aalochana ugr aur katu bhi ho sakati hai par aisa sarvatr aur sadaiv nahin hota parantu yadi aalochana apani andh jadata ke aage kavita ke jivan vikas ke sanketon ko grahan karane men asafal siddh hoti hai to kavita bhi usaka javab avashy degi isaka tatpary yah nahin ki kavita aalochana parampara kee satta ko hi asvikar kar de muktibodh ne samiksha kee samasyaen vishay par charcha karate hue in simaon ka spasht ullekh kiya hai yahan kavi aur samikshak donon kee sthitiyon par vichar kiya gaya hai nagarjun aisi hi aalochana se kshubdh hokar vyangy ka sahara lete hain ve poore aalochana karm ke virodhi nahin hain agar keerti ka fal chakhana hai kalakar ne firfir socha aalochak ko khush karana hai nagarjun kee ye panktiyan aalochana kee ek vishesh sthiti kee or sanket karati hai

isi prakar trilochan bhi aalochana karm kee sankeernnata ka sanket karate hain rukh dekh kar samiksha ka ab main hoon hami koee likha kare kuchh jaldi hoga nami main yah nahin manata ki aalochana ko rachana ka anuvarti mana jae n hi rachana ko aalochana ka anuvarti mana ja sakata hai in donon ka sambandh dvandatmak hai par yah jaroor kahana chahata hoon ki aalochana rachanakar ke jivananubhav ko samajhe vah jivananubhav jo rachana men jhilmila raha hai rachana men vyakt jivan kis prakar ka hai aur usake kaun se karan hain isakee padatal bhi aalochana ka dharm hai yah svikar karana padega ki rachana men vyakt jivan jaisa bhi hai usake bhi aitihasik aur bhautik karan hain isase inkar kar aalochana apane dayitv ka nirvah eemanadari ke sath nahin kar sakati aalochana par yah aarop lagaya jata hai ki vah rachana ke jivan sanvedana se shoony hokar vichar aur chintan ka sahara leti hai par yah aarop bebuniyad hai aisa kahana aalochana matr ko kathaghare men khada karana hai jabaki aalochana ka kary rachana ko samajhana prakarantar se sanvedanatmak jivan ko samajhana bhi hai

jivan ko samajhane ke mooladhar alagalag ho sakate hain aalochana un mooladharon kee khoj karati hai in mooladharon kee khoj rachana ke upakaranon ko kendr men rakhakar kee jati hai aalochana ka yah bhi kary hai ki jivan men un mooladharon kee sarthakata ya nirarthakata kee khoj kare rachanakar ko is par aapatti nahin honi chahie aalochana ke apane niyam aur siddhant bhi hote hain vastut aalochana bhi ek anushasan hai in siddhanton ya niyamon ke prayog ka ek tarika hota hai rachana kee tarah aalochana ke ye siddhant bhi jivan par avalambit hain is tathy ko svikar kar hi aalochanaaalochana ko vishvasaniy aur pramanik banaya ja sakata hai isaliye aalochana ka yah bhi kary hai ki vah jivan ke vastavik sanvedanatmak saty ka sakshatkar karate hue rachana ke sanvedanatmak saty ka udghatan karate hue rachanakar ko rachana ke vastu satyon se adhik se adhik parichit karayen us par naee se naee roshani dale jisase rachanakar ke lie bhi vah prerak siddh ho sake rachana bhi aalochana ke lie naee chunauti banakar aaye

sarokaron se lagabhag bahar hote ja rahe hain ham uttaraadhunik samay ke ek aise chakravyooh men ghir gaye hain ki isase mukti ke upay dhoondh pana kathin ho raha hai sare vaikalpik jabab vastusthiti kee aalochana se aage nahin badh pa rahe hain jo bhi uttar nikalakar aate hain unamen aagat se jyada vigat kee gandh hoti hai yadi vikalp kee soch ko koee tek milati hai to ledekar marks aur gandhi is pustak men adhyayan ke drishtikon se aalekh tin khandon men vibhajit kiya gaya hai harek ka alag nam bhi hai  kavita sanskriti aur bhasha pratham khand men aath lekh hain jinamen ek ko chhodakar shesh madhyakalin santkaviyon par hain dvitiy khand sanskriti men chhah aur bhasha par sat aalekh hain

doosare aur tisare khand ke adhyayan se pratham khand men kabir soor tulasi bihari aur subhadra kumari chauhan ke oopar likhe vichar ka uddeshy svayamev ujagar ho jata hai jisakee charcha main ant men karana chahoonga jisase bat ko rakhane men suvidha hogi

sanskriti ke vividh vishayon par kendrit doosare khand ke sabhi aalekh itihas aur sanskritinirman kee prakriya ka udbhedan karate hue apani sanskriti ke tatv sankat aur usake satitv ke raksharth un kriyashilanon ko samajhane kee antaradrishti deta hai jisake mool men lok kee ve paranparaen aur jivanonnmukh gatividhiyan hain jo manushy kee aantarik unnati ke dvar kholati hai aur manavata kee sanskriti rachane men sahayy aur agragami hoti hai is khand ka pahala adhyay prakriti darshan aur sanskriti hai yahan sanskriti kee rachana prakriya ko samajhate hue jivan ji ne prakriti dharm paranparaen aur vikas se usake antarsanbandhon aur dvandvon ko itani barikee aur saghanata se chitrit kiya hai ki poora aalekh hi ek shodhaalekh sa lagata hai ek udaharan dekhie sanskriti aur paranpara ke antarsanbandhon par

paranpara ka kam to bas itana hai ki vah sanskriti ke apane shishu ko vartaman ko saunp deti hai isake babajood sanskriti ke kshetr men prayah yah dekha jata hai ki prachinata ke prati hath kee had tak anurag hota hai jo us bandariya men bhi dikhaee deta hai jo agyanatavash apane mritashishu ke thathari ko apane vakshasthal se chipakaye ghoomati hai kahane ka matalab yah hai ki ham sanskriti ke karmakand se bachakar hi usake jivit aur svasth paksh ka vikas kar sakate hain karmakand aur anushthan sanskriti ke bahari paridhan hote hain usakee aatma nahin manushy ko sadaiv aatmik vikas kee jarurat hoti hai n ki bahari vaichitry kee

is aalekh kee badi khoobi yah hai ki yahan sanskriti ko aadami ke antasvikas kee prakriya se jodakar dekha gaya hai jisamen prakriti ke sahayog aur sangharsh ke avadan aur sath hi bhoomandalikaran ke nakaratmak bhoomika ko bhi lakshit kiya gaya hai bakaul samalochak manavjati ka dhyan manavsanskriti par kendrit n rahakar vastu aur usake upabhog par kendrit ho gaya hai poonji ka mahatv har samay raha hai lekin vah pahale kabhi manushy kee sthanapann nahin ban payi thi jabaki ab vah usaka sthan leti dikhaee de rahi hai yah sanskritipremiyon ke liye sabase badi chinta kee bat honi chahie bhavishy ka sangharsh poonji aur sanskriti ka hi sangharsh hoga dekha jay ki is sangharsh men manushy kitana vijit aur kitana parajit hota hai

sanskriti khand ke aalekh itihas kee prakriya ko samajhane ke liye bahumooly vichar prastut karate hain yahan mai ek dilachasp bat yah kahana chahata hoon ki main khud bhi itihas ka vidyarthi raha hoon aur mujhe aayog kee parikshataiyari ke dinon sanskritik itihas ka vivaranatmak adhyayan bhi karana pada tha parantu mujhe itihasvettaon kee motimoti kitabon se us samay utana labh nahin huaa jitana ki filavakt is chhoti si pustak ke sanskriti khand ke aalekhon se par afasos ki us vakt tak yah pustak prakash men nahin aayi thi in aalekhon ke padhane ke uparant agar koee bharat ke sanskritik itihas ka adhyayan kare to mere vichar se vah isake udbhav aur vikas kee jatilsanshlishth prakriya ko adhik gaharaee se samajh payega kyonki in aalekhon men nihit vichar sanskriti ke aadhunik bhavabodh ko chetana ke star par jagrat kar hamen us satyanveshan kee or modate hain jahan vivad kee paridhi se alag itihas apane mool roop men ghatit huaa hai isaliye pustak ka yah khand matr sahitysachetaon ke liye hi nahin sanskriti aur itihas ke shodharth  vidyarthi ke liye ek mahatvapoorn pustak a manual to understand the cultural heritage in India sabit hogi

inamen sanskriti ke oopar dharm aur sanskriti aur bhoomandalikaran aur sanskriti nam se do vishad aalekh to hain hi bharatiyata ke jvalant aur behad vivadit ulajhe hue mudde par bharatiyata ka savala shirshak se likha gaya ek matr itana gahanganbhir bahuprastariy multi layered aur bahuaayami multi dimensional vicharalekh bhi hai ki ise is pustak ka menifesto bhi kaha ja sakata hai jo pustak ko sarvajan hitaya aur keemati banate hain kyonki bakaul samalochak yah ek aisa saval hai jo aasani se pichha nahin chhodta hajaron salon kee paramparaon ka bal hamare pichhe jo hai kaisi vidambana hai ki aaj kee bharatiyata men ram kee us sanskriti ko ulata ja raha hai jisamen kursi lene ke bajay kursi chhod dene kee hod rahi hai

ikkeesavin sadi kee dahalij par kadam rakhane ke sath hi samay kee gati itani tivr ho gayi hai ki ab svagati svavalanban aur aatmanirbharata jaise vichar pichhadepan ke dyottak ho gaye hain jisamen gandhi kee mool avadharana ke ant kar dene ka bhi bigul foonk diya gaya hai kyonki da sinh ke anusar arthavyavastha men ab sab kuchh itana gaddmadd hai ki deshivideshi rashtriy aur antarashtriy jatiy aur vijatiy shaklon kee pahachan kee sookshm rekhaen tak mitane ko hain  isase kisi samaj desh aur rashthr kee bhavasatta kee koee ikahari aur ekarekhiy pahachan nahin hoti isaliye is kshetr men jo keval bharatiy manisha ne racha hai vah usaka apana hai vahi hamari bharatiyata hai vastav men is shodhalekh ke madhyam se bharatiyata kee jo khojabin kee gayi hai usamen yahan ke darshan rishichintan parampara sanskriti kee samarasata ka aatmasati charitrik paksha manavvyavahar aur sanbandhbhavana ko bakhoobi samane rakha gaya hai isake sufal ke roop men bharatiyata ka jo pratiman yahan prastut hai vah is arth men anyatam hai ki vah hi kal ke pravah men tik saka to tik payega bakee sab aisa pratit hota hai tathakathit uttaradhunikata ke prabal veg men bah jayenge itihas jisaka sadiyon se sakshee raha hai

yah da jivan sinh kee atyant mahatvapoorn sthapana hai ki anek jhanjhavaton ke bavajood bharatiyata ke mool men karuna rahi hai jo hamari samast darshanparampara ka nichod bhi hai par jo vaishvikaran kee chhdm sanskriti ke pas nahin hai ulte udaravad kee aad men shoshan aur kroorata ka ganda khel chand bahurashtriy kanpaniyon ke dvara khela ja raha hai sath hi yahan is bahari bayar men bharatiyata kee karunadhara ke ksheen ho jane ke sankat par gahari chinta vyakt kee gayi hai

isi bhanti isake bad ke aalekh dharm aur sanskriti men dharm ke prati marksavadi drishtikon men sanprati falit ho rahe vivekahin bhramak vicharon ko aade hathon lete hue jivan ji ne dharm ke mool aur sattatmak donon pakshon ka vishleshan kiya hai kyonki dharm ke mool men manaviy karuna sachaee nishchhalata sanvedanashilata aasha jaise hriday ke aatmik bhav hain par jab koee bhi dharm da sinh ke anusar sattatmak sthiti men tabdil ho jata hai to apani us manaviy pahunch se door hone lagata hai jo manav jati ke ek samooh ke liye ek samay shanti ka sandesh lekar aayi thi tab rah jati hai usakee aanushthanikata usaka karmakand usaka sharir dhiredhire usakee aatma nasht jati hai aur vah ek dhancha matr banakar rah jata hai is rahasy ko koee jivan sinh sarikhe samalochak kee kushagrabuddhi hi jan sakati hai ki marks ne dharm kee isi ulti prakriti ko janata ke liye afim bataya tha jo dharm kee manaviy bhoomika ke viparit hai n ki us dharm ko jo kshudratam prani ke liye bhi karuna aur shil ka vyavahar lekar sansar ke kalyanarth avatarit hota hai yahan dharm ke sanskritik paksh ke udghatan men samalochak kee medha atulaniy pratit hoti hai jo aadami ke vishvas ko dharm se digane se bachati bhi hai

bhoomandalikaran aur sanskriti nam ke aalekh men jaisa ki shirshak se spasht bhi hai vaishvikaran se sanskriti par aasann khataron kee bahukoniy padatal kee gayi hai yahan lekhak ne yah sandhan aur sanket karane kee koshish kee hai ki yadi bajar takanik ityadi aadhunik shodhon ka upayog manaviy gunnavatta ke liye kiye jayen to sthiti badal sakati hai jo ki ek vicharaniy sthapana hai

aalekh kala kee mooly prakriya kavipathakon ke liye vishesh labhakari hai kyonki isamen kavykala ke jin moolyon ko mahan bataya gaya haivah gahan manaviy prakriya ke marg se hokar jata hai kis tarah jata hai yah sudhi pathak aalochana padh kar aasani se samajh sakate hain is path se gujar kar aise kalavad aur roopavad se mohabhang bhi hota hai jo jivan kee prakriya se bahar hai

jaisa ki oopar bataya gaya hai bhasha par is pustak par sat aalekh hai ye aalekh vishvavidyalayi chhatron aur pratiyogi parikshaon men apane vaikalpik vishay hindi sahity chunane valon ko visheshopayogi pathaniy samagri upalabdh karata hai jo unake bhasha sanbandhi silebas par gahari pakad banane ke kam aa sakata hai sath hi yahan hindi jati kee sankalpana ko vrihattar udaravadi pariprekshy men vivechit kiya gaya hai jo hindi kshetr ke alava ahindi kshetron men hindi ke vikas aur prasar kee naee sanbhavanaen aur dishaen kholati hain sath hi sabhi jatiy bhashaon ke unnayan aur aatmgaurav ka marg prashast karati hai hinglisha ke prabhav men dindin nishpran ho rahi janabhasha hindi ko akshunn rakhane ke nihitarth bharatiy aatmabal ko sahi disha aur soch pradan karati hai

is prakar yah saf hai ki dvitiy aur tritiy khand men sanskriti aur bhasha ke sandarbh men da jivan sinh dvara bharatiy samay aur lok ko samajhane ka sarahaniy aur abhinav prayas kiya gaya hai jisamen un navachari vicharon ka pratifalan huaa hai jo bharatiy lok aur jivan ke paksh men hai isi lakshy kee prapti kavita khand ke aalekhon ka bhi abhipret hai ataev ab main pahala khand jo kavita vishayak pathon par aadhrit hai par aata hoon is khand men aath vichar hain jinamen panch madhyakalin sant kaviyon ke krititv par ek ritikavi bihari ek svatantrata ke gayak streekavi subhadra kumari chauhan aur ek kavita ke gadyroop par hai

da sinh kabir soor tulasi aur mira ko lok jivan ke atyant pratibhavan kavi ke roop men dekhate hain yahan lok aur bhakti prithakprithak nahin hai in santkaviyon ka sabase vilakshan gun yah hai ki ye bhakti men yogsadhana ke paksh ko jivan aur lok kee gaharaee men utar kar pratipadit karate hain n ki usakee avahelana kar aur ek premamay bhavapoorn sansar kee rachana karate hain aadikal kee kaviyon kee tarah inamen bhakti ka paksh jivan aur lok se kata huaa nahin hai samalochana men is vichar ko pratishtha mili hai ki aaj ke kaviyon kee rachanadharmita bhale hi un santkaviyon kee rachanadharmita se aage kee ho par unake srijan ke gahan manaviy arthon ko abhi samagr roop se samajhana bakee hai kyonki unakee kavitaon ka loksamay ab ke kaviyon se kahin adhik samriddh hai in lekhon ka sabase mahin aur saghan pahaloo hai unamen vyaiktik bhinnata individual difference jo bahut rochak bhi hai jivan ji kee sthapana hai ki kabir sanskriti kee buniyad par khade hain jabaki tulasi usake kangooron pardaraasal kabir hamare aadhunik bhavabodh ke bahut najadik hain is mamale men tulasi unase pichhe hain isaliye tulasi samanjasy aur samanvayavad ke poshak hain ve tootefoote ko jodane ka kam jyada karate hainkabir samanvayavad ke poshak nahin hain ve sanskriti ko antarvastu men badalate hain aur pahale se chali aati huee khandsanskriti men upekshit ko shamil karate hain kintu jab sanskriti ke star par stree ka mamala aata hai to kabir bhi pichhad jate hain kabir ke vyapak jivananubhavon men stree kee pida nahin sama pati is morche ko sanbhalati hain miran soor par likhe gaye aalekh ye braj ke loga men ve sabase mahatvapoorn bat kahate hain ki soor ne nagar sabhyata ke oopar gramy sabhyata ko pratishthit kiya hai jinamen prem aur jivan ke rag hain par kaise yah sab janane ke liye sinh ji ke priy pathakon ko poore aalekh se gujarana hoga sab uddharan yahan dena samichin nahin kyonki yah to pustakcharcha hai jisamen mainne matr apani pathakeey samajh hi abhivyakt kee hai

han ek bat aur bhaktikalin kaviyon par vah yah ki premras ke atyant mahatvapoorn kavi malik mo jayasi kee kami is khand men khalati hai jo madhyakalin santkaviyon kee ladi ko poori hone se rokati hain parantu pustak ke aamukh men da sinh kee svikarokti hai ki jayasi par koee mauka nahin mil paya to ve chahate hue bhi chhoot gaye par unase aasha kee jani chahie ki is pustak ke aagami sanskaran men is kami ko door kar liya jayega

roos men aapake rajadoot mistar josef devis ko roosi yuddh rahat kee or se sain fransisko men bhashan dena tha lekin ain mauke par unaka gala kharab ho gaya aur aapakee sarakar ke ek uchch adhikari ne mujhase poochha ki kya main unake sthan par bolane kee meharabani karoonga aur tab se main isamen apani gardan fansaye baitha hoon

tin ghante tak mujhase poochhatachh hoti rahi ek hafte bad fir unhonne mujhe fon kiya ki kya main aapravas karyalay men aaoonga mere vakeel ne mere sath chalane kee zid kee usaka kahana thaho sakata hai ve kuchh aur saval poochhen

jab main vahan par pahuncha to main itane sauhardapoorn svagat kee ummid nahin karata tha aapravas vibhag ke pramukh majhauli umr ke ek dayalu shakhs ne mano dilasa dete hue kahamujhe khed hai ki aapako hamari vajah se vilanb huaa hai mistar chaiplin lekin ab hamane aapravas karyalay kee ek shakha los enjels men bhi kholi hai aur ab aapaka kam jaldi hi ho jaya karega aur aapako apane aavedan patr vashingatan bhejane kee zaroorat nahin padegi aapase sirf ek saval aur poochhana hai mistar chaiplin aap kitana arasa bahar rahenge
chhah mahine se jyada nahin mainne javab diyaham sirf chhutti manane ja rahe hain

nahin to agar aap jyada arase ke lie ja rahe hain to aapako samay vistar ke lie avashy hi anumati leni hogi unhonne mej par ek dastavej rakh diya aur kamare se bahar chale gaye mere vakeel ne taeji se dastavej kee taraf dekhaye huee n bat kaha usane unhonne paramit de diya hai
vah aadami ek pen lekar lautakya aap yahan hastakshar karenge mistar chaiplin aur han aapako apani yatra ke doosare kagazat lene honge
mere hastakshar kar lene ke bad unhonne pyar se mera kandha thapathapayaye raha aapaka paramit main ummid karata hoon ki aapakee yatra sukhad rahegi charli jaiye jaldi ghar jaiye

shanivar ka din tha aur ham tren se ravivar kee subah nyoo yark ke lie nikalane vale the main chahata tha ki oona mere sef dipajit boks ko apane kabje men le le kyonki kuchh bhi ho sakata tha aur meri sari poonji isi bakse men rakhi thi lekin oona baink men jakar hastakshar karana talati rahi aur ab los enjels men ye hamara aakhiri din tha aur das minat men baink band ho jane vala tha
hamare pas sirf das hi minat bache hain isalie hamen jaldi karani hogi mainne kaha

aise mamalon men oona bahut tal matol karati hai kya ham chhuttiyon se vapis aane ka intazar nahin kar sakate kaha usane lekin main zid par ada raha hamane ek achchha kam kiya nahin to desh se apani sari poonji bahar nikalane ke lie hamen bakee jivan mukadamebaji men hi guzar dena padata

ye ek khushanuma din tha jab ham nyoo yark ke lie chale oona jane ke lie antim ghareloo taiyariyan kar rahi thi aur main baramade men khada ghar ko duvidha bhari bhavanaon ke sath dekh raha tha is ghar men mere sath kitana kuchh ghata tha itani sari khushiyan itani sari takalifen aur ab ghar kitana shant aur dostana lag raha tha ki mujhe ise chhodate hue takalif ho rahi thi

hailan hamari naukarani aur henari hamare batalar ko vida kah dene ke bad main rasoee men lapaka aur apani kuk anna ko vida ke do shabd kahe main aise maukon par bahut sharmila ho jata hoon aur anna golmatol si bhari bharakam mahila thoda ooncha sunati thi gud baya mainne kaha aur usakee banh ko chhuaa oona sabase bad men nikali usane mujhe bataya ki usane kuk aur naukarani ko rote hue dekha tha mere asistent dayarektar jeri epsatin hamen steshan par chhodane aaye

shahar ke bahari ilakon kee yatra rahat dene vali thi samudri yatra shuroo karane se pahale ham ek hafte tak nyoo yark men rahe jis samay main aanand bhogane ke lie apane aap ko taiyar kar hi raha tha ki mere vakeel charls shvartj yah kahane ke lie aaye ki yunaited aartists ka koee bhootapoorv karmachari mujh par kaee lakh dolar ke lie mukadama kar raha hai ye sab bakavas hai charli sath hi sath main chahata hoon ki aap ye samman n len kyonki isaka matalab aapako chhutti se vapis aana pad sakata hai is tarah se mujhe in aakhiri char dinon ke lie apane kamare me hi band rah jana pada aur main oona aur bachchon ke sath nyoo yark nahin ghoom paya alabatta main laimalait ke pres privyoo ke samay maujood rahana chahata tha samman mile ya nahin

main apane parivar ke sath jahaj ke vishal aakar ko us vakt chalate dekhane ka aanand lena chahata tha jab vah vahan se chhootata aur ek doosari duniya men pravesh karata isake bajaye main dar ke mare apane kebin men chhupa huaa tha aur portahol men se jhank raha tha

mainne daravaja khola

jim egi abhiabhi hamen vidaee dene ke lie aae hain ve daik par khade hain mainne chilla kar unhen bataya ki aap samman dene valon se chhupe hue hain aur portahol men se aapakee taraf dekh kar hath hilaenge ve tatabandh ke aakhir men khade hue hain oona ne bataya

mainne jim ko logon kee bhid se thoda alag hatakar khade hue dekha ve tez dhoop men jahaj ka muaayana kar rahe the mainne jaldi se apana fedora hait liya aur portahol men se apani banh nikal kar hath hilaya oona doosare portahol men se dekh rahi thi nahin unhonne aapako abhi bhi nahin dekha hai oona ne bataya

aur jim mujhe kabhi nahin dekh paye ye aakhiri bar tha ki main jim ko dekh raha tha duniya se alag akele khade hue takate hue aur khojate hue do baras bad dil ka daura padane se unakee mrityu ho gayi thi

aur aakhir hamane apani yatra shuroo kee payalat ke jane se pahale hi mainne daravaja khola aur dek par ek aazad aadami kee tarah aa gaya samane thin aakash chhooti nyoo yark kee imaraten akeli aur vishal dhoop men mujhase door jati hueen aur har pal aur adhik khoobasoorat hoti hueen vishal mahadvip dhundh men gayab ho raha tha aur mujhe ek ajib ehasas se bhar raha tha

halanki main apane parivar ke sath ingalaind jane kee ummid se hi utsahit tha main sukhad roop se rahat bhi mahasoos kar raha tha atalantik ka vistar man ko rahat de raha tha mujhe laga mano main koee doosara hi vyakti hoon main ab filmi duniya ka mithak nahin raha tha n hi badanami ka nishana balki main ek shadishuda aadami tha jo apane bivibachchon ke sath chhutti manane nikala hai bachche oopari dek par khelane men vyast the jabaki main aur oona dek kee kursiyon par baithe hue the aur isi mood men mujhe param prasannata ka anubhav huaa  ye ehasas udasi ke bahut nikat tha

ham un doston ke bare men bahut sneh se baten karate rahe jinhen ham pichhe chhod aaye the yahan tak ki hamane aapravas vibhag men mile mitravat vyavahar kee bhi bat kee aadami chhotechhote saujany ke aage kitani aasani se jhuk jata hai dushmani palana kitana mushkil hota hai

oona aur mainne yah socha tha ki ham lambi chhutti lenge aur apane aap ko prasannata ke havale kar denge laimalait ko lanch karane ke karyakram ke sath hamari chhuttiyan bematalab nahin hone vali thi jab aapako pata ho ki aap aanand ko karobar ke sath mila rahe hain to behad khushi hoti hai

agale din isase behatar lanch nahin ho sakata tha hamare mehaman the aarthar rubinasten dampatti aur edolf grin lekin abhi khana chal hi raha tha ki heri krokar ko ek tar thamaya gaya krokar tar ko apani jeb ke havale karane hi vala the ki sandeshavahak ne kaha ve vayarales par isake uttar kaaa intajar kar rahe hain tar padhate samay krokar ke chehare par badal ghir aaye usane mafi mangi aur mej se uth kar chala gaya bad men krokar ne mujhe apane kebin men bulaya aur tar padha tar men likha tha ki mujhe yunaited stets men pravesh karane kee manahi kee ja rahi hai aur desh men fir se pravesh karane se pahale mujhe rajanaitik prakriti aur naitik moolyon ke aaropon ke uttar dene ke lie aapravas vibhag ke janch bord ke samane jana hoga yunaited pres janana chahati thi ki mujhe kya is bare men kuchh kahana hai

meri shiraen tan gayin ab mere lie ye bat koee mayane nahin rakhati thi ki main nakhushi dene vale us desh men fir se jata hoon ya nahin mainne unhen bataya hota ki main unake damaghontoo mahaul se jitani jaldi bahar aata utana hi behatar hota aur main amerika se mile apaman aur naitik aadambar se thak chuka tha aur ki poora ka poora mamala hi bor karane vala tha lekin musibat yah thi ki mera jo kuchh bhi tha vah sab kuchh stets men hi tha aur mujhe dar tha ki ve use jabt karane ka koee tarika n nikal len ab main kisi bhi shararatapoorn karravaee kee ummid kar sakata tha isalie mainne aatm pradarshan se bhara ek bayan jari kiya ki main vapis aaoonga aur unake aaropon ka javab doonga aur ki mera rientri paramit kagaz ka koee aisa vaisa tukada nahin balki yunaited stets sarakar dvara sadashayata men mujhe diya gaya ek dastavej hai vagairah vagairah

ab jahaj par aaram milane ka saval hi nahin tha duniya ke sabhi hisson se pres rediogram bayan mang rahe the sauthampatan se ek stop pahale cherabarg men sau ya usase bhi adhik yooropiyan patrakar sakshatkar lene ke lie jahaj par chadh aaye hamane lanch ke bad bufe room men unhen ek ghanta diye jane kee vyavastha kee halanki unaka vyavahar sahanubhootipoorn tha poori karravaee shushk aur thaka dene vali thi

sauthampatan se landan kee yatra bechain rahasy se bhari huee thi yunaited stets se bahar kar diye jane se mahattvapoorn meri chinta yah thi ki angraeji desh ko pahali bar dekhana oona aur bachchon ko kaisa lagega kaee barason tak main ingalaind ke dakshin pashchimi hisse devanashayar tatha kornavel kee asim khoobasoorati ke gunnagan karata aaya tha aur ab ham lal eenton vali imaraton aur pahadi par bane ek jaise gharon kee kataron ke pas se guzar rahe the kaha oona neye sab ek jaisi dikhati hain
hamen ek mauka do kaha mainneham to abhi sauthampatan ke bahar hi hain aur jaisejaise ham aage badhate gaye ilake aur adhik khoobasoorat hote chale gaye

jab ham landan men votaraloo steshan par pahunche hamen pyar karane vali bhid abhi bhi vahan juti huee thi aur ve pahale kee hi tarah prem bhav se bhare aur utsah se khade the jab ham steshan se bahar nikale to ve hath hila rahe the aur khushi se chilla rahe the kisi ek ne kahacharli ve tumhara pyar chahate hain unhen do sachamuch ye dil ko chhoo lene vala mamala tha

aakhir jab oona aur main ek akele hue to ham sevay hotal kee panchavin manzil par apane suit kee khidakee par aa khade hue mainne naye vataraloo brij kee taraf ishara kiya halanki ye sundar tha fir bhi ab mere lie bahut mayane nahin rakhata tha bas ek hi bat thi ki isakee sadak mere bachapan kee or jati thi ham chupachap khade rahe aur is poori duniya men shahar ke sabase adhik chhoo lene vale drishy ko dekhate hue pite rahe mainne peris men ples de la konkord kee rumani utkrishtata kee tarif kee hai nyoo yark men sooryast men hazaron chamakati khidakiyon se rahasyapoorn sandesh mahasoos kiye hain lekin hamare hotal kee khidakee se landan tems ka nazara mere lie in sab drishyon se kahin adhik romani tha  kuchh aisa jo behad manaviy tha

oona jab is drishy ko nihar rahi thi to mainne usakee taraf dekha usaka chehara utsah se tan gaya tha aur vah apani sattais baras kee umr se chhoti lag rahi thi hamari shadi ke bad se vah mere sath kaee musibaton se guzar kar aayi thi aur is vakt vah landan ko nihar rahi thi dhoop usake kale balon se khel rahi thi mainne pahali bar usake ekdo safed bal dekhe mainne kuchh nahin kaha lekin us vakt mainne apane aap ko usake prati poori tarah se samarpit paya jab usane kahamujhe landan achchha laga hai

pichhali bar jab main yahan aaya tha tab se bis baras ka arasa guzar chuka tha meri nigah men nadi ke mod aur taton kee rekhaen bhaddi aadhunik imaraton se ghir gayi thin aur isase aakash ko chhooti drishyavali kharab lagane lagi thi mere bachapan ka aadha hissa isake vishal khali hisson kee jhulasati shamon men guzara tha

jis vakt oona aur main listar skvayar aur pikaidili men ghoom rahe the ye jagah bhadakeeli amerikee chizon lanch kauntaron hotadog staindon aur milk baron se ati padi thi hamane paya ki bina hait pahane yuva ladake aur jins pahane ladakiyan vahan tafarih kar rahe the mujhe yad aaya jab vest end ke lie main taiyar huaa karata tha aur pile dastane aur chhadi lekar vahan chahal kadami karata tha ve din ab hava ho gae the aur usakee jagah par aankhen kuchh aur hi dekh rahi thin hamari bhavanaen doosari thimon par pratikriya deti hain aadami joj sunakar rote hain aur hinsa kamuk ho gayi hai samay bitata rahata hai

ham taiksi lekar tin paunol taires dekhane ke lie keningatan gaye lekin ghar khali pada tha aur ise giraya jane vala tha ham  keningatan rod ke aage ruke yahan par sidani aur main apane pita ke sath raha karate the ham belagraviya ke aage se guzare aur jahan kabhi purane shanadar prayavet ghar huaa karate the unake kamaron men ab nion battiyan jal rahi thin aur klark deskon par kam kar rahe the bakee ghar gira diye gaye the aur unake jagah par glas taink jaisi lambotari imaraten aur oopar kee or uthati machis kee tarah kee siment kee imaraten nazar aa rahi thin ye sab pragati ke nam par ho raha tha
hamare samane kaee samasyaen thin pahali thi stets se dhan bahar kaise nikala jaye isaka matalab oona ko viman se vapis kailiforniya jana hoga aur hamare sef dipazit boks se sab kuchh nikalana hoga

use gaye hue das din ho gaye the jab vah vapis aayi to usane mujhe vistar se bataya ki kya huaa tha baink men klark ne usake hastaksharon ka adhyayan kiya usakee taraf dekha vahan se gaya aur baink mainejar ke sath gupachup bat karata raha oona tab tak bechaini mahasoos karati rahi jab tak unhonne hamara dipazit boks khol nahin diya

usane bataya ki baink men apana kam poora kar lene ke bad vah bevarali hils par apane ghar gayi sab kuchh vaisa hi tha jaisa ham chhod kar aaye the aur fool aur maidan pyare lag rahe the vah baithak men ek pal ke lie akeli khadi rahi aur bahut bhavuk ho gayi isake bad vah svis batalar hainari se mili hainari ne use bataya ki hamare jane ke bad efabiaai ke aadami do bar aaye the aur usase poochhatachh karate rahe ve janana chahate the ki main kis kism ka aadami hoon aur ki kya use pata hai ki ghar par nangi ladakiyon kee partiyan huaa karati thin jab batalar ne unhen bataya ki main apani patni aur parivar ke sath shant jivan bitaya karata tha to ve usakee khinchaee karane lage aur usase usakee rashtriyata poochhane lage aur janana chaha ki vah kab se is desh men tha unhonne usase usaka pasaport bhi dekhane ke lie manga

mitr mujhase poochhate hain ki main is amerikee virodh ka shikar kaise bana mera masoom pap yahi tha aur hai bhi ki main samajhautaparast nahin hoon halanki main kamyoonist nahin hoon fir bhi main unake virodh men khada hone se inkar karata raha isase kaee logon ko vakaee takalif huee aur takalif pane valon men amerikee lizan ke log bhi the main us sangathan ke vastavik sakaratmak kamon men usake khilaf nahin hoon unhonne achchhe kam bhi kiye hain bhootapoorv sainikon aur varishth nagarikon ke zarooratamand bachchon ke labh ke lie adhikar ka vidheyak lana aur jo upay kiye gaye hain ve bahut shanadar aur manaviy hain lekin lizan ke log jab apane vaidh adhikaron se pare chale jate hain aur deshabhakti ke nam par apani shakti ko doosaron par ladate hain to ve amerikee sarakar ke moolabhoot dhanche ke khilaf aparadh karate hain is tarah ke mahadeshabhakt amerika ko fasivadi desh men badal sakate hain

tisari bat mainne kabhi bhi amerikee nagarik banane ka prayas nahin kiya halanki saikadon amerikee bashinde ingalaind men apani roziroti kama rahe hain ve kabhi bhi british nagarik banane ka prayas nahin karate udaharan ke lie emajiem stoodiyo ka ek amerikee adhikari ingalaind men pichhale paintis baras se rah raha hai aur har hafte char ankon men vetan leta hai vah kabhi british nagarik nahin bana aur angrezon ne kabhi is bat kee paravah hi nahin kee

ye spashtikaran kshamayachana nahin hai jab mainne yah kitab shuroo kee to mainne apane aapase ise likhane ka karan poochha kitab likhane ke kaee karan hain lekin unamen se kshamayachana nahin hai apani sthiti ko sankshep men samane rakhate hue main kahoonga ki shaktishali samoohon tatha adrishy sarakaron ke parivesh men main rashtr ke virodh ka shikar huaa aur durbhagy se amerikee janata ka pyar kho baitha

laim lait listar skvear men odiyan thietar men sabase pahale dikhaee jani thi main is bat ko lekar bechain tha ki usaka svagat kaisa hoga karan ye tha ki ye samany chaiplin komedi nahin thi primiyar se pahale hamane ek primiyar pres ke lie rakha samay itana bit chuka tha ki main ise vastuparak tarike se nahin dekh paya tha aur main ye zaroor kahoonga ki main film dekh kar vichalit huaa ye aatm prashansa nahin hai kyonki main apani filmon ke kaee drishyon ka maza le sakata hoon aur doosare drishyon ko napasand kar sakata hoon alabatta main kabhi bhi nahin roya jaisa ki kisi shararati patrakar ne bataya ki main roya tha aur agar main roya bhi hooon to kya huaa agar lekhak apane srijan ke bare men sanvedana mahasoos nahin karata to vah janata se aisa karane kee ummid hi kaise kar sakata hai eemanadari se kahoon to mujhe apani filmon men janata se bhi jyada maza aata hai

laim lait ke liye primiyar sahayatarth tha aur usamen rajakumari margaret padhari thin agale din janata ke lie film pradarshit kee gayi halanki samikshaen yoon hi si thin isane vishv keertiman bhang kar diye aur ise amerika men pratibandhit kiye jane ke bavajood isane meri ab tak kee filmon kee tulana men sabase adhik kamaee karake di

landan se peris ke lie chalane se pahale oona aur main haus aof lords men ek dinar par lord strabolgi ke mehaman the main harabart maurisan ke pas baitha tha aur yah sun kar main hairan huaa ki ve samajavadi ke roop men paramanu pratiraksha kee niti ka samarthan karate the mainne unhen bataya ki ham bhale hi paramanu bamon ke ambar laga den ingalaind hamesha sabake nishane par bana rahega kyonki ye ek chhota sa dvip hai aur ise rakh ke dher men badal diye jane ke bad kisi bhi kism ka badala koee rahat nahin dila payega main is bat ko manata hoon ki ingalaind kee raksha ke lie sabase majaboot rannaniti nishpaksh rahane kee hai kyonki paramanu yug men mujhe is bat ka shak hai ki nishpaksh rahane ka ullanghan kiya jayega lekin mere vichar maurisan ke vicharon se bilkul bhi mel nahin khate the

main is bat ko soch kar hairan hoon ki kis tarah se kaee bauddhik log paramanu hathiyaron ke paksh men bat karate hain ek aur ghar men main lord selisabari se mila aur unakee bhi vahi ray thi jo maurisan kee thi aur paramanu pratiraksha ke prati apani nafarat ko vyakt karate samay mainne mahasoos kiya ki main unakee lordaship ke sath mel nahin bitha pa raha hoon

is mauke par mujhe ye uchit jan padata hai ki main duniya ke un halat ko sankshep men samane rakhoon jis tarah se main aaj ise dekhata hoon aadhunik jivan kee judati jatilataon aur bisavin sadi ke gatishil hamale se main pata hoon ki vyakti par charon taraf se badibadi sansthaon ke hamale ho rahe hain ye hamale rajanaitik vaigyanik aur aarthik roop se ho rahe hain ham aatm anukoolan ke aur bandishon aur paramiton ke shikar ho rahe hain

sushila kee saheli bade munhafat svabhav kee thi dil kee bhi vah badi saf thi boli   bahan sushila  yah sab dhakosalebaji mujhase nahin chalati agar main apane pati ke bahar hone par bhi achchha khana khati hoon to isaka matalab yah to nahin hota ki main unhen nahin chahati main to jaisi khush unake samane rahati hoon vaisi hi unake pichhe bhi agar koee mujh par ungali uthane par hi tula hoga to use main rok nahin sakati bakee yah to sirf main janati hoon ya mere pati  ki ham ek  doosare ko kitana chahate hain  saheli ke is javab se sushila jal  bhunakar rah gaee usane munh chuniyakar kaha   yah to sab thik hai  lekin tum pativrata nahin ho pativrata stree ke lie shastron men likha hai ki pati kee gairahajiri men vah jal tak n pie  saheli ne isaka bhi karara javab diya boli   aise shastr mere thenge se  ant men bat yahan tak badh gaee ki sushila tunakakar apane ghar laut aaee

ghar aakar sara kissa usane apane pati ko bataya pati bhi sushila ko bahut chahata tha aur usakee nishkam pati  bhakti se bahut prabhavit tha fir bhi kabhi  kabhi use yah jaroor lagata tha ki yah sab dhong hai agar pati ek mahina tak ghar par n rahe to kya koee stree bina ann  pani ke ek mahina tak rah sakati hai aur use laga ki yah bilakul asanbhav hai agar koee jiddi stree is bat par ad hi jae to jivit nahin bach sakati yah sochakar pati ne sushila kee pariksha lene ka vichar banaya kaee dinon tak vah tarah  tarah se sushila ko kasauti par kasata raha  lekin sushila har bar khari utarati kabhi vah snan der se karata  to kabhi khet se dopahar dhale lautata kabhi  kabhi to aisa hota ki parosi thali tak samane hone par vah bahana banakar bahar nikal jata aur din dhale lautata lekin sushila ne kabhi bhi pati ke khane se pahale pani tak n piya ek din sushila ke pati ne kaha   aaj mera man khir aur puaa khane ka ho raha hai isalie khoob ilayachi gari dalakar pue aur chiraunji  kishamish  kesar dalakar khir bana banao  ye donon chijen sushila ko bhi badi priy thin isalie khoob man lagakar usane ye chijen banaee kesar aur ilayachi aur desi ghee kee sugandh se banate samay hi sushila ke munh men pani aane laga chijen bana chukane ke bad sushila ne apane pati se jhatapat snan kar lene ko kaha

lekin pati ko to us din dhairy kee pariksha leni thi isalie kafi der tak vah dhil dale raha aur talata raha sushila ke bar  bar kahane par  aakhir men harakar  vah balti  lota aur rassi lekar nahane gaya nahane men bhi usane kafi der laga di idhar sushila kee aaten mare bhookh ke kulabulane lagi thi lekin jaise hi dehari ke bahar use pati ke khadaoon kee aavaj sunaee di  use dilasa bandhi ki ab to khane ka samay aa hi gaya lekin jaise hi pati ne dehari de andar pair rakhe  dayen pair kee khadaoon se pair aisa fisala ki vah charon khane chit fail gaya balti  lota hath se chhootakar door ja gire aur aankhen faili kee faili rah gaee yah dekha to sushila jis halat men thi vaisi hi daudi pas jakar sir hilaya  aavajen din  lekin sab bekar pati agar jinda hota tab to bolata hi  lekin usake to pran pakheroo ud chuke the  isalie bhala vah kaise bolata

sushila kee aankhen dabadaba aaee aur gala bhar aaya usaka man huaa ki dhad marakar ro pade lekin tabhi use khir aur pue ka dhyan ho aaya usane socha ki pati ab mar hi gae hain rone se ji to paenge nahi han  aas  pados ke log jaroor jud jaenge aur tab khir  pue khane ka mauka to milane se raha isalie behatar yah hoga ki pahale main khir  pue kha loon  tab rona  dhona shuroo karoon yah sochakar vah chupachap gaee aur jaldi  jaldi khir udane lagi pue agale din ke lie rakh lie  kyonki unake kharab hone ka dar n tha asaliyat yah thi ki pati mara nahin tha  balki marane ka natak kie pada tha isalie apani patni kee yah sari harakaten vah dekhata raha jab sushila khir khoob ji bharakar kha chukee to jhatapat munh dhoya aur lamba  sa ghoonghat nikalakar pati ke pas gaee aur sine se chipatakar rone lagi rone ke sath  sath vah yah bhi kahati jati thi
tum to chale paramadham koon  ham hoon soon kuchh bakkhaun kaho

usaka pati kuchh der tak to usake nakali prem aur dukh ko sahan karata raha lekin ant men usase n raha gaya aur jaise hi sushila ne apana jumala tum to chale paradham koon ham hoon soon kuchh bak khau khatm kiya  vaise hi usake pati ne usise milata  julata ek jumala jad diya pati ka jumala is prakar tha
khir sadopa kari tau puanoon koon tau chak khau

ab to sushila kee aisi halat ho gaee ki kato to khoon tak n nikale use kya pata tha ki usaka pati natak kie pada hai aur usakee pariksha le raha hai man hi man vah rah  rahakar apane aapako kosati rahi ki yah kya kiya kyon n jaban par kaboo rakhakar buddhi se kam liya aur usake bad fir kabhi kisi ne sushila ke munh se apane pativrat dharm kee tarif nahin suni pahale jaisi dinge hankana ab sushila ne band kar diya tha
shekhachilli aur kuen kee pariyan

ek ganv men ek sust aur kamachor aadami rahata tha kam  dham to vah koee karata n tha  han baten banane men bada mahir tha isalie log use shekhachilli kahakar pukarate the shekhachilli ke ghar kee halat itani kharab thi ki mahine men bis din choolha nahin jal pata tha shekhachilli kee bevakoofi aur susti kee saja usakee bivi ko bhi bhugatani padati aur bhookhe rahana padata ek din shekhachilli kee bivi ko bada gussa aaya vah bahut bigadi aur kaha   ab main tumhari koee bhi bat nahin sunana chahati chahe jo kuchh karo  lekin mujhe to paisa chahie jab tak tum koee kamaee karake nahin laoge  main ghar men nahin  ghusane doongi  yah kahakar bivi ne shekhachilli ko naukari kee khoj men jane ko majaboor kar diya sath men  raste ke lie char rookhi  sookhi rotiyan bhi bandh din sag  salan koee tha hi nahin  deti kahan se is prakar shekhachilli ko n chahate hue bhi naukari kee khoj men nikalana pada

shekhachilli sabase pahale apane ganv ke sahookar ke yahan gae socha ki shayad sahookar koee chhoti  moti naukari de de lekin nirash hona pada sahookar ke karindon ne dyodhi par se hi dant  dapatakar bhaga diya ab shekhachilli ke samane koee rasta nahin tha fir bhi ek ganv se doosare ganv tak din bhar bhatakate rahe ghar laut nahin sakate the  kyonki bivi ne sakht hidayat de rakhi thi ki jab tak naukari n mil jae  ghar men pair n rakhana din bhar chalate  chalate jab shekhachilli thakakar choor ho gae to socha ki kuchh der susta liya jae bhookh bhi joron kee lagi thi  isalie khana khane kee bat bhi unake man men thi tabhi kuchh door par ek kuaan dikhaee diya shekhachilli ko himmat bandhi aur usi kee or badh chale kuen ke chabootare par baithakar shekhachilli ne bivi kee di huee rotiyon kee potali kholi usamen char rookhi  sookhi rotiyan thin bhookh to itani jor kee lagi thi ki un charon se bhi poori tarah n bujh pati lekin samasya yah bhi thi ki agar charon rotiyon aaj hi kha dalin to kal  parason ya usase agale din kya karoonga  kyonki naukari khoje bina ghar ghusana namumakin tha isi soch  vichar men shekhachilli bar  bar rotiyan ginate aur barabar rakh dete samajh men nahin aata ki kya kiya jae jab shekhachilli se apane aap koee faisala n ho paya to kuen ke dev kee madad leni chahi vah hath jodakar khade ho gae aur bole   he baba  ab tumhin hamen aage rasta dikhao din bhar kuchh bhi nahin khaya hai bhookh to itani lagi hai ki charon ko kha jane ke bad bhi shayad hi mit pae lekin agar charon ko kha leta hoon to aage kya karoonga mujhe abhi kaee dinon yahin aasapas bhatakana hai isalie he kuaan baba  ab tumhin batao ki main kya karoon ek khaoon  do khaoon  tin khaoon charon kha jaoon  lekin kuen kee or se koee javab nahin mila vah bol to sakata nahin tha  isalie kaise javab deta

us kuen ke andar char pariyan rahati thin unhonne jab shekhachilli kee bat suni to socha ki koee danav aaya hai jo unhin charon ko khane kee bat soch raha hai isalie tay kiya ki charon ko kuen se bahar nikalakar us danav kee vinati karani chahie  taki vah unhen n khae yah sochakar charon pariyan kuen se bahar nikal aaee hath jodakar ve shekhachilli se bolin   he danavaraj  aap to bade balashali hain aap vyarth hi ham charon ko khane kee bat soch rahe hain agar aap hamen chhod den to ham kuchh aisi chijen aapako de sakati hain jo aapake bade kam aaengi  pariyon ko dekhakar v unakee baten sunakar shekhachilli hakke  bakke rah gae samajh men n aaya ki kya javab de lekin pariyon ne is chuppi ka yah matalab nikala ki unakee bat man li gaee isalie unhonne ek kathaputala v ek katora shekhachilli ko dete hue kaha   he danavaraj  aap ne hamari bat man li  isalie ham sab aapaka bahut  bahut upakar manati hain sath hi apani yah do tuchchh bhenten aapako de rahi hain yah kathaputala har samay aapakee naukari bajaega aap jo kuchh kahenge  karega aur yah katora vah har ek khane kee chij aapake samane pesh karega  jo aap isase mangenge  isake bad pariyan fir kuen ke andar chali gaee

is sabase shekhachilli kee khushi kee sima n rahi usane socha ki ab ghar laut chalana chahie kyonki bivi jab in donon chijon ke karatab dekhegi to fooli n samaegi lekin sooraj doob chuka tha aur rat ghir aaee thi  isalie shekhachilli pas ke ek ganv men chale gae aur ek aadami se rat bhar ke lie apane yahan thahara lene ko kaha yah bhi vada kiya ki isake badale men vah ghar ke sare logon ko achchhe  achchhe pakavan v mithaiyan khilaenge vah aadami taiyar ho gaya aur shekhachilli ko apani baithak men thahara liya shekhachilli ne bhi apane katore ko nikala aur usane apane karatab dikhane ko kaha bat kee bat men khane kee achchhi  achchhi chijon ke dher lag gae jab sare log kha  pi chuke to us aadami kee gharavali joothe baratanon ko lekar nali kee or chali yah dekhakar shekhachilli ne use rok diya aur kaha ki mera kathaputala bartan saf kar dega shekhachilli ke kahane bhar kee der thi ki kathaputale ne sare ke sare bartan pal bhar men nipata dale shekhachilli ke kathaputale aur katore ke yah ajibogarib karatab dekhakar ganv ke us aadami aur usakee bivi ke man men lalach aa gaya shekhachilli jab so gae to vah donon chupake se uthe aur shekhachilli ke katore v kathaputale ko churakar unakee jagah ek nakali kathaputala aur nakali hi katora rakh diya shekhachilli ko yah bat pata n chali sabere uthakar unhonne hath  munh dhoya aur donon nakali chijen lekar ghar kee or chal die

ghar pahunchakar unhonne badi dingen hankee aur bivi se kaha   bhagavan  ab tujhe kabhi kisi bat ke lie jheenkana nahin padega n ghar men khane ko kisi chij kee kami rahegi aur n hi koee kam hamen  tumhen karana padega tum jo chij khana chahogi  mera yah katora tumhen khilaega aur jo kam karavana chahogi mera yah kathaputala kar dalega  lekin shekhachilli kee bivi ko in baton par vishvas n huaa usane kaha   tum to aisi dinge roj hi mara karate ho kuchh karake dikhao to janoon  han  kyon nahin  shekhachilli ne tapak se jabav diya aur katora v kathaputalen men apane  apane karatab dikhane ko kaha lekin vah donon chijen to nakali thin  at shekhachilli kee bat jhoothi nikali natija yah huaa ki unakee bivi pahale se jyada naraj ho uthi kaha   tum mujhe is tarah dhokha dene kee koshish karate ho jab se tum ghar se gae ho  ghar men choolha nahin jala hai kahin jakar man lagakar kam karo to kuchh tanakha mile aur ham donon ko do joon khana nasib ho in jaduee chijon se kuchh nahin hone ka

bebas shekhachilli khisiyae hue  se fir chal die vah fir usi kuen ke chabootare par jakar baith gae samajh men nahin aa raha tha ki ab kya kiya jae jab sochate  sochate vah har gae aur kuchh bhi samajh men n aaya to unakee aankhen chhalachhala aaee aur rone lage yah dekhakar kuen kee charon pariyan fir bahar aayi aur shekhachilli se unake rone ka karan poochha shekhachilli ne sari aapabiti kah sunaee pariyon ko hansi aa gaee ve bolin   hamane to tumako koee bhayanak danav samajha tha aur isalie khush karane ke lie ve chijen di thin lekin tum to bade hi bhole  bhale aur sidhe aadami nikale khair  ghabarane kee jaroorat nahin ham tumhari madad karengi tumhara kathaputala aur katora unhin logon ne churaya hai  jinake yahan rat ko tum ruke the is bar tumhen ek rassi v danda de rahi hain inakee madad se tum un donon ko bandh v marakar apani donon chijen vapas pa sakate ho  isake bad pariyan fir kuen men chali gayin

jaduee rassi  danda lekar shekhachilli fir usi aadami ke yahan pahunche aur kaha   is bar main tumhen kuchh aur naye karatab dikhaoonga  vah aadami bhi lalach ka mara tha usane samajha ki is bar kuchh aur jaduee chijen hath lagengi isalie usamen khushikhushi shekhachilli ko apane yahan tika liya lekin is bar ulta hi huaa shekhachilli ne jaise hi hukm diya vaise hi us gharavale v usakee bivi ko jaduee rassi ne kas kar bandh liya aur jaduee danda danadan pitaee karane laga ab to ve donon chikhane  chillane aur mafi mangane lage shekhachilli ne kaha   tum donon ne mujhe dhokha diya hai mainne to yah socha tha ki tumane mujhe rahane ko jagah di hai  isalie main bhi tumhare sath koee bhalaee kar doon lekin tumane mere sath ulta bartav kiya mere kathaputale aur katore ko hi chura liya ab jab ve donon chijen tum mujhe vapas kar doge  tabhi main apani rassi v dande ko rukane ka hukm doonga  un donon ne jhatapat donon churaee huee chijen shekhachilli ko vapas kar din yah dekhakar shekhachilli ne bhi apani rassi v dande ko ruk jane ka hukm de diya

ab apani charon jaduee chijen lekar shekhachilli prasan n man se ghar ko vapas laut pade jab bivi ne fir dekha ki shekhachilli vapas aa gae hain to use bada gussa aaya use to kaee dinon se khane ko kuchh mila nahin tha  isalie vah bhi jhunjhalaee huee thi door se hi dekhakar vah chikhi   kamachor tum fir laut aae khabaradar  ghar ke andar pair n rakhana varana tumhare lie belan rakha hai  yah sunakar shekhachilli daravaje par hi ruk gae man hi man unhonne rassi v dande ko hukm diya ki ve use kaboo men karen rassi aur dande ne apana kam shuroo kar diya rassi ne kasakar bandh liya aur dande ne pitaee shuroo kar di yah jaduee karatab dekhakar bivi ne bhi apane sare hathiyar dal die aur kabhi vaisa bura bartav n karane ka vada kiya tabhi use bhi rassi v dande se chhutakara mila ab shekhachilli ne apane kathaputale v katore ko hukm dena shuroo kiya bas  fir kya tha kathaputala bartan  bhade v jin  jin chijon kee kami thi jhatapat le aaya aur katore ne bat kee bat men nana prakar ke vyanjan taiyar kar die

aaj jindagi men fir ek bar main chaubis maee ke din balgariya men hoon jab is desh men aksharon ka utsav manaya jata hai aaj savere se menh baras raha tha kal se sabhyata kee raksha par vichar karane ke lie jo kanfrens shuroo hogi usake lie mulkon se log aae hue hain aur ham sab soch rahe the ki is barasate menh men aaj aksharon ka utsav kaise hoga lekin utsav usi aabtab se huaa das baje se lekar sadhe gyarah baje tak jaise har baras hota hai har ilake ke saikadon bachchon ne barasate hue menh men jaloos nikala lal hari pili aur safed jhandiyan laharaee jinhonne slav lipi banaee thi un do vidvanonkrial aur maitovikee tasviren laharaeen aur un aksharon ko istemal karake jin shayaron aur adibon ne mulk ke gulam sharir men svatantrata kee ruh jagaee thi un shayaron aur adibon kee tasviren bhi laharaee main bahutse shayaron aur adibon ke namon se parichit hoon imaroj ne bhi inake skaich banae hain isalie ham donon juloos ke jhadon par laharaee gaee tasviron se kaeeyon ke nam pahachanate rahevah vapatsarov vah kharisto botefvah gio milev vah eevan vajovvah kharisto samaranainskee  aur itane men samane ek jhande se laharati huee ek tasvir dikhaee didora gabe kee  men main pahali bar dora gabe se mili thi aur milate hi ham donon ko ek doosare kee aisi pahachan ho gaee ki hamane ek doosare se us kee najmen bhi sunin aur dilon kee baten bhi aur yah silasila pandrah baras chalata raha jab  men main balgariya aaee thi dora gabe se usake ghar milane gaee thi to ek reshami rumal mere gale men dalakar usane kaha tha yah hamari aakhari mulakat hai tum ab agali bar aaogi tab men nahin houngi mainen usake munh par hatheli rakhi to usane meri hatheli ko honthon par se hatakar apani chhati par rakh liya boli suno  mainen ek lambi najm likhi haisamudr se baten   aur is varsh ke aarambh men maine suna tha ki vah samudr se baten karate hue samudr men lin ho gaee hai aur dekha samane jo aksharon ka utsav manaya ja raha hai usamen vah ek tasvir banakar  ek jhade par lahara rahi hai man kee jis halat men main dilli se aaee thi sirf men janati hoon ya imaroj aur jaisa ki imaroj ke kaha tha mainen apane desh kee dahalijon ko par karate samay sari udasi ko kenchuli kee tarah utar diya tha lekin abjab samane aksharon ke utsav men dora bage kee tasvir laharati huee dekhi to aankhon ka pani aankhon ka pani aankhon ke kahane ke bahar ho gaya honth sisak aae o khudaya  yah bhi ek desh hai jo apani ek shayara ke aksharon ko aksharon ke utsav men shamil kar raha hai aur ek mere aksharon vala panjab hai jo aaj mere aksharon par faujadariyan kar raha hai mainen apani aankhon ko saugandh dilaee thi ki rona nahin lekin doek pal ke lie jab meri aankhon ke saugandh ko tod diya to pas khade imaroj se kuchh takat udhar lene ke lie usakee banh kasakar tham li usane meri or dekha aur mere gale kee aavaj chahe gili thi par hontho par jo lafz aae vah sookhe bhi the sahaj bhimere bad shayaron par faujadariyan karane valon aur pavitr aksharon par goliyan chalane valon se kah dena ki duniya men vah goli kahin nahin bani hai jo sach ko lag sake

maee kee dopahar thi jab dekhapairon ke niche zamin bhi udasi ke rodon vali thi aur sir ke oopar aasaman bhi udasi ke badalon se ghira huaa tha aur man n jane kaunase patal men utar gaya aur fir  maee kee rat thi jab aadhi nind kee halat men maine ek chikh kee tarah kaha thamere nanak  maine tumhari kalpana karake dekhi hai lekin aaj tumhen pratyaksh dekhana chahati hoonkalpana kee aankhon se nahin in hadmans kee aankhon se nahin janati yah chikh kitani lambi thisirf itana janati hoon ki mere sharir ka romrom chikh bana huaa tha ki achanak aankhon ke samane ek ujala fail gaya aur bijali jaisi ek tharatharahat mere sare sharir me utar gaee koee soorat samane nahin aaee lekin ahasas jaisi ek aavaz sunitum  usake astitv ka saboot mangati thin saboot mil gaya  us aadhi nind kee halat men munh se nikalahan maine unhen dekh liya aur agale kaee dinon tak akhabar valon ne jitane intarvyoo mange main deti rahi aur guroo nanak ke bare men likhi huee meri nazamon par jo faujadari mukadame ka notis tha usake javab ke lie ek vakeel ko mukhyaranama bhi likhakar diya lekin itane dinon si sari uparamata ke sathchaudah tarikh kee rat vale sapane ne mere mathe par jaise ek thandi hatheli rakh di  maee kee sham ko balgariya jana tha chali gaee  maee se  maee tak sofiya men ko hi kangres men sanskritik aur aadhyatmik moolyon ke bare men jo takarir karani thi vah bhi kee lekin  maee se varna ja kar apani sehat ke lie jo ilaj lena tha usake lie panch sau kilomitar ka safar karate hue prakriti ka jo manoram drishy dekha usane faujadari mukadame vali bat kee udasi bhi aur gahari kar di aur  maee kee rat vale sapane kee tharatharahat bhi mathe men bhar di yahi ek tadap thi ek sukoon tha jo ek nazam banata gaya

aaj se gyarah baras pahale imaroz aur mainne landan men ek skaindineviyan film dekhi thi jisamen muhabbat ko kalkal karate jharanon kee bhasha men pesh kiya gaya tha vahan kaee thietar aise hain jahan ek hi film dinbhar chalati rahati hai aur ek paund ka tikat lekar aagar aap thietar men chale jaen to ek hi film ko chahen to kaee bar dekh sakate hain imaroz aur maine bhi vah film us din kaee bar dekhi thi kahate hain us film kee kahani ek sachchi ghatana ke aadhar par banaee gaee thi usamen sarkas men kam karane vali ladakee hai aur fauj ka ek sipahi donon apane kshetron se bahar nahin aa sakate lekin donon ko ek doosare se bepanah muhabbat ho jati hai aur us muhababt ka takaza hai ki donon ko kuchh din sath jaroor jina hai donon apaneapane kshetr se bahar aa jate hain aur janate hain ki donon bahut jaldi kanoon kee pakad men aa jaenge isalie maut se udhar lie hue dinon men vah har pal foolon kee aabtab ke saman jite hain  maee ko balgariya aane se pahale dilli men ek afavah suni thi ki aajakal panjab men jaise kaee log goliyon ka nishana ban rahe hain main bhi vaise hi kisi goli ke nishane ka lakshy hoon ise afavah kahana hi sahi hai vaise mainne yah bat ek vishvasaniy sootr samay gyarah baras pahale dekhi huee skendiviyan film kee kahani mere manas me ghul gaee aur lagajindagi kee aakhari sans tak foolon kee aab kee tarah jina haibad men balgariyan doston ka tapak bhi
