chhodakar kahan janevala hoon

ek bar dakshin afrika men ek musalaman batalar gandhiji ke pas aaya bole gandhibhaee mujhe bahut thodi tanakhvah milati hai balbachchedar aadami hoon utane men gujara nahin hota agar mujhe thodisi angreji aa jaye to jyada tanakhvah mil sakati hai gandhiji un dinon bairistar the unhonne kshannabhar socha aur fir manhiman nishchay karake javab diya achchha main tumako angreji padhaoonga batalar chakit hokar gandhiji kee taraf dekhane laga vilayati thath se rahanevala yah bairistar mujhe angreji sikhayega use bahut khushi huee lekin usake samane ek aur samasya thi usane vah samasya bhi gandhiji ke samane rakhi aur kaha aap mujhe padhayenge to yah thik hai lekin naukari se samay nikalakar main yahan jaldi kaise aa sakata hoon gandhiji ne turant javab diya tum isakee fikar mat karo main tumhare ghar aakar padhaya karunga batalar kee aankhe kritagyata se bhig aaeen bairistar gandhi pratidin char mil paidal chalakar usako angreji padhane ke lie jate aur fir usi prakar ghar vapas lautate yah ekaadh din kee bat nahin thi poore aath mahine tak yahi kram chalata raha

ek bar kastooraba gandhi bahut bimar ho gaeen jalchikitsa se unhen koee labh nahin huaa doosare upachar kiye gaye unamen bhi safalata nahin mili ant men gandhiji ne unhen namak aur dal chhodane kee salah di parantu isake lie ba taiyar nahin hueen gandhiji ne bahut samajhaya pothiyon se praman padhakar sunaye lekar sab vyarth ba bolin koee aapase kahe ki dal aur namak chhod do to aap bhi nahin chhodenge gandhiji ne turant prasann hokar kahatum galat samajh rahi ho mujhe koee rog ho aur vaidy kisi vastu ko chhodane ke liye kahen to turant chhod doonga aur tum kahati ho to main abhi ek sal ke lie dal aur namak donon chhodata hoon tum chhodo ya n chhodo ye alag bat hai yah sunakar ba bahut dukhi hueen bolin aapaka svabhav janate hue bhi mere munh se yah bat nikal gaee ab main dal aur namak nahin khanoogi aap pratigya vapas le len gandhiji ne kaha tum dal aur namak chhod dogi yah bahut achchha hoga usase tumhen labh hi hoga lekin kee huee pratigya vapis nahin li jati kisi bhi nimitt se sanyam palan karane par labh hi hota hai mujhe bhi labh hi hoga isalie tum meri chinta mat karo gandhiji apani pratigya par dridh rahe

gandhiji ne sabaramati men aashram khola tha ek bhaee unase milane aaye vah bahut achchhi angreji janate the aur manate the ki badhiya angreji men lekh likhana desh kee seva karana hain unhonne gandhiji se kahamere yogy koee ho to bataiye unaka vichar tha ki gandhiji unase angreji men lekh likhane ke lie kahenge par bat kuchh aur hi huee us samay gandhiji gehoon saf kar rahe the unhonne kahavah yah to bahut achchhi bat hai ye gehoon binane hai aap madad karenge vah bhaee sakapaka gaye achchha mahin laga parantu mana bhi kaise karate bole avashy madad karunga vah gehoon binane lage oopar se shant man men soch rahe the ki kahan aa fansa gandhiji kaise hain itani badhiya angreji jananevale se gehoon binavate hain kisi tarah ramram karake usane ghanta poora kiya fir bola bahut samay ho gaya ab jana chahata hoon gandhiji ne kaha bas ghabara gaye usane kaha nahin ghabaraya to nahin par ghar par jaroori kam hai gandhiji ne poochha kya kam hai vah bhaee bole ji rat ko khane men der ho jati hai isase sandhya ka nashta kar leta hoon usi ka samay ho raha hai gandhiji hans pade bole isake liye ghar jane kee jaroorat nahin hai hamara bhojan bhi bas taiyar hone vala hai hamen bhi ek bar apane sath bhojan karane ka maukaa dijiye hamari namakroti aapako pasand hogi n main kam men laga huaa tha aapase baten nahin kar saka maf karenab khate samay baten bhi kar lenge vah bhaee kya karate rukana pada kuchh der men khane ka samay ho gaya bhojan ekadam sada rookhi rotichaval aur dal ka pani n gheen acharn mirchn masale bapoo ne un bhaee ko apane pas baithaya bade pyar se khana parosa bhojan shuru hote hi baten bhi shuru ho gaee par un bhaee kee buri halat thi vah thahare mevamithaee se nashta karane val aur vahan thi rukhi roti ek tukada munh men den aur ek ghoont pani piye tab bhi ek roti poori n kha sake itane par bhi chhutti mil jati to ganimat thi vahan to apane baratan aap manjane ka niyam tha jaisetaise vah kam bhi kiya tab kahin jakar jane ka avasar aaya jate samay gandhiji ne unase kaha aap desh kee seva karana chahate hain yah achchhi bat hai aapake gyan aur aapakee soojhboojh ka achchha upayog ho sakata hai lekin isake lie sharir ka nirog aur majaboot hona jaroori hain aap abhi se usakee taiyari karen yahi aapaka deshseva kee or pahala kadam hoga
main tujhase dar jata hoon

sabaramatiaashram men rasoeeghar ka dayitv shreemati kasturaba gandhi ke oopar tha pratidin anek atithi gandhiji sen milane ke lie aate the ba badi prasannata se sabaka svagatsatkar karati thin travanakor ka rahane vala ek ladaka unakee sahayata karata tha ek din dopahar ka sara kam nipatane ke bad rasoeeghar band karake ba thoda aaram karane ke liye apane kamare men chali gaeen gandhiji mano isi kshan kee rah dekh rahe the ba ke jane ke bad unhonne us ladake ko apane pas bulaya aur bahut dhime svar men kaha abhi kuchh mehaman aanevale hain unamen pandit motilal neharu bhi hain un sab ke lie khana taiyar karana hai ba subah se kam karatekarate thak gaee hain unhen aaram karane de aur apani madad ke lie kusum ko bula le aur dekh jo chij jahan se nikale use vahin rakh dena ladaka kusum bahan ko bula laya aur dono chupachap atithiyon ke lie khana banane kee taiyari karane lage kam karatekarate achanak ek thali ladake ke hath se nicher gir gaee usakee aavaj se ba kee aankh khul gaee socha rasoeeghar men billi ghus aaee hai vah turant uthakar vahan pahunchi lekin vahan to aur kuchh hi drishy tha bade joron se khana banane kee taiyariyan chal rahi thin vah chakit bhi hueen aur gussa bhi aaya oonchi aavaj men unhonne poochha tum donon ne yahan yah sab kya dhandhali macha rakhi hain ladake ne ba ko sab kahani kah sunaee isapar vah bolin tumane mujhe kyon nahin jagaya ladake ne turant uttar diya taiyari karane ke bad aapako jaganevale the aap thak gaee thin isalie shuru men nahin jagaya ba bolin par too bhi to thak gaya tha kya too sochata hai too hi kam kar sakata hainmain nahin kar sakati  aur ba bhi unake sath kam karane lagin sham ko jab sab atithi chale gaye tab vah gandhiji ke pas gaeen aur ulahana dete hue bolin mujhe n jagakar aapane in bachchon ko yah kam kyon saunpa gandhiji janate the ki ba ko krodh aa raha hai isalie hansatehansate unhonne uttar diya kya too nahin janati ki too gussa hoti hai tab main tujhase dar jata hoon ba bade jor se hans padin mano kahati hon aap aur mujhase darate hain

san  men gandhiji yaravadajel men the us samay harijankary ko lekar unhonne ikkees din ka upavas karane ka nishchay kiya tha ek din panch baje khabar aaee ki koee harijan balak unase milana chahata hai samay nahin tha lekin bechara ladaka kaee ghanton se daravaje par baitha bat joh raha tha vah panch mahine pahale bhi aaya tha us samay usane gandhiji se chhatravriti mangi thi gandhiji ne use vachan diya tha ki yadi vah kalej ke prinsipal ka pramannpatr le aayega to madad ke lie vichar karenge ab vah pariksha pas karake aur prinsipal ka pramannpatr lekar aaya tha jel men milane aane ke lie usane chappal kee jodi kharidi thi badi musibat uthakar usane ye paise ikatthe kiye the mahadevabhaee ne gandhiji se kaha ki vah ladaka ek minat se jyada nahin lega vah itana aashvasan chahata hai ki thakkarabapa usakee bat par dhyan dekar usakee madad karen vah ladaka aaya apane sath vah fool laya tha unhen usane gandhiji ke charanon men rakha lekin jab gandhiji ne use usakee bat thakkarabapa tak pahunchane ka aashvasan diya to usane kaha main doosaron par vishvas nahin karata mera to aap hi par vishvas hai gandhiji boleagar mere sathi itane apramanik hain to main sabase jyada apramanik thahara tumhen mujhapar bhi vishvas nahin rakhana chahie yah sunakar ladaka ro pada hichakiyan bharate hue bola aap hamen chhodakar jane ke lie kisalie taiyar ho gaye hain aap hi kahate hain ki aapake sathi apavitr hain

aapake aasapas pavitrata ka vayumandal nahin hai aur isalie aap upavas karana chahate hain gandhiji ne kaha tum jo yah kahate ho ki main tumhen chhaudakar ja raha hoon so main nahin jaoonga ladaka bola main kaise manoon

yaravada jel men ek billi thi ek bar usake do bachche hue jaise hi ve kuchh bade hue ki tarahtarah ke kel karake sabako rijhane lage gandhiji se unhe dekhakar bahut khush hote the ve bhi dhire gandhiji se itana hilmil gaye ki prarthana ke samay unakee god men aa baithate ya fir unake idhar udhar chakkar lagane parantu vallabhabhaee unhen tar kee jali ke niche band karake aanand lete ek din vallabhabhaee ne ek bachche ko jali ke niche band kar diya to vah sir patakate patakate jali varamade ke sire tak le gaya aur fir bahar nikal gaya yah sab usane apani buddhi se hi kiya kuchh door jakar vah shauch kee taiyari karane laga jamin khodi shauch karake use dhaka vahan mitti bahut nahin thi isalie doosari jagah gaya vahan usane yah kriya santoshapoorvak kee aur pahale kee tarah use dhankane laga doosare bachche ne bhi is kam men usakee madad kee gandhiji yah sab dekh rahe the bole in bachchon par aakash se fool barasane chahie

sabaramati aashram men ek bar shreemati kastooraba gandhi ke kamare men chori ho gaee chor kapadon se bhari huee dopetiyan uthakar le gaye kapade unhonne nikal liye aur petiyan vahin khet men chhodakar chale gaye jab yah samachar gandhiji ko mila to unhonne poochha ba ke pas do peti bhar kapade kahan se aaye vah roj badalbadalakar sadiyan to pahanati nahin ba ne kaha rami aur manu kee man to bhagavan ke ghar tali gaee lekin jab kabhi ye bachchiyan mere pas aayengi to unhe den ke lie do kapade to mujhe chahie hi isi vichar se kuchh sadiyan aur khadi un petiyon men rakh chhodi thi is bat ka virodh karate hue gandhiji ne  kaha ham kapadon ka sangrah nahin kar sakate pahanane ke lie jitane jaroori ho utane hi apane pas rakhe ja sakate hain usase adhik ho to unhe aashram ke karyalay men kara dena chahie gandhiji itana kahakar hi santusht nahin hue usi din sayankal kee prarthana ke bad unhonne sarvajanik roop se is vishay kee charcha kee aur kaha hamare jaise logon ko is prakar ka vyavahar karane ka adhikar nahin hai ladakiyan hamare ghara

gandhiji baradoli tahasil men the pratidin hajaron streepuroosh unake darshanon ke lie aate the ek din ek bhadr mahila unake darshan karane aaee usake hath men roomal se dhankee ek thali thi us thal men roopaye bhare hue the mahila ne vah thali samane rakhakar badi shraddha se unhe pranam kiya gandhiji ne ek kshan us mahila kee or dekha fir gambhir bhav se bole tum mere samane is prakar nangi kaise aaeen yah sunakar sab upasthit vyakti stabdh rah gaye mahila ne ghabarakar apane vastron par ek drishti dali kahi se ve fate to nahin rahe sabhi vastr sundar aur naye the kisi kee kuchh samajh men nahin aaya gandhiji bole meri bat ka arth tum logo kee samajh men nahin aaya sabon kee buddhi mano jad ho gaee hai is bahan ke sabhi kapade vilayati hai naaj tum sabakee laj vilayati kapade dhankate hainyadi kal ko vilayat se kapada nahin aaya to tumhari laj kaise dhankee jayegijo doosare par aashrit rahate hain ve nange hi hote hain apani ijjat ko apane hath se katakar khadi pahanani chahie

ek bar gandhiji baradoli men thahare hue the kisi ne unake sathiyon ko soochana di ki ek hattakatta pahad jaisa kabuli masjid men aakar thahara hai kyonki vah gandhiji ke bare men poochhata rahata hai kahi vah gandhiji par hamala n kar de isalie unake sathiyon ne makan ke aaspas kantile taron kee jo aad lagi huee thi usaka daravaja band karake tala laga diya usi vah kabuli us daravaje ke pas dekha usane andar aane ka prayatn bhi kiya lekin vahan paharedar the isalie safal nahin ho saka re din kuchh musalaman bhaiyon ne aakar bataya vah kabuli pagal maloom hota hai kahata hai ki main gandhiji kee nak katoonga yah sunakar sab log aur bhi ghabaraye lekin gandhiji se kisi ne kuchh nahin kaha ve usi tarah apana kam karate rahe rat hone par vah apane svabhav ke anusar khule aakash ke niche sone ke lie apane bistar par pahunche unhonne dekha ki unako gherakar charon or kuchh log soye hue hain unhen aashchary huaa poochha  aap sab log to bahar nahin sote the aaj yah kya bat hai un logon ne us kabuli kee kahani kah sunaee sunakar gandhiji hans pade aur bole aap mujhe bachane vale kaun hain bhagavan ne mujhe yadi isi tarah marane ka nishchay kiya hai to use kaun rok sakega jaiye aap log apane roj ke sthan par jaiye gandhiji ke aadesh kee upeksha bhala kaun kar sakata tha sab log chale gaye parantu soya koee nahin vah kabuli pahali rat kee tarah aaj bhi aaya lekin andar nahin aa saka fir savera huaa prarthana aadi karyon se nibatakar gandhiji katane baithe dekha vah kabuli fir vahan aakar khada ho gaya hai ek vyakti ne gandhiji se kaha bapoo dekhiye yah vahi kabuli hai gandhiji bole use roko nahin mere pas aane do vah gandhiji ke pas aaya unhonne poochha bhaee tum yahan kyon khade the kabuli ne uttar diya aap ahinsa ka upadesh dete hain main aapakee nak katakar yah dekhana chahata hoon ki us samay aap kahan tak ahinsak rah sakate hain

gandhiji hans pade aur bole bas yahi dekhana hai lekin sirf nak hi kyon apana yah dhad aur yah sir bhi main tumhen saunpe deta hoon tum jo bhi prayog karana chaho bina jhijhak ke kar sakate ho vah kabuli gandhiji ke prem bhine shabd sunakar chakit rah gaya usane aisa nidar vyakti kahan dekha tha ek kshan vah khada raha fir bola mujhe yakeen ho gaya hai ki aap saty aur ahinsa ke pujari hain mujhe maf kar dijiye

jab golamej parishad men bhag lene ke lie gandhiji inglaind gaye to deshvidesh ke anek sanvadadata unake sath the unamen se bahutse sanvadadata jahaji jivan kee ghatanaon par namakmirch jagakar prasarit karate the ve prarthana ke drishy tatha charkha katane ke chitr dekar hi santusht nahin hote the aisiaisi kalpanaen bhi karate the ki hansi aa jaye udaharan ke lie ek sanvadadata ne ek aisi billi ka aavishkar kiya tha jon pratidin gandhiji ke sath doodh piti thi inhin men ek sanvadadata the shree slokov gandhiji se apani yaravadajel kee mulakat ka romanchakari varnnan prakashit kar vah kafi prasiddh ho gaye the irvaning staidardan men gandhiji kee udarata kee prashansa karate samay unhonne bhi anubhav kiya ki bina kisi spasht udaharan ke yah vivaran adhoora rah jayega bas unhonne apani kalpana daudaee aur likh dala ki jab prins aanf vels bharat gaye the tab gandhiji ne unhen dandavat kiya tha yah padhakar gandhiji ne unhen apane pas  bolemi slokov aapase to main yah aasha karata tha ki aap sahi baten janate honge aur sahi baten hi likhenge parantu aapane jo kuchh likha hai vah to aapakee kalpanashakti ko bhi lanchhit karanevala hai main bharatavarsh ke garib bhangi aur achhoot ke samane n keval ghutane tekana hi pasand karunga balki unakee charannraj bhi le loonga kayonki unhen sadiyon se pad dalit karane men mera bhi bhag raha hain parantu prins aanf vels to door main badashah tak ko bhi dandavat nahin karunga vah ek mahan satta ka pratinidhi hai  ek hathi bhale hi mujhe kuchal de parantu main usake samane sir n jhukaoonga parantu ajane men chinti par pair rakh dene ke karan usako pranam kar loonga

ek din bihar ke champaran jile ke ek ganv se hokar logon ka ek juloos devi ke thanak kee or ja raha tha sanyog se gandhiji us din usi ganv men thahare hue the jab vah juloos gandhiji ke nivas ke pas se hokar gujara to usaka shor sunakar unaka dhyan usakee or gaya pas baithe hue ek karyakarta se unhonne poochha yah kaisa juloos hai aur ye itana shor kyon macha rahe hain karyakarta pata lagane ke lie bahar aaya hi tha ki utsukatavash vah svayan bhi bahar aa gaye or sidhe juloos ke pas chale gaye unhonne dekha ki sabase aage ek hattakatta bakara chala ja raha hai usake gale men foolon kee malaen padi huee hain aur mathe par tika laga huaa hai vah samajh gaye ki yah bali ka bakara hai kshannbhar men andhavishvas men doobe hue in bholebhale logon ka sajiv chitr unake mastishk men ubhar aaya hriday karuna se bhig gaya thodi der tak isi vichar men doobe vah juloos ke sath chalate rahe log apani dhun men itane mast the ki ve yah jan hi nahin sake ki gandhiji unake sathsath chal rahe hain juloos apane sthan par pahuncha bakare ka balidan karane ke lie vidhivat taiyari hone lagi tabhi gandhiji un logon ke samane ja khade hue kuchh log unhen pahachanate the nilahe goronke atyachar ke viruddh vahi to unakee sahayata karane aaye the unhen apane samane dekhakar ve chakit ho uthe tabhi gandhiji ne unase poochha is bakare ko aap log yahan kyon laye hai sahasa kisi ko kuchh kahate n bana kshan bhar bad ek vyakti ne sahas karake kaha devi ko prasann karane ke lie gandhiji bole aap devi ko prasann karane ke lie bakare kee bhent chadhana chahate hain lekin manushy to bakare se bhi shreshth hai ve kuchh samajh n paye bol utheji han manushy to shreshth hai hi gandhiji ne kahayadi ham manushy ka bhog chadhayen to kya devi adhik adhik prasann nahin hogi bada vichitr prashn tha un graminon ne is par kabhi vichar nahin kiya tha ve sahasa koee uttar n de sake gandhiji ne hi fir kaha kya yahan par koee aisa manushy hai jo devi ko apana bhog chadhane ko taiyar ho ab bhi unamen se koee nahin bola thoda rukakar gandhiji ne kaha isaka matalab hai ki aap men se koee taiyar nahin hai tab main taiyar hoon ve sab log ab to aur bhi hakkebakke ho uthe pagalse ekdoosare ka munh takane lage unhen soojh nahin raha tha ki ve kya kahen vimoodh se khade hi rahe gandhiji ne ab atyant vyathit svar men kaha goonge aur nirdosh prani ke rakt se devi prasann nahin hoti agar yah bat kisi tarah saty bhi ho to manushy ka rakt adhik moolyavan hai vahi devi ko arpan karana chahie parantu aap aisa nahin karate main kahata hoon ki nirdosh prani kee bali chadhana puny nahin hai pap hai adharm hai

champaran men nilahe goron ke viruddh janch ka kam chal raha tha gandhiji ke aasapas kafi log ikatthe ho gaye the unamen kushthrog se pidit ek khetihar majadoor bhi tha vah pairon men chithade lapetakar chalata tha usake ghav khul gaye the aur per sooj gaye the use asahy vedana hoti thi lekin n jane kis aatm shakti ke bal par vah apana kam kar raha tha ek din chalatechalate usake pairon ke chithade khulakar raste men gir gaye ghavon se khoon bahane laga chalana doobhar ho gaya doosare sathi aage badh gaye gandhiji to sabase tej chalate the vah sabase aage the us rogi kee aur kisi ne dhyan nahin diya apane aavas par pahunchakar jab sab log prarthana ke lie baithe to gandhiji ne usako nahin dekha poochha hamare sath jo majadoor tha vah kahan hai ek vyakti ne kaha vah jaldi chal nahin pa raha tha thak jane se ek ped ke niche baith gaya tha gandhiji chup ho gaye aur hath men batti lekar use khojane nikal pade vah majadoor ek ped ke niche baitha ramanam le raha tha gandhiji ko dekhakar usake chehare par prakash chamak aaya gandhiji ne kaha tumase chala nahin ja raha tha to mujhe kahana chahie tha bhaee unhonne usake khoon se sane hue pairon kee or dekha chadar fadakar unhen lapeta fir sahara dekar use apane aavas par le aaye us din usake pair dhokar hi unhonne apani prarthana shuroo kee

champaran bihar men hai vahan gandhiji ne satyagrah kee ek shanadar ladaee ladi thi gore vahan ke logon ko bada satate the nil kee kheti karane ke karan ve nilahe kahalate the unhin kee janch karane ko gandhiji vahan gaye the unake is kam se janata jag uthi usaka sahas badh gaya lekin gore bade pareshan hue ve ab tak manamani karate aa rahe the koee unakee or ungali uthane vala tak n tha ab is ek aadami ne toofan khada kar diya ve aagbaboola ho uthe

vah aapako mar dalana chahata hai is kam ke lie usane hatyare bhi tainat kar diye hain gandhiji ne bat sun li usake bad ek din rat ke samay achanak vah us gore kee kothi par ja pahunche gore ne unhen dekha to ghabara gaya usane poochhatum kaun ho gandhiji ne uttar diya main gandhi hoon vah gora aur bhi hairan ho gaya bola gandhi han main gandhi hi hoon gandhiji ne uttar diya suna hai tum mujhe mar dalana chahate ho tumane hatyare bhi tainat kar diye hain gora sann rah gaya jaise sapana dekh raha ho apane marane kee bat koee itane sahaj bhav se kah sakata hai vah kuchh soch sake isase pahale hi gandhiji fir bole mainne kisi se kuchh nahin kaha akela hi aaya hoon bechara gora usane dar ko jitane vale aise vyakti kahan dekhe the vah aage kuchh bhi nahin bol saka

rajakotaandolan ne jab deshavyapi mahatv prapt kar liya tab rajy ke adhikari aur jamindar bhadak uthe us aandolan ke pichhe janata ka bahut bada bal tha gandhiji kee prarthana sabhaon men apar jansamooh ikattha hota tha adhikariyon ne socha is jansamooh ko aatankit kiya jaye unhonne bhade ke badamashon kee ek toli ko lathiyon aur dandon se lais kar prarthanasthal kee bhid ko titarbitar karane ka kam saunpa prarthana kee samapti ke bad ve gunde bhid ko chirate hue gandhiji kee or badhe kangres svayam sevakon ne sadaiv kee bhanti ahinsatmak riti se unhen rokane ka prayatn kiya lekin unakee sari koshishen vyarth gaeen gandhiji motar kee or badh rahe the ki un badamashon ne unhen gher liya paristhiti sahasa vikat ho uthi dhakkamukkee aur thelatheli ke karan gandhiji sankat men pad gaye tabhi sahasa unaka sharir kanpane laga vah dar nahin rahe the lekin us hinsatmak vatavaran kee pratikriya ke karan unaka sharir kanp utha tha upavas ke karan vah durbal bhi ho gaye the vah kisi bhi kshan gir sakate the lekin usi samay unhonne aankhen moond lin aur bhaktibhav se ramanam ka jap karane lage kaee kshan bit gaye unhonne aankhen kholi ab paristhiti bilakul badal gaee thi unhonne dridhatapoorvak sabhi svayansevakon aur aashramavasiyon se kaha ki ve chale jayen aur unhen gundon kee daya par chhod den ve ab motar se nahin aavenge paidal hi chalakar pahunchenge usake bad unhonne gundon ke mukhiya ke mukhiya ko apane pas bulaya aur kaha agar tumhari ichchha bahas karane kee hai to main taiyar hoon aur yadi tumhara vichar kuchh aur hai to vah bhi bata do aashchary ki gandhiji ke svar kan men padate hi gundon kee hinsa mom kee tarah pighal gaee unaka saradar hath jodakar gandhiji ke samane khada ho gaya bola mujhe maf kar do bapooji mujhe aapase kya bahas karani hai aap apana hath mere kandhe
par rakhie jahan bhi aap chalane ko kahenge main aapako surakshit pahuncha doonga aur us sandhya ko gandhiji apana ek hath gundon ke saradar ke kandhe par rakhakar apane dere par laute

sevagram men gandhiji ka janmdivas manaya gaya sham kee prarthana ke bad gandhiji pravachan karanevale the isalie aasapas ke bahut se log aa gaye the gandhiji thik samay par prarthana sabha main aaye dekha unake samane ghee ka ek diya jal raha hai yah naee bat thi vah ekatak usakee or dekhane lage kaee kshan dekhate rahe fir prarthana shuroo huee aur vah usamen lin ho gaye prarthana ke bad pravachan prarambh huaa charon or poorn shanti thi sab log yah janane ke lie utsuk the ki apane janm divas par gandhiji kya kahane vale hain sahasa gandhiji ne poochha yah diya kaun laya hai kastooraba pas hi baithi huee thin boli main laee hoon gandhiji ne poochha kahan se laee ba ne uttar diya ganv se laee hoon aaj aapakee varshaganth hai n gandhiji thodi der ke lie maun ho gaye fir gambhir svar men boleaaj agar sabase bura koee kam huaa hai to yah ki ba ne ghee ka diya jalaya aaj meri varshaganth hai isilie diya jalaya gaya hai aasapas ke ganv men log bag rahate hain ve kaise ganv men log bag rahate hain ve kaise jite hain yah main roj dekhata hoon un becharon ko jvarbajare kee sookhi roti par chupadane ke lie tel tak nahin milata aur yahan aaj mere aashram men ghee ka diya jal raha hai bechare garib kisanon ko jo chij nasib n ho use ham is tarah barabad kaise kar sakate hain unake us pravachan men dard jaise sakar ho utha tha

kanoon ke samane sab barabar hote hain  gandhiji manate the ki samajik ya samoohik jivan kee aur badhane se pahale kautumbik jivan ka anubhav prapt karana aavashyak hai unake ramarajy kee yah pahali sidhi thi isilie ve aashramjivan bitate the vahan sabhi ek bhojanalay men bhojan karate the isase samay aur dhan to bachata hi tha samoohik jivan ka abhyas bhi hota tha lekin yah sab hona chahie samaypalan suvyavastha aur shuchita ke sath is or logon ko protsahit karane ke lie gandhiji svayan bhi samoohik rasoeeghar men bhojan karate the bhojan ke samay do bar ghanti bajati thi jo doosari ghanti bajane tak bhojanalay men nahin pahunch pata tha use doosari pankti ke lie baramade men intajar karana padata tha doosari ghanti bajate hi rasoeeghar ka dvar band kar diya jata tha jisase bad men aanevale vyakti andar n aane paven ekadin gandhiji pichhad gaye sanyog se us din aashramavasi shree haribhaoo upadhyay bhi pichhad gaye jab ve vahan pahunche to dekha ki baramade men khade hain baithane ke lie n bainch hai n kursi haribhaoo ne vinod karate hue kaha bapooji aaj to aap bhi gunahagaron ke kathaghare men aa gaye hain gandhiji khilakhilakar hansh pade bole kanoon ke samane to sab barabar hote hain n haribhaooji ne kaha baithane ke lie kursi laoon bapoo gandhiji bole nahin usakee jaroorat nahin hai saja poori bhugatani chahie usi men sachcha aanand hai

main nikal doon to vah kisake pas jayega  gandhiji maganabadi men thahare hue the ek din ek yuvak unase milane aaya usakee aayu lagabhag atharah varsh kee hogi use kampan rog tha hathpair kanpane lagate to rukate hi n the usane gandhiji se kaha main kisi ke kam nahin aa sakata mera jivan ek bojh ban gaya hai mujhe aap apane pas rakh lijiye gandhiji bolemain har apang ko apane sath kaise rakh sakata hoon mere lie yah sambhav nahin hai aap kahin aur aasara khojen parantu vah yuvak apani bat par adig raha vah kisi bhi tarah vahan se jane ko raji nahin huaa sham tak barabar ke makan kee sidhiyon par baitha raha ek bhaee ne is bat kee soochana gandhiji ko di kaha is yuvak ko nikal bahar kiya jaye yah sunana tha ki gandhiji bol utheyadi main use nikal bahar karoon to vah aakhir kisake pas jayega rahane do bechare ko main sochakar usake yogy kam bata doonga vah yuvak vahin rah gaya gandhiji ne sabase pahale use sagsabji dhone ka kam bataya shuru shuru men vah yah kam bhi nahin kar pata tha lekin vah himmat harane vala nahin tha kam karane kee usake man men badi utkat ichchha thi vah laga raha aur dhiredhire hath men

chakoo lekar sag katane laga usake man men badi utkat ichchha thi vah laga raha aur dhiredhire hath men chakoo lekar sag katane laga usake man men apani nason ko bas men rakhane kee ichchhashakti tivr hoti gaee kuchh mahine bitatenbitate vah sachamuch thik ho gaya usake bad to vah padhane ke lie amarika chala gaya adamy ichchhashakti sahanubhooti aur pyar ye tinon mil jayen to himalay bhi hilaya ja sakata hai

main bhi aise naiyon se bal nahin katavaoonga garmi ke din the gandhiji maganabadi se aakar sevagram aashram men nayenaye hi base the govind nam ka ek harijan ladaka unakee seva men rahata tha unake khanepine sone baithane kee sari vyavastha vahi karata tha vah is bat se bahut prasann tha ki harijan hokar bhi gandhiji kee seva karane ka use saubhagy prapt ho raha hai ek din usane gandhiji se kaha main thodi der ke lie vardha jana chahata hoon gandhiji ne poochha kisalie govind ne uttar diya mere sir ke bal bahut badh gaye hain vahan jakar unako katavana chahata hoon gandhiji bole kya seganv men naee nahin hain naee to hain par ve sab oonchi jati ke hinduon ke hain to kya ve tere bal nahin katate govind ne kaha  ji nahin ve harijanon ke bal nahin katate svarn hinduon kee tarah ve bhi hamase nafarat karate hain gandhiji ne poochha to kya vardha ke savarn naee harijanon ke bal kat dete hain govind ne jhijhakate hue uttar diya ji nahin jati batane par ve bhi nahin katate to too jat chhipakar bal katavayega  nahin bapooji jati chhipakar main apana dharm nahin dubona chahata  to fir vardha jakar kya karega tere bal kaun katega govind ne kaha bapooji vahan ekdo harijan naee bhi hain ve bade prem se mere bal kat dete hain gandhi ji ne gambhir hokar kaha achchhi bat hai too ja lekin agar seganv ke savarn naee tere bal nahin kat sakate to main bhi unase bal nahin katavaoonga aur usake bad se gandhiji ne bal katane kee mashin kainchi manga li aur aashramvasiyon kee madad se apane bal katavane lage

ek bar gandhiji dilli se vardha ja rahe the rajakumari amritakaur unake sath thin gandhiji ne unase kaha ki sandhya ka bhojan vah gadi men karenge isake lie garm doodh aur garm pani sath le jana aavashyak tha lekin rajakumari

ke pas tharamas keval ek hi tha tab vah kya karen kisi tarah shree ghanashyamadas bidala ko is kathinaee ka pata chal gaya ek din pahale hi vah ek naya tharamas kharidakar laye the vahi unhonne rajakumari ko de diya aavashyakata thi isalie unhonne use le liya lekin gandhiji kee drishti to badi tivr thi khane ke samay unhonne us tharamas ko dekha turant bhanp gaye ki yah naya hai poochha tumane yah naya tharamas kharida hai rajakumari ne uttar diya ji nahin bidalaji ne diya hai hamare pas ek hi tharamas rah gaya tha yah sunakar gandhiji ko bahut dukh huaa bole tum itani garib ho jo doosaron ka paisa kharch karavati ho manaliya unake pas bahut paisa hai par tumako to adhik samajhadari se kam lena chahie bhagavan ne jise paisa diya hai vah use dharohar mane usamen se ek kaudi bhi kisi gairjaroori chij par kharch n kare mahadevabhaee vapas dilli lautane vale the unhin ke hath vah naya tharamas unhonne bidalaji ko lauta diya

bina majadoori kiye khana pap hai ek samay avadhesh nam ka ek yuvak vardha men gandhiji ke aashram men aaya bola main dotin roj thaharakar yahan sab kuchh dekhana chahata hoon bapooji se milane kee bhi ichchha hai mere pas khanepine ke lie kuchh bhi nahin hai main yahin bhojan karoonga gandhiji ne use apane pas bulaya poochha kahan ke rahane vale ho aur kahan se aaye ho avadhesh ne uttar diya main baliya jile ka rahane vala hoon karanchi kangres dekhane gaya tha mere pas pesa nahin he isalie kabhi mainne gadi men bina tikat safar kiya kabhi

paidal mangatakhata chal pada isi prakar yatra karata huaa aa raha hoon yah sunakar gandhiji gambhirata se boletumhare jaise navayuvak ko aisa karana shobha nahin deta agar paisa pas nahin tha to kangres dekhane kee kya jarurat thi usase labh bhi huaa bina majadoori kiye khana aur bina tikat gadi men safar karana sab chori hai aur chori pap he yahan bhi tumako bina majadoori kiye khana nahin mil sakega avadhesh dekhane men utsahi aur tejasvi maloom deta tha kangres ka karyakarta bhi tha usane kaha thik hai aap mujhe kam dijiye main karane ke lie taiyar hoon gandhiji ne socha is yuvak ko kam milana hi chahie aur kam ke badale men khana bhi milana chahie samaj aur rajy donon ka yah dayitv hai rajy jo aaj paraya hai lekin samaj to apana hai vah bhi is or dhyan deta parantu mere pas aakar jo aadami kam mangata hai use main na nahin kar sakata unhonne us yuvak se kahaachchha avadhesh tum yahan par kam karo main tumako khana doonga jab tumhare pas kiraye ke layak paise ho jayen tab apane ghar jana avadhesh ne gandhiji kee bat svikar kar li aur vah vahan rahakar kam karane laga

ganvon men vilayati davaen kyon ek bar ek amarikee bahan sevagramaashram men rahane ke lie aaee ek din kam karate hue achanak vah kisi tarah jal gaee socha yahan kisi ke pas koeenkoee maraham to hoga hi isalie unhonne maraham manga gandhiji ne kahais par mitti lagao usane aisa hi kiya aur use aaram bhi maloom huaa vah kisi patr kee pratinidhi thi aur bharatiy sanskriti ka adhyayan karane ke lie is desh men aaee thi isalie use samajhate hue gandhiji boleganvon men vilayati davaon ka upayog kyaun kiya jaye agar aisa huaa to hamare log kangal ban jayenge mamooli ghav ka ilaj kya ho sakata hai yah hamen jan lena chahie usake sthan par jhat se taiyar maraham lagana mere vichar men ek prakar se aalasy ko hi badhava dena hai purane jamane men hamare desh kee boodhi bahanen desi davaiyon ka achchha gyan rakhati thin aaj bhi rakhati hai lekin ab usamen kuchh sudhar hona chahie agar unhen vaigyanik riti se samajhaya jaye to ve ganvon men ledi daktar jaroor ban sakati hain aap ek shikshit mahila hain hamare desh kee sthiti ka adhyayan karane aaee hain isalie aap in baton kee or khas taur par dhyan dijiyega

main to pahale til saf karoonga maganavadi men telaghani gandhiji ke kamare ke pichhe hi chalati thi aur til aadi kee safaee unake samane ke baramade men hoti thi til kee safaee ka kam ba aur doosari bahanen karati thin ek roj ba ne balavant sinh se kaha balavant dekho ye til bahut barik hain aur inamen jo kachara hai vah bhi bahut barik hai meri aankh se dikhaee nahin deta tum kisi majadoorani se saf kara do to achchha ho balavant sinh ne turant kahaavashy kara doonga un dinon ek bore kee safaee karane ke lie ek majadoorani do ya char aane leti thi parantu ek majadoorani ko til saf karane ke lie laga diya gaya lekin tabhi gandhiji kisi kam se apane kamare se bahar nikale majadoorani ko til saf karate hue dekhakar bole is bahan ko kisane lagaya hai isaka uttar kaun de ant men balavant sinh ne daratedarate kaha bapuji mainne lagaya he gandhiji bole kyon lagaya he mainne to yah kam ba ko saunpa tha n tum bich men kyon pade balavant sinh ne sakuchate hue uttar diyatil bahut barik hain aur unamen kachara bhi barik haiba ko thikthik dikhaee nahin deta fir isakee safaee men paise bhi jyada nahin lagenge gandhiji sahasa gambhir ho gaye unhonne kaha thik hai main doosare sab kam chhodakar pahale til saf karoonga ve soop lekar til saf karane lage balavant sinh to jaise pasinapasina ho uthe pas vale kamare men ba sab sun rahi thin thodi der men ve bahar aaeen aur gandhiji ke hath se soop chhinakar bolin aap apana kam karen ham saf kar lenge gandhiji chale gaye aur ba til saf karane lagin

isaka prayashchit karana hoga us varsh kathiyavad ke rajanaitik karyakartaon ne apana varshik sammelan morabi men kiya tha usi avasar par kathiyavad ke naujavan kangresiyon ka bhi ek sammelan huaa tha saradar vallabhabhaee patel aur pandit javahar lal neharoo kramashah in donon ke sabhapati the gandhiji to kathiyavad ke hi the unhen vishesh roop se aamantrit kiya gaya tha apane dal ke sath vah morabi gaye aur sammelan kee samapti par usi prakar vapas laut aaye gadi ravana hone ke bad sahasa gandhiji ne apane sathiyon ke bare men poochhatachh kee kitane vyakti sath aaye the kitane vapas ja rahe hain tikat kitane hain yah sab unhonne vistar se janana chaha janch karane par pata laga ki yatree kam hain aur tikat jyada hain shree mahadev desaee ne utane hi vyaktiyon ke lie tikat kharide the jitane sabaramati se ravana hue the lekin ab pata laga ki do bhaee morabi men hi rah gaye hain unhonne is bat kee soochana nahin di thi aur ve log bhi vapas lautane kee jaldi men poochhana bhool gaye the ab chalati rel men is tathy ka pata laga gandhiji gambhir ho uthe unaka chehara antar kee

vedana se vyathit ho aaya vah itane ashant hue ki us rat n to svayan soye n unake sathi hi so sake sari rat unake antar men tivr manthan aur chintan chalata raha jaise vedana ka koee par hi nahin tha unhonne sara dosh apane oopar le liya ve apane ko hi pratadit karane lage main itana gafil kyon ban gaya maine dhyan kyon nahin rakha ye sab baten mainne gadi par savar hone se pahale hi kyon nahin poochhin galati meri hai mahadev to abhi bachcha hai par mujhe budhape men yah kya ho gaya log meri sachchaee par bharosa karake mujhe paisa dete hain us paise ka thikthik upayog karana mera kartavy ho jata hai aaj main chook gaya mujhe isaka javab apane sirajanahar ke samane dena hoga aadiaadi sathiyon ne unako bahut samajhaya mahadevabhaee ne apani asavadhani ke lie kshama mangi vishvas dilaya ki jo paise adhik kharch hue hain unhen vah aashram ke hisab men nahin dalenge apane pas se de denge lekin gandhiji ko santosh nahin huaa bole tum apane pas se kya doge tumhare pas rah hi kya gaya haitumane apana sabakuchh desh ko diya hai ab alag kamaee kaise karoge yah to ek bhari bhool ham sabase ho hi gaee hai isaka prayashchit hamen karana hoga

kam kee chij ko sanbhalakar rakhana chahie  nahate samay gandhiji sabun ka prayog nahin karate the apane pas ek khuradara patthar rakhate the varshon pahale mirabahan ne unhen yah patthar diya tha noaakhali kee yatra ke samay ek bar patthar sanyog se pichhale padav par chhoot gaya us samay manu gandhiji ke sath rahati thi snanaghar men jab usane gandhiji se kaha bapooji nahate samay aap jis patthar ka prayog karate hain vah main kahin bhool aaee hoon kal jis julahe ke ghar thahare the shayad vah vahin chhoot gaya hai ab kya karoon gandhiji kuchh der sochate rahe fir bole tujhase galati huee too us patthar ko khud khojakar la sunakar manu sakapaka gaee fir jhijhakate hue poochhaganv men bahut se svayansevak hain unamen se kisi ko sath le jaoon bapoo ne poochha kyon manu ko krodh aa gaya bapooji sab kuchh janate hain fir bhi poochhate hain yahan nariyal aur supari ke ghane jangal hain anajan aadami to usamen kho jaye fir ye toofan ke din hain aadami aadami ka gala katata hai aadami aadami kee laj lootata hai raha

ekadam viran aur ujad hai us par koee akele kaise jaye magar bhool jo huee thi usane kyon ka koee javab nahin diya kisi ko sath bhi nahin liya akeli hi us rah par chal padi kanp rahi thi par usake kadam aage badh rahe the pairon ke nishan dekhati jati thi ramanam leti jati thi aur chalati jati thi aakhir vah us julahe ke ghar pahunch gaee us ghar men keval ek budhiya rahati thi vah kya jane ki vah patthar kitana keemati tha shayad usane to use fenk diya tha manu idharudhar dhoondhane lagi aakhir vah mil gaya manu ke aanand ka par n raha khushikhushi lauti dere par pahunchatepahunchate ek baj gaya jor kee bhookh lag aaee thi aur is bat ka dukh bhi tha ki is bhool ke karan vah apane bapoo kee seva se vanchit rah gaee isilie vah unhen patthar dete samay ro padi use samajhate hue gandhiji bole is patthar ke nimitt aaj teri pariksha huee isamen too pas huee isase mujhe kitani khushi ho rahi hai yah patthar mera pachchis sal ka sathi hai jel men mahal men jahan bhi main jata hoon yah mere sath rahata hai agar yah kho jata to mujhe aur mirabahan ko bahut dukh hota toone aaj ek path sikha aise patthar bahut mil jayenge doosara dhoondh lenge is khayal se beparavah nahin hona chahie kam kee har chij ko sanbhalakar rakhana sikhana chahie

mere pas shan ka kya kam  un dinon gandhiji poorvi bangal kee yatra par the ek din unhen nav ke dvara malikanda se lohaganj jana tha vah nav jamindar shree ray kee thi do din ke lie unhonne use gandhiji kee seva men rakh diya tha usi marg par shree ray ka ghar bhi padata tha lekin us din gandhiji ko us kasbe men nahin jana tha par jis samay vah nav unake ghar ke samane pahunchi to andar se ek vyakti vyavasthapak ke pas aaya aur bolashree ray ke ghar kee mahilaen gandhiji ke darshan karana chahati hain karyakram men is bat kee koee vyavastha nahin thi isalie vyavasthapak mahoday ko yah achchha nahin laga bolepahale svikriti kyon nahin li thi kya jagahjagah roke jane se itane bade neta kee shan fikee nahin padati aap janate hain ki unake oopar kitana bojh hain aur ve kitane vyast rahate hain ye sab baten gandhiji sun rahe the unhonne kaha mere pas shan ka kya kam hai bhaee apane hi deshavasiyon ke samane apani manmaryada ka vichar kaise kar sakata hoon chalie ham shree ray ke makan ke andar chalen vahan se lautakar aage badhenge nav rukee gandhiji andar gaye striyon ne unaka yathochit aadarsatkar kiya aur unaka
hridaykamal khil utha

bachchon jaisi kalpanaen nahin karani chahie  satyagrah ke dinon men ek bar gandhiji karadi nam ke ganv men thahare hue the ek din saveresavere hi kya dekhate hain ki ganv valon ne ek bada juloos nikala hai sabase aage striyan hain rashtradhvaj bhi hai baje baj rahe hain sochane lageye log kya satyagrah karane ja rahe hain lekin purushon ke hathon men ye fal fool aur paise kaise hain sochatesochate ve jhonpadi se bahar nikal aaye log unakee jayajayakar karane lage pas aakar sabane unako shraddha se pranam kiya aur apaneapane upahar unake charanon men samarpit kar diye gandhiji ne poochha aap log kaise aaye hain aur yah baja kisalie baj raha hai julush ke neta ne kahamahatmaji hamare ganv men hamesha pani ka akal rahata hai garmi ke din aaye ki kuen sookh jate hain lekin aashchary ki is bar aap aaye to sabakuchh palat gaya ganv men aapake charan padate hi kuon men pani bhar aaya usi ke lie ham apana bhaktibhav pragat karane aaye hain gandhiji ka svar jara kathor ho utha bole tum log pagal ho kya mere aane ka aur is pani ka kya sambandh eeshvar par mera adhikar nahin hai usake lie aapakee vani ka jo mooly hai vahi meri vani ka hai sunakar bechare ganv ke log lajjit ho uthe ab gandhiji hans pade aur boledekho kisi ped par kauaa baithe aur sanyog se usi ghadi vah dal toot jaye to kya tum kahoge ki kaue ne ped ko tod diya bahut se karan hote hain tumhare kuen men pani aaya usaka karan yahi hoga ki dharati ke bhitar kuchh uthal puthal machi hogi aur ek naya jharana foot pada hoga hamen bachchon jaisi kalpanaen nahin karani chahie

sarvajanik kam men avyavastha thik nahin  ek bar malabar pradesh kee ek kangres kameti ka mantree gandhiji ke pas aaya vah bahut dukhi tha usane sarvajanik kosh ka kafi dhan lokseva men kharch diya tha lekin usaka hisab vah nahin rakh saka tha isalie jamakharch thik nahin ho saka tha lagabhag ek hajar rupaye kee kami pad rahi thi usane apane lie ek bhi paisa kharch nahin kiya tha lekin hisab to hona hi chahie karyakarini samiti ne usase kaha ya to hisab do ya paise bharo mantree ne kaha main itani rakam kahan se doonga samiti ka uttar tha  ham kuchh nahin janate sarvajanik paise ka hisab milana hi chahie vah bechara bahut dukhi huaa usane socha kyon n gandhiji ke pas chala jaye ve to meri bat samajh lenge unake kahane se shayad ye log man jayen bas yahi sochakar vah gandhiji ke pas aaya tha sab baten batakar usane kaha bapoo main skool kee naukari chaudakar apane ko kangres kee seva ke lie samarpit kar chuka hoon mainne ek paisa bhi apane kam men nahin liya gandhiji bole yah sach ho sakata hai lekin aapako paise to bharane hi honge sarvajanik kam men avyavastha thik nahin hoti mantree ne kaha lekin main paise kahan se bharoon gandhiji bole yah main nahin janata kuchh bhi karake tumhen paise bharane chahie us yuvak kee aankhon men aansoo aa gaye dinabandhu endrayooj pas hi baithe the bole bapoo yah yuvak pachhata raha hai isase aap itani kathorata se kyon bolate hain gandhiji ne kaha pashchatap keval man men hone se kya hota hai asali pashchatap tabhi hota hai jab dosh ka parimarjan ho is yuvak ko apani bhool sudharani chahie yah janasevak hai

sabako kurate chahie  ek bar gandhiji ek skool dekhane gaye un dinon ve langoti pahanane lage the kandhe par ek chadar dal lete the unhen is roop men dekhakar ek bachche ne kaha parantu shikshak ne use rok diya gandhiji sabakuchh dekh rahe the us bachche se bole tum kuchh kahana chahate ho vah bachcha bola  aapane kurata kyon nahin pahana main apani man se kahoonga vah aapake lie kurata si degi aap pahanenge n gandhiji bole  jaroor pahanoonga lekin ek shart hai bete main akela nahin hoon bachche ne poochha tab aapako kitane kurate chahie do man se kahoonga vah aapake lie do kurate si degi gandhiji ne uttar diya do nahin mere chalis karod bhaeebahan hain un sabako kurate chahie kya tumhari man chalis karod kurate si sakegi vah bachcha shayad kuchh samajh nahin saka gandhiji usakee pith thapathapakar chale gaye lekin shikshakon ne to sabakuchh samajh hi liya tha
ab aapako nind aa jayegi

briten ke suprasiddh majadoor neta shree fenar brokave bharat aaye hue the madras pahunchane par vah achanak asvasth ho gaye gandhiji bhi un dinon madras men hi the ve unhen dekhane aspatal gaye fenar brokave ke pas jakar bole main aapase milane aaya hoon suna hai aapako bahut takalif ho rahi hai kya bat hai fenar brokave ne uttar diya aap aaye aapakee badi kripa hai main kya kahoon mujhe badi baichaini anubhav ho rahi hai  gandhiji ne poochha  aakhir is bechaini ka kuchh karan to hoga hi fenar brokave ne uttar diya ji han karan to hai nind bilakul nahin aati jara nind aa jaye to kitana achchha ho gandhiji bole yah to aap thik kahate hain nind sachamuch rasayan hai itana kahakar unhonne bade prembhav se inake mathe par hath rakha aur aankhen band kar li doosare hi laga jaise ve samadhisth ho gaye hain aur apane eeshvar se

prarthana kar rahe hain kuchh der ve isi sthiti men khade rahe fir aankhen kholakar bole ab aapako nind aa jayegi aur aap aaram anubhav karenge itana kahakar gandhiji laut aaye fenar brokave ne apani pustak pachas varsh ka samajavadi jivan ka itihas men likha haikitana aashchary hai ki gandhiji gaye aur kuchh hi der men mujhe ekadam gahari nind aa gaee nind khuli to main kaisi sfoorti anubhav kar raha tha

ab yah sone kee choodiyan n pahanegi  bangal ke suprasiddh kangresi neta baboo shyamasundar chakravarti kee devati ranibala koee das varsh kee rahi hogi apane svabhav ke anusar gandhiji usake sath hasyvinod kar rahe the usake hath men sone kee chhah choodiyan thin unhen dekhakar vah bole tumhare nanhennanhen hathon men itani bharibhari choodiyan ranibala turant unako utarane lagi usake nana ne bhi use protsahit karate hue kaha han han ye choodiyan gandhiji ko de do gandhiji ko laga jaise yah udarata bahut uchit nahin hai kyonki aakhir ye choodiyan baboo shyamasundar chakravarti kee to hai nahin chakravarti mahoday shayad gandhiji ke man kee yah bat bhanp gaye boleaap meri beti aur damad ko nahin janate ranibala ne ye choodiyan aapako de di hain yah janakar meri beti bahut prasann hogi aur mera damad to bahut udar hai vah garibon kee madad karata hai gandhiji ne yah sab majak men hi kaha tha par unaka uddeshy gahanon ke prati aruchi paida karana to tha hi vah logon ke man men garibon ko sahayata karane kee ichchha bhi paida karana chahate the fir bhi unhonne choodiyan lautane kee koshish kee lekin shyamababoo nahin mane tab gandhiji bolelekin ab rani sone kee naee choodiyan nahin pahanegi han vah shankh kee choodiyan pahan sakati hai isi shart par main inhen le sakata hoon nanhin ranibala aur usake nana shyamababoo donon ne saharsh unakee yah shart svikar kar li

sab chijen vyavasthit aur svachchh rakhana  ek din gandhiji ne aadesh diya ki rasoeeghar men bhojan karanevale vyaktiyon ke jhoothe bartan pratidin baribari se do ya tin vyakti manja karen aisa karane se logon men prem bhav badhega aur ek doosare ke bartan manjane men jo ghrina v anubhav karate hain vah door ho jayegi samay bhi bachega un dinon rasoeeghar kee vyavastha balavantasinh dekhate the unhen yah aadesh bahut achchha nahin laga unhen dar tha ki aisa karane se aur bhi avyavastha failegi gandhiji bolemera uddeshy avyavastha men vyavastha lana hai achchha sabase pahale main aur ba hi is kam ka shreeganesh karenge aur ve ba ko lekar turant bartan manjane kee jagah par jakar baith gaye unhonne sabase kaha aap log apane bartan yahan par rakh den aur hath dhokar chale jayen log ghabaraye parantu ve janate the ki gandhiji jo kah dete hain vahi karate hain isalie ve apaneapane bartan vahin chhodakar chale gaye gandhiji aur ba donon bade manoyog se bartan manjane lage balavantasinh barabar soch rahe the ki kaise gadhiji ko yah kam chhodane ke

lie manayen lekin sath hi unhen aisa bhi lag raha tha ki jab gandhiji aur ba is tarah ka kam kar sakate hain to hamen bhi man men kisi kam ke lie chhotebade ka bhedabhav nahin rakhana chahie udhar gandhiji aur ba men hod lag rahi thi ki kisaka bartan adhik chamakata hai gandhiji bartan saf karate jate aur kahate kyon balavant sinh kaisa saf huaa hai tum darate kyon ho aadami nity kare to kya nahin kar sakata aakhir striyan ghar men sabake jhoothe bartan saf karati hi hain yah aashram hamara bada kutumb hai hamen to streepurush ka bhed mitana hai isilie to rasoeeghar ka bhar tum par saunpa hai mainne jivan men bahut prayog kiye hain aur main is parinam par pahuncha hoon ki samoohik rasoeeghar kholane men jo kutumb bhavana badhati hai vah aur kisi prakar nahin badhati jo rasoeeghar chalata hai usaka dayitv bahut adhik hota hai sab chijon ko vyavasthit aur svachchh rakhana aur jitane bhojan karane vale hain unako bhagavan samajh kar prem se khilana yah aadhyatmik pragati kee badi sadhana hai tum isamen pas ho jaoge to main samajhoonga ki tum seva kar sakate ho
aisa aadami kis kam ka  ek bar gandhiji deharadoon men mahilaon kee ek sabha men bhashan de rahe the vahan par unhen thaili bhi bhent kee gaee bhashan dene ke uparant ve bole  main to gahane bhi

le sakata hoon daridr narayan ke lie angoothi bhi le sakata hoon aur choodi bhi le sakata hoon inhen dene men purushon se poochhane kee koee aavashyakata nahin kyonki yah to stree dhan hai isalie der kyon kee jaye aap sab thodethode gahane mujhe de sakate hain mere pas aane kee jaroorat nahin hai main hi aapake pas aakar le loonga us din gandhiji ko bahutkuchh mila itana ki ve sanbhal bhi n sake kafi kuchh idharudhar bikhar gaya isilie sabha se lautate samay unhonne shree mahavir tyagi se kaha apane samane farsh ko khoob achchhi tarah jhadakar rupaye aur gahane batorana achchha kahakar ve chale gaye tyagiji ne sabase pahale pandal ko khali karavaya fir mudetude not duvanni athanni aadi sikke aur chhotechhote gahanenath bali bunde choodiyan jo idharudhar bikhare pade the un sabako ikattha karake sanbhala aur kaimp men pahuncha diya rat ko prarthana ke bad gandhiji ne tyagiji ko bula bheja tyagiji bahut khush the shayad gandhiji ne shabashi dene ke lie bulaya hai lekin jab ve vahan pahunche to gandhiji ne kaha mainne kaha tha ki apane samane dari jhadakar sara paisa ikattha kar lena aisa lagata he ki tumane kisi doosare ko kah diya kyonki sari chijen nahin aaeen tyagiji bolenahin bapooji mainne svayan hi sara pandal jhada tha gandhiji ne dridh svar men kahaaisa mat kaho mujhe tumhara vishvas nahin he tumane svayan nahin dekha aisa aadami kis kam ka jo apani jimmedari doosare par dal de tumhen svayan dekhana chahie tha maine to tumhare bharose sab kuchh chhod diya tha tyagiji ghabarakar bolebapu aapase kisane kaha ki main vahan nahin tha gandhiji ne turant ek sone ka bunda nikal kar tyagiji ko dikhaya aur kaha yah bunda kahata hai ki tum vahan nahin the bhala koee stree mujhe ek bunda degi aur doosara apane kan men rakhegi isaka jodidar kahan hai agar aankh kholakar dekhate to milata n jo janata ke paise ke sath laparavahi vah bharose ka aadami nahin ho sakata mere pas apani koee poonji nahin hai main is nukasan ko kahan se bharoonga jab tak vah bunda nahin milata vahan jakar jhadoo lagao jao rat ho gaee thi latad khakar tyagiji pandal men pahunche gais ke hande mangavaye tarch li kuchh mitron ko sath liya dari chataee sab kuchh jhadabuhara bhagy kee bat ki vah bunda mil gaya usake sath mile kuchh not kuchh rupayepaise ek do angoothi chhalle chandi ke bale aadiaadi lagabhag dhaee sau rupaye ka saman hoga gandhiji kee nigah tej thi

hamara matalab samay par ravana hone se hai  udisa yatra men kakasahab kalelakar gandhiji ke sath the ghoomateghoomate ve balasor pahunche vahan se unhen bhadrak jana tha vahan ek sabha ka prabandh kiya gaya tha parantu kisi karannavash gandhiji ka vahan jana sambhav nahin ho saka unhonne kakasahab se kaha main nahin ja sakata lekin tum chale jao aur mera sandesha sabha ko suna do kakasahab taiyar ho gaye lekin unhen le jane ke lie koee nihin aaya rah dekhate dekhate ek ghanta bit gaya tabhi gandhiji ne unhen dekh liya unhonne acharaj se poochha kyon gaye nahin kakasahab ne kaha main to taiyar baitha hoon koee mujhe le jaye tab n yah sunakar gandhiji bade naraj hue bole  is tarah se kam nahin hote samay hote hi tumhen paidal chal dena chahie motar n mili to kya huaa paidal hi chalate do din lagate to lag jate hamara matalab gantavy sthan par pahunchane se nahin he samay par ravana hone se hai kakasahab bade lajjit hue aur usi kshan chal pade

yahi to pavitr dan hai  khadiyatra ke samay dakshin ke bad gandhiji udisa gaye the ghoomateghoomate ve eetamati nam ke ek ganv men pahunche vahan unaka vyakhyan huaa aur usake bad jaisa ki hota tha sab log chanda aur bhent lekar aaye prayah sabhi sthanon pararupayapaisa aur gahane aadi diye jate the lekin yahan doosara hi drishy dekhane men aaya koee vyakti kumhada laya tha koee bijora koee baingan aur koee jangal kee doosari bhaji kuchh garibon ne apane chithadon men se khol kholakar kuchh paise diye kakasahab kalelakar ghoomghoomakar ve paise ikatthe kar rahe the un paison ke jang se unake hath hare ho gaye unhonne apane hath bapoo ko dikhalaye ve kuchh kah n sake kyonki unaka man bhig aaya tha us kshan to gandhiji ne kuchh nahin kaha us drishy ne manon sabhi ko abhibhoot kar diya tha agale din savere ke samay donon ghoomane ke lie nikale rasta chhodakar ve kheton men ghoomane lage usi samay gandhiji gambhir hokar bolekitana daridry aur dainy hai yahan kya kiya jaye in logon ke lie ji chahata hai ki apani maran kee ghadi men yahin aakar in logon ke bich men maroon us samay jo log mujhase milane ke lie yahan aayenge ve in logon kee karun dasha dekhenge tab kisinkisi ka hriday to pasijega hi aur vah inakee seva ke lie yahan aakar bas jayega aisa karun drishy aur kahin shayad hi dekhane ko mile lekin jab ve charabatiya gram pahunche to stabdh rah gaye sabha men bahut thode log aaye the jo aaye the unamen se kisi ke munh par bhi chaitany nahin tha thi bas pret jaisi shoonyata gandhiji ne yahan bhi chande ke lie apil kee un logon ne kuchhnkuchh diya hi vahi jang lage paise kakasahab ke hath fir hare ho gaye in logon ne rupaye to kabhi dekhe hi nahin the tanbe ke paise hi unaka sabase bada dhan tha jab kabhi unhen koee paisa mil jata to ve use kharch karane kee himmat nahin kar pate the isilie bahut din tak bandhe rahane ya dharati main gad dene ke karan us par jang lag jata tha kakasahab ne kaha in logon ke paise lekar kya hoga gandhiji bole yahi to pavitr dan hai yah hamare lie diksha hai isake dvara in logon ke hriday men aasha ka ankur uga hai yah paisa usi aasha ka pratik hai inhen vishvas ho gaya hai ki ek din hamara bhi uddhar hoga

isi ka nam hai andha prema  un dinon gandhiji bihar men kam kar rahe the achanak vayasaray ne unhen bula bheja anurodh kiya ki ve havaee jahaj se aayen gandhiji ne kaha jis savari men karodon garib log safar nahin kar sakate usamen main kaise baithoon unhonne rel ke tisare darje se hi jana tay kiya manu bahan ko bulakar bole mere sath sirf tujhako chalana hai saman bhi kamsekam lena aur tisare darje ka ek chhotesechhota dibba dekh lena saman to manu bahan ne kamsekam liya lekin jo dibba chuna vah do bhagon vala tha

ek men saman rakha aur doosara gandhiji ke sonebaithane ke lie raha aisa karate samay manu ke man men unake aaram ka vichar tha har steshan par bhid hogi fir harijanon ke lie paisa ikattha karana hota hai rasoee ka kam bhi usi men hoga to vah ghadi bhar aaram nahin kar sakenge yahi baten usane sochi patana se gadi subah sadhenau baje ravana huee garmi ke din the un dinon gandhiji das baje bhojan karate the bhojan kee taiyari karane ke bad manu unake pas aaee ve likh rahe the use dekhakar poochhakahan thi manu boliudhar khana taiyar kar rahi thi gandhiji ne kaha jara khidakee ke bahar to dekh manu ne bahar jhanka kaee log daravaja pakade latak rahe hen vah sabakuchh samajh gaee gandhiji ne use ek mithisi jhidakee di aur poochhais doosare kamare ke lie toone kaha tha manu boli ji han mera vichar tha ki yadi isi kamare men sab kam karoongi to aapako kasht hoga gandhiji ne kahakitani kamajor dalil hai isi ka nam hai andhaprem yah to toone sirf doosara kamara manga lekin agar sailoon bhi mangati to vah bhi mil jata magar kya vah tujhako shobha deta yah doosara kamara mangana bhi sailoon mangane ke barabar hai gandhiji bol rahe the aur manu kee aankhon se pani bah raha tha unhonne kaha agar too meri bat samajhati hai to aankhon men yah pani nahin aana chahie ja sab saman is kamare men le aa gadi jab ruke tab steshan mastar ko bulana manu ne turant vaisa hi kiya usake man men dhukaddhukad mach rahi thi n jane ab gandhiji kya karenge kahin ve meri bhool ke lie upavas n kar baithe yah sochatesochate steshan aa gaya steshanamastar bhi aaye gandhiji ne unase kaha yah ladakee meri poti hai shayad abhi mujhe samajhee nahin isilie do kamare chhant lie yah dosh isaka nahin hai mera hai meri sikh men kuchh kami hai ab hamane doosara kamara khali kar diya hai jo log bahar latak rahe hain unako usamen baithaiye tabhi mera dukh kam hoga steshan mastar ne bahut samajhaya minnaten kee par ve tassemas n hue ant men steshan mastar bole main unake lie doosara dibba lagavaye deta hoon gandhiji ne kaha han doosara dibba to lagava hi dijiye magar isaka bhi upayog keejiye jis chij kee jaroorat n ho usaka upayog karana hinsa hai aap suvidhaon ka durupayog karavana chahate hain ladakee ko bigadana chahate hain bechara steshanamastar sharm se usakee gardan gad gaee use gandhiji ka kahana manana pada

us pensil ko main kaise kho sakata hoon  gandhiji madras men shree natesan ke mehaman the ek din subah vah divanakhane men baithe hue pensil se kuchh likh rahe the usi samay shree natesan ka chhota ladaka vahan aaya dekha gandhiji jis pensil se likh rahe hain vah bahut chhoti hai balsulabh utsukata se vah poochh baithaaap itani chhoti pensil se kyon likh rahe haibade aadami to badi pensil se likha karate hain gandhiji hanse aur kaha mujhe chhoti pensil se likhana achchha lagata hai lekin kya tumhare pas badi pensil hai balak bola hai kyon nahin meri pensil badi chamakeeli hai laoon yah kahakar balak bhaga huaa andar gaya aur kuchh hi der bad apani pensil lekar laut aaya bola dekhie hai n yah aapakee pensil se badi aur chamakeeli gandhiji vinod bhare svar men bole hai to lekin kya tum ise meri pensil se badaloge balak ne ek kshan socha fir kaha nahin main aapako vaise hi de doonga lekin aap ise kabhi khoiyega mat gandhiji ne uttar diyatumhari bat manjoor hai jab tak ye pensil kam degi tab tak main isase likhata rahoonga bahut din bit gaye usi varsh bambaee men kangres ka adhiveshan tha ek din kakasahab kalelakar gandhiji ke pas baithe hue the unhen kahin jana tha desk par rakhi huee sab chijen sanbhalakar rakhane lage sahasa kakasahab ne dekha ki gandhiji koee chij dhoondh rahe hain aur usake n mil pane par ve pareshan ho uthe hain unhonne poochha bapooji kya dhoondh rahe hain gandhiji ne uttar diya apani pensil dhoondh raha hoon bahut chhotisi hai kakasahab ne unaka samay bachane kee drishti se apani jeb se ek pensil nikali aur kahaaap ise le lijiye gandhiji bolenahinnahin mujhe vahi meri chhoti pensil chahie kakasahab ne poochha us pensil men esi kya visheshata hai jo aap apana samay is prakar bekar ganva rahe hain gandhiji bole tumhen nahin maloom vah chhotisi pensil mujhe madras men natesan ke chhote bachche ne di thi bade pyar se vah use le aaya tha use main kaise kho sakata hoon yah sunakar kakasahab gandhiji ke sath us pensil ko dhoondhane men lag gaye jab tak vah nahin mili gandhiji shant nahin hue vah do inch se bhi kam hi thi

to main abhi chalata hoon  un dinon kadake ka jada pad raha tha gandhiji kisi kam se dilli aaye unakee gadi subah char baje steshan par pahunchati thi shree ghanashyamadas bidala unhen lene ke lie steshan gaye vahan pahunchane par unhen pata laga ki gandhiji ek ghante bad hi ahamadabad chale jayenge unake gadi se utarate hi bidalaji ne poochhaek din thahar nahin sakate gandhiji ne kahanahin jana bahut aavashyak hai yah sunakar bidalaji nirash ho gaye gandhiji ne poochhakyon kya bat hai bidalaji ne kahaghar men koee mrityushaiya par hai vah aapake darshan karana chahati hai gandhiji ne turant kahato main abhi chalata hoon bidalaji bole samay bahut thoda hai is jade men le jakar aapako kasht nahin dena chahata un dinon khuli motaren hoti thin khoob thandi hava chal rahi thi fir bhi gandhiji nahin mane unake aagrah karane ke karan bidalaji lachar ho gaye aur unhen apane ghar le gaye vah sthan dilli se koee pandrah mil door tha gandhiji ne rogi ko dekha use santvana di aur fir dilli chhavani jakar apani gadi pakadi bidalaji chakit rah gaye itana bada vyakti unakee jarasi prarthana par kadake ke jade men itana kasht utha sakata hai par yah unakee aatmiyata hi to thi jo logon ke prati panipani kar deti thi vah bimar aur koee nahin shree ghanashyamadas bidala kee dharmapatni thin

mera puny toone le liya  noaakhali men gandhiji paidal ganvganv ghoom rahe the vah dukhiyon ke aansoo ponchhate the unamen jine kee prerana paida karate the vah unake man se dar ko nikal dena chahate the isilie us aag men svayan bhi akele hi ghoom rahe the vahan kee pagadandiyan badi sankari thi itani ki do aadami ek sath nahin chal sakate the
