iskee kod men eskee kod ko yathavat rakha gaya hai jisase angrezi aur bharatiy bhashaon ke sahastitv men koee kathinaee nahin aaegi isase angrezi men vikasit sabhi softaveyaron men isake istemal men koee kathinaee nahin aaegi

aap soch rahe honge ki jab hindi men itana suvicharit aur suchintit kod tha jo n keval hindi ko vaigyanik aadhar par sanyojit karata tha balki sabhi bharatiy lipiyon kee aadharabhoot ekata kee bhitti par bhi khada tha aur jisake karan sabhi bharatiy bhashaon kee ekata bhi ek naya takanikee aayam grahan karane ja rahi thi fir kya huaa ki isake bavajood hindi men behad arajakata kee sthiti dikhaee padati hai

is kod ke itana behatarin aur upayogi hone ke bavajood adhikatar softaveyar nirmataon ne isaka anupalan nahin kiya is bat ko zara thande dimag se samajhie yani ki man lijie  ke sthan par jise iskee kod men k ke lie niyat kiya huaa hai yadi ek softaveyar nirmata ne g rakh de aur doosara softaveyar nirmata ne isi sthan par ch rakh de to kya hoga pahale nirmata ke softaveyar men taiyar dastavez men jahanjahan g taip kiya huaa hai doosare softaveyar men kholane par vahinvahin ch dikhaee padega aur manak iskee kod ka istemal karane vale softaveyar men vahan k dikhaee dega yani betaratib arthahin aksharon ka samooh skrin par drishtigochar hoga aur mitro yahi huaa bhi hai aaj hindi men kanpyootar par aane vali mahatvapoorn kathinaiyon ka yahi karan hai intaranet eemel eevanijy aur eeshasan ke badhate ghode kee lagam hindi softaveyar nirmataon ne isi tarah thami hai inake kod vyavastha men nit nae prayogon ne bharatiy bhashaon ke upayoktaon ko behad pareshan kiya hai
saval yah hai ki in softaveyar nirmataon ne iskee kod ka istemal kyon nahin kiya kya isake pichhe iskee kod kee kuchh khamiyan thin ya ve ise aur behatar banana chahate the nahin

isake pichhe ek taraf aopareting sistam nirmataon ka hindi aur doosari bharatiy bhashaon ke prati upeksha bhav tha to doosari taraf inake bazaron ko n samajh pane kee kshamata ka abhav tha isilie unhonne iskee ko samarthan nahin diya ek aur bat iskee apane aap sidhe vindoz jaise aopareting sistam par istemal nahin kiya ja sakata isake lie ek font kod chahie jisamen hindi ke lie kam se kam  kod sthan chahie iskee ke  sthanon kee tulana men vindoz jaise aopareting sistamon ke lie iskee kod tab tak aparyapt tha jab tak ki aopareting sistam nirmata andar se ise samarthan n den

choonki iskee is samasya ke hal ke lie aparyapt tha isalie jaroori tha ki hindi softaveyar nirmata aapas men baith kar ek manak nirdharit karate aur use apanate aisa nahin huaa halanki sidek ne is samasya ke hal ke lie isfok font kod vikasit kiya aur ise manak banane kee koshish kee yadi hamane ise manak nirdharit kar apanaya hota to doosare deshon kee tarah hamari bhashaon kee kanpyootari ka jabardast vikas huaa hota durbhagy se sidek is prayas men safal nahin ho paya

manakeekaran n kie jane aur use n apanane ke pichhe hindi softaveyar nirmataon kee thodi svarthalipsa bhi thi alag font kod ke karan yadi koee sangathan ya kanpani ek bar unake softaveyar ko kharid le to hamesha unake hi softaveyar kharidane ko majaboor tha nahin to vah sangathan ya kanpani apane vibhinn kanpyootaron men taiyar hindi dastavezon ka aadanpradan nahin kar paegi yahi nahin n keval unhonne apane kod doosare font nirmataon se alag rakhe balki apane hi vibhinn utpadon ke lie bhi vibhinn kod banae taki unake ek utpad ka grahak doosare utpad ke font istemal n kar pae

inakee is svarthalipsa ke shikar hue sarakari karyalay jinamen rajabhasha niti ke chalate hindi ka prayog karana tha to doosari taraf desk top pablishar jinhen bharatiy bhashaon ke mudran ko galakat pratiyogita bhari duniya men tike rahana tha nit nae fonton ko apanate hue
is anyayapoorn loot men koee font nirmata pichhe nahin tha

is mamale men bharat sarakar bhi apani jimmevari se nahin bach sakati doosare deshon kee sarakaron kee tarah bharat sarakar ka yah kartavy tha ki vah is font kod ke manakeekaran men kendriy bhoomika nibhati aur is disha men ho rahe niji prayason kee kadi nigarani karati jaisaki doosare deshon kee sarakaron ne kiya to font kod ke karan utpann samasya paida hi nahin hoti

kanpyootar jagat kee ek pratishthit patrika pisi kvest men  men ek dilachasp vakaya chhapa koriya kee ek chhatra uchch stariy adhyayan ke lie amarika gaee vah koriya men koriyaee bhasha men kanpyootar aur intaranet ke istemal men nipun thi yahan tak ki usakee boodhi dadi bhi kanpyootar aur intaranet ka istemal kar leti thi chhatra ko to angrezi aati thi parantu usakee dadi ko nahin duniya ke anek deshon kee tarah koriya men kisi bhi softaveyar ke bikane kee buniyadi shart hoti hai ki usamen koriyaee bhasha ka intarafes ho zahir hai ki usakee dadi koriyaee intarafes ke madhyam se kanpyootar aur intaranet ka upayog karati thi jab koriyaee chhatra ne amarika se apani dadi ko eemel bhejana chaha to vaikalpik bhasha men koriyaee bhasha ke badale arabi bhasha kee maiping dekh kar usaka hath ruk gaya aur usakee dadi ka bheja eemel arabi jank kairektaron men badal chuka tha

yahan jems band shrinkhala kee film toomaro nevar daiz ka vah drishy yad karen jab jems band apani koriyaee sathi ke sath bachatabachata usake ghar pahunchata hai jo bahar se to kisi slam jaisa dikhata hai par andar se kisi jasoosi sanstha ka atyanudhik niyantran kaksha jems band jaise hi usaka kanpyootar istemal karana chahata hai keebord par keval koriyaee akshar dekh kar usaka hath ruk jata hai

is paristhiti ne softaveyar nirmataon ko sochane par mazaboor kiya ki ve vibhinn bhashaon ko ek hi vistrit kod men samahit karane ka upay khojen taki intaranet par failate eebazar ka tezi se failav ho sake intaranet kee duniya bahubhashi bane isamen bahut se logon kee apaneapane karanon se dilachaspi thi

isi ka parinam hai yoonikod kansoratiyam isamen sabhi deshon kee sarakaron ke pratinidhi shamil hain bharat ka soochana praudyogikee vibhag isaka sadasy hai is kansoratiyam ne sabhi sadasy deshon kee bhashaon ke manak kodon ko shamil kiya gaya hai isamen  bit ke bajay  bit kee storing vyavastha hai isalie isamen kul  kairektar stor kie ja sakate hain isake pahale  kairektar to angrezi ke aaskee kod ke lie niyat hain yah vishv kee sabhinaee v purani likhit bhashaon ke sabhi kairektaron ko sthan muhayya karata hai isake atirikt isamen takanikee chihn viram chihn aur kaee any kairektar bhi die gae hai yoonikod manak sabhi tarah ke upayoktaonkarobar se hon ya shiksha vyavasay se mukhy dhara kee lipiyon ka istemal karane vale hon ya alpasankhyak lipiyon kasabhi kee jarooraton ko samarthan dene ka prayatn karata hai

vishv ke sabhi deshon ke log softaveyar v hardaveyar nirmata kanpaniyan intaranet seva pradata ilektronikee se jude karobari log sabhi poori duniya men yoonikod ko samarthan de rahe hain pratidin kanpaniyan naenae yoonikod samarthit utpad lekar bazar men aa rahi hain is mamale men opan sors mukt sansadhan samuday bhi pichhe nahin hai

yoonikod men hindi aur doosari bharatiy bhashaon ko bhi sthan mila hai isake lie iskee ko aadhar banaya gaya hai jisase yoonikod men thodi bahut samasya bhi hai agar iskee  ko aadhar banaya gaya hota to ye mamooli dikkaten bhi nahin hotin khair der aayad durast aayad

vishv ke sathsath bharat men sabase jyada prachalit aopareting sistam maikrosoft kanpani ka vindoz eksapi hai yah hindi men taip karane ke upakaran to upalabdh karata hi hai isaka hindi intarafes bhi yani sari kamande roop aadi bhi hindi men upalabdh hain isaka istemal karake fail ka nam aadi bhi hindi men de sakate hain tatha vindoz ke sarch injan se hindi ke kisi shabd ke aadhar par khoj bhi kar sakate hain isaka istemal karane se angrezi vindoz eksapi par chal rahe kanpyootaron se kanektiviti kee kinchinmatr bhi samasya nahin hai

isake bad sarvadhik lokapriy hai maikrosoft aofis eksapi isaka hindi intarafes jise aofis hindi nam diya gaya hai bhi upalabdh hai jisamen vard eksel pavarapvaint aaootaluk aur ekses hindi men kamandon ke sath upalabdh hain isakee hindi bahut aasan aur sahaj hai isake vard men hindi ka vartani janchak hindi thisaras hindi shabdavali kee suvidha bhi maujood hai isake eksel men akaradikram se deta kee chhantaee karane aur soochibaddh karane aur khojane kee suvidha upalabdh hai

mukt softaveyaron men aopareting sistam linaks aur aofis soot men aopanaaofis poori tarah hindi intarafes ke sath bilkul muft men upalabdh hain yah sab hai yoonikod ka chamatkar ki usane hindi ko har jagah pahuncha diya hai bas jaroorat matr hindi ko sakriy karane kee hai

ab ek banagi vishesh karyon ke lie bane softaveyaron men hindi kee suvidha v samarthan kee niche ham un unnat kanpyootari ke utpadon ek soochi de rahe hain jo apane khas kamon ke lie poori duniya men chhae hain aur sath hi yoonikod ke raste hindi ko apana poorn samarthan pradan karate hain

aopareting sistam kanpyootar par koee bhi kary karane se pahale us par aopareting sistam hona bahut zaroori hota hai aopareting sistam hamari bhasha aur kanpyootar kee bhasha ke bich pul ka kam karate hain yadi hamara aopareting sistam yoonikod samarthak ho aur hamane usamen hindi ko sakriy kiya huaa ho to us par chal rahe kisi bhi softaveyar ke yoonikod samarthak hote hi usamen hindi samarthan svatah hi aa jata hai isake lie hamen kisi thard parti fonton kee aavashyakata nahin hoti niche kuchh yoonikodasevi aopareting sistam die gae hain

yah soochi sirf ishara bhar hai sthan ke abhav ke karan kuchh adhik lokapriy nam hi die gae hain yah soochi pratidin badhati hi ja rahi hai aisa nahin hai ki uparokt sabhi softaveyaron men poora hindi samarthan hai parantu adhikatar softaveyar hindi men kam karane kee suvidha pradan karane ke sath hi hindi ke any sanbandhit upakaran bhi upalabdh karate hain in softaveyaron men jo suvidhaen shuroo men nahin thin ve unhen apane agale sanskaranon men jodate ja rahe hain
lekin in suvidhaon ka dvar aapake lie tabhi khulata hai jab aap yoonikod apanate hain nahin to hindi kanpyootari kee duniya kee arajakata jas kee tas virajaman hai

hindi softaveyar nirmata ab apane softaveyaron men apane fonton se yoonikod men kanavarzan kee suvidha aur any softaveyaron se kanvarzan kee suvidha ka bade zor shor se ullekh karate hain inhonne pahale to apane softaveyaron men kisi manak ka anupalan n karake hindi kanpyootari ke vikas men rukavaten pahunchaeen aur ab khud ko masiha ke taur par pesh kar rahe hain aur isake lie ek bar fir in samasyaon se anajan hindi vibhagon se moti kamaee kar rahe hain

lekin kya sara kasoor inhin ka hai bharat sarakar ko any deshon kee tarah sabhi softaveyar nirmataon ko spasht nirdesh de dene chahie the ki yadi bharat men karobar karana hai to hindi men samarthan dena hi padega agar aisa huaa hota to hindi kanpyootari  sal pichhad n gaee hoti angrezi ke sath kadam mila kar nit nae anuprayog vikasit kar bharat ke lie aur jyada videshi mudra la rahi hoti sath hi yahan ke vikas karyon pariyojanaon ko badhane aur soochana praudyogikee ke labh jan sadharan tak pahunchane men bahut aage nikal gaee hoti

fir bhi in softaveyar nirmataon ka yah yogadan to hai hi ki inhonne pratikool paristhitiyon ke bavajood har nae angrezi anuprayog men hindi samarthan dene ke lie turant thard parti tool vikasit kie yadi hindi ka prabuddh varg kanpyootar par hindi men apana rozamarra ka kam karata to ye sabhi tool aur bhi jaldi vikasit ho gae hote durbhagyapoorn to yah hai ki hindi samaj sari suvidhaen hone ke bavajood apana sara kam angrezi men kar ke usaka bazar badhata hai aur hindi kee rah men rode atakata hai

hindi kanpyootari men manak sthapit karane hi honge hamen har hal men yoonikod ko apana lena chahie yah hindi kanpyootari kee duniya men ek nae yug kee shuruaat hai ab hindi kanpyootar par keval patr taip karane vali bhasha ban kar nahin rah sakati ise naee praudyogikee ke har charan men apani takat dikhani hai yadi hindi samaj pran kar le ki vah yoonikod v any tay manakon ka hi prayog karega to fir sooraj nikala hi samajho

pichhale adhyay men hamane hindi kod par vistrit charcha kee hai kod kanpyootar men soochana janakari ya aankadon ke inaput proses storej aur aaootaput ka aadhar hota hai parantu ek upayokta ke lie koding sistam se koee fark nahin padata jab tak ki vah apane dastavejon failon aadi ko ilektronik roop men vinimay n karana chahe ek upayokta ko fark padata hai fonto se halanki yoonikod aur aopanataip fonton ko apanane se in sabhi samasyaon se nijat mil jati hai fir bhi jin samasyaon ne hindi aur bharatiy bhashaee kanpyootari ko ek dashak tak sansat men rakha un par ek nazar dalana anupayukt n hoga

vindoz ke yug men pravesh karane ke sath hi is samasya kee shuruaat hoti hai usake pahale dos men kairektar koding vyavastha se ekeekrit hone ke karan samasya nahin thi lekin vindoz vatavaran ne kanpyootari men saundary bodh joda isane prakashan vyavasay kee zarooraton ke maddenazar naenae roop vale font jode angrezi men pratyek akshar kee koding aur usake pradarshit roop men ekaroopata hai isalie bhi dikkat nahin thi lekin hindi men aksharon ke pradarshit roopon men kaee tarah kee bhinnataen hainjaise matra lagane ya arddhakshar lagane ya sanyukt akshar hone par unaka roop badal jata hai

isase pahale ki ham fonton kee vyavastha par bat karen aaie thoda font ke bare men janen font kanpyootar skrin dispale bord ya skrin printar dvara chhapa kisi akshar ka pradarshit roop hota hai ek hi akshar ko mote tirachhe ya rekhankit roop men bhi pradarshit kiya jata hai aur unake likhane ke lie vibhinn shailiyan apanaee jati hain in vibhinn shailiyon ya roopon men ek glif roopakar hota hai jo us kairektar ke lie niyat kod pvaint ke sath antassanbandhit hota hai hindi aur bharatiy bhashaon men k sanyuktaksharon ke glif kh matraon ke vibhinn roopon aur chandrabindu anusvar aur nukte ke lie glif aur g ankon aur viram chihnon ke lie alag glif istemal kie jate hain in glifon ko nirdharit karate samay n keval unake tankit roopon ka dhyan rakha jata hai apitu unake vartaman aur paranparagat likhit roopon ka bhi dhyan rakha jata hai font men di gaee ukt k aur kh kee vishayavastu ko font men glif pratisthapan talika sabastityooshan tebal ka pravadhan karake upayog kiya ja sakata hai aisi talika bharatiy lipiyon ke lie aparihary hai aisi lipiyon men glif pozishaning talika nyoonatam apekshit chihnit sthiti ko hasil karane ke lie bhi di jati hai kuchh fonton ke lie ye talikaen kamobesh saman hoti hain par hamesha aisa nahin hota aur yahin se samasya paida hoti hai

font pojishaning talika men ek font ke lie koee ek tarika tay kiya jata hai kanpyootar ke kunjipatal par us akshar ke lie niyat kunji dabate hi kanpyootar kee memori men sanchit vibhinn glif jud kar dispale skrin par us akshar ko darshate hain yah poori prakriya kanpyootar kee kritrim buddhimata ke zarie badi teji se kee jati hai
yadi alagalag font nirmata ek saman kod hone par bhi yadi alagalag font pojishaning talikaen istemal karate hain to ek softaveyar men taiyar dastavez ko padhana asanbhav ho jaega

hindi aur bharatiy bhashaon men vibhinn softaveyar nirmataon ne yahi kiya bhi natija ham sabake samane hai is vishay men bharat sarakar ko koee manak nahin hai halanki sidek isfok font talika ko manak banavana chahata tha par aisa nahin ho paya natija samane hai

lekin fonton men ek samasya aur bhi hai vibhinn softaveyar nirmataon ne apane alagalag font samoohon ke lie alagalag fontakod taiyar kie jabaki kam se kam unhen apane sabhi fonton ke lie to ek hi fontakod vyavastha apanani chahie thi ek hi font nirmata ne anek font talikaon ka istemal kyon kiya

jab vindoz vatavaran ne hindi font ko apane aopareting sistam ka hissa nahin banaya to hindi premiyon ke lie kanpyootar ke badhate prayog ka matalab tha hindi ka prayog se bahar ho jana hindi premi softaveyar nirmata is sthiti ko svikar karane ko taiyar nahin the unhonne eksatendid aaskee kod parivardhit eskee kod men die gae grafik kairektaron ke sthanon par ovaralaiping karake hindi aksharon ke disple ko sanbhav banaya shuroo men unakee prathamikata thi ki kisi tarah kanpyootar skrin par hindi akshar chamakane lagen vaise bhi hindi kanpyootari ka bazar sabase pahale ditipi ne banaya ditipi ne mudran ke purane tarike men aamoolachool badalav la diya tha mudran kee gati aur gunnavatta bahut achchhi ho gaee thi isalie sabase pahale mudran softaveyaron ke lie hindi font vikasit kie gae inhen sthapit aur istemal karane ke lie kanpyootar men edob taip mainejar sthapit karana zaroori tha in fonton ko post skript fonta sankshep men pies font kahate hain

dhire dhire sarakari daftaron men kuchh hindi premi utsahi karmachariyon ne maikrosoft vard men hindi fonton kee mang kee to isane trootaip fonton ka marg prashast kiya trootaip font vindoz men jaisa dikhate the vaisa hi print men bhi dikhaee dete the lekin sarakari vatavaran dvibhashik tha hindi vibhag bhi keval hindi men kam nahin kar sakate the ek hi dastavej men hindi aur angrezi donon taip karani ho to har bar bhasha badalate samay togal kunji dabane ke sath sath font bhi silekt karana padata tha isase bachane ke lie maikrosoft vard men mekro likhe gae jisase togal kunji dabate hi skrin par svatah hi hindi ya angrezi font aa jata lekin yah hal sthayi nahin tha us softaveyar ka naya sanskaran aane par vah mekro bekar ho jata tab itane sare grahakon ke kanpyootar par jakar nae mekro likhana hindi softaveyar nirmataon ke lie bada mahanga sauda tha

hindi fonton ke sath ek samasya yah bhi thi ki apane jatil svaroop ke karan ve chhote dikhate the skrin par donon bhashaon ka taikst ek hi aakar men dikhane ke lie zaroori tha ki ham agreji ke font ka aakar yadi  chunen to hindi ke font ka aakar hamen kam se kam  aur behatar hoga ki  chunana padega kanpyootar ke font foramet ko yad rakhane ka ek dushparinam yah bhi tha ki vah hindi taip karate hue usake font ke aakar ko chhota kar angrezi font ke aakar men le jata tha ya angrezi taip karate samay usake font ko badhakar hindi ke aakar men le jata tha aise men sivay isake koee chara n tha ki samagri ko silekt kar upayukt fontaakar men kiya jae

is font ke aakar vali samasya ke nidan ke lie hindi softaveyar nirmataon ko hindi fonton ke saman aakar aur roop vale angrezi fonta banane pade ye font sidek ke utpadon men eksatenshan  ke sath dikhaee padate hain inhonne nausikhie hindi karmachariyon ko khoob chhakaya ve inaka nam dekh kar inake hindi font hone ka dhokha kha jate aur samagri taip karana shuroo kar dete skrin par ubharate jank kairektar dekh kar ve sanbhalate fir tankit samagri ko silekt kar dhoondh kar hindi font dete tab kahin ja kar hindi men dastavej apane sahi roop men dikhaee deta

isamen ek dikkat yah bhi thi ki dubara dastavej kholane par ya to poora dastavej angrezi font men badal ho jata aur hindi akshar jank kairektaron ke roop men dikhane lagate ya poora dastavej hindi font men badal jata aur angrezi akshar jank kairektaron ke roop men dikhane lagate isase kam men khasi deri hoti softaveyar samanyatah font ko svatah pahachan lete isase angrezi men jahan kam kafi aasan hota vahin hindi men kasht aur badh jata kyonki kabhi hindi taip karate samay kanpyootar svatah angrezi font dene lagata aur jank kairektar dikhane shuroo ho jate ya angrezi taip karate samay hindi font darshane lagata aur jank kairektar dikhane shuroo ho jate dastavej ko vanchhit sthiti men lane ke lie jagahjagah samagri silekt kar upayukt font dena padata

is bich maikrosoft eksel men talika banane aur detabes programon men hindi men deta bharane men yah kathinaee bhi thi ki unamen ek khane sel ya fild men ek se adhik font dene ka vikalp nahin tha aur sarakari vibhagon men yah kary keval hindi men kiya nahin ja sakata tha vaise bhi hindi men sorting indeksing aur sarching kee suvidha maujood nahin thi isalie deta proses karane ke lie angrezi men deta dena aavashyak tha ukt sabhi samasyaon ke hal ke lie dvibhashik bailingvual fonta vikasit kie gae yani ki ek hi font talika men hindi aur angrezi donon ke glif shamil kie gae

ab togal kunji dabane par font badalane kee aavashyakata nahin thi font ka aakar badalane kee aavashyakata nahin thi bas sidhe taip karane kee zaroorat thi han yadi kabhi poori samagri angrezi jank ke roop men dikhe bhi to sari samagri ko ek sath silekt kar dvibhashik font chunane se samasya khatm ho jati lekin ekabhashiy monolinguval font men tankit samagri ke sath yah suvidha nahin thi in dvibhashik fonton ne hindi jagat kee lanbe samay tak bharapoor seva kee aam karmachari ko hindi men kam karane par samany taur par koee dikkat nahin aati thi

is sthiti men parivartan tabhi aaya jab ilektronik roop men yani flopi dvara kee deta vinimay zaroorat paida huee yah sthiti aur vikaral tab bani jab intaranet aur eemel kee duniya ne dastak di yadi aapaka dastavez pane vale kanpyootar men vahi font nahin hai to vah aapaka dastavej nahin pad sakata isaka hal yah nikala ki eemel men fail ko chitr biemapi fail ke roop men bheja jae isaka parinam tha fail ka aakar badh jana yani eemel ke aadanpradan men adhik samay zaya hona intaranet par samay kee keemat thi isalie yah vikalp chhote dastavejon aur aparihary paristhitiyon men hi istemal kiya gaya isamen ek dikkat yah bhi thi ki dastavej kee samagri to chhodie usake foramet men bhi parivartan karana sanbhav nahin tha

main samajhata hoon ki siripediya ke bare men mainne jo adhyayan kiya vah kafi moolyavan hai kyonki isamen is ghonghe ke vibhinn angon kee sajatiyata ka ullekh hai mainne ghonghe ke khol banane vale angon ko khoja halanki khol banane vali granthiyon ke bare men mainne bahut badi galati kee thi aur antat mainne siddh kiya tha ki ghonghon kee kuchh naslon men sookshm naron kee vidyamanata ubhayalingiyon kee anupoorak aur un par parajivi hoti hai meri antim khoj kee poori tarah se pushti ho chukee hai halanki ek samay aisa bhi tha jab ek jarman lekhak ne is samoochi khoj ke bare men kaha tha ki yah sab meri kalpana ka vilas hai is ghonghe kee itani jyada aur alag alag prajatiyan hain ki sabhi ka vargikaran karana bahut kathin hai mera yah kam us samay mere bahut kam aaya jab mainne aorijina aofa spisheja men prakritik vargikaran par vichar vimarsh prastut kiya is sabake bavajood mujhe sandeh hai ki is kam men kya itana samay lagana thik raha

sitambar  se mainne apana sara samay apane nots ke dher ko vyavasthit karane men lagaya sath hi jiv prajatiyon kee kaya palat ke bare men bhi mainne dhyan diya aur kuchh prayog bhi kie bigal kee yatra ke dauran mainne pempiyan sanghatana ke jivashm khoje the jo is samay pae jane vale aarmadilos kee bhanti kathor khal se dhanke hote the doosari bat yah ki usi mahadvip par jaise jaise ham dakshin kee or badhe to badi hi nikat sajatiyata vale jiv ek doosare ka pratisthapan karate dikhaee die aur tisari bat yah ki dakshin amarikee lakshanon ke mutabik gelapegos dvip samooh ke adhikansh jiv jantu alag hi the yahi nahin pratyek dvip par ve apane hi samooh ke jivon se thodasa alag the jabaki inamen bhoovaigyanik drishti se koee bhi dvip bahut prachin nahin tha

yah to spasht hi ek prakar ke aur isi tarah ke any tathyon kee vyakhya keval isi pratyasha ke aadhar par kee ja sakati hai ki jiv prajatiyan dhire dhire badalati chali jati hain aur fir isi vishay ne mujhe vichalit kiya lekin sathsath yah bhi spasht tha ki pratyek prakar ka jiv apane jivan kee paristhitiyon ke prati bade hi sundar dhang se anukoolit hota hai aise asankhy mamale dikhaee denge lekin isamen paristhitiyon ya jiv kee ichchha khasakar paudhon ke bare men ka koee yogadan nahin hota hai udaharan ke lie kathafodava ya ped par chadhane vale mendhak ya kanton ya pichchhaparn kee sahayata se doordoor tak pahunchane vale bij main is prakar kee anukoolataon se hamesha hi prabhavit huaa aur mujhe lagata hai ki jab tak inakee vyakhya nahin ho jati hai apratyaksh pramanon se yah siddh karana ki jiv prajatiyon men parivartan hue hain nirarthak prayas hi kaha jaega

inglaind lautane ke bad mujhe yah laga ki bhoovigyan men leyel ke udaharan ka anusaran karane aur ghareloo ya prakritik vatavaran men jiv jantuon aur ped paudhon men badalav ke bare men jarasa bhi sambandh rakhane vale sabhi tathyon ka sangrah karane ke bad hi samooche vishay par shayad kuchh roshani pad sake meri pahali notabuk julaee  men shuroo huee mainne poori tarah se bekoniyan siddhanton par kary karana shuroo kiya aur bina kisi niyam ko apanae bade paimane par tathyon ka sangrah karata raha isamen mainne palatoo pashuon men prajanan par adhik dhyan diya isake lie mudrit poochhatachh samagri ekatr karata tha kushal prajanan karane valon aur maliyon se batachit karata aur khoob padhata tha jin kitabon ko mainne padha aur unamen se tathyon ka sangrah kiya unakee soochi aur jarnalon tatha tranjakshans kee samoochi shrrinkhala par nazar dalata hoon to apani mehanat par mujhe bhi aashchary hota hai jald hi mujhe yah aabhas ho gaya ki janavaron aur paudhon kee upayogi nasl taiyar karane men manav kee safalata kee mahattvapoorn kunji hai prajatiyon ka sahi chayan lekin prajatiyon ka yah chayan prakritik vatavaran men rahane vale jiv jantuon men kis tarah hota hoga kuchh samay tak yah tathy mere lie rahasy bana raha

mainne pandrah mahine bad aktoobar  men sootrabaddh roop se poochhatachh shuroo kee mainne manoranjan ke lie malthas likhit di populeshana  bhi padha aur jiv jantuon tatha paudhon kee aadaton par lambe samay se lagatar dhyan dete hue zinda rahane ke sangharsh kee prashansa bhi karane laga isi bich mujhe achanak khyal aaya ki in paristhitiyon men anukool vibhedon ko sanrakshit karane aur pratikool ko nasht karane kee pravritti rahati hai isake parinamasvaroop naee nasl ka janm hota hai yahan aakar mujhe ek niyam mila jisake anusar main kam kar sakata tha lekin sath hi main poorvagrahon se bachana chahata tha isalie mainne yah bhi faisala kiya ki kuchh samay tak isake bare men leshamatr bhi nahin likhoonga joon  men mainne apane siddhanton ka saransh likhane kee shurooaat kee aur lagabhag  prishth pensil se likhe aur  kee garamiyon tak mainne  prishth likh lie isake bad mainne inakee saf saf nakal taiyar kee jo abhi tak mere pas hai

lekin us samay mainne ek mahattvapoorn samasya kee anadekhi kar di thi aur yah mere lie acharaj kee bat hai kyonki kolambas aur usake ande kee kahani vali bat alag thi yahan mainne apani samasya aur usake samadhan donon kee hi anadekhi kar di thi samasya yah thi ki jaise jaise sanparivartan hota hai to ek hi vanshamool ke jivon ke lakshanon men antar aana shuroo ho jata hai ve bade hi vishal star par bantate chale gae hain yah vibhajan is riti men bhi prakat ho jata hai jisake anusar sabhi naslon ko prajatiyon prajatiyon ko parivaron parivaron ko up vibhajanon aur isi prakar aage vargikrit kar diya gaya hai main sadak par aaj bhi us sthan ko bhoola nahin hoon jahan par main apani tamatam men baitha tha aur achanak hi mujhe isaka samadhan soojh gaya yah bat daun aane ke kafi bad kee hai mere matanusar samadhan yahi hai ki prakriti kee grihasthi men sabhi pramukh aur vriddhishil naslon kee sanparivartit santatiyan anek aur atyadhik vibhedit sthanon ke anusar apane aapako dhalati jati hain

san  ke prarambh men hi leyel ne mujhe salah di ki main apane drishtikon ko vistarapoorvak likh daloon aur mainne turant hi tin ya char guna bade paimane par lekhan shuroo kar diya jo meri pustak di aorijina aofa spishej men bhi dikhaee dega to bhi jitani samagri mainne batori thi usaka saransh tha isamen aur is roop men main keval aadha kary hi prastut kar paya lekin meri yojana dhari rah gayi kyonki  kee garmiyon kee shuruaat men hi malay dvip samooh se mistar vailes ne aana di tendensi aofa vairayatija too diparta indaifinetali froma di aorijanala taipa vishay par ek nibandh bheja is nibandh men vahi siddhant the jinakee mainne rooparekha banayi thi mistar vailes ne likha tha ki yadi main unake nibandh ko sahi samajhoon to leyel ke avalokan hetu bhijava doon

mainne jarnala aofa di prosidingsa aofa di linneyana sosayati  prishth  par un paristhitiyon ka jikr kiya hai jinake karan mainne leyel aur hookar ke is anurodh ko mana tha ki main apane sansmaran vrittant ko  sitambar  ko esa gre ke patr sahit bhejoon aur ve bhi vailes ke nibandh ke sath hi chhapen pahale to main sahamati dene ka ichchhuk hi nahin tha mujhe lag raha tha ki mistar vailes mere is kam ko anyayapoorn manenge kyonki main nahin janata tha ki unakee manovritti kitani udar aur dayalutapoorn hai mere sansmaran vrittant aur esa gre ko likha patr donon hi ko chhapavane ka abhipray to tha hi nahin aur ye bahut bekar dhang se likhe hue bhi the doosari or mistar vailes ka nibandh behatarin abhivyakti aur spashtata ke sath likha huaa tha isake bavajood hamare sanyukt prakashan ne bahut kam logon ka dhyan aakarshit kiya isake bare men dabalin ke profesar hotan ne hi ekamatr samiksha prakashit karayi thi aur kul milakar unaka faisala yahi tha ki un aalekhon men jo kuchh naya tha vah asaty tha aur jo kuchh saty tha vah purana tha isase yahi siddh hota hai ki kisi bhi nae drishtikon kee vyakhya kafi vishad honi chahie taki us par logon ka dhyan bhi jae

leyel aur hookar ke kafi kahane par sitambar  men mainne jiv prajatiyon men tattv parivartan par ek pustak likhane kee taiyari kee lekin sehat ne bich bich men dhokha diya is karan mujhe moor park sthit doktar len ke sundar jal chikitsa kendr men bhi jana pada mainne apane vrittant ko  men bade paimane par shuroo kiya tha aur apani pustak ko kuchh chhota aakar dete hue poora kar liya isamen mujhe terah mahine aur das din mehanat karani padi navambar  men isaka prakashan di aorijana aofa spisheja ke nam se huaa yadyapi bad ke sanskaranon men isamen kafi kuchh judata gaya aur sanshodhan bhi hue lekin pustak ka moolaroop barakarar raha

nisandeh yah mere jivan ka pramukh kary raha yah pustak prarambh se hi safal rahi pahale sanskaran men chhapi sabhi  pratiyan pahale hi din bik gayin isake bad jald hi doosare sanskaran kee  pratiyan bhi bik gayin ab tak  tak inglaind men isakee solah hajar pratiyan bik chukee hain aur pustak kee jatilata ko dekhate hue yah sankhya kafi badi hai isaka anuvad yoorop kee lagabhag sabhi jubanon men huaa aur spainish bohemiyan polish tatha roosi bhashaon men bhi yah pustak chhapi mis bard ka kahana tha ki isaka anuvad japani men huaa aur vahan bhi kafi padhi gayi yahi nahin hibroo bhasha men bhi ek nibandh prakashit huaa jisamen yah kaha gaya tha ki yah siddhant to old testament men bhi hai isakee samiksha bhi jam kar huee aisa mujhe isalie maloom hai ki di aorijina aur meri any kitabon ke bare men jo samikshaen prakashit hoti thin unako main ekatr kar leta tha kul samikshaon kee sankhya akhabaron men chhapi samikshaen shamil nahin  thi bad men mainne yah kam chhod diya kyonki isaka koee upayog lag nahin raha tha is vishay par alag se anek nibandh aur pustaken bhi chhapin aur jarmani men prativarsh ya har doosare varsh darvinavada par pustak ya granthasoochi prakashit hoti thi

mera vichar hai ki di aorijana kee safalata ka shrey kafi had tak do sankshipt rooparekhaon ko jata hai jo mainne kafi pahale likhin thi aur usake bad kafi badi taiyari ke sath likhi pandulipi ko jata hai jo apane aap men saransh thi in upayon se main adhik prabal tathyon aur nishkarshon ka chayan karane layak bana vigat kaee varsh tak mainne ek svarnim niyam apanae rakha vah yah ki jab bhi main apana koee tathy prakashit karata aur jaise hi koee aisa vichar mere man men aata jo us samany parinam ka virodhi hota to main bila naga fauran hi use yadadasht ke lie likh leta tha kyonki apane anubhav se mainne jana tha ki virodhi tathy aur vichar yadadasht men se jaldi nikal jate hain is aadat ke chalate mere drishtikonon ke virodh men bahut kam aapattiyan huee jin par mainne dhyan n diya ho ya jinaka uttar n diya ho

kaee bar yah kaha jata hai ki di aorijina kee safalata se yah siddh ho jata hai ki is vishay par kafi kanafoosi huee ya logon ka man isake lie taiyar kiya gaya tha lekin main ise poorn saty nahin manata kyonki mainne kisi bhi mauke par ek bhi prakritivadi ko isakee bhanak nahin lagane di aur kisi aise vyakti se meri bhent bhi nahin huee jo naslon ke sthayitv ke bare men tanik bhi sandeh karata raha ho yahan tak ki leyel aur hookar jo bade manoyog se meri baten sunate the bhi sahamat pratit nahin hue mainne ekadh bar kuchh layak logon ko yah vyakhya batane ka prayas bhi kiya ki prakritik chayan se mera aashay kya hai lekin main asafal hi raha han main jo poorn saty manata hoon vah yah tha ki sabhi prakritivadiyon ke man men suvicharit tathyon kee bharamar thi aur jaise hi unhen paryapt vyakhya ke sath niyam mila to unake asankhy vicharon ko ek disha mil gayi is pustak kee safalata ka ek any tattv bhi tha isaka samany aakar aur main isaka shrey deta hoon doktar vailes ke nibandh ko yadi mainne pustak ka aakar vahi rakha hota jis par mainne  men likhana shuroo kiya tha to yah aorijina jitani badi hoti aur bahut kam logon men ise poora padhane ka dhiraj hota

meri ek kitab kee rooparekha  se hi chal rahi thi lekin isaka prakashan  men ho paya is deri se mujhe bhi fayada hi huaa kyonki itane samay men siddhant aur bhi spasht ho gaya isase mujhe kuchh nahin khona pada balki isamen kuchh logon ne mere ya vailes ke siddhanton men moolaroop se yogadan hi diya vailes ke nibandh ne to mujhe is siddhant ko apanane karane men bhi madad kee mainne keval ek hi mahattvapoorn tathy ke bare men poorvanuman lagaya tha jisake lie mera antarman mujhe dhikkarata bhi raha vah tathy tha dooravarti parvat shikharon aur aarkatik pradeshon men ek hi nasl ke paudhon aur kuchh pashuon kee maujoodagi himanadkal ke karan hai is drishtikon ne mujhe itana prabhavit kiya ki mainne is par vistarapoorvak likha mujhe yakeen hai ki is vishay par ee forbs ke prasiddh sansmaran prakashit hone se kafi pahale hi hookar mera lekh padh chuke the main kuchh muddon par asahamat tha lekin mujhe lagata hai ki main sahi tha beshak mainne mudrit roop men yah ishara kabhi nahin kiya ki mainne is drishtikon ko svatatr roop se poshit kiya tha

duniya men kuchh naslen aisi hain jinake vayaskon aur unhin ke bhroonon men kafi antar hota hai aur ek hi varg ke alag alag pashuon ke bhroonon men kafi samanata rahati hai is spashtikaran ne mujhe itana santosh diya jitana any kisi tathy ne nahin diya tha us samay main da orijina par kam kar raha tha jahan tak main samajhata hoon da orijina kee kisi bhi samiksha men is tathy par dhyan nahin diya gaya tha mainne esa gre ko likhe patr men is bare men hairani bhi jahir kee thi kuchh hi varsh men vibhinn samikshakon ne isaka poora shrey fitj myooler aur hekel ko diya nisandeh yahi kary un donon ne meri tulana men adhik vyapak aur sahi roop men kiya tha is bare men poora adhyay likhane ke layak samagri mere pas thi aur mainne vicharon ko thoda aur vistar diya hota to behatar rahata lekin yah to spasht tha ki main apane pathak ko prabhavit karane men asafal raha aur jo aisa karane men safal huaa mere matanusar nishchay hi shrey pane ka hakadar hai

main yahan yah bhi kahana chahoonga ki mere samikshakon ne mere kary ko eemanadari se se jancha parakha inamen ve pathak shamil nahin hain jinhen vaigyanik gyan nahin tha mere vicharon ko bahudha poori tarah se galat tarike se pesh kiya gaya bade hi tivr virodh hue aur mazak tak udaya gaya lekin main samajhata hoon ki yah samanyataya sadbhavana se kiya gaya kul milakar mujhe isamen sandeh nahin ki mere karyon kee to kaee bar zaroorat se jyada tarif huee mujhe is bat kee bahut khushi hai ki main kabhi vivadon men nahin pada aur isaka shrey leyel ko jata hai jisane mere bhoovaigyanik lekhan ke bare men mujhe sakht hidayat di thi ki kabhi vivadon men mat pado isase labh to kuchh hota nahin ulte samay aur svabhav donon bigadate hain

jab kabhi bhi mujhe laga ki mainne galati kee ya mera kam doshapoorn raha aur jab bhi bade hi anadarapoorvak meri aalochana huee ya jab kabhi atyadhik tarif ke vashibhoot huaa to main apane aap se barbar yahi kah kar khud ko tasalli deta ki main jitani mehanat kar sakata tha mainne kee jitani shuddhata la sakata tha laya aur doosara koee bhi isase behatar nahin kar sakata mujhe yad hai jab gud sakses be men tiyera del fyoogo men jab main soch raha tha mujhe yad hai ki isake bare men ghar par khat bhi bheja tha ki prakritik vigyan men thodasa yogadan karane se badh kar mere jivan ka doosara upayog kya ho sakata tha mainne apani liyakat ke mutabik sarvashreshth kiya aalochak jo chahen kahate rahen lekin ve is dridh vishvas ko nasht nahin kar sakate

san  ke aakhiri do mahinon men di orijin ke doosare sanskaran kee taiyari kar raha tha aur sath hi prapt hue khaton ke vishal dher se bhi nipat raha tha pahali janavari  ko main apane aalekhon ko vyavasthit karake ghareloo vatavaran men pashuon aur paudhon men badalav ke bare men verieshanasa aofa enimalsa enda plantasa andara domestikeshan shirshak se lekhan kee taiyar kar raha tha lekin yah kam  kee shurooaat men hi prakashit ho paya is deri ka kuchh karan meri bar bar kee bimari rahi ek bar to main poore sat mahine bimar raha isaka kuchh karan yah bhi raha ki mujhe us samay kuchh any vishayon men ruchi huee aur main unhin par kuchh likhane aur prakashit karane ko lalayit ho utha

san  men  maee ko shatavari men nishechan prakriya ke bare men meri chhoti si pustak prakashit huee jisaka shirshak tha  fartilaijeshana aofa aarchida  is pustak men meri das mah kee mehanat lagi thi isake adhikansh tathyon ka sangrah vigat kaee baras men huaa tha san  men grishmaritu ke dauran aur pichhali garmiyon men mainne keet patangon dvara foolon ke sankar paragan par dhyan diya tha isase mainne to yahi natija nikala tha ki is prakar ka paragan vishisht prakaron ko sthayi banaye rakhane men mahattvapoorn bhoomika nibhata hai isake bad pratyek grishm ritu men main kamobesh isi kam par laga raha yahi nahin rabart braun kee salah par mainne si ke sprengel kee utkrisht pustak dasa entadekte gehimnisa dera nechura mangava kara padhi is pustak ko padh kar main apane is kam men dooni lagan se jut gaya san  se pahale mainne kuchh varsh tak apane is british aarchid ke paragan ka adhyayan kiya tha isase mujhe laga ki main paudhon ke samoohon par behatar se behatar lekh taiyar karoon bajaye isake ki any paudhon ke bare men dhiredhire tathy bator kar unake dher ka prayog karoon

mera sankalp buddhimanipoorn siddh huaa kyonki meri pustak prakashit hone ke bad se sabhi prakar ke foolon men paragan vidhi ke bare men lekhon aur shodh prabandhon ka tantasa lag gaya yah manana padega ki ye sabhi mere kary kee tulana men kafi behatar the bechare spengel ka jo kam kafi samay tak benami ke gart men pada tha usakee mrityu ke kaee varsh bad achanak hi sarvamany ho gaya

isi baras mainne di jarnala aofa di linneyana sosayati men ek aalekh prakashit karaya jisaka shirshak tha aana di too farmsa aofa dayamorfika kandishana aofa di primula  isake bad aagami panch varsh men ubhayaroopi aur triroopi paudhon par panch any aalekh prakashit hue in paudhon kee sanrachana ka aashay niroopit karane men mujhe jitana santosh mila poore jivan men kisi vaigyanik kary se nahin mila
