charli ne adhikansh mook filmen banayi aur jivan bhar bezuban traimp ke charitr ko sakar karate rahe lekin is traimp ne apani mook vani se duniya bhar ke karodon logon se barason baras sanvad banaye rakha aur n keval apane man kee bat un tak pahunchayi balki logon kee jivan shaili bhi badali charli ne blaik end vhait filmen banayin lekin unhonne sabakee zindagi men itane rang bhare ki yakeen nahin hota ki ek akela vyakti aise kar sakata hai lekin charli ne ye kam kiya aur bakhoobi kiya

donon vishv yuddhon ke dauran jab charon taraf bhishan mar kat machi huee thi aur door door tak koee bhi aisa vyakti nahin tha n neta n raja n pir n fakeer jo lakhon ghayalon ke jakhmon par maraham lagata ya jinake bete behatar jivan ke nam par insaniyat ke nam par yuddh kee aag men jhonk diye gaye the unake parivaron ko dilasa de pata aise vakt men hamare samane ek chhote se kad ka aadami aata hai jisake chehare par gazab kee masoomiyat hai aankhon men hairani hai jisake apane sine men jalan aur aankhon men toofan hai aur vah sabake honthon par muskan lane ka kam karata hai is aadami ke vyaktitv ke kaee pahalu hain vah ghumakkad mast maula hai bhala aadami hai kavi hai svapnajivi hai akela jiv hai hamesha romans aur romanch kee ummiden lagaye rahata hai vah tumhen is bat kee yakeen dila dega ki vah vaigyanik hai sangitagy hai dyook hai polo khiladi hai alabatta vah sadak par se sigareten utha kar pine vale aur kisi bachche se usakee tofi chhin lene vale se jyada kuchh nahin aur han yadi mauka aaye to vah kisi bhali aurat ko usake pichhavade lat bhi jama sakata hai lekin beintaha gusse men hi vah yah kam apane akele ke balaboote par karata hai vah sabako hansata hai aur rulata bhi hai ham hanse kaee bar dil khol kar aur ham roye asali aansuon ke sath  aapake aansuon ke sath kyonki aap hi ne hamen aansuon ka keemati upahar diya hai

charli jiniyas the sahi mayane men jiniyas jiniyas shabd ko tabhi usaka sahi arth milata hai jab ise kisi aise vyakti ke sath joda jata hai jo n keval utkrisht komediyan hai balki ek lekhak sangitakar nirmata hai aur sabase badi bat us vyakti men ooshma udarata aur mahanata hai aap men ye sare gun vas karate hain aur isase badi bat ki aap men vah sadagi hai jisase aapaka kad aur ooncha hota hai aur ek garamahat bhari sahaj apil ke darshan hote hain jisamen n to koee hisabi gannana hoti hai aur n hi koee prayas hi aap isake lie karate hain aur inase aap sidhe insan ke dil men pravesh karate hain insan jo aap hi kee tarah musibaton ka mara hai

lekin charli ko ye bana dharan karane men karodon logon ke chehare par hansi lane ke lie bahut papad belane pade bhayankar hatashaon ke akelepan ke daur unake jivan men aaye parivarik aur rajanaitik morchon par ek ke bad ek musibat unake samane aayin lekin charli kabhi dige nahin unhen apane aap par vishvas tha apani kala kee eemanadari apani abhivyakti kee sachchaee par vishvas tha aur sabase badi bat unakee niyat saf thi aur ve apane aap par bharosa karate the

unaka poora jivan utarchadhavon se bhara raha badakismati ek ke bad ek apani potaliyan khol kar unake imtihan leti rahi jab ve barah baras ke hi the to unake pita kee mrityu ho gayi thi matr saintis baras kee umr men bahut adhik sharab pine ke karan halanki ve likhate hain ki main pita ko bahut hi kam janata tha aur mujhe is bat kee bilkul bhi yad nahin thi ki ve kabhi hamare sath rahe hon unake pita aur man men nahin banati thi isalie charli ne apana bachapan man kee chhatr chhaya men hi bitaya charli ke mata pita donon hi manch ke kalakar the lekin ye usakee man kee aavaj ke kharab hote chale jane ke karan hi tha ki mujhe panch baras kee umr men pahali bar stej par utarana pada us rat main apani zindagi men pahali bar stej par utara tha aur man aakhiri bar ve apani pahali manch prastuti se hi sabake chahete ban gaye aur fir unhonne pichhe mud kar nahin dekha abhi mainne aadha hi git gaya tha ki stej par sikkon kee barasat hone lagi mainne tatkal ghoshana kar di ki main pahale paise batoroonga aur usake bad hi gana gaoonga is bat par aur adhik thahake lage stej mainejar ek rumal le kar stej par aaya aur sikke batorane men meri madad karane laga mujhe laga ki vo sikke apane pas rakhana chahata hai mainne ye bat darshakon tak pahuncha di to thahakon ka jo daura pada vo thamane ka nam hi n le khas taur par tab jab vah rumal liyeliye vings men jane laga aur main chintatur usake pichhepichhe lapaka jab tak usane sikkon kee vo potali meri man ko nahin thama di main stej par vapis gane ke lie nahin aaya ab main bilkul sahaj tha main darshakon se baten karata raha main nacha aur mainne tarahtarah kee nakal karake dikhayi mainne man ke aayarish march thim kee bhi nakal karake batayi

charli ka bachapan behad garibi men guzara ve log jo ravivar kee sham ghar par dinar ke lie nahin baith pate the unhen bhikhamange varg ka mana jata tha aur ham usi varg men aate the pita ke marane aur man ke pagal ho jane aur koee sthayi aadhar n hone ke karan charli ko poora bachapan abhavon men guzarana pada aur yatim khanon men rahana pada hamara vakt kharab chal raha tha aur ham giraja gharon kee khairat par pal rahe the man pagal khane men aur bhaee sidani apani naukari par jahaj men charli ko dar rahata ki kahin use fir se yatim khane n bhej diya jaye vah sara sara din makan malakin kee nigahon se bachane ke lie sadakon par mare mare firate main laimbeth vok par aur doosari sadakon par bhookhapyasa kek kee dukanon kee khidakiyan men jhankata chalata raha aur gay aur sooar ke mans ke garamagaram svadisht lajij pakavanon ko aur shorabe men doobe gulabi lal aaluon ko dekhdekh kar mere munh men pani aata raha

charli ko chalana aur bolana sikhane se pahale pahale gana aur nachana sikhaya gaya tha aur yahi vazah rahi ki ve panch baras men manch par utar gaye the aur isase bhi badi bat ki sat baras kee umr men ve nrity ke laisan diya karate the aur is tarah se hone vali kamaee se ghar chalane men man ka hath bantate the beshak ham samaj ke jis nimnatar star ke jivan men rahane ko mazaboor the vahan ye sahaj svabhavik tha ki ham apani bhashashaili ke star ke prati laparavah hote chale jate lekin man hamesha apane parivesh se bahar hi khadi hamen samajhati aur hamare bat karane ke dhang uchcharan par dhyan deti rahati hamara vyakaran sudharati rahati aur hamen yah mahasoos karati rahati ki ham khas hain

charli kee skooli padhaee aadhi adhoori rahi dekha jaye to ve aupacharik roop se do baras hi skool ja paye aur bakee padhaee anath aashramon ke skoolon men ya ingalaind ke pradeshon men natak mandali ke sath sho karate hue ek ek hafte ke lie alag alag shaharon ke skoolon men karate rahe charli ne niyamit roop se aath baras kee umr men hi et lankashayar laids mandali men bal kalakar ke roop men kam karana shuroo kar diya tha aur barah baras kee umr tak aate aate ve ingalaind ke sarvadhik charchit bal kalakar ban chuke the aur jivan kee asali pathashala men apani padhaee kar rahe the fir bhi skooli padhaee ne unhen jo kuchh sikhaya usake bare men ve likhate hain kash kisi ne karobari dimag istemal kiya hota pratyek adhyayan kee uttejanapoorn prastavana padhi hoti jisane mera dimag jhakajhora hota tathyon ke bajaye mujh men ruchi paida kee hoti ankon kee kalabaji se mujhe aanandit kiya hota nakshon ke prati romanch paida kiya hota itihas ke bare men meri drishtikon vikasit kiya hota mujhe kavita kee lay aur dhun ko bhitar utarane ke mauke diye hote to main bhi aaj vidvan ban sakata tha

matr aath baras kee umr men unhen jin sankaton ka samana karana pada usase koee bhi doosara bachcha bilkul toot hi jata charli kam dhandhe kee talash men galiyon men mare mare firate us vakt main aath baras ka bhi nahin huaa tha lekin ve din meri zindagi ke sabase lambe aur udasi bhare din the

aise men bhi charli ne kabhi himmat nahin hari kyonki lakshy unake samane tha ki unhen jo bhi karana hai thiyetar men hi karana hai unhonne bisiyon dhandhe kiye mujhamen dhandha karane kee jabaradast samajh thi main hamesha karobar karane kee nayinayi yojanaen banane men ulajha rahata main khali dukanon kee taraf dekhata sochata inamen paisa pitane ka kaun sa dhandha kiya ja sakata hai ye sochana machhali bechane chips bechane se le kar pansari kee dukan kholane tak hota hamesha jo bhi yojana banati usame khana zaroor hota mujhe bas poonji kee hi zaroorat hoti lekin poonji hi kee samasya thi ki kahan se aaye aakhir mainne man se kaha ki vah mera skool chhudava de aur kam talashane de

mainne bahut dhandhe kiye mainne akhabar beche printar ka kam kiya khilaune banae glas bloar ka kam kiya doktar ke yahan kam kiya lekin in tarahtarah ke dhandhon ko karate hue mainne sidani kee tarah is lakshy se kabhi bhi nigah nahin hatayi ki mujhe antat abhineta banana hai isalie alagalag kamon ke bich apane joote chamakata apane kapadon par brash ferata saf kolar lagata aur straind ke pas bed ford strit men blaik mor thietar ejensi men bichbich men chakkar katata main tab tak vahan chakkar lagata raha jab tak mere kapadon kee halat ne mujhe vahan aur jane se bilakul hi rok nahin diya

charli chaiplin ne bachapan men naee kee dukan par bhi kam kiya tha lekin is aatm katha men unhonne isaka koee zikr nahin kiya hai is kam ka unhen ye fayada huaa ki ve apani mahan film d gret thidaktetar men yahoodi naee ka charitr bakhoobi nibha sake

jab unhen pahali bar natak men kam karane ke lie vidhivat kam mila to ve jaise sataven aasaman par the main khushi ke mare pagal hota huaa bas men ghar pahuncha aur dil kee gaharaiyon se yah mahasoos karane laga ki mere sath kya ho gaya hai mainne achanak hi garibi kee apani zindagi pichhe chhod di thi aur apana bahut purana sapana poora karane ja raha tha ye sapana jisake bare men aksar man ne baten kee thin aur use main poora karane ja raha tha ab main abhineta hone ja raha tha main apani bhoomika ke pannon ko sahalata raha is par naya khakee lifafa tha yah meri ab tak kee zindagi ka sabase mahattvapoorn dastavej tha bas kee yatra ke dauran mainne mahasoos kiya ki mainne ek bahut bada kila fatah kar liya hai ab main jhopad patti men rahane vala namaloom sa chhokara nahin tha ab main thietar ka ek khas aadami hone ja raha tha mera man kiya ki main ro padoon

aur is bhoomika ke lie unhonne khoob mehanat kee aur apane charitr ke sath poori tarah se nyay kiya ve lagatar darshakon ke chahete banate gaye ek mazedar bat ye huee ki ve apani zindagi ka pahala karar karane ja rahe the lekin unhen lag raha tha ki jitana mil raha hai ve usase jyada ke hakadar hain aur vahan ve apani vyavasayik baniya buddhi ka ek namoona dikha hi aaye the halanki yah rashi mere lie chhappar fad lotari khulane jaisi thi fir bhi mainne yah bat apane chehare par nahin jhalakane di mainne nimrata se kaha sharton ke bare men main apane bhaee se salah lena chahoonga

unnis baras kee umr tak aate aate ve ingalish thiyetar men apani jagah bana chuke the lekin apane aapako akela mahasoos karate ve barason se akele hi rahate aaye the pyar ne unakee zidangi men bahut der se dastak di thi lekin ve apani akad ke chalate vahan bhi apane patte fenk aaye the halanki apane pahale pyar ko ve lambe arase tak bhula nahin paye solah baras kee umr men romans ke bare men mere khyalon ko prerana di thi ek thiyetar ke postar ne jisamen khadi chattan par khadi ek ladakee ke bal hava men ude ja rahe the main kalpana karata ki main usake sath golf khel raha hoon

yahi mere lie romans tha lekin kam umr ka pyar to kuchh aur hi hota hai ek nazar milane par shuruaat men kuchh shabdon ka aadan pradan aam taur par gadahapachisi ke shabd kuchh hi minaton ke bhitar poori jindagi ka nazariya hi badal jata hai poori kayanat hamare sath sahanubhooti men khadi ho jati hai aur achanak hamare samane chhupi huee khushiyon ka khazana khol deti hai

main unnis baras ka hone ko aaya tha aur karno kampani ka safal kamediyan tha lekin kuchh tha jisakee anupasthiti khatak rahi thi vasant aa kar ja chuka tha aur garmiyan apane poore khalipan ke sath mujh par havi thin meri dinacharya basipan liye hue thi aur mera parivesh shushk main apane bhavishy men kuchh bhi nahin dekh pata tha vahan sirf anamanapan sab kuchh udasinata liye hue aur charon taraf aadami hi aadami sirf pet bharane kee khatir kam dhandhe se jude rahana hi kafi nahin lag raha tha zindagi naukar sarikhi ho rahi thi aur usamen kisi kism kee bandh lene vali bat nahin thi

main buddhoopane aur atinatakeeyata ka pujari tha svapnajivi bhi aur udas bhi main zindagi se khafa bhi rahata tha aur use pyar bhi karata tha kala shabd kabhi bhi mere bheje men ya meri shabd sampada men nahin ghusa thiyetar mere lie roziroti ka sadhan tha isase jyada kuchh nahin

main akela hota chala gaya apane aap se asantusht main ravivaron ko akela bhatakata ghoomata rahata parkon men baj rahe baindon ko sun ka dil bahalata n to main apani khud kee kampani jhel pata tha aur n hi kisi aur kee hi aur tabhi ek khas bat ho gayi  mujhe pyar ho gaya mujhe achanak do badibadi bhoori shararat se chamakati aankhon ne jaise bandh liya ye aankhen ek dubale hirani jaise sanche men dhale chehare par tangi huee thin aur bandh lene vala usaka bhara poora chehara khoobasoorat dant ye sab dekhane ka asar bijali jaisa tha lekin haitti ko ji jan se chahane ke bavajood unhonne apani chauthi mulakat men hi usake kharab mood ko dekh kar faisala kar liya ki vah unase pyar nahin karati aur sanbandh tod baithe mera khyal yahi hai ki ham vida ho jayen aur fir kabhi dobara ek dooje se n milen mainne kaha aur sochata raha ki usakee pratikriya kya hogi

lekin ab kya ho sakata tha mainne kya kar dala tha kya mainne bahut jaldibaji kee mujhe use chunauti nahin deni chahiye thi main bhi nira gavadi hoon ki usase dobara milane ke sare raste hi band kar diye lekin kismat unhen doosare daravaje se dastak de rahi thi sanbhavanaon ne naye daravaje khul rahe the amerika men sanbhavanaon ka annat aakash tha mujhe amerika jane ke lie isi tarah ke kisi mauke kee jaroorat thi ingalaind men mujhe lag raha tha ki main apani sanbhavanaon ke shikhar par pahunch chuka hoon aur isake alava vahan par mere avasar ab bandhe bandhaye rah gaye the aadhiadhoori padhaee ke chalate agar main myoojik hol ke kamediyan ke roop men fel ho jata to mere pas majadoori ke kam karane ke bhi bahut hi simit aasar hote

unake jivan ka sabase sukhad pahalu agar amerika jana tha aur vahan chalis baras tak rah kar natak filmon aur manoranjan ke sarvadhik safal vyaktitv ke roop men poori duniya ke logon ke dil par raj karana tha to vahan se jana bhi unake lie sabase dukhad ghatana ban kar aayi ve khuli anant aakash kee khuli hava kee talash men amerika gaye the aur aakhir khuli hava kee talash men mazaboor ho kar vahan se kooch karana pada aur umr ke chhathe dashak men svitazaralaind ko apana ghar banana pada

charli poori duniya ke chahete the ve shayad akele aise shakhs rahe honge jinake dost har desh men har fild men aur har umr ke the ve amooman har desh ke rajyadhyaksha rashtrapati pradhan mantree se mitrata ke star par milate the ve unakee filmen dikhaye jane ka aagrah karate unhen rajakeey samman dete unake ghar par aate aur unake sath khana khate ve gandhi ji se bhi mile the aur neharoo ji se bhi gandhi ji se ve bahut prabhavit hue the unhonne barnard sho ke ghar par kaee bar khana khaya tha aur aainstin kaee bar charli ke ghar aa chuke the jivan ke har kshetr ke log unake mitr the main doston ko vaise hi pasand karata hoon jaise sangit ko pasand karata hoon shayad mujhe kabhi bhi bahut jyada doston kee zaroorat nahin rahi  aadami jab kisi oonchi jagah par pahunch jata hai to dost chunane men koee vivek kam nahin karata alabatta ve manate the ki zaroorat ke vakt kisi dost kee madad karana aasan hota hai lekin aap hamesha itane khushanasib nahin hote ki use apana samay de payen

charli ne ikatarafa prem bahut kiye vaise dekha jaye to haitti ke sath unaka pahala pyar bhi ikatarafa hi tha aur shayad yahi vajah rahi ki ve unatis baras kee umr tak akele hi rahe mera akelapan kunthit karane vala tha kyonki main dosti karane kee sari zarooraten poori karata tha main yuva tha amir tha aur badi hasti tha isake bavazood main nyoo yark men akela aur pareshan hal ghoom raha tha

halanki charli ne char shadiyan keen lekin pahali tin shadiyon se unhen bahut takalif pahunchi pahali shadi karane jate samay to ve samajh hi nahin pa rahe the ki ve ye shadi kar hi kyon rahe hain doosari shadi ne unhen itani takalif pahunchayi ki is aatm katha men apani doosari patni ka nam tak nahin bataya hai alabatta oona o nil se unakee chauthi shadi sarvadhik safal rahi halanki donon kee umr men  baras ka fark tha aur oona unakee chhattis baras tak yani aajivan unakee patni rahin ve apane jivan ke antim  baras usi kee vajah se achchhi tarah se guzar sake pichhale bis baras se main janata hoon ki khushi kya hoti hai main kismat ka dhani raha ki mujhe itani shanadar bivi mili kash main is bare men aur jyada likh pata lekin isase pyar juda huaa hai aur parafaikt pyar sari kunthaon se jyada sundar hota hai kyonki ise jitana jyada abhivyakt kiya jaye usase adhik hi hota hai main oona ke sath rahata hoon aur usake charitr kee gaharaee aur saundary mere samane hamesha naye naye roopon men aate rahate hain

halanki charli ne apani aatm katha men pola negari se apani abhinn mitrata ka hi zikr kiya hai tathy batate hain ki negari se unakee pandrah din ke bhitar hi do bar sagaee huee thi aur tooti thi charli ne apani aatm katha men apani sabhi santanon ka bhi ullekh nahin kiya hai isakee vajah ye bhi ho sakati hai ki ye aatm katha  men likhi gayi thi jab ve  baras ke the aur oona ne kul mila kar unhen aath santanon ka upahar diya tha aur unakee aathavin santan tab huee thi jab charli  baras ke the aur oona  baras kee

alabatta apani aatm katha men charli ne apane saiks sanbandhon ke bare men kafi khul kar charcha kee hai har doosare vyakti kee tarah mere jivan men bhi saiks ke daur aatejate rahe lekin unaka manana hai mere khyal se to saiks se charitr ko samajhane men ya use samane lane men shayad hi koee madad milati ho aur ki thand bhookh aur garibi kee sharm se vyakti ke manovigyan par kahin adhik asar pad sakata hai jo paristhitiyan aapako saiks kee taraf le jati hain ve mujhe jyada romanchak lagati hain

charli amerika gaye to thiyetar karane the lekin unake bhagy men aur bade paimane par duniya ka manoranjan karana likha tha amerika men aur bhi kaee sanbhavanaen thin main thietar kee duniya se kyoon chipaka rahoon main kala ko samarpit to tha nahin koee doosara dhandha kar leta mainne amerika men tikane kee than li thi shuroo shuroo men unhen apane pair jamane men aur apane man kee karane men takalif huee lekin ek bar traimp ka bana dharan karane lene ke bad unhonne fir pichhe mud kar nahin dekha mera charitr thoda alag tha aur amerikee janata ke lie anajana bhi yahan tak ki main bhi usase kahan parichit tha lekin ve kapade pahan lene ke bad main yahi mahasoos karata tha ki main ek vastavikata hoon ek jivit vyakti hoon daraasal jab main ve kapade pahan leta aur traimp ka bana dharan kar leta to mujhe tarah tarah ke mazakiya khyal aane lagate jinake bare men main kabhi soch bhi nahin sakata tha choonki mere kapade mere charitr se mel kha rahe the mainne tabhi aur usi vakt hi tay kar liya ki bhale hi kuchh bhi ho jaye main apane isi dhab ko banaye rakhoonga

ve jaldi hi apani mehanat aur hunar ke bal par aisi sthiti men aa gaye ki manamani keemat vasool kar saken ve aol in van the lekhak sangitakar abhineta nirdeshak sanpadak nirmata aur bad men to vitarak bhi jald hi unakee tooti bolane lagi lekin ek mazedar bat thi unake vyaktitv men kisi bhi film ke pradarshan se pahale ve behad narvas ho jate unakee raton kee nind ud jati pahale sho men ve thiyetar ke andar bahar hote rahate lekin aashchary kee bat ki sab kuchh thik ho jata aur har film pahale kee filmon kee tulana men aur safal hoti

har film ke sath charli kee prasiddhi ka graf oopar uthata ja raha tha aur sath hi unakee keemat bhi badhati ja rahi thi ve manamane dam vasool karane kee haisiyat rakhate the aur kar bhi rahe the nyoo yark men mere charitra kailektar ke khilaune aur moortiyan sabhi dipartament storon aur dragastoron men bik rahe the jigafeld ladakiyan charli chaiplin git ga rahi thin

unhonne bahut teji se bahut kuchh hasil kar liya tha main sirf sattais baras ka tha aur mere samane anant sambhavanaen thin aur thi mere samane ek dostani duniya thode se hi arase men main karodapati ho jaoonga main kabhi is sab kee kalpana bhi nahin kar sakata tha

charli ke bahut se mitr the aur unakee kaee mitrataen aajivan rahin purushon se bhi aur mahilaon se bhi ve doosaron se prabhavit bhi hue aur poori duniya ko bhi apane tarike se prabhavit kiya harst unake behad karibi mitr the aur unhen apana aadarsh manate the mere ekdo bahut hi achchhe dost hain jo mere kshitij ko raushan banaye rahate hain
bharatiy sinema ke kitane hi kalakaron ne charli ke traimp kee nakal karane kee koshish kee lekin ve use do ek filmon se aage nahin le ja paye

halanki charli ne skooli shiksha bahut kam payi thi lekin unhonne jivan kee kitab ko shuroo se aakhir tak kaee bar padha tha unhen manovigyan kee gahari samajh thi unaka bachapan bahut abhavon men guzara tha aur unhonne takalifon ko bahut nazadik se jana aur pahachana tha isake alava ve self med aadami the lekin unhen apane aap par bahut bharosa tha is aatm katha men unhonne amooman sab kuchh par likha hai aur behatarin likha hai abhinay kala sanvad adayagi kaimara engal nirdeshan thiyetar vigyan paramanu bam manav manovigyan machhali marana samyavad samajavad poonjivad yuddh amiri garibi rajaniti sahity sangit kala dharm dosti bhoot pret kuchh bhi to aisa nahin bacha hai jis par unhonne apani visheshagy vali ray n jahir kee ho komedi kee paribhasha dete hue ve kahate hain kisi bhi komedi men sabase mahattvapoorn hota hai nazariya lekin har bar nazariya dhoondhana aasan bhi nahin hota kisi komedi ko sochane aur use nirdeshit karane se jyada dimag kee satarkata kisi aur kam men zaroori nahin hoti abhinay ke bare men ve kahate hain mainne kabhi bhi abhinay ka adhyayan nahin kiya hai lekin ladakapan men ye mera saubhagy raha ki mujhe mahan abhinetaon ke yug men rahane ka mauka mila aur mainne unake gyan aur anubhav ke vistar ko hasil kiya

shayad charli ka nam is bat ke lie giniz buk aof varld rikards men likha jayega ki un par unakee abhinay kala par unakee filmon par unakee shaili par aur unake traimp par duniya bhar kee bhashaon men shayad ek hazar se bhi jyada kitaben likhi gayi hain jo bhi unake jivan men aaya ya nahin bhi aaya usane charli par likha

amerika jane aur khoob safal ho jane ke bad charli pahali bar das baras bad aur doosari bar bis baras bad landan aaye the aur unhen vahan bachapan kee smritiyon ne ek tarah se gher liya tha mere atit ke dinon se haitti hi vah akeli parichit vyakti thi jisase dobara milana mujhe achchha lagata khas taur par in behatarin paristhitiyon men usase milane ka sukh milata

unhonne jivan men bharapoor dukh bhi bhoge aur sukh bhi aisa aur kaun abhaga hoga jo sirf isalie dost ke ghar ke aasapas mandarata rahe taki use bhi sham ke khane ke lie bulava liya jaye aur aise vyakti se jyada sukhi aur kaun hoga jise kamobesh har desh ke rajyadhyakshon ke yahan se nyaute milate hon vishv vikhyat vaigyanik lekhak aur rajanayik unase milane ke lie samay mangate hon aur usake aas pas vilasita kee aisi duniya ho jisakee ham aur aap kalpana bhi n kar sakate hon jivan ke ye donon paksh charli spensar chaiplin ne dekhe aur bharapoor dekhe

unake jivan ka sabase dukhad paksh raha amerika dvara un par ye shak kiya jana ki ve khud kamyoonist hain aur agar nahin bhi hain to kam se kam unase sahanubhooti to rakhate hi hain aur unakee parti lain par chalate hain

is bhram bhoot ne aajivan unaka pichha nahin chhoda aur antat amerika men chalis baras rah kar us desh ke lie itana kuchh karane ke bad jab unhen beaabaroo ho kar apana jama jamaya sansar chhod kar ek naye ghar kar talash men svitzaralaind jana pada to ve behad vyathit the un par ye aarop bhi lagaya gaya ki ve amerikee nagarik kyon nahin bane aapravas vibhag ke adhikariyon ke savalon ko javab dete hue ve kahate hain kya aap janate hain ki main is sari musibat men kaise fansa aapakee sarakar par ahasan karake roos men aapake rajadoot mistar josef devis ko roosi yuddh rahat kee or se sain fransisko men bhashan dena tha lekin ain mauke par unaka gala kharab ho gaya aur aapakee sarakar ke ek uchch adhikari ne mujhase poochha ki kya main unake sthan par bolane kee meharabani karoonga aur tab se main isamen apani gardan fansaye baitha hoon

main kamyoonist nahin hoon fir bhi main unake virodh men khada hone se inkar karata raha mainne kabhi bhi amerikee nagarik banane ka prayas nahin kiya halanki saikadon amerikee bashinde ingalaind men apani roziroti kama rahe hain ve kabhi bhi british nagarik banane ka prayas nahin karate

charli chaiplin kee yah aatm katha ek mahakavy hai ek aise shakhs ke jivan ka jisane diya hi diya hai aur badale men sirf vahi manga jo usaka hak tha usane hansi banti aur badale men pyar bhi paya aur aansoo bhi paye usane kabhi bhi naraz ho kar ye nahin kaha ki aap galat hain use apane aap par apane faisalon par apani kala par aur apani abhivyakti shaili par vishvas tha aur us vishvas ke prati sachchi pratibaddhata bhi thi vah apane paksh men kisi se bhi ladane bhidane kee himmat rakhata tha kyonki vah janata tha ki sach usake sath hai usamen parafaikshan ke lie itani zid thi ki sitilaits ke  sekend ke ek drishy ke lie panch din tak ritek leta raha apane kam ke prati usamen itani nishtha thi ki mook filmon ka yug bit jane ke  baras bad bhi vah lakhon dolar laga kar mook film banata hai kyonki usaka manana hai ki har tarah ke manoranjan kee zaroorat hoti hai vah sachche arthon men jiniyas tha aur ye bat aaj bhi is tathy se siddh ho jati hai ki filmon ke itane adhik parivartanon se guzar kar yahan tak aa pahunchane ke bad bhi sattar assi baras pahale bani usakee filmen hamen aaj bhi gudagudati hai us vyakti ke pas mas apil ka jaduee chirag tha

mujhe is bat kee khushi hai ki main pahali bar charli chaiplin kee aatm katha ko hindi pathakon ke samane la raha hoon ye kam mainne kaee baras pahale shuroo kiya tha lekin isaka kafi sara hissa kampyootar men hard disk kee chita ke sath jal jane ke karan mainne ise dobara hath bhi nahin lagaya tha dobara shuroo karane ke bad is arase men mainne kuchh nahin kiya n padha n likha bas charli baba ke sanidhy men baitha ye kam karata raha unhen apane bhitar utarata raha

mainne mool kathy ke prati poori tarah se eemanadar bane rahane kee koshish kee hai aur jahan kahin aavashyak laga apani taraf se futanot diye hain ek bat aur ki beshak charli ne vidhivat skooli shiksha nahin payi thi lekin unaka bhasha gyan adbhut hai unhonne n keval angrezi ke balki french italvi grik aur jarman sandarbh bhi khoob diye hain bhasha unakee shanadar angrezi kee misal hai

main vishvas karata hoon ki mera ye kam aapako achchha lagega halanki kam bahut bada tha aur asim dhairy aur samay kee mang karata tha lekin mitron kee shubhakamanaon ke sath main ise poora kar paya mujhe isaka santosh hai isake kuchh ansh shree nikhare ne taip kiye hain kuchh pannon kee dikteshan mere chhote bete abhigyan ne li hai hart kren kee kavita ka saras anuvad meri telifon mitr dipti ne kiya hai in sabaka aabhar
naitik bal meri patni aur mitr madhu ne banaye rakha hai isalie yah kitab usi ko samarpit hai

vest minstar brij ke khulane se pahale keningatan rod sirf ashv marg huaa karata tha  ke bad pul se shuroo karate hue ek nayi sadak banayi gayi thi jisase braitan tak ka sidha rasta khul gaya tha isaka natija yah huaa ki keningatan rod par jahan mainne apane bachapan ka adhikansh vakt guzara hai kuchh bahut hi shanadar ghar dekhe ja sakate the ye ghar vastukala ke utkrisht namoone the inake samane kee taraf lohe kee gril vali balkani hoti thi ho sakata hai ki un gharon men rahane valon ne kabhi apani koch men baith kar braitan jate hue jorj IV ko dekha hoga

unnisavin shatabdi ke aateaate inamen se jyadatar ghar kiraye ke kamare dene vale gharon men aur apartamenton men badal chuke the alabatta kuchh ghar aise bhi bache rahe jin par vakt kee mar nahin padi aur unamen doktar vakeel safal vyapari aur natakon vagairah men kam karane vale kalakar rahate aaye ravivar ke din subah ke vakt keningatan rod ke donon taraf ke kisi n kisi ghar ke bahar aap kasi huee ghodi aur gadi dekh sakate the jo vahan rahane vale natak kalakar ko nauravud ya meratan jaisi dasiyon mil door kee jagah par le jane ke lie taiyar khadi ho vapasi men ye keningatan rod par alagalag tarah ke sharab gharon vhait haus da harns aur da tainkard par rukate hue aate the

main barah baras ka ladaka aksar tainkard ke bahar khada behatarin poshaken pahane in rangile chamakeele mahanubhavon ko utarate aur bhitar launj bar men jate dekha karata tha vahan natakon ke kalakar aapas men milatejulate the ravivar ke dinon ka unaka yahi shagal huaa karata tha dopahar ke bhojan ke lie ghar jane se pahale ve apana ek aakhiri paig yahan liya karate the ve kitane bhavy lagate the charakhane ke soot pahane aur bhoore felt hait date apani hire kee angoothiyon aur taipinon ke lashakare marate ravivar ko dopahar do baje pab band ho jata tha aur vahan maujood sab log bahar jhund bana kar khade ho jate aur ekdoosare ko vida dene se pahale man bahalav men vakt zaya karate main un sabako hasarat bhari nigahon se dekha karata aur khush hota kyonki unamen se kuchhek bevakoofi bhari akad ke sath dingen hankate

jab unamen se aakhiri aadami bhi ja chuka hota to aisa lagata mano soory badalon ke pichhe chhip gaya ho aur tab main dhahate purane gharon kee apani katar kee taraf chal padata mera ghar keningatan rod ke pichhe kee taraf tha ye tin nambar paunal teres tha jisakee tisari manzil par ek chhotisi duchhatti par ham raha karate the tisari manzil tak aane vali sidhiyan khasta hal men thin ghar ka mahaul damaghontoo tha aur vahan kee hava men bas marate pani aur purane kapadon kee boo rachibasi rahati

jis ravivar kee main bat kar raha hoon us din man khidakee par baithi ekatak bahar dekh rahi thi vah meri taraf mudi aur kamazori se muskurayi kamare kee hava damaghontoo thi aur kamara barah varg fut se thodasa hi bada raha hoga ye aur bhi chhota lagata tha aur usakee dhaluaan chhat kafi nichi pratit hoti thi divar ke sath sata kar rakhi gayi mez par joothi pleton aur chay ke pyalon ka ambar laga huaa tha nichali divar se sata ek lohe ka palang tha jis par man ne safed rang pota huaa tha palang aur khidakee ke bich kee jagah par ek chhoti si aag jhanjhari thi palang ke ek sire par ek puranisi aaram kursi thi jise khol dene par charapaee ka kam liya ja sakata tha is par mera bhaee sidani sota tha lekin filahal vah samudr par gaya huaa tha

is ravivar ko kamara kuchh jyada hi damaghontoo lag raha tha kyonki kisi karan ne man ne ise safsoof karane men laparavahi barati thi aam taur par vah kamara saf rakhati thi isaka karan yah tha ki vah khud bhi samajhadar hamesha khush rahane vali aur yuva mahila thi vah abhi saintis kee bhi nahin huee thi vah is vahiyat duchhatti ko bhi chamaka kar suvidhapoorn bana sakati thi khasakar sardiyon kee subah ke vakt jab vah mujhe mera nashta bistar men hi de deti aur jab main so kar uthata to vah chhotasa kamara safaee se damak raha hota thodisi aag jal rahi hoti aur khoonti par garamagaram ketali rakhi hoti aur jangale ke pas haiddar ya blotar machhali garam ho rahi hoti aur vah mere lie tost bana rahi hoti man kee ullasit kar dene vali mauzoodagi kamare ka sukhad mahaul chini mitti kee ketali men dale jate ubalate pani kee chhalchhal karati aavaz aur main aise vakt apana saptahik komik padh raha hota shant ravivar kee subah ke ye durlabh aanandadayak pal hote

lekin is ravivar ke din vah nirvikar bhav se baithi khidakee se bahar ekatak dekhe ja rahi thi pichhale tin din se vah khidakee par hi baithi huee thi aashcharyajanak dhang se chup aur apane aap men khoyi huee main janata tha ki vah pareshan hai sidani samudr par gaya huaa tha aur pichhale do mahinon se usakee koee khabar nahin aayi thi man jis kiraye kee silaee mashin par kam karake kisi tarah ghar kee gadi khinch rahi thi kiston kee adayagi samay par n kiye jane ke karan le jayi ja chukee thi ye koee nayi bat nahin thi aur main dans ke path padha kar panch shinling hafte ka jo yogadan diya karata tha vah bhi achanak khatm ho gaye the

mujhe sankat ke bare men shayad hi pata raha ho kyonki ham to lagatar hi aise sankaton se joojhate aaye the aur ladaka hone ke karan main is tarah kee apani pareshaniyon ko shanadar bhulakkadapane ke sath dar kinar kar diya karata tha hamesha kee tarah main skool se daudata huaa ghar aata aur man ke chhotemote kam kar deta boo marata pani girata aur taze pani ke dol bhar lata tab main bhag kar maikkarthi parivar ke ghar chala jata aur vahan sham tak khelata rahata mujhe is dam ghontati duchhatti se nikalane ka koee n koee bahana chahiye hota

maikkarthi parivar man ka bahut purana parichit parivar tha man unhen natakon ke dinon se janati thi ve keningatan rod ke behatar samajhe jane vale ilake men aaramadayak ghar men rahate the unakee mali haisiyat bhi hamari tulana men behatar thi maikkarthi parivar ka ek hi ladaka tha  vaili main usake sath sham ka dhundhalaka hone tak khelata rahata aur amooman yah hota ki mujhe sham kee chay ke lie rok liya jata mainne is tarah kaee bar der tak vahan mandarate hue rat ke khane ka bhi jugad kiya hoga aksar misej maikkarthi man ke bare men poochhati rahati aur kahati ki kaee din se vah nazar kyon nahin aayi hai main koee bhi bahana mar deta kyonki jab se man durdin jhel rahi thi vah shayad hi apani natak mandali ke parichiton se milanejulane jati ho

han aise bhi din hote jab main ghar par hi rahata aur man mere lie chay banati sooar kee charbi men mere lie bred tal deti mujhe ye bred bahut achchhi lagati fir vah mujhe ek ghante tak kuchh n kuchh padh kar sunati vah bahut hi behatarin path karati thi aur tab main man ke is sangsath ke sukh ke rahasy ka parichay pata aur tab mujhe pata chalata ki main maikkarthi parivar ke sath jitana sukh pata usase jyada mainne man ke sath rah kar pa liya hai

sair se aa kar main jaise hi kamare men ghusa vah mudi aur ulahane bhari nigah se meri taraf dekhane lagi use is halat men dekh kar mera kaleja munh ko aa gaya vah bahut kamazor tatha mariyalsi ho gayi thi tatha usakee aankhon men gahari pida nazar aa rahi thi main akathaniy dukh se bhar utha main tay nahin kar pa raha tha ki ghar par rah kar usake aasapas hi bana rahoon ya fir is sab se door chala jaoon usane meri taraf taras khati nigah se dekhatum lapak kar maikkarthi parivar ke yahan chale kyon nahin jate usane kaha tha
mere aansoo girane ko thekyonki main tumhare pas hi rahana chahata hoon
vah mudi aur soonisooni aankhon se khidakee ke bahar dekhane lagitum bhag kar maikkarthi ke yahan hi jao aur rat ka khana bhi vahin khana aaj ghar men khane ko kuchh bhi nahin hai
mainne usakee aavaj men tadap mahasoos kee mainne is taraf se apane dimag ke daravaje band kar diyeagar tum yahi chahati ho to main chala jata hoon

vah kamajori se muskurayi aur mera sir sahalayahanhan tum daud jao halanki main usake aage gidagidata raha ki vah mujhe ghar par hi apane pas rahane de lekin vah mere jane par hi adi rahi is tarah se main aparadh bodh kee bhavana liye chala gaya vah usi manahoos duchhatti kee khidakee par baithi rahi use is bat ka zara sa bhi guman nahin tha ki aane vale dinon men durbhagy kee kaunsi potali usake lie khulane vali hai

mera janm eest len velavarth men  aprail  ko rat aath baje huaa tha isake turant bad ham sent skvayar sent jorj rod laimbeth men rahane chale gaye the meri man ka kahana hai ki meri duniya khushiyon se bhari huee thi hamari paristhitiyan kamobesh thikthak thin ham tin kamaron ke ghar men rahate the jo suruchipoorn tarike se saje hue the meri shuruaati smritiyon men se ek to ye hai ki man roz rat ko thiyetar jaya karati thi aur mujhe aur sidani ko bahut hi pyar se aaramadayak bistar men sahej kar lita jati thi aur hamen naukarani kee dekhrekh men chhod jati thi sadhe tin baras kee meri duniya men sab kuchh sanbhav tha agar sidani jo mujhase char baras bada tha hath kee safaee ke karatab dikha sakata tha aur sikka nigal kar apane sir ke pichhe se nikal kar dikha sakata tha to main bhi thik aise hi kar ke dikha sakata tha isalie main adh peni ka ek sikka nigal gaya aur mazabooran man ko doktar bulavana pada

roz rat ko jab vah thiyetar se vapis lautati thi to usaka yah dastoorsa tha ki mere aur sidani ke lie khane kee achchhiachchhi chizen mez par dhak kar rakh deti thi taki subah uthate hi hamen mil jayen  rangbirange aur sugandhit kek ka slais ya mithaee isake pichhe aapasi razamandi yah thi ki ham subah uth kar shorsharaba nahin karenge vah aam taur par der tak so kar uthati thi

man vairaiti stej kee kalakar thi apani umr ke tisare dashak ko chhooti vah nafasat pasand mahila thi usaka rang saf tha aankhen bainjani nili aur lambe halke bhoore bal bal itane lambe ki vah aasani se un par baith sakati thi sidani aur main apani man ko bahut chahate the halanki vah asadharan khoobasoorat nahin thi fir bhi vah hamen svarg kee kisi apsara se kam nahin lagati thi jo log use janate the unhonne mujhe bad men bataya tha ki vah sundar aur aakarshak thi aur usamen samane vale ko bandh lene vale saundary ka jadoo tha ravivar ke sairsapate ke lie hamen achchhe kapade pahanana use bahut achchha lagata tha vah sidani ko lambi pataloon ke sath chaude kalar vala soot pahanati aur mujhe nili makhamali pataloon aur usase mel khate nile dastane is tarah ke mauke aatmatushti ke utsav hote jab ham keningatan rod par itarate firate

landan un dinon dhirganbhir huaa karata tha shahar kee gati manthar thi yahan tak ki vestaminstar rod se chalane vali ghode juti tramen bhi kharamakharama chalatin aur isi gati se hi pul ke pas tarminal par gol ghere rivalving tebal par ghoom jatin jab man ke khatepite din the to ham bhi vestaminstar rod par raha karate the vahan ka mahaul dil khush karane vala aur dostana hota vahan shanadar dukanen restaran aur sangit sadan the pul ke thik samane kone par falon kee dukan ranginiyon se bhari hoti bahar kee taraf taratib se rakhe gaye santaron sebon nashapati aur kelon ke piramid saje hote isake thik viparit samane kee taraf nadi ke us par sansad kee shant dhoosar imaraten nazar aatin

ye mere bachapan ka meri mansthitiyon ka aur mere jagaran ka landan tha vasant men laimbeth kee smritiyan  chhoti moti ghatanaen aur chizen man ke sath ghoda bas men oopar ja kar baithana aur pas se guzarate lilak ke darakhton ko chhoone kee koshish karana tarahtarah ke rangon kee bas tikaten santare ke rang kee hari nili gulabi aur doosare rangon kee jahan basen aur tramen rukati thin vahan futapath par un tikaton ka bikhara hona mujhe vestaminstar pul ke kone par fool bechane vali gulabi chehare vali ladakiyan yad aati hain jo kot ke batan men lagane vale fool banaya karati thin unakee daksh ungaliyan teji se gote aur kinari ke farn banati chalatin taze pani chhidake gulabon kee bhigibhigi khushaboo jo mujhe betarah udas kar jati thi aur vo udas kar dene vale ravivar aur pile chehare vale matapita aur unake bachche jo vestaminstar pul par pavan chakkee ke khilaune tatha rangin gubbare liye ghisatate chalate aur fir paini stimar jo haule se pul ke niche se jate samay apane fanel niche kar lete the mujhe lagata hai is tarah kee chhotichhoti ghatanaon se meri aatma ka janm huaa tha
aur fir hamare baithane ke kamare se judi smritiyan jinhonne meri anubhootiyon par asar dala

nel gven kee man kee banayi aadamakad penting jise main pasand nahin karata tha hamare khanepine kee mez ke lambotare dibbe jo mujhamen avasad paida karate the aur fir chhotasa gol myoojik boks jisakee ainamal kee huee satah par pariyon kee tasviren bani huee thin ise dekh main khush bhi hota tha aur pareshan bhi

mahan palon kee smritiyan  rayal machhali ghar men jana man ke sath vahan ke slaid sho dekhana lapaton men muskurati aurat ka jivit sir dekhana shi dekhana chh peni kee bhagyashali lotari sarapraiz paiket uthane ke lie man ka mujhe ek bahut bade burade ke dram tak oopar karana aur us paiket men se ek kaindi ka nikalana jo bajati nahin thi aur ek khilaune vale brooch ka nikalana aur fir kaintarabari myoojik hol men ek bar jana jahan lal aaramadayak sit par panv pasar kar baithana aur pita ko abhinay karate hue dekhana

aur ab rat ka vakt ho raha hai aur main char ghodon vali bagghee men oopar kee taraf safari jhole men lipata huaa man aur usake thiyetar ke aur sathiyon ke sath chala ja raha hoon unakee chal men rama tatha hansikhushi men khush hamara bigul bajane vala apani shekhi men hamen keningatan rod se ghode kee sajsajja kee sumadhur run jhun aur ghodon kee tapon kee sangitamay aavaz ke sath liye ja raha tha

tabhi kuchh huaa ye ek mahine ke bad kee bat bhi ho sakati hai ya thode hi dinon ke bad kee bhi achanak laga ki man aur bahar kee duniya ke sath sab kuchh thik nahin chal raha hai vah subah se apani kisi sakhi ke sath bahar gayi huee thi aur vapis lauti to bahut adhik uttejana se bhari huee thi main farsh par khel raha tha aur apane thik oopar chal rahe bhishan tanav ke bare men satark ho gaya tha aisa lag raha tha mano main kune kee talahati men sun raha hooon man bhavapoorn tarike se havbhav jatala rahi thi roye ja rahi thi aur barbar aarmastrang ka nam le rahi thi  aarmastrang ne ye kaha aur aarmastrang ne vo kaha aarmastrang jangali hai man kee is tarah kee uttejana hamane pahale nahin dekhi thi aur yah itani tej thi ki mainne rona shuroo kar diya main itana roya ki mazabooran man ko mujhe god men uthana pada aur dilasa deni padi kuchh baras bad hi mujhe us dopahari ke mahattv ka pata chal paya tha man adalat se lauti thi vahan usane mere pita par bachchon ke bharan poshan ka kharchapani n dene kee vajah se mukadama thok rakha tha aur badakismati se mamala usake paksh men nahin ja raha tha aarmastrang mere pita ka vakeel tha

main pita ko bahut hi kam janata tha aur mujhe is bat kee bilkul bhi yad nahin thi ki ve kabhi hamare sath rahe hon ve bhi vairaiti stej ke kalakar the ekadam shant aur chintanashil aankhen unakee ekadam kali thin man ka kahana tha ki ve ekadam nepoliyan kee tarah dikhate the unakee halkee mahin aavaz thi aur unhen behatarin adakar samajha jata tha un dinon bhi ve har hafte chalis paund kee shanadar rakam kama liya karate the bas dikkat sirf ek hi thi ki ve pite bahut the man ke anusar yahi un donon ke bich jhagade kee jad thi

stej kalakaron ke lie yah bahut hi mushkil bat hoti ki ve pine se apane aapako rok saken karan yah tha ki un dinon sharab sabhi thiyetaron men hi bika karati thi aur kalakar kee adakari ke bad usase ummid kee jati thi ki vah thiyetar bar men jaye aur grahakon ke sath baith kar piye kuchh thiyetar to boks aofis se kam aur sharab bech kar jyada kama liya karate the kuchhek kalakaron ko to tagadi tankhvah hi di jati thi jinamen unakee pratibha ka kam aur us pagar ko thiyetar ke bar men udane ka jyada yogadan rahata tha is tarah se kaee behatarin kalakar sharab ke chakkar men barabad ho gaye mere pita bhi aise kalakaron men se ek the ve matr saintis baras kee umr men jyada sharab ke karan bhagavan ko pyare ho gaye the

man unake bare men mazak hi mazak men aur udasi ke sath kisse bataya karati thi sharab pine ke bad ve ugr svabhav ke ho jate the aur unakee isi tarah kee ek bar kee daroobaji kee nautankee men man unhen chhodchhad kar apani kuchh sakhiyon ke sath braitan bhag gayi thi pita ji ne jab hadabadi men tar bhejatumhara irada kya hai aur turant javab do to man ne vapasi tar bheja thanach gana partiyan aur maujmaza darling

man do bahanon men se badi thi unake pita charls hils jo ek aairish mochi the kaunti kork aayaralaind se aaye the unake gal surkh sebon kee tarah lal the unake sir par balon ke safed guchchhe the unakee vaisi safed dadhi thi jaisi vhislar ke potret men karlail kee thi ve kaha karate the ki rashtriy aandolan ke dinon men pulis se chhipanechhipane ke chakkar men ve gile nam kheton men sote rahe is karan se unake ghutanon men hamesha ke lie dard baith gaya aur is karan ve dohare ho kar chalate the ve aakhir landan men aa kar bas gaye the aur apane lie eest len velavarth men jooton kee marammat ka kamdhandha talash liya tha

dadi aadhi ghumakkadin thi yah bat hamare parivar ka khula rahasy thi dadi man hamesha is bat kee shekhi baghara karati thi ki unaka parivar hamesha zamin ka kiraya de kar rahata aaya tha unaka ghar ka nam smith tha mujhe unakee shanadar nanhin budhiya ke roop men yad hai jo hamesha mere sath nanhenmunne bachchon jaisi baten karake mujhase duaa salam kiya karati thi mere chh baras ke hone se pahale hi ve chal basi thin ve dada se alag ho gayi thin jisaka karan un donon men se koee bhi nahin bataya karata tha lekin ket aanti ke anusar isake pichhe parivarik jhagada tha aur dada ne ek premika rakhi huee thi aur ek bar use bich men la kar dadi ko hairani men dal diya tha

aam jagah ke manadandon ke madhyam se hamare khanadan ke naitikata ko napana utana hi galat prayas hoga jitana garm pani men tharmamitar dalakar dekhana hota hai is tarah kee aanuvanshik kabaliyat ke sath mochi parivar kee do pyari bahanon ne gharbar chhoda aur stej ko samarpit ho gayin

ket aanti man kee chhoti bahan bhi stej kee adakara thi lekin ham usake bare men bahut hi kam janate the isaka karan yah tha ki vah aksar hamari zindagi men se aatijati rahati thi vah dekhane men bahut aakarshak thi aur gussail svabhav kee thi isalie man se usakee kam hi patati thi usaka kabhikabhar aana achanak chhotemote tante men hi khatm hota tha ki man ne kuchh n kuchh ulata sidha kah diya hota tha ya kar diya hota tha

attharah baras kee umr men man ek adhed aadami ke sath afrika bhag gayi thi vah aksar vahan kee apani zindagi kee bat kiya karati thi ki kis tarah se vah vahan pedon ke jhuramuton naukaron aur jin kase ghodon ke bich masti bhari zindagi ji rahi thi

usakee umr ke attharahaven baras men mere bade bhaee sidani ka janm huaa tha mujhe bataya gaya tha ki vah ek lord ka beta tha aur jab vah ikkees baras ka ho jayega to use vasiyat men do hajar paund kee shanadar rakam milegi is samachar se main ek sath hi dukhi aur khush huaa karata tha

man bahut arase tak afrika men nahin rahi aur ingalaind men aa kar usane mere pita se shadi kar li mujhe nahin pata ki usakee zindagi ke afrikee ghatanachakr ka kya huaa lekin bhayankar garibi ke dinon men main use is bat ke lie kosa karata tha ki vah itani shanadar zindagi kahe ko chhod aayi thi vah hans deti aur kaha karati ki main in chizon ko samajhane kee umr se bahut kam hoon aur mujhe is bare men itana nahin sochana chahiye

mujhe kabhi bhi is bat ka andaza nahin lag paya ki vah mere pita ke bare men kis tarah kee bhavanaen rakhati thi lekin jab bhi vah mere pita ke bare men bat karati thi usamen koee kaduvahat nahin hoti thi isase mujhe shak hone lagata tha ki vah khud bhi unake pyar men gaharegahare doobi huee thi kabhi to vah unake bare men bahut sahanubhooti ke sath bat karati to kabhi unakee sharabakhori kee lat aur hinsak pravritti ke bare men bataya karati thi bad ke barason men jab bhi vah mujhase khafa hoti vah hikarat se kahatitoo bhi apane bap kee hi tarah kisi din apane aapako gatar men khatm kar dalega

vah pitaji ko afrika jane se pahale ke dinon se janati thi ve ek doosare ko pyar karate the aur unhonne shamus obriyan nam ke ek aayarish melodrama men ek sath kam kiya tha solah baras kee umr men man ne usamen pramukh bhoomika nibhayi thi kampani ke sath toor karate hue man ek adhed umr ke lord ke sampark men aayi aur usake sath afrika bhag gayi jab vah vapis ingalaind aayi to pita ne apane romans ke toote dhagon ko fir se joda aur donon ne shadi kar li tin baras bad mera janm huaa tha main nahin janata ki sharabakhori ke alava aur kaunkaun si ghatanaen kam kar rahi thin lekin mere janm ke ek baras ke hi bad ve donon alag ho gaye the man ne guzare bhatte kee bhi mang nahin kee thi vah un dinon khud ek star huaa karati thi aur har hafte  paund kama rahi thi usakee mali haisiyat itani achchhi thi ki apana aur apane bachchon ka bharan poshan kar sake lekin jab usakee zindagi men durbhagy ne dastak di tabhi usane madad kee mang kee agar aisa n hota to usane kabhi bhi kanooni karravaee n kee hoti

man ko usakee aavaz bahut takalif de rahi thi vaise bhi usakee aavaz kabhi bhi itani buland nahin thi lekin zarasa bhi sardijukam hote hi usakee svar tantree men soojan aa jati thi jo fir hafton chalati rahati thi lekin use mazaboori men kam karate rahana padata tha isaka natija yah huaa ki usakee aavaz bad se badatar hoti chali gayi vah ab apani aavaj par bharosa nahin kar sakati thi gana gategate bich men hi usakee aavaz bharra jati ya achanak gayab hi ho jati aur fusafusahat men badal jati tab shrota bich men thahake lagane lagate ve gala fad ka chillana shuroo kar dete aavaz kee chinta ne man kee sehat ko aur bhi danvadol kar diya tha aur usakee halat manasik rogi jaisi ho gayi natija yah huaa ki use thiyetar se bulave aane kam hote chale gaye aur ek din aisa bhi aaya ki bilkul band hi ho gaye

ye usakee aavaz ke kharab hote chale jane ke karan hi tha ki mujhe panch baras kee umr men pahali bar stej par utarana pada man aam taur par mujhe kiraye ke kamare men akela chhod kar jane ke bajaye rat ko apane sath thiyetar le jana pasand karati thi vah us vakt kaintin et da eldarashat men kam kar rahi thi ye ek ganda chalataoosa thiyetar tha jo jyadatar faujiyon ke lie khel dikhata tha ve log ujadd kism ke log hote the aur unhen bhadakane ya ochhi harakaton par utar aane ke lie mamoolisa karan hi kafi hota tha eldarashot men natakon men kam karane valon ke lie vahan ek hafta bhi guzarana bhayankar tanav se guzarana hota tha

mujhe yad hai main us vakt vings men khada huaa tha jab pahale to man kee aavaz fati aur fir fusafusahat men badal gayi shrotaon ne thahake lagana shuroo kar diye aur anapshanap gane lage aur kutte billiyon kee aavajen nikalana shuroo kar diya sab kuchh aspashtsa tha aur main thik se samajh nahin pa raha tha ki ye sab kya chal raha hai lekin shorsharaba badhata hi chala gaya aur mazabooran man ko stej chhod kar aana pada jab vah vings men aayi to buri tarah se vyathit thi aur stej mainejar se bahas kar rahi thi stej mainejar ne mujhe man kee sakhiyon ke aage abhinay karate dekha tha vah man se shayad yah kah raha tha ki usake sthan par mujhe stej par bhej de

is bich ham tin aaramadayak kamaron ke makan men se do kamaron ke makan men aur fir ek kamare ke makan men shift ho chuke the hamara saman kam hota chala ja raha tha aur har bar ham jis tarah ke pados men rahane ke lie jate usaka star niche aata ja raha tha

tab vah dharm kee or mud gayi thi mujhe isaka karan to yah lagata hai ki shayad use yah ummid thi ki isase usakee aavaz vapis laut aayegi vah niyamit roop se vestaminstar brij rod par kraist charch jaya karati aur har itavar ko mujhe bakh ke aargan myoojik ke lie baithana padata aur padari ef bi meyer kee joshili tatha dramaee aavaz ko sunana padata jo giraje ke madhy bhag se ghisatate hue pairon kee tarah aati pratit hoti zaroor hi unake bhashanon men apil hoti hogi kyonki main aksar man ko daboch kar tham leta aur chupake se apane aansoo ponchh dalata halanki isase mujhe pareshani to hoti hi thi

mujhe achchhi tarah se yad hai us garm dopahari men pavitr prarthana sabha kee jab vahan bhid men se chandi ka ek thanda pyala guzara gaya us pyale men svadisht angooron ka ras bhara huaa tha mainne usamen se dher sara joos pi liya tha aur man ka mujhe rokatasa vah nam naram hath aur tab mainne kitani rahat mahasoos kee thi jab fadar ne baibal band kee thi isaka matalab yahi tha ki ab prarthanaen shuroo hongi aur eesh vandana ke antim git gaye jayenge

man jab se dharm kee sharan men gayi thi vah thiyetar kee apani sakhiyon se kabhikabhar hi mil pati usakee vah duniya ab chhoo mantar ho chukee thi aur usakee ab yaden hi bachi thin aisa lagata tha mano ham hamesha se hi is tarah ke dayaniy halat men rahate aaye the bich ka ek baras to takalifon ke poore jivan kal kee tarah laga tha ham ab beraunak dhundhalake kamare men rahate the kamdham talashana bahut hi doobhar tha aur man ko stej ke alava kuchh aatajata nahin tha isase usake hath aur bandh jate the vah chhote kad kee lality liye bhavuk mahila thi vah viktoriyan yug kee aisi bhayankar vikat paristhitiyon se joojh rahi thi jahan amiri aur garibi ke bich bahut badi khaee thi garibguraba auraton ke pas hath ka kam karane mehanat majoori karane ke alava aur koee chara nahin tha ya fir thi dukanon vagairah men hadtod gulami kabhikabhar use narsing ka kam mil jata tha lekin is tarah ke kam bhi bahut durlabh hote aur ye bhi bahut hi kam arase ke lie hote isake bavajood vah kuchh n kuchh jugad kar hi leti vah thiyetar ke lie apani poshaken khud siya karati thi isalie sinepirone ke kam men usaka hath bahut achchha tha is tarah se vah charch ke logon kee kuchh poshaken si kar kuchhek shiling kama hi leti thi lekin ye kuchh shiling ham tinon ke guzare ke lie nakafi hote pita ji kee darookhori ke karan unhen thiyetar men kam milana aniyamit hota chala gaya aur is tarah har hafte milane vala unaka das shiling ka bhugatan bhi aniyamit hi rahata

ab vah hamare samane pradarshan karati to vah apane khud ke manoranjak ansh to dikhati hi doosari abhinetriyon kee bhi nakal dikhati jinhen usane tathakathit vaidh thiyetaron men kam karate dekha tha

jab vah ye sab suna rahi thi to usake galon par aansoo dharake chale aa rahe the man ne bataya ki kis tarah se saiman ne kros dhone men yishoo masih kee madad kee thi aur kis tarah bhav vihval ho kar yishoo ne use dekha tha man ne barabas ke bare men bataya jo pashchatapi tha aur kros par unake sath hi mara tha vah kshama mang raha tha aur yishoo kah rahe the aaj tum mere sath svarg men hovoge aur kros se apani man kee or dekhate hue yishoo ne kaha tha man apane bete ko dekho aur unake antim marate vakt kee pida bhari karah mere param pita aapane mujhe kshama kyon nahin kiya

ham samaj ke jis nimnatar star ke jivan men rahane ko mazaboor the vahan ye sahaj svabhavik tha ki ham apani bhashashaili ke star ke prati laparavah hote chale jate lekin man hamesha apane parivesh se bahar hi khadi hamen samajhati aur hamare bat karane ke dhang uchcharan par dhyan deti rahati hamara vyakaran sudharati rahati aur hamen yah mahasoos karati rahati ki ham khas hain

ham jaisejaise aur adhik garibi ke gart men utarate chale gaye main apani agyanata ke chalate aur bachapane men man se kahata ki vah fir se stej par jana shuroo kyon nahin kar deti man muskurati aur kahati ki vahan ka jivan nakali aur jhootha hai aur ki is tarah ke jivan men rahane se ham jaldi hi eeshvar ko bhool jate hain isake bavazood vah jab bhi thiyetar kee bat karati to vah apane aapako bhool jati aur utsah se bhar uthati yadon kee galiyon men utarane ke bad vah fir se maun ke gahare koone men utar jati aur apane suee dhage ke kam men apane aapako bhula deti main bhavuk ho jata kyonki main janata tha ki ham ab us shanoshaukat vali zindagi ka hissa nahin rahe the tab man meri taraf dekhati aur mujhe akela pa kar mera hausala badhati

sardiyan sir par thin aur sidani ke kapade kam hote chale ja rahe the isalie man ne apane purane reshami jaiket men se usake lie ek kot si diya tha us par kali aur lal dhariyon vali banhen thin kandhe par plits thi aur man ne poori koshish kee thi ki unhen kisi tarah se door kar de lekin vah unhen hata nahin pa rahi thi jab sidani se vah kot pahanane ke lie kaha gaya to vah ro pada thaskool ke bachche mera ye kot dekh kar kya kahenge

is bat kee kaun paravah karata hai ki log kya kahenge man ne kaha thaisake alava ye kitana khas kism ka lag raha hai man ka samajhanebujhane ka tarika itana shanadar tha ki sidani aaj din tak nahin samajh paya hai ki vah man ke fusalane par vah kot pahanane ko aakhir taiyar hi kaise ho gaya tha lekin usane kot pahana tha us kot kee vajah se aur man ke oonchi hil ke saindilon ko katchhant kar banaye gaye jooton se sidani ke skool men kaee jhagade hue use sab ladake chhedatejosef aur usaka rang biranga kot aur main man kee purani lal lambi jurabon men se katkoot kar banayi gayi juraben lagata jaise unamen pliten dali gayi hain pahan kar jata to bachche chhedateaa gaye sar fransis drek

is bhayavah halat ke charam dinon men man ko aadhi sisi sir dard kee shikayat shuroo huee use mazabooran apana sinepirone ka kam chhod dena pada vah kaeekaee din tak andhere kamare men sir par chay kee pattiyon kee pattiyan bandhe padi rahati hamara vakt kharab chal raha tha aur ham giraja gharon kee khairat par pal rahe the soop kee tikaton ke sahare din kat rahe the aur madad ke lie aaye parsalon ke sahare ji rahe the isake bavajood sidani skool ke ghanton ke bich akhabar bechata aur beshak usaka yogadan oont ke munh men jira hi hota ye us khairat ke saman men kuchh to jodata hi tha lekin har sankat men hamesha koee n koee klaimeks bhi chhupa hota hai is mamale men ye klaimeks bahut sukhad tha
