kisanon kee chinta hai ki unake bachche kheton men jana nahin chahate ve to pan thela hotal aur any dukan kholakar jine ke aadi hote ja rahe hain naee pidhi ke khetikisani ke prati aroochi se khet banjar hote ja rahe hain yah chinta kee bat hai ghar men khane ko kuchh ho ya n ho lekin ek motar sayakal avashy hona chahiye isake lie baink aur fainensing kanpaniyan lon dene ko taiyar baithe hain lon ke karj men ghar bhale hi doob jaye isase kisi ko kuchh lena dena nahin hota logon ka manana hai ki karj men ham janm lete hain karj men jite hain aur karj lie mar jate hain

khushi karane kee bat hai ki nadi kinare vale ganvon men audyogik pratishthan lagate ja rahe hain logon ko ummid hai ki audyogik pratishthanon ke lagane se unhen rojagar mil jayega vyapariyon ka vyapar badh jayega makan malikon ko kirayedar mil jayega chhattisagadh shasan audyogik samoohon ko pratishthan lagane ke lie aamantrit kar rahi hai yahan unhen bhoomi muhaiya kara rahi hai to svabhavik hai ki yahan audyogik pratishthan lagenge hi lagate ja rahe hain akele rayagadh jile ke aasapas lagabhag  aayaran aur pavar plant lag chuke hain chhattisagadh ka sabase bada jindal spanj aur stil plant lag chuka hai aur jald hi unaka pavar plant lagane vala hai isake lie kelo nadi men unaka pavar plant lagane vala hai isi prakar anek audyogik pratishthan lag chuke hain aur lagate ja rahe hain svabhavik roop se in sabhi pratishthanon ko pani kee aavashyakata hogi jisakee poorti nadiyon ke upar bane bandhon se kee ja rahi hai bandh ke banane se nadiyon men pani hi nahin hai aur hai bhi to audyogik pratishthanon se nikala rasayan yukt ganda pani hai jisase nadiyan pradooshit ho gayi hai

pradesh men audyogik pratishthanon ke lagane se rashtriy aur antarrashtriy bajar men vikas ka graf avashy badha hai lekin vikas ke sath sath anek prakar kee buraeeyan bhi aati hain jise pratyaksh roop se dekha ja sakata hai audyogik pratishthanon se nikala dhunaa jahan pedon ke chakriy jivan ko prabhavit kar raha hai vahin usake dhuen se khet kee urvara shakti khatm hoti ja rahi hai aur khet banjar hote ja rahe hain adhikansh nadiyon men bandh banaye ja chuke hain jisase nadiyan sookh gayi hai usamen jo thoda bahut jal hai usamen audyogik pratishthanon ka rasayan yukt ganda pani pravahit ho raha hai isase jan jivan ast vyast hote ja raha hai

aaj fasal chakr kee bat kee jati hai fasal chakr to nahin badala lekin jalavayu parivartan avashy ho gaya hai ek hi nagar men kahin barasat hoti hai to kahin nahin hoti jal ka chakr ke prabhavit hone se aisa hota hai jalavayu parivartan vikasit aur vikasashil deshon ke bich vad vivad ka vishay jaroor bana hai lekin sachchaee yah hai ki hava pani bhojan svasthy kheti aavas aadi sabhi ke upar isaka pratikool prabhav padane vala hai samudri jal star ke badhane se prabhavit hote tatiy kshetr ke log hon ya asamany manasoon athava jal sankat se trast kisan vinashakari samudri toofan ka kahar jhelate tatavasi hon athava sookhe se trast aur asamany mausam se janit ajibogarib bimariyan jhelate log ya fir vinashakari badh men apana sab kuchh gavan baithe aur doosare kshetron men palayan karate tamam lo jalavayu parivartan kee mar jhel rahe hain
prakriti ke tin upakar h mitti pani aur bayara

audyogik kranti kee bhatthi men hamane apana jangal jhonk diya hai ped kat dale aur sadaken bana dalin kulhadiaari se jangal katane men der hoti thi to pavar se chalane vali aariyan gadh dalin san  se  ke bich  varsho men duniyan ke lagabhag aadhe jangal kat dale aaj bhi berahami se kate ja rahe hain jal sangrahan ke lie talab banaye jate the jisase kheton men sinchaee bhi hoti thi lekin aaj talab ya to patakar usamen badi badi imaraten banayi ja rahi hai ya usamen keval machhali palan hota hai machhali palan ke lie kaee prakar ke rasayanon ka upayog kiya jata hai jisaka talabon ka pani anupayogi ho jata hai isi prakar audyogik dhuon se vayumandal to pradooshit hota hi hai jamin bhi banjar hoti ja rahi hai isase prakriti ka santulan bigadane laga hai aur dushparinam ham bhugat rahe hain aakhir jangal kyon jaroori hai  ped hamen aisa kya dete hain jo unhen bachana jaroori hai  ped hamen fal fool jadibooti bhojan rindhan eemarati lakadi gond kagaj resham rabar aur tamam duniyan ke adbhoot rasayan dete hain isalie hamane usaka dohan shoshann to kiya par yah bhool gaye ki vrikshon ke nahin hone se yah dharati aaj viran banati ja rahi hai vanon ke is upakar ka roopayon men hi hisab lagayen to ek ped  lakh roopaye ka fayada deta hai ghane jangalon se bhap banakar uda pani varsha banakar vapas aata hai aur dharati ko hara bhara banata hai ped paudhon kee jaden mitti ko bandhe rahati hai pedon kee kataee se dharati kee hariyali khatm ho jati hai dharati kee upajaoo mitti ko tej bauchharon ka pani baha le jati hai pedon kee dhal ke bina pani kee tej dharaen pahadon se utar kar maidanon ko dubati chali jati hai har sal badh ka pani apane sath  karod tan mitti baha le jata hai mitti ke is bhayavah katav ko rokane ka ek hi upay haivriksharopan mitti pani aur bayar ye tin upakar hain vanon ke ham par isalie hamare desh men prachin kal se pedon kee pooja hoti aayi hai

kabir kahate hain ki manushy ke man ke ganga jal kee tarah nirmal ho jane par hari arthat eeshvar ko khojane kee aavashyakata nahin apitu hari hi manushy ke pichhepichhe dauda chala aaega sant ravidas bhi kahate hain ki man changa to kathauti men ganga kabir aur ravidas hi nahin sabhi santon ne man kee nirmalata par bal diya hai aur nirmalata bhi gangajal si ek prarthana men bhi pankti aati hai ki gangajal sa nirmal man ho mila mujhe vidya ka dhan ho prashn uthata hai ki man kee nirmalata se kya tatpary hai aur isakee kya upayogita aur mahattv hai tatha man kee nirmalata kee upama ganga ke jal se kyon di jati hai

ganga bharat kee ek atyant pavitr nadi hai jisaka jal kafi dinon tak rakhane ke bavajood ashuddh nahin hota jabaki sadharan jal kuchh dinon men hi sad jata hai ganga ka udgam sthal gangotree ya gomukh hai gomukh se bhagirathi nadi nikalati hai aur devaprayag namak sthan par alakananda nadi se milakar aage ganga ke roop men pravahit hoti hai bhagirathi ke devaprayag tak aateaate isamen kuchh chattanen ghul jati hain jisase isake jal men aisi kshamata paida ho jati hai jo usake pani ko sadane nahin deti

har nadi ke jal men kuchh khas tarah ke padarth ghule rahate hain jo usakee vishisht jaivik sanrachana ke lie uttaradayi hote hain ye ghule hue padarth pani men kuchh khas tarah ke baiktiriya ko panapane dete hain to kuchh ko nahin kuchh khas tarah ke baiktiriya hi pani kee sadan ke lie uttaradayi hote hain to kuchh pani men sadan paida karane vale keetanuon ko rokane men sahayak hote hain vaigyanik shodhon se pata chalata hai ki ganga ke pani men bhi aise baiktiriya hain jo ganga ke pani men sadan paida karane vale keetanuon ko panapane hi nahin dete isalie ganga ka pani kafi lanbe samay tak kharab nahin hota aur pavitr mana jata hai

kaha gaya hai ki sankalpavikalpatmakan manah arthat man sankalp aur vikalp svaroop hai man men har pal asankhy vichar aate aur jate hain aur unamen parivartan hota rahata hai man atyant chanchal hai kahin ek sthan par tikata nahin bhagata rahata hai isamen paraspar virodhi vicharon ka pravah chalata rahata hai kabhi achchhe vichar to kabhi bure vichar man kee isi chanchalata ke karan manushy anek samasyaon aur vyadhiyon se grast rahata hai vicharon ke anuroop hi hamari aadaton ka vikas hota hai aur vichar hi karm karane ke lie utprerak tattv kee bhoomika ka nirvah karate hain sakaratmak vichar hamen sahi karm kee or agrasar karate hain to nakaratmak vichar galat karm kee or hamare achchhe svasthy ke lie sakaratmak soch hi uttaradayi hai to bure svasthy ke lie nakaratmak soch man kee chanchalata ke karan athava man kee nirmalata ke abhav men hi ham apani chetana se ekakar nahin ho pate hain

man kee nirmalata se tatpary hai man ka vikaron arthat galat vicharon se rahit hona vikar roopi baiktiriya hi hamare man kee nirmalata ko nasht karate hain atah unase chhutakara pana anivary hai jahan tak jal kee nirmalata kee bat hai shuddh jal ka n to koee svad hota hai aur n koee rang ya gandh hi ham prayah kahate hain ki ye pani mitha hai aur ye khara hai vastav men shuddh pani mitha nahin hota apitu jo pani khara nahin hota ya jisamen ashuddhiyan nahin hotin use hi mitha pani kah dete hain aur yah bilakul svadahin rangahin tatha gandhahin hota hai

hamara man bhi shuddh pani kee tarah hi hona chahie tabhi vah nirmal mana jaega arthat man men bhi kisi prakar ke bhav nahin hone chahien lekin yah asanbhav hai kyonki man vichar shoony nahin ho sakata vichar ke abhav men to karm hi sanbhav nahin jaise vichar ya bhav vaisa manushy atah manushy ko karmashil bane rahane ke lie tatha sahi disha men agrasar hone ke lie achchhe vicharon se otaprot hona chahie manushy nakaratmak vicharon ya bhavon ke vashibhoot hokar hi galat kary karata hai atah vicharon par niyantran anivary hai aur vicharon par niyantran ke lie anivary hai man kee nirmalata

jis prakar pani ko sadane se rokane ke lie pani men panapane vale ghatak baiktiriya ko rokane ke lie usamen upayogi baiktiriya kee upasthiti anivary hai usi prakar man men bhavon ke pradooshan ko rokane ke lie sakaratmak vicharon ke nirantar pravah kee bhi aavashyakata hai jab bhi koee nakaratmak vichar utpann ho sakaratmak vichar dvara use samapt kar dijie sakaratmak vichar roopi baiktiriya dvara hi ham apane man ko nirmal kar sakate hain aur man kee nirmalata ka arth hai man men ragdvesh aadi paraspar virodhi bhavon v vikaron kee samapti dvara samata kee sthapana

jab vyakti samata men sthit ho jata hai to dvandv kee bhi samapti ho jati hai aur dvandv kee samapti hi vastavik upachar hai sakaratmak vicharon ke nirantar pravah dvara n keval sharirik vyadhiyon ka upachar sanbhav hai apitu svayan ke vastavik svaroop athava chetana se ekakar hona bhi sanbhav hai svayan ke vastavik svaroop athava chetana se ekakar hone ka arth hi hai apane andar ke eeshvar kee khoj man kee nirmalata ke bad eeshvar ko khojane kee aavashyakata hi nahin rahati kyonki svayan eeshvar hi pichhepichhe dauda chala aata hai arthat manushy ke man men aa upasthit hota hai yahi man kee vastavik nirmalata hai
rashtriy asmita ke rekhankan ka sarthak prayas hai krantiyagya

svatantrata aur svadhinata pranimatr ka janmasiddh adhikar hai isi se aatmasamman aur aatmautkarsh ka marg prashast hota hai bharatiy rashtriyata ko dirghavadhi videshi shasan aur satta kee kutilupaniveshavadi nitiyon ke chalate paratantrata ka dansh jhelane ko majaboor hona pada aur jab is krooratam krityon se bhari apamanajanak sthiti kee charam sima ho gaee tab janamanas udvelit ho utha tha apani rajanaitiksamajiksanskritikaarthik paradhinata se mukti ke lie san  se san  tak dirghavadhi krantiyagy kee balivedi par anek rashtrabhakton ne apana sarvasv nyauchhavar kar diya tha isi kranti yagya kee gauravagatha janamanas men sahity aur sahityetihas men ankit hai bharatiy dak seva ke adhikari evan yuva sahityakar krishn kumar yadav v yuva lekhika aakanksha yadav dvara susampadit pustak kranti yagy h  kee gatha men bharatiy svadhinata sangram kee amar balidani gaurav gathaon evan inake vibhinn pahaluon ko vividh jivan kshetron se sankalit karake aitihasik shodhagranth ke roop men prastut kiya hai is prastuti men bharatiy svadhinata sangram ke gyat v agyat amar shahidon aur senaniyon ko vistrit rashtriy asmita ke bhavapoorn parivesh men ankit karane ka sarthak prayas kiya gaya hai jo apane rashtriy jivan ke aadarshamay sandeshon se paripoorn hai apani sampadakeey men krishn kumar yadav ne svayan kaha hai ki bharat ka svadhinata sangram ek aisa aandolan tha jo apane aap men ek mahakavy hai lagabhag ek shatabdi tak chale is aandolan ne bharatiy rashtriyata kee avadharana se sangathit hue logon ko ekajut kiya yah aandolan kisi ek dhara ka paryay nahin tha balki isamen samajik dharmiksudharak rashtravadi sahityakar patrakar krantikari kangresi gandhivadi ityadi sabhi kisi n kisi roop men sakriy the inhi vicharon ko pramanikata pradan karate hue is shodh sahity men un sabhi vicharakon chintakon itihasakaron aur amar balidani krantikari shahidon se jude evan unakee lekhani se nikale aitihasik dastavejon ka sankalan kiya gaya hai

kranti yagy h  kee gatha men jin lekhon ko sankalit kiya gaya hai unhen do bhagon men banta ja sakata hai pratham bhag  ke svatantry sangram kee prishthabhoomi kranti kee tivrata aur kranti ke nayakon par kendrit hai to doosare bhag men  kee kranti ke paravarti aandolanon aur nayakon ka chitran hai pratham svadhinata sangram par svayan sampadak krishn kumar yadav ka likha huaa lekh  kee kranti h prishthabhoomi aur vistara sarvadhik ullekhaniy hai is aalekh men tatkalin eest indiya kampani kee shoshan niti aur bharatiyon ke prati unakee kroorata ko  kee kranti ka pramukh karan mana gaya hai isake alava bharatiy paramparaon aur dharmik manyataon ko kuchal kar eesaee dharm ke vistar kee niti ko bhi kranti upajane ka karan mana gaya hai ghatanaon ka tarkasangat vishleshan karate hue vidvan lekhak ne us kranti ko matr sipahiyon ka vidroha athava samanti virodha ke angrej itihasakaron ke jhoothe prachar ka khandan bhi kiya hai krishn kumar ne bade nayab tarike se ankit kiya hai ki  kee kranti ko kuchh itihasakaron ne mahasvapn kee shokantika bhale hi kaha ho par is garvile upakram ke falasvaroop hi bharat ka nayab moti eest indiya kampani ke hathon se nikal gaya aur jald hi kampani bhang ho gaee

pan javahar lal neharoo kee pustak bharat kee khoja se uddhrit aitihasik aalekh h aajadi kee pahali angadaee is sangrah ka mahatvapoorn aalekh hai jisamen vishv itihas kee jhalak ke sath tatkalin rashtriy vicharadharaon v unake prabhavon ka sanskritik aur samajik paksh ujagar huaa hai isamen bharat ke pratham pradhanamantree ne un sabhi pakshon ka varnnan kiya hai jo janamanas men british shasan ke virooddh upaje aakrosh ka karan the sangrah men ek aur mahatvapoorn aalekh daae ramavilas sharma ka  kee rajy krantihitihasakaron ka drishtikonna hai  kee kranti ka adhyayan karane ke lie shree sharma ne itihasakar shree majoomadar shree sen aur shree joshi ke lekhon ka vishleshan kiya hai makrsavadi drishtikon aur paddhati ko svikar karane vale itihasakaron ne british satta ka paksh liya hai daae sharma ne aise tathyon ka tarkasangat khandan kiya hai

striyon kee duniyan ghar ke bhitar hai shasansootr ka sahaj svami to puroosh hi hai athava shasan v samar se striyon ka sarokar nahin jaisi tamam purooshavadi sthapanaon ko dhvast karata aakanksha yadav ka lekh viranganaon ne bhi jagaee svadhinata kee alakha svatantry samar men mahilaon kee prabhavi bhoomika ko karine se prastut karata hai inamen se kaee viranganaon ka jikr to itihas ke pannon men milata hai par kaee viranganaon kee mahima atit ke pannon men hi dabakar rah gayi isi kram men aasharani vhora dvara prastut pratham krantikari shahid kishorihpritilata vadedara evan svatantrata senani yuvatiyon men sarvadhik lambi jel saja bhugatane vali nagalaind kee rani gidaloo ke sambandh men lekh bhi mahatvapoorn hain aajad hind fauj men leftinent rahin manavati aayrya ka manana hai ki bharat apani sajjanata ke vyavahar ke karan samrajyavadi angrejon kee kootanitik chalon v hinsavadi gatividhiyon ka shikar bana tha apane lekh bharatiy svatantrata kee do sashastr krantiyan men ve  kee kranti v aajad hind fauj kee ladaee ko bharat kee aajadi ke pramukh aadhar stambh ke roop men chinhit karati hain

kee kranti ka itihas mangal pande bahadur shah jafar tatya tope nana sahab ajimulla khan maulavi ahamadulla shah kunvar sinh rani lakshmibaee jaise krantidharmiyon ke bina adhoora hai vidvan lekhak shree ram shiv moorti yadav ne  kee kranti ka pratham shahid mangal pande ko manate hue jo tathy prastut kiye hain vah angrejon kee barbaratatanashahi aur nirankushata ka pardafash karane valepramanikkanoonipahaloo ko ujagar karate hain jabalapur ke sena aayudh kor ke sangrahalay men rakhe mangal pande ke fansinama ka hindi anuvad is lekh kee vishishtata hai vijay narayan tivari dvara atit ke pannon se uddhrit bahadurashah jafar ka aitihasik ghoshana patra sanskritik aur samajik samarasata ko aadhar deta sabhi bharatiyon ko sangathit hokar aatatayi ke virooddh aandolit hone ka nimantran patr hai gurilla yuddh men mahir tatya tope ke sambandh men dinesh bihari trivedi ka lekh kaee pahaluon kee padatal karata hai angrejon ne aise krantidharmi ke lie galat nahin likha tha ki yadi us samay bharat men aadha darjan bhi tatya tope sarikhe senapati hote to british senaon kee har tay thi ek hath men kalam dooje men talavar lekar avadh kshetr men kranti kee alakh jagane vale vilakshan vairagi maulavi ahamadulla shah ne kranti ka anootha adhyay racha kumar narendr sinh dvara un par prastut aalekh vartaman parivesh men har ghatana ko sampradayik najar se dekhane valon ke lie ek sabak hai

kee kranti ka vishleshan sanchartantr kee bhoomika ke bina nahin kiya ja sakata  men harakaron ne krantikariyon ko jabaki tar ne angrejon ko jo madad di usane mote taur par pratham svatantrata sangram kee jayparajay ka lekhajokha likh diya aravind sinh ne  aur sanchar tantra men in bhavanaon ko bakhoobi vyakt kiya hai jaisejaise logon men svadhinata kee akulahat badhati gayi vaisevaise angrejon ne svadhinata kee aakanksha ka daman karane ke lie tamam raste akhtiyar kiye jinamen sabase bhayanak kalapani kee saja thi krishn kumar yadav ka lekh krantikariyon ke balidan kee saksheeh selyular jela manavata ke virooddh angrejon ke kukrityon ka amanaviy paksh spasht karata hai isamen kalapani kee saja ka aatankit karane vala saty aur usase sangharsh karate krantikariyon kee viratadhirata aur rashtrahit ke lie svatantrata kee balibedi par kurban ho jane kee adamy lalasa ka aatmotsargaparak varnnan prerak shabdavali men vyakt kiya gaya hai vir savarakar kee aatmakatha se uddhrit kalapani kee yatana ka varnnan to rongate khada kar deta hai

kee kranti ke jayparajay kee apani manyatayen hain par isamen koee shak nahin ki  kee aajadi kee prishthabhoomi  men hi taiyar ho gaee thi yahan tak kee fransisi pres ne bhi  ko gambhirata se liya tha svatantrata kisi ek vyakti jati dharm ya prant kee mohataj nahin hai balki yah sabake sammilit prayason se hi prapt huee kranti yagya pustak men da esaela nagauri ne svatantrata men jainon ke yogadan da ema sheshan ne tamilanadu ke yogadan ke nath ne dalitonpichhadon ke yogadan ko chinhit kiya hai kahate hai ki itihas unhin ka hota hai jo satta men hote hain par sattasin log yah bhool jate hain ki itihas apani gatha khud kahata hai yah sirf pannon par hi nahin balki lokamanas ke kanth men giton aur kinvadantiyon ityadi ke madhyam se pidhidarpidhi pravahit hota rahata hai aitihasik ghatanaon ke sarthak vishleshan hetu loketihas ko bhi sametana jaroori hai da suman raje ne apane lekh loketihas aur  kee jankranti men ise darshane ka gambhir prayas kiya hai bharatiy svadhinata ka sangram sirf vyaktiyon dvara nahin lada gaya balki kaviyon aur lok gayakon ne bhi logon ko prerit karane men pramukh bhoomika nibhayi isi kadi men yuva lekhika aakanksha yadav ke lekh lok kavy men svadhinata men  kee svatantry gatha ka anahad nad sunaee padata hai

sahity ka uddeshy hai samajik roopantaran yah anayas hi nahin hai ki tamam krantikari v netritvakarta achchhe sahityakar v patrakar bhi rahe hai vastutah kranti men koodane vale yuvak bhavavesh matr se sanchalit nahin the balki sushikshit v vichar sampann the vicharsahitykranti ka yah bejod santulan ramaprasad bismil roshan sinh ashafakaulla khan shachindr nath sanyal bhagat sinh bal gangadhar tilak ityadi jaise tamam krantikariyon men mahasoos kiya ja sakata hai da soory prasad dikshit ne krantikari aandolan aur sahity rachana men kranti kee mashal ko jalaye rakhane men lekhani ke yogadan par khoobasoorat roop men prakash dala hai kanapur se ganesh shankar vidyarthi dvara prakashit pratapa akhabar kee bhoomika svatantrata ke aandolan ko gati dene men rahi hai is rashtriy asmita ke sanrakshak patr ko tatha usake yashasvi deshabhakt sanpadak ko mahatv dekar samman pradan karana apani sahityik virasat ko samman dena hai da ramesh varma dvara prastut lekh svadhinata aandolan ke itihas men pratap kee bhoomika ko bhi isi pariprekshy men dekha ja sakata hai yah sahityik kranti ka hi kamal tha ki angrejon ne anek pustakon aur giton ko pratibandhit kar diya tha madanalal varma kanta ne in durlabh sahityik rachanaon ko anek vismrit aakhyanon aur pannon se dhanoodh nikala hai aur pratibandhit krantikari sahitya men british sarakar dvara jabt kee gayi pustakon evan patrapatrikaon par soochanatmak dhang men mahatvapoorn lekh likha hai

kee kranti ke  varsh poore hone ke sathsath  ka mahatv isalie bhi aur badh jata hai ki yah saradar bhagat sinh sukhadev aur durga devi vohara ka janm shatabdi varsh hai yogy sampadak dvay krishn kumar aur aakanksha yadav kee yah khoobi hi kahi jayegi ki is tathy ko vismrit karane kee bajay unake yogadan ko bhi kranti yagy men unhonne rekhankit kiya bhagat sinh par unake krantikari sathi shiv varma dvara likha sansmaranatmak aalekh is pustak ko mahatvapoorn banati hai to pahala giramitiya se charchit giriraj kishor ne jab bhagat sinh ne hindi ka nara buland kiya men ek naye sandarbh men bhagat sinh ko prastut kiya hai koee bhi desh apani bhasha aur sahity ke bina apani pahachan nahin bana sakata aur bharatiy sandarbh men hindi ko pratishthit karane kee bhagat sinh kee svarnim kalpana vartaman pariprekshy men punah prasangik hai bhagat sinh bhavavesh hone kee bajay tarkik dhang se apani bat kahana pasand karate the yatindr nath das kee shahadat ke bad madarn rivyoo ke sampadak dvara inkalab jindabada nare kee sampadakeey aalochana ke pratyuttar men bhagat sinh v batukeshvar datt dvara likha gaya aitihasik patr kranti yagya pustak men samahit hai is patr men kranti shabd ka arth pragati ke lie parirvatan kee bhavana evan aakanksha vyakt kiya gaya tha krantikari sukhadev par satyakam pahariya ka lekh aur durga devi vohara par aakanksha yadav ka lekh unake vistrit jivan par prakash dalate hain aakanksha yadav ne is tathy ko bhi udadhrit kiya hai ki ek hi varsh kee vibhinn tithiyon men janmatithi padane ke bavajood bhagatasinh apana janmadin durga devi ke janmadin par unhin ke sath manate the aur unake pati bhagavaticharan vohara sahit tamam krantikari is avasar par apani upasthiti darj karate the

shahidon kee chitaon par lagenge har baras mele vatan par marane valon ka yahi bakee nishan hoga kee bhavana ko aatmasat karate hue amit kumar yadav ne svatantrata sangharsh aur krantikari aandolana ke madhyam se krantikari gatividhiyon ko bakhoobi sanjoya hai to satyakam pahariya ne svadhinata men yogadan dene vale tamam manishiyon v krantikariyon kee bhoomikaon ko saheja hai krantikari manmathanath gupt kee kalam se angreji hukoomat kee choolen hila deni vale kakori kand ka sacha yuva pidhi ka dhyan aakrisht karata hai chandrashekhar aajad krantikari aandolan men pramukh stambh the krantikari ramakrishn khatree ka un par likha sansmaranatmak aalekh kaee chhuyeanachhuye pahaluon kee padatal karata hai aajad ke maujar pistaul kee rochak dastan bhi krantiyagya men shamil hai ram prasad bismil kee vin jayanti par sankalit lekh kalam aur rivalvar par bismil kee saman jadoogari preranaspad hai svadhinata aandolan men svarajy svadeshi v vahishkar kee bhoomika par alagoo ray shastree ka lekh us samay kee bhavanaon ko khoobasoorati se abhivyakt karata hai to da badrinarayan tivari ka chetavani bhara aalekh svadhinata sangram kee balidani bhavana ko sahejane aur use banaye rakhane ka sandesh deta hai

svatantrata sangram ka itihas mahatma gandhi ke bina adhoora hai sanyukt rashtr sangh varsh  se gandhi jayanti ko vishv ahinsa divasa ke roop men manaye jane kee ghoshana karake shanti v ahinsa ke pujari mahatma gandhi ke vicharon kee prasangikata ko ek bar punah siddh kar diya hai aise men krishn kumar yadav ka lekh samagr vishvadhara men vyapt hain mahatma gandhi vartaman pariprekshy men kafi prasangik hai kanapur  kee kranti aur usake pashchat bhi gatividhiyon ka pramukh kendr raha hai nana sahab tatya tope v ajimulla khan ne yahin se sare desh men kranti kee alakh jagaee to kalantar men bhagat sinh v aajada jaise tamam krantikariyon hetu yah dharati preranabindu bani aise men jangeaajadi kanapura lekh kaee mahatvapoorn ghatanaon ko samane lata hai ganesh shankar vidyarthi kee supautree daae madhulekha vidyarthi ne bhi svadhinata sangram men kanapur kee bhoomika par vistrit prakash dala hai

krantiyagya ke visheshata sirf yah nahin hai ki isamen svadhinata sangram se jude har pahaloo ko chhoone kee koshish kee gayi hai balki isamen ajimulla khan dvara rachit  ka mahaprayan gita rashtragit vandemataram parshad ji dvara rachit jhanda gita krantikariyon kee gitahd var aaf indipendens evan bharatbhraman par nikali aajadi eksapresa jaisi rochak baton ko shamil kar ise jivant v samasamayik banaya gaya hai aavaran prishth par mashal top v dhal ke sath aajadi kee ladaee ko dhar dene vale mahapurooshon ke chitron ka ankan is pustak ko aur bhi khoobasoorat banata hai

aajakal mera dhyan is saval kee or barbar jata hai ki aaj se saupachas varsh bad bharat ka roop kya hone vala hai kya vah aisa bharat hoga jise kanban kabir akabar tulasidas vivekanand aur gandhi pahachan sakenge athava badalakar vah poorakapoora amarika aur yoorop ban jaaiga pichhale saudedh sau varshon se bharat aadhunikata kee or badhata aa raha hai lekin samajha yah jata hai ki bharat ab bhi aadhunik desh nahin hai vah madhyakalinata se aachchhann hai svatantrata ke bad se aadhunikata ka prashn atyant prakhar ho utha hai kyonki chintak yah manate hain ki hamane agar aadhunikata ka varan shighrata ke sath nahin kiya to hamara bhavishy andhakarapoorn ho jayega ataev yah prashn vicharaniy hai ki aadhunik banane par bharat ka kaunsa roop bachane vala hai aur kaun balidan men jayega naitikata saundarybodh aur adhyatm ke saman aadhunikata koee shashvat mooly nahin hai

sach poochhiye to vah mooly hai hi nahin vah keval samaysapekshy dharm hai navin yug samaysamay par aate hi rahate hai aur jaise aaj ke naye jamane par aaj ke logon ko naj hai usi tarah har jamane ke log apane jamane par naj karate hai sansar ka koee bhi samaj kisi bhi samay itana svabhavik nahin raha hai ki vah har aadami ko pasand ho aur koee samaj aisa bhi nahin bana hai jisake bad ka kal usaka aalochak nahin huaa ho vaidik yug bharat ka pray sabase adhik svabhavik kal tha yahi karan hai ki aaj tak bharat ka man us kal kee or barbar lobh se dekhata hai

vaidik aary apane yug ko svarnnakal kahate the ya nahin yah ham nahin janate kintu unaka samay hamen svarnnakal ke saman avashy dikhayi deta hain lekin jab bauddh yug ka aaranbh huaa vaidik samaj kee pol khulane lagi aur chintakon ke bich usakee aalochana aaranmbh ho gayi bauddh yug anek drishtiyon se aaj ke aadhunikataaandolan ke saman tha brahmanon kee shreshthata ke viruddh buddh ne vidroh ka prachar kiya tha jatipratha ke buddh virodhi the aur manushy ko ve janmana nahin karmana shreshth ya adham samajhate the nariyon ko bhikshuni hone ka adhikar dekar unhone yah bataya tha ki moksh keval purooshon ke hi nimitt nahin hai usakee adhikarani nariyan bhi ho sakati hain buddh kee ye sari baten bharat ko yad rahi hain aur buddh ke samay se barabar is desh men aise log utpann hote rahe hain jo jatipratha ke virodhi the jo manushy ko janmana nahin karmana shreshth ya adham samajhate the

aaj kee aadhunikata ke prasang men dekhen to buddh ke yuddhvirodhi vichar bhi aadhunik the kintu buddh men aadhunikata se bemel bat yah thi ki ve nivritivadi the grihasthi ke karm se ve bhikshudharm ko shreshth samajhate the unakee prerana se desh ke hajaronlakhon yuvak jo hattekatte the hal jotane aur gadi hankane ke yogy the utpadan badhakar samaj ka bharannposhan karane ke layak the sannyasi ho gaye aur unakee yuva patniyan jivit vaidhavy kee vedana se kaharane lagin sannyas kee sanstha samajvirodhini sanstha hai hansihansi men ek bar svami vivekanand ne bhi kaha tha ki sannyas ka ek bada dosh yah hai ki vah achchhe logon ko samaj se alag kar deta hai kintu vivekanand fir bhi adhik aadhunik nikale kyonki apane sannyasiyon ko unhonne samajasevi bana diya

vivekanand ke sannyasi ek daravaje se sansar se nikal jate hain kintu doosare daravaje se ve sansar men hi vapas aa jate hai apani grihasthi chhodakar ve sabakee grihasthi men sahayata karate hain kintu buddh kee drishti aihik thi hi nahin ve manushy ko yah upadesh dete the ki jivan jalata huaa makan hai aur buddhimani kee bat yah hai ki ham is aag se nikal bhagen jivan dukhapoorn hai aur sare dukhon kee jad manushy ka janm hai ataev hamen vah rasta pakadana chahie jisase janm lena hi asanbhav ho jay srishti ke vishay men buddh kee drishti kya thi isaka spashtikaran buddh ne kabhi nahin kiya is par buddh ko kaee nastik athava sandehavadi manate hain garache adhik sachcha mat yah maloom hota hai ki buddh eganastik the kyonki unaka vichar tha ki jo tatv bhautikottar aur indriyon kee pahunch ke par hain unhen buddhi nahin jan sakati hai aur unakee yahi nastikata aur sandehavadita unhen aadhunik yug ke lie aakarshak bana deti hai

nastik to charvak aur brihaspati bhi the kintu charvak aur brihaspati bharatiy vicharadhara athava usake drishtikon ka pratinidhitv nahin karate kintu buddh bharatiy vicharadhara ke bahut bade pratinidhi hai unaka bharatiy chintan par prabhav hai aur bharatiy sanskriti ke pratinidhi hone ke karan hi ve vishnu ke navam avatar mane jate hain gautam buddh prachand buddhivadi the ve janata kee shradva ka shoshan karake us par apana mat ladana chahate the apane shishyon se bhi unhone kaha tha aatmadipo bhava tum apana dipak aap bano tum meri koee bhi bat isalie mat mano ki vah meri kahi huee hai tumhen unhin baton men vishvas karana chahie jo tumhari khud kee samajh men aati hon jin prashnon ka samadhan buddhi se nahin ho sakata aur jinake uttar pane ya n pane se aadami ka kuchh banata bigadata nahin vaise sabhi prashnon ko tathagat ne avayakrit koti men dal diya tha aur unake poochhe jane kee manahi kar di thi diryanikay ke potthapadsutt men buddh karate hai podvapad log nity hai aur doosara mat yah ki lok nirarthak hai ise mainne avyakrit kathan ka avishay kaha hai potthapad ke yah poochhane par ki kisalie bhante bhagavan ne ise avyakrit kaha hai tathagat ne batalaya ki isalie ki ye prashn n to arthayukt hain n dharmayukt n aadi brahmachary ke upayukt n nirved vairagy ke lie n nirodh ke lie n upasham ke lie arthat in prashnon ke vivechan men padane se manushy ko kuchh bhi prapt hone vala nahin hai

kintu buddh ka avyakrit charon or se nishchhidr nahin hai kyoki paralok ko ve manate the devataon kee yoni men unaka vishvas tha aur garache aatma ko ve nashavan samajhate the kintu aavagaman ke sidvant men unaka atal vishvas tha aur ve manate the ki jo aatma sharir ke sath nasht hoti hai usi ka punarjanm bhi hota hai ataev janmantaravad aur karmafalavad men unaka poora vishvas tha aur is mamale men unaka darshan vahi tha jo vaidik dharm valon ka raha hai buddh ke pahale bharat men sanskriti kee ek hi dhara bahati thi jise ham vaidik sanskriti ke nam se janate hai kintu buddh ke aavirbhav ke bad se is desh men sanskriti kee do dharaen bahane lagi hai

pahali dhara sanskriti kee vah matdhara hai jo varnashramdharm ka samarthan karati hai jatipratha ko kayam rakhana chahati hai shoodron ko oopar uthane dena nahin chahati chhuaachhoot men vishvas karati hai aur any dharmon aur sanskritiyon ke prabhav se bachakar jina chahati hai doosari dhara vah hai jo buddh ke kamandalu se nikali hai yah dhara brihat manavata kee dhara hai ab to is dhara ka bhi eeshvar men vishvas hai aur vah janmantaravad aur karmafalavad ko usi dridhata se manati hai jis dridhata ke sath vaidik dharm usamen vishvas karata hai kintu yah dhara varnashramdharm ke viruddh hai jatpat ko vah nahin manati hai chhuaachhoot ko vah adharm samajhati hai shoodro aur daliton ke lie usake bhitar khas pakshapat hai tatha any dharmon aur sanskritiyon se vah dvesh nahin prem karati hai kamse kam unake prati vah poorn roop se sahanashil hai

bad ke dotin baras men jab main mayer gaya to mainne nishanebaji nahin kee fir bhi samay shanadar guzara vahan ka jivan ekadam tanav rahit tha paidal ghoomane ya ghudasavari karane ke lie doordaraj ke ilake bade hi dilakash the aur sham ko sab baithakar sangit aur gappabaji ka aanand lete the hamari gappen bahut vyaktigat nahin hoti thin jaisa ki bade parivaron men aksar hoti hain garmiyon men poora parivar aksar purane portiko kee sidhiyon men baith jata tha samane hi fulavari thi aur makan ke thik samane faila huaa dhalavan jangal nadi men chamakata rahata tha nadi men machhaliyon kee chhalang ya jal pakshiyon ka tairana bada hi manamohak tha mere dilo dimag par mayer kee un shamon kee yad aaj bhi taza hai main ankal jos ka bahut aadar karata tha aur mujhe unase lagav bhi bahut tha ve bahut hi maun prakriti ke aur ekantapriy vyakti the lekin mujhase kaee bar khulakar baten karate the ve atyant saral aur spasht vivek ke svami the mujhe nahin lagata ki sansar men aisi koee bhi shakti hogi jo unhen us marg se vichalit kar sake jo marg unakee samajh men sahi ho unake bare men main hores ke kavy kee kuchh panktiyan kahata tha

kaimbrija  edinabarga men do satra guzarane ke bada pata nahin mere pita ko malooma ho gaya ya meri bahanon ne bata diya ki main fijishiyana banane ka vichara pasanda nahin karata unhonne mujhase kaha ki main padari bana jaoon to behatara hoga kyonki main eka nithalla shikari banoon isa bata ke ve prakhara virodhi the usa samaya to yahi sambhavana jyada thi ki main shikari banane kee ora kadama badha raha tha mainne sochane ke lie kuchha mohalata mangi taki charcha aofa inglainda ke sabhi dharmasootron ke prati apane mana men vishvasa paida kara sakoon kyonki suni sunaee baton ke karanna men mana men bahutasi aashankaen ghara kara chukee thin isake alava main padari banane ke vichara ko pasanda karata tha isi krama men mainne eesaee siddhanton para piyarasana ke lekha aura anya dharmagrantha bahuta hi savadhani se padhe usa samaya to baibala ke pratyeka shabda men varnita satya ka kade aura aksharashah palana karane men mujhe sandeha nahin raha gaya jalda hi main isa bata ka murida ho gaya ki eesaee mata ke siddhanton ka sampoornna roopa se palana hona chahie

is bat par dhyan doon ki mere vicharon ke karan kis prakar se mujh par roodhivadiyon ne hamale kie to yah bada hi asangat lagata hai ki kabhi main padari banana chahata tha vaise mera to abhipray nahin tha aur mainne pitaji kee ichchha ko chhoda bhi nahin tha lekin padari banane ka yah vichar bhi us samay svabhavik roop se dam tod gaya jab mainne prakritivadi ke roop men bigala men kam shuroo kiya yadi manas vigyaniyon ka bharosa kiya jae to main padari banane ke lie kaee mayanon men ekadam sahi tha kuchh varsh pahale jarman manas vigyani sosayati ke karyalay se mujhe ek patr mila tha jisamen unhonne kafi shiddat ke sath mera foto manga tha kuchh samay bad mujhe unakee baithakon ka vrittant prapt huaa usamen yah ullekh tha ki mere lalat ka aakar prakar vahan charcha ka vishay raha aur vahan maujood ek vakta ne to yahan tak kaha ki mere jaisa unnat lalat to das padariyon ko milakar bhi nahin hoga

jab yah tay ho gaya ki main padari banoon to yah bhi zaroori ho gaya ki is disha men taiyari karane ke lie main kisi inglish yoonivarsiti men padhane jaoon aur upadhi hasil karoon mere sath sankat yah tha ki skool chhodane ke bad mainne koee shastreey granth nahin padha tha mujhe yah jan kar bada hi kshobh huaa ki in do baras ke dauran skool men padha huaa sab kuchh bhool gaya tha sab kuchh yahan tak ki grik varnnamala ke kuchh akshar bhi isalie main aktoobar men thik samay par kaimbrij nahin ja saka balki shroojaberi men hi praivet tyootar se padha aur fir krisamas kee chhuttiyon ke dauran  kee shuruaat men hi kaimbrij ja paya mainne jald hi skool kee sari padhaee ko yad kar liya aur homara tatha grika testamenta jaisi aasan grik pustakon ka suvidhanusar anuvad bhi kar lene laga tha

yadi shaikshanik gyan ko dekha jae to mainne kaimbrij men tin baras ka apana samay barabad kiya yah thik vaisa hi raha jaisa edinabarg men skool men huaa tha mainne ganit ka abhyas shuroo kiya aur  kee garmiyon men baramauth men praivet tyootar bhi rakha lekin meri padhaee bahut dhimi chal rahi thi mujhe bijaganit ke shuruaati sootr to bematalab hi lag rahe the padhaee men is tarah kee adhirata dikhana ek tarah se bevakoofi thi kyonki bad ke samay men main khud ko hi kosata tha ki mainne mehanat kyon nahin kee aur ganit ke kuchh vikhyat sootron ko kyon nahin samajha mujhe lagane laga tha ki ganit kee janakari rakhane vale prabal medha ke svami hote hain lekin sath hi mujhe yah bhi mahasoos huaa ki ganit kee padhaee men main khas kuchh kar bhi n pata shastreey gyan ke bare men mainne kolej ke anivary laikcharon ke alava kuchh khas nahin kiya aur inamen bhi main mamooli taur par hi jata tha

apane doosare varsh ke dauran litil go pas karane ke lie mainne ek ya do mahine jamakar mehanat kee aur beda par ho gaya isi tarah se antim varsh men bie kee digri pane ke lie mainne manoyog se adhyayan kiya apana shastreey gyan bijaganit aur yooklid doharaya yooklid men mujhe vaisa hi aanand aaya jaisa ki skooli dinon men aata tha bie kee pariksha pas karane ke lie mujhe pale dvara likhita evidensa aofa filosfi padhana bhi zaroori tha yah kam mainne man lagakar kiya aur mujhe yah to bharosa ho hi gaya tha ki main sampoorn evidensa ko poori shuddhata ke sath likh sakata tha han itana zaroor hai ki pale jaisi spasht bhasha nahin likh pata is kitab ke vibhinn prakar ke tarkon ne aur main yah bhi kahoonga ki unakee prakritik aadhyatm vidya ne mujhe yooklid jaisa hi aanand pradan kiya in rachanaon ka savadhanipoorvak adhyayan hamare shaikshanik pathyakram ka vah bhag tha jo mere dimagi vikas ke lie shikshan men zarasa bhi kam ka nahin tha mainne in rachanaon kee tota ratant ka prayas nahin kiya ise main tab bhi bekar manata tha aur aaj bhi manata hoon mainne us samay pale kee bhoomika ke bare men svayan ko jyada pareshan nahin kiya isi vishvas ke boote main tark vitark kee parampara se khush aur santusht bhi raha pale ke sabhi prashnon ka thik uttar dene yooklid men behatar taiyari aur shastron kee padhaee men bhi dayaniy roop se asafal n hone ke karan mujhe aanars n karane vali polloee ya logon kee bhid men achchha sthan aur digri bhi mil gayi mujhe thik tarah se to nahin maloom ki mera raink kitana oopar tha lekin mujhe thoda bahut yad hai ki soochi men panchaven dasaven ya shayad barahaven sthan par tha

yoonivarsiti men kaee vishayon par sarvajanik vyakhyan die jate the aur inamen haaajir hona apani marji ke mutabik tha lekin edinabarg men laikchar sun sunakar main itana oob gaya tha ki main sedavika ke prabhavashali aur rochak vyakhyanon men bhi nahin gaya yadi main un vyakhyanon men gaya hota to bahut pahale hi bhoovigyani ban jata halanki mainne vanaspatishastr men hensalo ke vyakhyan sune aur unakee spashtata ko tatha atyadhik prabhavashali uddharanon ko mainne bahut pasand kiya lekin main vanaspatishastr padhata nahin tha hensalo apane shishyon aur yoonivarsiti ke kuchh purane sadasyon ko lekar door daraj ke ilakon tak paidal ya ghodagadi men ya fir nadi ke bahav ke sath sath bajare men baithakar adhyayan yatraon par jate the is dauran pae jane vale durlabh paudhon aur pashuon par ve vyakhyan dete ye adhyayan yatraen badi manoranjak hoti thin

is samay vaise to yahi lag raha hoga ki kaimbrij men padhaee ke dauran mere jivan ke kuchh nirdharak pahaloo ujagar ho rahe the to bhi main yahi kahoonga ki vahan mera samay buri tarah se barabad ho raha tha bhayankar barabadi nishanebaji kee aur shikar karane kee meri bhavana mar chukee thi aur ab mujhe desh ke door door ke hisson kee sair karane men maza aane laga tha main door door tak ghudasavari karata yahan main ek naee hi chandal chaukadi men fans gaya tha hamari is mandali men kuchh lafange aur nich pravritti ke yuvak bhi the ham aksar sham ko ek sath bhojan karate halanki inamen hamare sath aksar koee n koee garimamay vyakti bhi rahata tha aur kaee bar ham jyada pi lete the aur bad men gate rahate ya tash khelate is tarah se jitani shamen mainne guzarin mujhe aaj bhi usake lie sharam mahasoos hoti hai halanki mere kuchh mitr bahut hi khushamijaz the aur ham sabhi ke dimag sataven aasaman par the lekin kul milakar mujhe un dinon kee yad bahut sukhadayak nahin hai

lekin mujhe yah janakar khushi bhi hai ki mere kuchh aur dost bhi the jo poori tarah alag prakriti ke the vhitale ke sath meri dantkati dosti vala mamala tha bad men vah siniyara raingalara bana ham donon kafi door tak ghoomane nikal jate the usane mujhamen achchhe chitron aur nakkashiyon ke prati rujhan paida kiya inamen se kuchh kalakritiyan mainne kharidin bhi main aksar fitjaviliyam gailari bhi jata rahata tha aur lagata hai meri ruchi bhi kafi achchhi thi kyonki mainne hamesha achchhe chitron kee prashansa kee thi aur unake bare men bujurg kyooretar se charcha bhi karata tha mainne sar joshuaa renald kee kitab kafi ruchi ke sath padhi halanki yah ruchi mere prakritik rujhan men nahin thi to bhi kuchh baras tak mainne isamen kafi ruchi li aur landan sthit neshanal gailari ke kaee sare chitr mujhe bahut aanandit karate the aur sebestiyana dela piyembo ke chitr to jaise mujhe divyalok men le jate the

main ek sangit mandali men bhi jata tha mera ek joshila dost harbarta mujhe vahan le gaya usake pas haee raingalar kee upadhi bhi thi is mandali men shamil hone aur unakee dhunon ko sunakar mujhamen sangit ke prati gahara lagav paida ho gaya tha main apani sair ka samay is tarah rakhata tha ki saptah ke dinon men kings kalej ke chaipal men us mandali ko rashtragan kee dhun bajate sun sakoon isamen mujhe itana gahara aanand aata tha ki kaee bar meri ridh men siharan daud jati thi main pakke taur par kah sakata hoon ki is lagav men koee banavat ya keval nakal nahin thi kyonki main kaee bar khud hi kings kalej chala jata tha aur kaee bar to giraje kee gayan mandali ke bachchon ko paise dekar apane kamare men unaka gayan sunata tha yah bat doosari hai ki mere kan sangit ko samajhane ke mamale men din hin the main ek bhi dhun samajh nahin pata tha aur n hi koee dhun baja pata tha sahi tarike se gunagunana to mere lie kathin tha fir bhi yah rahasy hi hai ki main sangit ka aanand kyonkar le pata tha

meri sangit mandali ke mere mitron ne jald hi meri halat ka andaja laga liya kaee bar ve sab sangit men mera imtihan lete aur apana manoranjan bhi karate ve koee dhun bajate aur fir sab mujhase poochhate ki inamen kaun kaun si dhunon ko main pahachan sakata hoon inhin dhunon ko jab ve samany se drut ya manthar gati se bajate the to mere lie aur bhi kathinaee hoti the is tarah se to goda sevda da kinga kee dhun bhi mere lie kashtaprad paheli ban jati thi ek aur vyakti bhi tha jo sangit men mere jitani hi samajh rakhata tha aur kahane men atapata lagata hai ki vah thoda bahut bansuri bhi baja leta tha hamari sangit mandali kee parikshaon men ek bar mainne use parajit kar diya to mujhe bahut khushi hasil huee thi

kaimbrij men rahane ke dauran main jis utsukata aur lagan se bhringi keet pakadata tha vah mere lie aanandadayak tha aur jitana aanand mujhe is kam men milata tha utana kisi any kam men nahin aata tha yah kam keval sangrah ka junoon tha kyonki main in keeton kee chir fad nahin karata tha han itana zaroor hai ki prakashit vivaranon ke sath in keeton ke bahari lakshan yadakada mila leta tha lekin main unake nam zaroor rakh leta tha keet sangrah ke bare men main apane utsah ke pramannasvaroop ek ghatana batata hoon

ek din ped kee purani chhal utarate samay mujhe do durlabh bhring dikhaee die mainne donon ko ek ek hath se uthaya tabhi mujhe tisara bhring bhi dikhaee diya main use bhi chhodana nahin chahata tha isalie mainne hath men pakade hue ek bhring ko munh men rakh liya durbhagyavash us keet men se koee tikha taral padarth nikala jisase meri jibh jal gayi aur main thoo thoo kar utha bhring munh se bahar gira aur sath hi tisara bhring bhi hath n aaya

main is prakar ke keeton ka sangrah karane men kafi safal raha aur isake lie mainne do nae tarike eezad kie mainne ek mazadoor rakh liya tha jo sardiyon men jam gae purane vrikshon kee chhal ko kat chhant kar bade thaile men bhar lata tha aur isi tarah daladali ilakon se sarakande lane vale bajaron kee tali men se kooda kachara bator lata tha is tarah se mujhe kuchh durlabh prajati ke bhring bhi mile

shayad kisi kavi ko apani pahali kavita ke prakashan par bhi itani prasannata nahin hoti hogi jitani mujhe us samay huee jab mainne stifana kee ilastreshansa aofa britisha insektsa men yah jaduee shabd dekhe  sar si darvin dvara sangrihita mere door ke rishte ke chachere bhaee dablayoo darvina foksa ek chatur aur bahut hi khushamijaj vyakti the us samay kraist kalej men padhate the main inake sath kafi hil mil gaya tha aur inhonne hi mujhe keet vigyan se parichit karaya isake bad main triniti kalej ke elbarta ve se bhi parichit huaa aur unake sath bhi keet sangrah ke lie jane laga aage chalakar yahi sajjan suvikhyat puratattvavetta bane sath men usi kalej ke ech thampasana bhi hote the bad men yah prasiddh krishivigyani gret relave ke cheyaramain aur sansad sadasy bhi bane lagata hai ki bhringi keeton ke sangrah kee meri ruchi men hi bhavishy men mere jivan kee safalata kee sootr chhipa huaa tha

mujhe is bat kee hairani hai ki kaimbrij men mainne jitane bhringi keet pakade unamen se kaee ne mere dimag par amit chhap chhod di thi jahan jahan mujhe achchha sangrah karane ka mauka laga un sabhi khambhon purane vrikshon aur nadi ke kinaron ko main aaj bhi yad kar sakata hoon un dinon penagiyasa kruksa mejara namak pyara bhringi keet ek khajane kee tarah se tha aur don men ghoomate hue mainne ek bhringi keet dekha jo ki sadak par daudata huaa ja raha tha mainne bhag kar use pakada aur turant hi mainne andaza laga liya ki yah penagiyasa kruksa mejara se thoda alag hai bad men pata chala ki vah pi kvadripanktetasa tha jo ki isakee ek kism ya isi kee nikat sambandhi prajati hai lekin isakee banavat men thoda antar hai mainne un dinon lisinas ko kabhi jinda nahin dekha tha yah keet bhi anajan vyakti ke lie kale kairabaiduasa bhring se shayad hi alag lage lekin mere beton ne yahan ek aisa hi keet pakada aur main turant jan gaya ki yah mere lie naya hai to bhi pichhale bis sal se mainne british bhringi keet nahin dekha hai

mainne abhi tak vah paristhiti nahin batayi hai jisane doosari baton kee tulana men mere samooche kairiyar ko sarvadhik prabhavit kiya yah ghatana thi profesar hensalo ke sath meri dosti kaimbrij aane se pahale mainne apane bhaee se unake bare men suna tha profesar hensalo vigyan kee har shakha ke bare men janate the aur main unake prati natamastak tha saptah men ek bar ve opan haus rakhate the us din yoonivarsiti men vigyan vishay padhane vale sabhi andar grejuet aur purane sadasy ekatr hote the foks ke madhyam se jald hi mujhe bhi sabha men shamil hone ka nimantran mila aur usake bad main niyamit roop se vahan jane laga hensalo ke sath ghulane milane men mujhe adhik samay nahin laga kaimbrij men bad ke dinon men main jyadatar unhin ke sath sair karane jata tha kuchh gurujan to mujhe yah bhi kahane lage the hensalo ke sath ghoomane vala vyakti aur aksar sham ko ve mujhe apane parivar ke sath bhojan par bula lete the vanaspati shastra keet vigyan rasayan khanij vigyan aur bhoovigyan men unhen vyapak gyan tha lambe samay tak nirantar chalane vale sookshm avalokan se nishkarsh nikalane kee unakee ruchi bahut gahari thi unakee nirnnay shakti advitiy aur unaka dimag santulit tha lekin mujhe koee bhi to aisa nahin dikhaee deta tha jo yah kahe ki profesar hensalo men aatm pragya nahin thi

ve bahut hi dharmik aur rudhivadi the ek din unhonne mujhe bataya ki thartinaina aartikalsa ka agar ek bhi shabd badala jae to unhen bahut dukh hoga unake naitik gun atyadhik prashansaniy the unamen lesh matr bhi mithya ahankar nahin tha ve any kshudr bhavanaon se bhi koson door the mainne aisa vyakti nahin dekha tha jo apane aur apane kary vyapar ke bare men bahut hi kam sochata ho ve har prakar kee ahanmanyata ya isi prakar kee sankeern vicharadhara se poori tarah mukt the unaka svabhav atyant shant tha ve sushil the aur doosare ke dil ko jit lete the lekin ve kisi bhi galat kam ke khilaf bahut hi jaldi aakrosh se bhar jate the aur fauran hi use rokane ka prayas bhi karate the

ek bar main unake sath kaimbrij kee sadakon par ghoom raha tha achanak hi mainne bada bhayankar drishy dekha jo shayad fransisi kranti men hi dikhaee diya hoga do uthaeegiron ko pulis dvara giraftar kiya gaya tha aur jel le jate samay ugr bhid ne unhen havaladar ke hathon se jhapat liya aur usi dhoolabhari tatha patharili sadak par donon uthaeegiron kee tangen pakadakar ghasitane lage ve donon hi sir se pair tak dhool se sane hue the lat ghoonson aur pattharon kee mar se unake chehare lahooluhan the donon hi adhamare hue ja rahe the bhid itani jyada thi ki un donon aafat ke mare uthaeegiron kee ek jhalak bhar dekh pae the ham donon us bhayankar drishy ko dekhakar hensalon ke chehare par jo pida mainne dekhi vaisi mainne apane jivan men kabhi nahin dekhi unhonne bar bar bhid ko chirakar rasta banane kee koshish kee lekin vah to asambhav tha ve turant meyar ke pas bhage aur mujhase kaha ki unake pichhe aane ke bajaye main kuchh aur pulisavalon ko bula laoon bakee to yad nahin han itana zaroor huaa ki pulis donon uthaeegiron ko jinda hi jel pahunchane men safal rahi

hensalo kee paropakarita aparimit thi unhonne garib dehatiyon ke lie jo behatarin yojanaen taiyar keen unase isake pakke praman milate hain hichem men rahane ke dauran to unhonne bahuton ka bhala kiya aise insan ke sath to meri ghanishthata honi hi thi aur mere khyal se yah mere lie apar labhadayak bhi raha

main ek chhotasa vakya batata hoon jo unakee udarata ko prakat karata hai namidar satah par parag kanon kee pariksha karate samay mainne dekha ki kuchh ganthen si nikal aayi hain apani yah aashcharyajanak khoj unhen turant batane ke lie main bhaga bhaga gaya unakee jagah vanaspatishastr ka koee doosara profesar hota to is tarah kee janakari dene ke lie meri badahavasi par hanse bina n rahata lekin unhonne is ghatana ko bada rochak bataya aur isaka aashay samajhate hue yah bhi spasht kiya ki yah koee naee ghatana nahin hai balki sarvavidit hai is ghatana se ve to bahut kam prabhavit hue lekin mujhe unhonne yahi ehasas karaya ki mainne svayan hi bahut ullekhaniy tathy ko bhali prakar samajh liya hai sath hi main isake lie bhi kritasankalp ho utha ki ab apani khoj ko lekar itani jaldabaji nahin karoonga

doktar vhivel purane parichiton aur khas logon men se ek the hensalo ke pas inaka aana jana hota rahata tha main kaee bar rat men unake sath hi ghar lautata tha gambhir vishayon par vyakhyan dene men sar je mekinatosh ke bad unhin ka sthan tha lekin mainne unake vyakhyan kabhi nahin sune hensalo aur liyonard jenyans men jija sale ka rishta tha liyonard bhi kabhi kabhar hensalo ke yahan rukate the inhonne aage chalakar prakritik itihas men bahut se utkrisht nibandh prakashit karae liyonard jab fains svathama bulabek kee sima par rah rahe the to main khas mehaman ke taur par unake pas gaya tha unake sath bhi prakrit itihas par mainne khoob baten keen ham milakar sair ko gae main apane se umr men bade kaee logon se parichit huaa jo vigyan ke bare men adhik chinta nahin karate the lekin ve sab hensalo ke dost the inamen ek skotamain bhi the jo sar alekjendar raimase ke bhaee the aur jisas kalej men shikshak the bahut kam umr men hi inaka dehant ho gaya tha ek mistar daves bhi the jo bad men haraforda ke din bane garibon ke lie shiksha vyavastha taiyar karane men inhonne bahut nam kamaya in logon aur aise hi gyanavan log tatha hensalo sab milakar gramin ilakon men door door tak adhyayan yatraon par jate the inamen mujhe bhi bulaya jata tha aur sabhi mujhe tahe dil se sath rakhate the

atit par najar daloon to main is nirnnay par pahunchata hoon ki mujhamen aisa zaroor kuchh tha jo mujhe aam naujavanon se alahada banae hue tha varana to main jin logon ke sath rahata tha ve n keval umr men mujhase bade the balki kahin jyada padhe likhe bhi the aur aisa n hota to unhonne mujhe kabhi bhi sath n liya hota

main apane ek shikari dost tarnar kee bat yad kar baithata hoon jisane mujhe gubarailon ka sangrah karate dekhakar kaha tha ki tum ek din royala sosayati ke failo banoge usakee aatma kee yah aavaz mujhe us samay nirarthak lagi thi

kaimbrij men apane antim varsh men mainne atyadhik savadhani baratate hue aur ruchi lete hue hambold likhit parsanala naretiva ka adhyayan kiya is rachana aur sar je harshel likhit introdakshana too di stadi aofa nechurala filasafi ne mere man men is utsah ko aur bhi badhava diya ki main bhi prakrit vigyan kee vishal sanrachana men apana tuchchh yogadan dene ka prayas karoon lagabhag darjan bhar doosari pustakon men se kisi bhi pustak ne mujh par itana prabhav nahin dala jitana in donon ne mainne hambold kee pustak men se tenarifel ke bare men likhe ansh kee nakal kee aur apani adhyayan yatraon ke dauran hensalo shayad remase aur deves ke samane isaka vachan kiya kyonki pahale kisi mauke par mainne tenarifel kee shobha ka jikr kiya tha aur hamari mandali ke kuchh logon ne yah bhi kaha tha ki ve vahan jane ka prayas karenge lekin mera vichar hai ki ve sab adhoore man se kah rahe the lekin main to bhitar se taiyar tha aur landan ke ek marchent se milakar jalayan ke bare men poochhatachh bhi kar chuka tha lekin meri yah yojana bigen par samudri yatra ke aage dhari rah gayi

garmi kee chhuttiyon ka mera sara vakt gubaraile pakadane kuchh padhaee karane aur chhoti moti yatraon men nikal jata tha patajhad ke dauran mera sara samay nishanebaji men jata tha main isamen se jyadatar samay vudahaus aur mayer men guzarata tha kaee bar main aayatan ke raees ke sath bhi rahata tha kul milakar kaimbrij men bitae gae tinon baras mere jivan ke sarvadhik khushi bhare rahe meri sehat bahut badhiya rahi aur kul milakar main kabhi dukhi nahin raha

main  kee shuruaat men krisamas par kaimbrij aaya tha isalie antim pariksha uttirn karane ke bad bhi mujhe do satron tak roka gaya tab hensalo ne hi mujhe samajhabujha kar bhoovigyan ka adhyayan shuroo karane ke lie kaha isalie shrapashayar lautane ke bad main bhookhandon kee vyavastha ka adhyayan karane laga aur shroojaberi ke aasapas ke ilakon ke rangadar nakshe bhi taiyar kie prachin chattanon ka bhoovaigyanik anveshan karane ke lie agast kee shuruaat men profesar sedavik narthavels kee yatra shuroo karane vale the hensalo ne unase kaha ki ve mujhe bhi sath chalane kee ijazat den sab taiyari karake ve mere pita ke ghar aakar ruke

sham ko unake sath thodi batachit ne mere dimag par gahara asar dala shroojaberi ke samip hi ek daladali gaddhe kee janch karate samay ek mazadoor ne mujhe bataya ki use gaddhe men se ek bada puranasa ushnnakatibandhiy shankh mila hai aise shankh jhopadiyon kee chimaniyon men bhi mil jate hain lekin us majadoor ne shankh bechane se mana kar diya main is bat se poori tarah sahamat tha ki use yah shankh vastav men gaddhe men se hi mila tha mainne sedavik ko yah bat bataee to sandeh nahin sach men ve ekadam bole ki kisi ne ise gaddhe men fenk diya hoga lekin ve yah bhi bole ki yadi yah vahin pada rahata to bhoovigyan ke lie durbhagy kee bat hoti kyonki yah hamen midalaind kauntij men dharataliy mitti ke jamav ke bare men kafi baton kee janakari dega daladal kee ye paraten vastut himanadiy yug se sambandhit hain aur bad ke varshon men ye mujhe aarkatik ke toote hue shankhon men bhi mile lekin us samay main ekadam hairan rah gaya ki sedavik is adbhut tathy par khush kyon nahin hue ki ushnnakatibandhiy ilake ka shankh yahan inglaind ke bichon bich ilake men zamin ke bhitar kahan se aaya hoga yadyapi mainne bahutsi vaigyanik pustakon ka adhyayan kiya tha lekin isase pahale mujhe itani gaharaee se yah ahasas nahin huaa tha ki tathyon ka samoohikaran karane men hi vaigyanikata hai kyonki isake bad hi koee samany niyam ya nishkarsh nikala ja sakata hai

agale din ham lengolen konave bengor aur kaipal koorig ke lie nikal pade is yatra ka ek labh to mujhe yah mil hi gaya ki kisi desh ke bhoovigyan ka adhyayan kis prakar kiya jae sedavik mujhe kaee bar apane hi samanantar chalane ko kahate aur kahate ki chattanon ke namoone lete chalo tatha nakshe par unaka star vinyas bhi chihnit karo mujhe thodasa sandeh hai ki unhonne yah meri bhalaee ke lie kiya tha kyonki main unakee sahayata karane men bahut hi udasin rahata tha is yatra ke dauran ek vishesh anubhav bhi huaa ki jab tak dhyan dekar n dekha jae to utkrishtatam lakshan ko bhi nazarandaz kar dena kitana aasan hota hai kvem idval men ham donon ne kaee kaee ghante lagakar sabhi chattanon ko bade hi dhyan se dekha kyonki sedavik unamen jivashm fosil talash rahe the lekin ham donon hi ne apane charon or bikhare pade himanadiy lakshanon par zara bhi dhyan nahin diya hamane samatal tarashi chattanon idhar udhar pade shilakhandon aavasanik aur parshviy himodhon par nazar hi nahin dali halanki ye lakshan itane suspasht hain ki isake kaee varsh bad filasfikala maigajin men prakashit ek lekh men mainne yah zikr kiya ki vah ghati apani kahani thik usi tarah se kah rahi thi jis tarah se jalakar khak huaa koee makan kahata hai yadi yah ghati abhi bhi himanad ke pani se bhari hoti to ye sabhi lakshan itane mukhar n hote jitane is samay hain

kepel kyoorig men main sedavik se alag ho gaya aur diksoochak tatha nakshe ke sahare nak kee sidh men chalata gaya tatha parvaton ko par karata huaa baramauth tak gaya raste men mainne kabhi bhi nirdharit marg ka anusaran nahin kiya sanyogavash mil gaya to doosari bat thi is prakar main ek aparichit biyaban men ja pahuncha aur is tarah kee yatra ka mainne khoob aanand uthaya main baramauth men padh rahe kaimbrij ke purane sathiyon se mila aur vahan se shroojaberi lauta aur nishanebaji ke lie mayer chala gaya us samay mujh par bhoovigyan ya kisi any vigyan kee banisbat chakor ke shikar ka bhoot savar tha
bigela se samudrayatra   disambara  se  aktoobara

narth vels kee is chhoti bhoovaigyanik yatra se lautane par mujhe bataya gaya tha ki kaiptan fitj ray ko ek sahayak chahie jo unake sath bina kuchh bhi vetan lie bigal kee samudr yatra par chal sake use prakritivadi ke roop men kam karana hoga aur badale men use kaiptan ray apane kebin kee sabhi kalakritiyan denge jahan tak mera vishvas hai mainne apane yatra sansmaran rojanamache men un sabhi ghatanaon ka jikr kiya hai jo us dauran ghatit hueen yahan main keval itana hi bataoonga ki main bhi is prastav ko manane ke lie poori tarah se ichchhuk tha lekin mere pita ne isaka purazor virodh kiya aur meri bhalaee ke lie yah bhi kahayadi tum samany buddhi ka aisa koee vyakti bata sako jo tumhen vahan jane kee salah de to main bhi sahamati de doonga isalie mainne usi sham inkar karate hue javab likh diya agali subah main pahali sitambar kee taiyari karane ke lie mayer chala gaya main nishanebaji kar raha tha ki mujhe ankal ne bulavaya unhonne mujhase shroojaberi chalane ke lie kaha aur bole ki ve mere pita se chalakar bat karenge ki us prastav ko manana buddhimani ka kam hoga mere pita hamesha yah manate the ki mere ankal vishv ke sarvadhik samajhadar vyakti hain unakee bat sunate hi pitaji ne fauran sahamati de di main kaimbrij men bahut fijoolakharchi karata tha isake lie mainne pitaji ko bharosa dilaya ki bigel yatra ke dauran main apane bhatte se jyada kharch nahin karoonga pitaji ne muskarate hue kaha lekin unhonne mujhe bataya hai ki tum bahut buddhiman ho

agale din main kaimbrij jane ko chal pada vahan hensalo se mila aur fir fitj ray se milane landan ke lie nikal gaya yah sare kam aananfanan men ho gaye isake bad jab fitj ray se kuchh ghanishtata ho gayi to unhonne mujhe bataya ki ve meri nak kee aakriti ke karan mujhe apane sath n lene ka man bana chuke the ve lavetara ke prabal anuyayi the aur is bat ko pakka manate the ki ve kisi bhi insan ke chehare se usaka charitr jan sakate the unhen sandeh tha ki mere jaisi nak vale insan men is samudr yatra ke lie paryapt takat aur ichchhashakti bhi hogi lekin main samajhata hoon ki bad men unhen yah to santosh ho gaya hoga ki meri nak ne galat aabhas diya tha

fitj ray ka charitr vilakshan tha unamen bahut se uttam lakshan the ve apane kartavy ke prati samarpit kisi bhi kami ke prati udar bahadur dridh pratigy aur gazab ke oorjavan to the hi apane sabhi matahaton ke lie joshile dost bhi the ve jise sahayata pane layak samajhate the us vyakti ke lie kuchh bhi kar guzarate the ve ek sajile sudarshan vyakti the unaka vyavahar bahut adhik shishtata liye hue tha unakee sabhi aadaten unake mama prasiddh lard kesalarig se milati thin jaisa ki riyo ke ministar ne bataya tha beshak unaka chehara charls dvitiy se milatajulata tha isi silasile men doktar vilish ne apana ek elabam diya tha unhin chitron men se ek chitr fitj ray se bahut milata julata tha bad men chitr ke niche likha nam mainne padha doktar ee sobeskee stuaart kaunt daalbain jo ki usi samrat ke vanshajon men se the

fitj ray ka mijaz bada hi ajib tha saveresavere to unaka mood aam taur par kharab hi rahata tha apani giddh jaisi paini nigah se unhe fauran hi pata chal jata tha ki jalayan par kuchh gadabad hai aur fir ilzam lagane men ve kisi ko bhi bakhshate nahin the ve mere prati kafi dayalu the lekin unake sath ghanishtata kar pana tedhi khir tha lekin ek hi kebin men rahane ke karan ham donon kee aadaton men kuchh ghalmel to ho hi gaya ham kaee bar ek doosare se ulajh bhi jate aise hi yatra kee shuruaat men brajil ke bahiya namak sthan par unhonne gulami pratha ka paksh liya aur isakee badi tarif kee jabaki mujhe gulami pratha se nafarat thi unhonne mujhe bataya ki ve ek aise vyakti se mil chuke hain jisake pas kaee gulam hain unhonne svayan hi anek gulamon ko poochha tha ki kya ve khush hain aur kya ve aazad hona chahate hain is prashn par sabhi ka javab tha  nahin mainne us samay upahas ke lahaze men kaha tha ki malik ke samane usake gulamon ka vah javab koee mayane nahin rakhata isase ve bahut nakhush ho gae aur bole ki isaka matalab yah bhi ho sakata hai ki main unake sath rahana nahin chahata mainne socha ki ab jahaj to chhodana padega lekin jaise hi doosare logon ko is jhagade kee bhanak lagi to jahaj ke kaiptan ne fauran hi apane laiftinent ko bheja ki jao aur ray ke gusse ko shant karane ke lie darvin ko kharikhoti sunao

yahan main gan room ke aafisars ke prati kafi shukraguzar hoon ki unhonne turant hi yah sandesh bheja ki main unake sath rah sakata hoon lekin kuchh hi ghante ke bad fitj roy ne dariyadili dikhate hue jahaj ke ek adhikari kee marfat mafi mangate hue yah bhi anurodh kiya ki main unake sath rah sakata hoon

kaee baton men ve bahut mahan charitr ke insan the unamen kuchh aisa bhi tha jo mujhe pahale pata nahin tha bigel par yah samudri yatra mere jivan kee sabase mahattvapoorn ghatana rahi aur isi ne mere poore kairiyar ka khaka taiyar kiya lekin ye sab kuchh ek chhotisi ghatana par aadharit tha ghatana kuchh yoon thi ki jis din mere ankal tis mil savari chalakar mujhe shroojaberi lae the sansar men bahut kam natedaron ne aisa kiya hoga aur to aur meri nak bhi isamen aade aa rahi thi main hamesha yah mahasoos karata hoon ki mere dimag ke lie is yatra ne vastavik prashikshan ya talim di thi isase mujhe prakritik itihas kee kaee paraton kee janakari mili aur chizon ko samajhane kee meri takat men badhotari huee halanki ye sari yogyataen mujhamen pahale se maujood thin

main jitani bhi jagahon par gaya vahan ke bhoovigyan kee janakari bhi mere lie kafi mahattvapoorn thi yahan mujhe tarkashastr ka bhi sahara mila kisi bhi nae bhoobhag ko agar pahali bar dekhen to chattanon ke dher se jyada kuchh nahin dikhata lekin bahut sthanon par chattanon aur jivashmon ke sanstaron aur prakriti kee janch karane ke sath sath yadi man men yah prashn aur aasha bhi rakhi jae ki isake alava aur kya mil sakata hai to us bhoobhag ke bare men kuchh tathy ujagar hone shuroo ho jate hain is prakar sari sanrachana hi kamobesh subodh banane lagati hai main apane sath leyel likhit prinsipalsa aofa jyoloji ka pahala khand bhi laya tha jise main savadhanipoorvak padhata raha yah pustak kaee mayanon men mere lie bahut fayademand rahi varde antarip namak dvip sent jego vah pahali jagah thi jisaka mainne nirikshan kiya aur vahin mujhe pata chal gaya ki bhoovigyan kee janakari par jitane lekhakon kee rachanaon ko main padh chuka tha ya bad men padha unamen sabase nayab tarika leyel ka tha

isi dauran main ek aur kam bhi karata tha sabhi prakar ke jivon ka sangrah main inaka sankshipt byaura likhata aur kuchhek samudri jivon kee chhoti moti chirafad bhi karata tha par ek kami rahi ki draing men hath tang hone aur sharir rachana kee zaroorat bhar janakari n hone ke karan is yatra ke dauran mainne jo sansmaran likhe ve sab bekar ho gae is tarah se mainne kafi samay barabad kiya han itana zaroor raha ki krasteshiyans kee kuchh janakari hasil huee jisakee madad se main bad men siripediya par apana prabandh granth likh saka

din men thoda vakt nikal kar main apana rojanamacha likhata tha jo kuchh bhi main dekhata tha use savadhani se aur vistarapoorvak likhata tha main samajhata hoon ki yah ek achchhi aadat thi mere rojanamache ghar ko likhe gae khaton ka bhi kam karate the jab bhi mauka milata main inake kuchh ansh inglaind bhej deta tha

abhi oopar mainne jin vishesh adhyayanon ka jikr kiya hai yadi unakee tulana beintaha mehanat aur dhyan lagakar kam karane se kee jae to ve isakee tulana men kuchh bhi nahin the us samay to main mehanat aur dilojan se kam karane ka path padh raha tha us samay main jo kuchh padhata ya sochata tha usaka sidha talluk us chiz se rahata tha jo main dekh chuka tha ya dekhane kee sambhavana thi meri yahi aadat is yatra ke agale panch baras tak barakarar rahi main pakke taur par kah sakata hoon ki isi prashikshan kee badaulat main vigyan men kuchh hath panv mar paya

yadi atit par nazar daloon to men kah sakata hoon ki vigyan ke prati mere moh ne any sabhi ruchiyon par vijay payi shuroo ke do baras tak to nishanebaji ke lie mera shauk jorshor se barakarar raha apane sangrah ke lie sabhi pakshiyon aur pashuon ko main khud hi marata tha lekin dhire dhire bandook aur mere bich doori badhati gayi aur ant men yah kam mere naukar ne sanbhal liya kyonki ab yah nishanebaji mere kam ke aade aane lagi thi khasakar kisi ilake kee bhoovaigyanik sanrachana taiyar karate samay halanki man ke kisi kone men main yah bhi mahasoos kar raha tha ki kisi chiz ko dekhane aur saty kee kasauti par kasane kee takat shikari ke kam se jyada hai is yatra ke dauran kiye gaye kamon se mere dimag ka kitana vikas huaa tha yah isase spasht ho jaega ki mere pitaji kabhi sandeh men koee kam nahin nipatate the aur lalat shastr men unhen koee ruchi nahin thi lekin ve badi paini nazar rakhate the tabhi to samudr yatra se lautane ke bad mujhe dekhate hi meri bahanon ko bula kar bole kyon ji isake sir ka to huliya hi badal gaya hai

aur ek bar fir samudr ka bulava sitambar   ko main plemauth men bigal par fitj ray se milane gaya vahan se shroojaberi gaya apane pita aur bahanon se lambi judaee ke lie vidaee li aur chal diya ek aur safar ke lie main  aktoobar ko plemauth pahunchakar vahin rahane laga aur  disambar ko duniya ka chakkar lagane ke lie yatra shuroo karane tak vahin raha kyonki bhari andhadon ke karan hamare jahaj bigal ke do prayas vifal ho chuke the aur hamara jahaj vahin inglaind ke samudr tat par langar dale khada raha plemauth men ye do mahine behad mushkil bhare guzare halanki main kisi n kisi kam dhandhe men laga hi rahata tha apane parivar aur mitron se lambi judaee kee yad hi mujhe hatash kar deti thi aur mausam bhi apane rang dikha hi raha tha

meri sans fool jati aur dil ke aas pas dard bhi mahasoos hota rahata tha doosare naujavanon kee tarah main bhi apani sehat ke prati laparavah rahata tha us par turra yah bhi ki mujhe doktari ka satahi gyan bhi tha to usake aadhar par mainne yah bhi man liya ki mujhe dil kee bimari hai mainne kisi daktar se salah bhi nahin li kyenki main poori tarah se man chuka tha ki vah kya faisala sunane vala hai yahi ki main samudri yatra ke kabil nahin hoon aur yahan main har khatara uthane ko kamar kase baitha tha

ab main apani yatra ke byauron ka aur ghatanaon ka jikr fir se nahin karoonga kyonki in sabako main apane prakashit rojanamache men vistar se bata chuka hoon filahal to mere samane ushnnakatibandhiy pradeshon kee vanaspatiyon kee hariyali mere dimag par kisi bhi doosari chiz ke mukabale jyada gaharaee se chhayi huee hai yah hariyali mainne petagoniya ke vishal registanon aur tiyera del fyoogo kee van se dhankee parvatamala par dekhi is drishy ka mere man par amit prabhav hai apani matribhoomi men khade nagn aadivasi ko main kabhi bhool nahin sakata jangali ilakon men ghudasavari karate hue ya navon men kaeekaee hafte tak jo safar mainne kie ve bahut hi rochak aur romanchak the us samay safar ke sath judi pareshaniyan aur chhotemote khatare zara bhi aade nahin aae aur ye chhitaput ghatanaen bad men yad bhi nahin rahin mainne apane kuchh vaigyanik lekhon main bhi inaka kafi upayog kiya misal ke taur par sent helena jaise kuchh dvipon kee bhoovaigyanik sanrachana ko spasht karate hue moonga dvipon ke nirman aadi ka samadhan kiya yahi nahin gailapegos dvip samooh ke bahut se tapuon par pae jane vale pashuon aur paudhon ke ekal sambandhon ko bhi dhyan men rakha aur dakshini amarika men pae jane vale jivon aur paudhon par bhi lekh likhe

yadi apane bare men kahoon to kissa kotah yahi hai ki samoochi samudri yatra ke dauran mainne khud ko kam men jhonk rakha tha kyonki mujhe khoj bin men aanand aata tha aur prakritik vigyan se jude tathyon ke vishal punj men kuchh aur tathy bhi jodane kee meri balavati ichchha thi itana hi nahin vaigyanikon ke bich apane lie thikthak jagah bana pana bhi meri abhilasha thi yah main nahin kah sakata ki meri abhilasha mere sahakarmiyon se adhik thi ya kam

sent jaigo ka bhoovigyan behad samany hone ke bavajood chakit kar dene vala tha bahata huaa lava sagar kee talahati men chala aaya is lave ke sath taja shankhon aur moongon ka choora milakar jamata chala gaya aur inake pakane se safed rang kee kathor chattanen banati chali gayin usake bad samoocha dvip sir utha kar oopar nikal aaya lekin safed chattan men padi lakeeron ne mujhe ek nae tatha mahattvapoorn tathy se parichit karaya vah yah ki jvalamukhi ke jivant hone kee avastha ke dauran lava nikal nikal kar kretaron ke charon or jamata chala gaya us samay mere man men yah vichar kaundha ki main jitane deshon bhi men gaya hoon vahan ke bhoovigyan par ek kitab likhoon is vichar ne mujhe romanch se bhar diya yah mere lie avismaraniy kshan the mere man par aaj bhi vah chhavi jas kee tas ankit hai ki lave se bani khadi chattan ke niche main khada tha oopar sooraj chamak raha tha aas pas registani ilakon men pae jane vale kuchh paudhe sir uthae khade the aur mere pairon ke pas samudri jal men jivit moonge apani chhata bikher rahe the yatra ke hi dauran fitj ray ne mujhase kaha ki main apane kuchh rojanamache padhakar unhen sunaoon sunate hi ve bole ki ye to bhaee chhapane chahiye aur is tarah se doosari pustak ka aagaj ho gaya

hamari yatra samapt hone ko thi eskensan par padav ke dauran mujhe ek khat mila jisamen meri bahanon ne likha tha ki sedavik ghar aakar pitaji se mile the aur unase kaha tha ki ab mujhe vaigyanikon ke bich jagah milana tay hi hai us samay main yah nahin jan paya tha ki unhen meri gatividhiyon kee janakari kaise mili hogi bad men mainne suna aur mujhe bharosa bhi huaa ki mainne kuchh khat hensalo ko bhi likhe the un khaton ko unhonne kaimbrij kee filasfikal sosayati ke samaksh padha aur unhen vahan vitaran ke lie chhapavaya bhi tha mainne jitane jivashmon ka sangrah kiya tha vah bhi hensalo ko bhijava diya tha is sangrah ne bhi jivashm vaigyanikon ko kafi aakarshit kiya tha

is khat ko padhakar main kisi tarah se aiskensan kee pahadiyon par chadh kar gaya aur apane hathaude se un jvalamukhiy chattanon ko thakathakane laga is sabase is bat ka andaja to lag hi gaya hoga ki main kitana mahattvakankshee tha lekin main is saty ko bhi svikar karane men sankoch nahin karoonga ki aane vale barason men leyel aur hookar jaise sathiyon ka hath meri pith par raha bakee aam logon kee mainne utani paravah nahin kee mera aashay yah nahin hai ki meri kitabon kee anukool samiksha ya khoob bikri se mujhe khushi nahin hoti thi lekin yah khushi kshan bhangur hoti thi par itana to tha hi ki prasiddhi pane ke lie main apane raste se jarasa bhi diga nahin
inglainda men vapasi  aktoobara  ke bada se mere vivaha taka  janavari

do baras aur tin mahine ka yah samay kafi uthalputhal vala raha halanki is bich bimari ke karan thodasa vakt barabad bhi huaa shroojaberi mayer kaimbrij aur landan ke bich khoob daud bhag karane ke bad main  disambar ko kaimbrij men ghar lekar rahane laga is samay tak mera sara sangrah hensalon ke pas raha mainne vahan par tin mahine bitae aur profesar milar kee sahayata se khanijon aur chattanon par parikshanon men juta raha

vahi raghubaboo ek din achanak bimar pad gae the bimari bhi unakee aisi vaisi nahin thi un par dil kee badi khataranak aur jan leva bimari ne hamala bol diya tha bimari ke chalate unaka chalana firana kaun kahe bistare par uthana baithana tak band ho gaya tha unakee bimari kee khabar jab mujhe mili to main bhagakar unake ghar pahuncha tha raghubaboo kee jo hal thi us samay use dekh main buri tarah ghabara gaya tha raghubaboo apane bistar par bejan se pade hue the unaka damakata chehara ekadam se bujh chuka tha aankhon men unake pida mishrit bhishan udasi thi dadhi unakee kafi badh gaee thi raghubaboo utan bistare par pade hue the aur unake donon hath unake sine par bejan se pade hue the nigahen unakee siling par sthir thin aur ve gahari soch men doobe hue the patni unakee unake payatane bisoorati baithi huee thi raghubaboo ko us halat men dekh main thodi der tak to avak khada raha tha isake bad apane ko dridh karata dhire dhire unake pas pahuncha tha

kya huaa  bhaee ji aapako  unake sine par pada unaka hath apane hathon men lekar use sahalate hue unase poochha tha to raghubaboo ne mujhe koee javab nahin diya tha javab men unakee aankhon se jhar jhar jharajhar aansoo jharane lag gae the raghubaboo kee patni jo abhi tak unake payatane bisoorati udas baithi huee thi mujhe aaya dekh ve bhi susuk susuk kar rone lag gaee thin donon ko rota dekh main aur jyada ghabara gaya tha isaka matalab ab raghubaboo ka ant ekadam najadik aa pahuncha hai aur ve kisi bhi kshan apani ih lila samapt kar is lok se bida ho lenge raghubaboo mujhe hamesha hamesha ke lie chhod kar chale ja rahe hai yah bat dimag men aate hi mera dil baithane lag gaya tha man men aaya tha ki raghubaboo ko pakad loon jor jor se rokar unase kahoon aap mujhe is tarah akela chhodkar nahin ja sakate bhaee jan main aapako jane nahin doonga lekin us samay mere aisa kuchh karane ka matalab tha raghubaboo ke marane ke pahale hi unhen mar dena main mard hoon aur aise maukon par mujhe dridh hona hoga mujhe aisi koee bat nahin karani hai jisase ki raghubaboo ke bhitar kee kamajori aur badh jae aur unakee maut unake oopar havi hokar unhen jo do char dinon aur zinda rahana hai usake pahale hi unhen apane sath le ude yahi sab soch kar main raghubaboo se lipat kar vilap karane ka apana irada badal diya tha aur dilasa dekar unhen dridh karane kee sochane lag gaya tha lekin raghubaboo ko koee dilasa doon usake pahale jan to loon ki aakhir unhen huaa kya hai

bhaee jan aapako huaa kya hai apane hathon men bejan sa aur thanda pada raghubaboo ka hath sahalate hue unase poochha tha to unhonne apane donon hathon se aansuon se tar apani aankhen ponchh apana dahina hath apane sirahane le jakar vahan se ek lifafa nikal mujhe pakada diya tha lifafe ke bhitar daktar khetan hriday rog visheshagy ke letar paid par unaka preskripsan aur sath men do tin janch riport natthi thi unhen padhakar raghubaboo kee bimari janane kee koshish kiya tha lekin daktar sahab kee likhavat aisi thi ki use padh hi nahin saka tha aur daktari bhasha men likhi janch riport bhi mere palle nahin padi thi thodi der unhen ulatane palatane ke bad sabhi kagaj vapas lifafe men dalakar mainne raghubaboo se poochha tha bhaee jan riport se to meri samajh men kuchh bhi nahin aaya aakhir huaa kya hai aapako mere poochhane par raghubaboo ne jo kuchh mujhe sunaya tha vah bhi meri samajh men kuchh nahin aaya tha kyonki batate samay raghubaboo ke gale se koee aavaj nahin nikali thi sirf unake honth hile the aur hothon ke hilane ke sath kuchh unake sas kee hava bhi nikali hogi lekin vah itani kamajor thi ki mujhe kuchh bhi sunaee hi nahin pada tha

main suna nahin bhaee jan main apane kan ke pas apana hath le jakar unhen ishare se samajhaya tha ki unhonne jo kuchh mujhe bataya hai mainne use nahin suna isake bad raghubaboo ne apane donon hathon ke ishare se mujhe bataya tha ki unaka dil jo bade fajali aam ke barabar ka hona chahie tha vah badhakar toonbi ke aakar ka ho gaya hai aur vah lagatar badhata hi ja raha hai
tab to yah badi teji se badh raha hai bhaee jan

bhaee jan kahin aisa to nahin ho gaya hai ki aapake fefade kee hava kee koee nali sidha aapake dil men khul gaee hai aur vah lagatar aapake dil ke bhitar hava foonkati ja rahi hai jisake chalate aapaka

Par phir isi dal se jinhe khud thukraaya gaya tha se Amulek kehta hai Aapke prarthna karne ke baad agar  tumne kisi deen aur nange ko thukraaya aur beemaar aur dukhi ko na bhent kiya aur apne sampati mein se agar tumhare paas woh hote hue zarooratmand ko na diyamai tumsekehta hoon  tumhara prarthna vyarth ho jaaega aur tumhare liye koi laabh nahin hoga aur tum usi prakaar dhoni hoge jaise ki avishwaasi hote hai Yeh hamein shaktishaali dhang se yaad dilaata hai ki chaahe hum dhanwaan ho ya gareeb hamein jo bhi hum kar sakein karna hai jab anye log ki zarooratein hoti hai
